column1: 3_076_13_spyi_don_W1PD153536-v16_img513-514_tei.xml,3_076_13,,ex76132024-10-25-14-49,unreviewed,4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4""/>cha 'di nyid du gzhan gyis bar du ma chod pas byang chub du lung bstan pa bcom ldan 'das byams pa yin pas

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">chos kyi rje dpal ldan bla ma dam pa</rs> la bstod pa gsol 'debs dang bcas pa 1 gyis zhes bskul ba'i rjes su <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5066"">slob dpon dpal ldan ye shes</rs> kyis kyang bskul ba'i ngor
chos kyi rje dpal ldan la ma dam pa de nyid kyi bka' 'bangs su gyur pa
column2: ma Ni ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4066"">thogs med</rs> kyis
column4: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5692"">dngul chu'i chos rdzong</rs> du <lb n=""N007""/>bkod pa'i yige pa'ang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5066"">slob dpon dpal ldan ye shes</rs> kyis bgyiso

column1: 2_050_14 ye shes kyi gzhag sa.19_04_2022.xml,2_050_14,,ex50142023-09-0816-07-29,reviewed,5b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b5""/> ci yin tshig du zhus pa zin bris<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50142023-09-0816-07-29"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><note type=""editorial"">(1st post-colophon annotation)</note><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad pa byon pa</rs> des <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6458""> btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> la gnang ste yi ger bris pa'o

3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-22-49,unreviewed,1.2 - 1.3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1.2""/>gyis bstan bcos pa mi shes rabs skyed sgyu ba bdun po 'di dngos su bden ba gnyis gtan la 'bebs la shugs la dra ba dang nges pa'i don gyi rnam par dbye ba 'thad pa la
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-22-49"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon klu grub</rs> kyi dongs pa 'grel pa la mi mthun pa du ma yod pa yin te
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon legs ldan 'byed</rs> lasogs pas slob dpon gyi thugs dngos pa rgyud du bkrel la
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon zla ba grags pa</rs> lasogs pas thal du bkrel <lb n=""1.3""/>lo
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon klu grub</rs> kyis 'thal 'gyur du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">zla ba grags pa</rs> la bkral la
column8: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">zla grags</rs> kyi thugs dgongs <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes lo tsa ba</rs>s <!--TODO =Nag tsho--> bkrel bas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:""><!--TODO =Nagarjuna-->slob dpon</rs> gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis la don rnams pa drug ste
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1215-05-46,unreviewed,2.10,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2.10""/>tha snyad du brtags pa yin gsung
column2: de ltar ma gzigs paʼi tshul du gzig pa de
column3: de bzhi nyid gzigs pa yin par yang btsom bdan 'das kyis chos mang dag par sbyad pa'i mdos pas
column4: 'ga' yang mthod pa myed pa ni de lo na mthong ba'i zhes gsungs la
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1215-05-46"" status=""unreviewed"">des don bsdus nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">jo bo</rs>s kyang
column7: <quote source=""db:"" n=""7ab""><!--Satyadvayāvatāra, v.7ab: ma mthong ba nyid de mthong bar / / shin tu zab pa’i mdo las gsungs /.-->ma mthong bar nyid de mthong par
column9: shin rta zab pa'i mdo las gsungs</quote> zhes bshad do
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-29-45,unreviewed,4.2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4.2""/>zhes bshad do
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-29-45"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes</rs> kyi zhal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis don dam pa'i ngo bo bstan pa yin gsung
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-29-47,unreviewed,4.2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4.2""/>zhes bshad do
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-29-47"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas bden pa gnyis ga'i ngo bo ston pa gsung
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1214-29-53,unreviewed,4.9 - 4.10,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4.9""/>dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin te
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-29-53"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas dbang po gsal ba ste rab rib lasogs pas dbang po nyams par ma byas shing yul ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzin pa dang
column3: de yang 'jig rten rnams kyis bden par byed pa de yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid <lb n=""4.10""/>du shes par bya ste
column5: de skad du yang <rs type=""work"">'jug pa</rs> las
column6: <quote source=""db:"" n=""6.25"">gnod pa myed pa'i dbang po drug rnams kyis

column1: bzung pa gang zhig 'jig rten gyis rtogs ste
'jig rten nyid las bden </quote>
zhes bshad pas de'i steng du 'jig rten bas bden par byed pa de yang dag kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin no gsung
column3: </seg>

column1: gnyis pa yul can shes pa'i log pa ni rab ris dang dmig ser lasogs pa</TEI>"

3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-06-26,unreviewed,8.8 - 8.9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8.8""/>na migs rgyu la chur 'dzin pa lasogs pas log shes de dag kyang tshad mas grub par thal lo
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-06-26"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes</rs> kyi chos can mthun snang myed pa'i rigs pa gdu gdu ba ni chos can bya ba shes par 'dod pas khyad par du byas pa yin ba la rgol ba dngos por smra ba lasogs pa chos can snang ba rten 'brel 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang rang bzhin myed par shes par 'dod pa yod kyang
column4: dbu ma bas snang ba rten 'brel 'di brdzun pa sgyu ma lta bu dang <lb n=""8.9""/> rang bzhin myed par rtogs zin pas shes 'dod myed pas chos can mthun snang myed do
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-10-26,unreviewed,9.1 - 9.2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9.1""/>
column2: tshad mas grub na
column3: tshad ma gcig gis bun pa la tshad ma gzhan gyis mi gnod pas chos can de don dam du sod par thal de
column4: tshad mas grub cing tshad mas mi gnod pa yin pa'i phyir ro
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-10-26"" status=""unreviewed"">de skad byas pa las <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">rang rgyud pa</rs> na re chos can snang ba rten 'brel 'di tshad mas grub kyang don dam du thal ba'i nyes pa myed ste
column7: tha snyad pa'i tshad mas grub kyang chos can kyang snang ba rten 'brel 'di cig dang du <lb n=""9.2""/> bral lasogs pa rigs pa'i shes pa'i yul du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zer na
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-15-57,unreviewed,9.7 - 9.8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9.7""/>gyi log rtogs sgro dogs gcod pa yin no
column3: mtshan nyid la gnyis thun mong spyi'i mtshan nyid dang
column4: khyad par so so'i mtshan nyid zhes mtshan nyid lasogs pa'i don bzhi res 'ga' skabs 'dir pang byed do
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-15-57"" status=""unreviewed"">'o na thal 'gyur gnyis po 'di la thun mong spyi'i mtshan nyid yod dam myed
column7: khyad par so so'i mtshan nyid gang yin zer na

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">rngog</rs> gi zhal nas thun mong spyi'i mtshan <lb n=""9.8""/> nyid myed pa yin gsung
column2: <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slang ba</rs>'i</abbr> zhal nas thun mong spyi'i mtshan nyid ni
column3: tshul ci rigs su khas blangs pa yin gsung
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-15-59,unreviewed,9.8 - 9.9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9.8""/> nyid myed pa yin gsung
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-15-59"" status=""unreviewed"">khyad par so so'i mtshan nyid la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">sngon gyi bshad pa po rnams</rs> kyi zhal nas khyab pa dngos po la gnas shing phyogs chos khas blangs su 'dug pa de yin no zer ba la

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">rngog</rs> gi zhal nas sgrub pa'i thal 'gyur bya ba bzlog pa rang rgyud dang 'brel ba yin <lb n=""9.9""/> pa la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">sngon gyi bshad pa po rnams</rs> kyi de bzlog pa dang ma 'brel bas <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>bsgrub pa'i thabs 'gyur<?oxy_comment_end?> gyi mtshan nyid ni khyab pa dngos po la gnas pa phyogs chos khas blangs su 'dug pa skabs su bab pa'i dam bca la tshad ma'i bsal ba byung ba la bzhed do
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-18-59,unreviewed,9.9 - 10.1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9.9""/> pa la
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-18-59"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slang pa ba</rs>'i zhal nas <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>sgrub pa'i thal 'gyur <?oxy_comment_end?>gyi mtshan nyid ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">sngon gyi bshad pa mkhan po rnams</rs> kyi des chog pa yin te
column3: bsgrub pa'i thal <lb n=""9.10""/><?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?> gyur <?oxy_comment_end?>du 'dug pa tsam gyis bzlog pa rang rgyud 'phen pa'i nges pa myed ste
column4: bzlog pa dang 'brel bya ba de bzlog pa 'phen pa'i nus pa yod byas pa yin myi
column5: gyi nus pa yod pa tsam gyis bzlog pa 'phen pa'i * myed pa ste
column6: dper na sa bon skya bo la my gu skyed ming nus pa yod kyang nus pa yod pa tsam gyis ci'i kyang mas kyang my gu skyed pa'i nges pa myed pa bzhin no gsung

column1: gnyis pa sun 'byin pa'i thal <pb n=""10""/><lb n=""10.1""/> 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid ni khyab pa dngos la gnas rung mi gnas rung phyogs khas blangs su 'dug pa yin no zer ro
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-20-59,unreviewed,10.1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""10.1""/> 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid ni khyab pa dngos la gnas rung mi gnas rung phyogs khas blangs su 'dug pa yin no zer ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-20-59"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">pa tshab</rs> kyi zhal nas bsgrub pa'i thabs thal 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid ni gtan tshigs kyi tshul gsum rgol bas zhe bas 'dod pa yin la
column4: sun 'byin pa'i thal 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid thal 'gyur de'i gtan tshigs khas blangs sam khas blangs kyi mthar thug pa yin no gsung
column6: </seg>

column1: de dag ni thal</TEI>"

3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-39-51,unreviewed,11.6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11.6""/>pa'i kun rdzob pama log pa nyid du bzhag ste de dag la 'jig rten pa'i phyis ba rnams kyis kyang bden bar mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-39-51"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes</rs> kyi zhal nas yul can shes pa la yang dag log pa ni yod pa kun rdzob myed gsung ba la
column4: de'i rgyu mshan ni 'di yin no bya ba ni mi gsung skad do
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-39-52,unreviewed,11.6 - 11.7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11.6""/>pa'i kun rdzob pama log pa nyid du bzhag ste de dag la 'jig rten pa'i phyis ba rnams kyis kyang bden bar mi 'dzin pa'i phyir ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-39-52"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas shes bya yul la yod na yul can shes pa la yang kun rdzob yod pa <lb n=""11.7""/> yin te rgyu mtshan la khyad par myed pa'i phyir dang
column4: gzhan yang
column5: <quote source=""db:"" n=""6.28a"">gti mug rang bzhin sgrib phyir kun rdzob ste</quote> zhes pa lasogs pa shes pa'i steng du kun rdzob kyi sgra'i don bshad pa byas nas
column6: yul can shes pa'i steng na yang dag dang log pa yod la kun rdzob myed zer ba ni 'thad pa ma yin no gsung
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1214-45-12,unreviewed,N001 - 12.2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N001""/>skyes snang ba tsam cig yod kyang sgyu ma dang gzugs brtan lasogs pa ltar bcos ma'i rang bzhin du gzigs te snang ba tsam cig yod kyang bden par 'dzin pa dang zhen pa myed pas kun rdzob tsam du 'gyur ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-45-12"" status=""unreviewed""> de ltar 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob dang kun rdzob tsam po'i sgo nas phye ba de yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes pa</rs>'i rang dga' ma yin te <rs type=""work"">'jug pa</rs> las /

column1: <quote source=""db:"" n=""6.28"">gti mug rang bzhin srib phyir kun rdzob ste
column2: <lb n=""12.2""/> des gang bcos ma bden pa (for bar) snang de ni
column3: kun rdzob bden zhes thub pas de gsung te

column1: bcos mar gyur pa'i dngos ni kun rdzob tsam du'o</quote> zhes bshad do //</seg></TEI>"

3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-40-52,unreviewed,12.2 - 12.3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12.2""/> des gang bcos ma bden pa (for bar) snang de ni
column2: kun rdzob bden zhes thub pas de gsung te

column1: bcos mar gyur pa'i dngos ni kun rdzob tsam du'o<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-40-52"" status=""unreviewed"">yang na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pas 'khrul pa byas pa'i yul dang yul can thams cad yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin la
column2: nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pa las gzhan nyon mongs pa can ma <lb n=""12.3""/> yin pa'i ma rig pa de rab rib dang dmyigs ser lasogs pas 'khrul pa byas pa'i yul dang yul can thams cad ni
column3: log pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin te zhes spyi thod du bstan kyang chog gsung ngo
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1214-43-55,unreviewed,12.7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12.7""/>'o na gnyis lasogs pa'i bkag pa'i cig du yod dam byas pa la
column2: de yang ma yin te 'di cig dang gnyis lasogs pa rnam par bcad pa tsam yin no
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-43-55"" status=""unreviewed"">de ltar yin bas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">jo bo</rs>'i zhal nas kyang
column5: <quote source=""db:"" n=""SDA 4cd""><!--Satyadvayāvatāra, v. 4cd (Ejima 1983, p. 362): / cir yang ma grub chos nyid de / / gnyis dang gsum sog ga la ’gyur / / 4 / /.-->ci yang ma grub chos nyid la / gnyis dang gsum rtsogs ga la yod</quote> zhes bshad pa yin no
column7: </seg>
column9: </TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1214-43-52,unreviewed,12.8 - 12.9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12.8""/>du byas na dang po kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid 'thad pa la
column2: dper na dmig bzhi rwa dang bcas ba ni mtshan gzhi yin la
column3: nog dang lkog shal ni mtshan nyid yin pas mtshan gzhi dmig ba ni rwa dang bcas pa'i steng du nog dang rkog shal gyi mtshon bya ba la bya ba'i tha snyad cig bsgrub pa yin no
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-43-52"" status=""unreviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">dge bshes lo tsa ba</rs>'i zhal nas mtshan gzhi dang mtshan <lb n=""12.9""/> nyid dngos po la yod pa bzhin du mtshon bya ba lang bya ba de yang bda'i rgyu mtshan mi 'dra ba myed pa dgag pa bya ba de rngos po la yod pa bzhed la
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-43-52,unreviewed,12.9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12.9""/> nyid dngos po la yod pa bzhin du mtshon bya ba lang bya ba de yang bda'i rgyu mtshan mi 'dra ba myed pa dgag pa bya ba de rngos po la yod pa bzhed la
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-43-52"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slang pha ba</rs>s <!--TODO =khyung--> mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid rngos po la yod kyi mtshon bya ni rngos po la myed ste brtags par bzhed pa yin no
column4: </seg>

column1: de bzhin du 'di yang kun rdzob kyi bden ba bya ba shes pa 'khrul ba'i yul du snang ba'i ngo bor grub pa</TEI>"

3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-26-07,unreviewed,N007 - 13.8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N007""/>yang khas long cig zer ba de lta bu yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-26-07"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">kha cig</rs> na re khyed thal 'gyur ba la yongs cos sgrub pa'i dam bca myed pas de sgrub par byed pas gtan tshigs lasogs pa tshad mas grub pa mi dgos pa bden khongs su gzhug gi
column4: rnam dpyad dgag pa'i dam bca yod dam myed
column5: yod na de sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshgis brjod dgos la
column6: de ni de 'gal ba rjod pa'i thal 'gyur lasogs <lb n=""13.8""/> pa brjod pa dgos pa ci yod zhe na zer ro
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1215-00-57,unreviewed,16.7 - 16.8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16.7""/>des na 'khrul pas ma shos pa rgyun chad zhes 'dogs na 'dogs la rag go
column3: gsung
column4: nan tar na chos kyi slu bya ba spros pa thams cad dang bral s ci'i ngo bor yang ma grub pa yin pas ye shes yod myed lasogs pa'i bsam ba'i yul tham rthad las 'das pa yin no
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1215-00-57"" status=""unreviewed"">yang na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">jo bo</rs>s gsungs pa bzhin du ye shes phyed chad bya ba yin te shes bya cir yang ma grub pa la ye shes kyis ci <lb n=""16.8""/> yang mi rtog pa ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni yod la
column7: ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba dang bcas pa ni myed pa yin no bya ba gsung
column8: </seg> de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi sa de na rang gi don gyi mthar sdug pa spros pa thams cad nye bar zhis chos kyi sku dang
column9: gzhan gyi don gyi mthar thun pa gdul bya rang gi rnam pas bzhag pa'i gzugs kyi bnhis kyis chos ston pa'i snang ba 'byung ste
column10: sems can</TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-29-57,unreviewed,16.10,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-29-57"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""16.10""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par bzhag pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon</rs> gyi gsung tshod bris pa
column3: </seg> rdzogs s+ho
column7: </TEI>"

column1: 1_021_03 rNal 'byor pa Shes rab rdo rje_bden gnyis kyi rnam par bshad pa.xml,1_021_03,,ex21032024-09-0412-46-26,reviewed,[55a5] - 55a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[55a5]""/> thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gnyis myed lam
column3: bden gnyis seng ge'i nga ro 'di bsgrags pas
column5: dngos 'dzin ? tshogs phyogs bcur 'byer bar shog
column7: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21032024-09-0412-46-26"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4627"">bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par bshad pa</rs>
column8: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3729"">slob dpon klu sgrub</rs> kyi lugs su <lb n=""55a6""/> sbyar ba
column10: × rdzogs s+hyo
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_03 rNal 'byor pa Shes rab rdo rje_bden gnyis kyi rnam par bshad pa.xml,1_021_03,,ex21032024-09-0412-46-27,reviewed,55a6 - 55a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""55a6""/> sbyar ba
column3: × rdzogs s+hyo
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21032024-09-0412-46-27"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bdag</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3913"">shag kya'i dge slong prad nya badz+ra</rs></note><note><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3829"">dge ba'i bshes pu to ba</rs>'i slob ma <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3913"">rnal 'byor pa shes rab rdo rje</rs>s mdzad pa yin no</note> gis <note type=""gloss"">ti ka</note> de bsdebs <note type=""gloss"">ba las byung ba'i</note> dge ba gang <note type=""gloss"">zhig</note> thob <note type=""gloss"">pa</note> des

column1: phyin chad skyes bu <note type=""gloss"">bdag gzhan gyi don dang tshig don gyi rtogs pa</note> don <note type=""gloss"">du</note> gnyer <note type=""gloss"">bar</note> 'dod pa yis
column3: <lb n=""55a7""/>bden pa gnyis ston <note type=""gloss"">pa'i</note>tshig dang <note type=""gloss"">des bstan pa'i</note> don rtogs <note type=""gloss"">par gyur</note> nas
column5: <note type=""gloss"">thabs dang shes rab du su 'jug pa

column1: </note> dbu ma'i lam gyis nges <note type=""gloss"">pa ste gdon mi za bar</note> par <note type=""gloss"">chos kyi</note> sku thob <note type=""gloss"">par</note> shog <note type=""gloss"">1</note>
column3: dge'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_02_C_NI_Ar_sher phyin rgya grel_etext.xml,1_002_02,,ex2022023-10-13-110745,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2022023-10-13-110745"" status=""unreviewed""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4453"">‹sher snying gi rgya cher 'grel›</rs></note><anchor xml:id=""a1""/>‹La¶ 588›<anchor xml:id=""a2""/></seg></TEI>"
1_002_02_C_NI_Ar_sher phyin rgya grel_etext.xml,1_002_02,,ex20220240828_1,unreviewed,6a4 - 6a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a4""/> zer ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex20220240828_1"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">dags po</rs><!--Probably for dwags po lha rje=sGam po pa, but could also be dags po dbang rgyal db:3792--> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs><!--uncertain whether Khyung po is khyung po grags se--> ni <quote xml:id=""d2e1608"">gha te gha te</quote> zhes pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid yin la
column2: <quote xml:id=""d2e1611"">pa ra gha te</quote> zhes pa ni mtshan ma <abbr>med</abbr> pa yin la
column3: <quote xml:id=""d2e1617"">pa ra sang gha te</quote> zhes pa ni rmon pa myed pa yin no zer ro

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'brom</rs> ltar na <quote xml:id=""d2e1624"">tad yā tha</quote> zhes pa ni 'di lta ste bya ba yin la
column2: <quote xml:id=""d2e1627"">gha te gha te</quote> bya ba ni song 1 song 1 bya ba yin pas tshogs laM sbyor laM du song 1 bya ba yin la
column4: <quote xml:id=""d2e1630"">pa ra gha te </quote>zhes bya ba ni <lb n=""6a5""/> pha rol du song 1 bya ba yin pas mthong laM du song 1 bya ba yin la
column5: <quote xml:id=""d2e1636"">pa ra gha te</quote> zhes bya ba ni yang dag par song 1 bya ba yin pas
column6: sgoMs laM du song 1 bya ba yin la
column7: <quote xml:id=""d2e1640"">bho te swo ha </quote>zhes bya ba ni byang chub zhi bar song 1 bya ba yin pas mi slob pa'i laM du song 1 bya ba yin zer te legs so

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_002_02_C_NI_Ar_sher phyin rgya grel_etext.xml,1_002_02,,ex2022023-10-13-111939,unreviewed,6b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b3""/> (spyi)r de<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2022023-10-13-111939"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4453""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3694"">'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa'i mdo'</rs> rgya cher 'grel pa</rs>
column2: <note type=""gloss"">gsang phu ba ar zer ro?<!--This note is by another hand than the glosses to the text--></note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">shag kya'i dge slong byang chub ye shes</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o

column12: rdzogs s+hyo"", staring with ""ni 'tshogs""; it might belong to the above lines rather than the colophon--></seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_046_02_sangs rgyas bzang po_legs bshad gter mdzod_etext.xml,2_046_02,,ex46022023-09-19-102726,unreviewed,46a10 - 46a11,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""46a10""/> rab dkar dge ba zla 'od [lta bu] des
column3: (zla 'od [lta bu] de)<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex46022023-09-19-102726"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4780"">rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i de kho na nyid <abbr>rnam par</abbr> 'byed pa <abbr>legs</abbr> par bshad pa'i gter mdzod ¦ blo gsal gyi yid la dga' ba  gter ba</rs> zes bya ba 'di ni ; <rs tpye=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5356""><rs type=""place"">gangs ri</rs>'i <lb n=""46a11""/> khrod kyi <abbr>rigs</abbr> pa smra ba rnaMs kyi gtsug rgyan daM par gyur pa ¦ rigs pa smra ba'i btsun pa sangs rgyas bzang po</rs> ¦ sbrang rtsi 'dzin pa'i dkar phyogs la ¦ mkhas grub du ma nye bar rten pa'i dben gnas ¦ <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5667"">broM pa rgyang gi gtsug lag <abbr>bkhang</abbr> <abbr>chen por</abbr></rs> nye bar sbyar ba'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-0309-22-52,reviewed,1a1 - 1a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-0309-22-52"" status=""reviewed""><pb n=""1a""/><lb n=""1a1""/> phyi <lb n=""1a2""/>la <lb n=""1a3""/>142<lb n=""1a4""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4476"">yuM bar ma nyi khri'i rnaM bshad</rs></seg></TEI>"

1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-0309-24-52,reviewed,1b5 - 1b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b5""/> bdag nyid chen po thugs rje mi bzad pas 'gro ba yongs su bskyab pa'i blo dang ldan zhing
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-0309-24-52"" status=""reviewed"">'jig rten na nyi ma ltar kun du gsal ba'i shes rab rmad du byung ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba chen po</rs>'i gsung sgros las
column3: dam pa'i bshes gnyen chos la mnga' ba rnams gyis lung dang rigs pa'i tshul ji ltar phye ba'i bshad sbyar mang po la brten nas
column4: de dag gi lam gyi ra ba las ma 'das par
column5: blo dman pa 'ga' tsam rjes su gzung bas 'gro ba drang ba'i sa <lb n=""1b6""/> bon gdab pa dang
column6: <rs type=""deity"">thub pa</rs>'i bstan pa rin po ce spel ba la gces spras gyi dad pas rang gi brjed byang tsam du rnam par bshad pa dgod par bya'o
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-43-46,unreviewed,1b7 - 1b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b7""/> pa dang
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-43-46"" status=""unreviewed""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">bzang po</rs> nyid kyi</note> mchod brjod du <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">mngon rtogs</rs> nyid kyi de bkod pa ni <quote source=""db:3706"" n=""D3786, 1b2"">nyan thos</quote> zhes bya ba lasogs pa ste
column3: <note type=""gloss"">rnam dpyad rigs pa las bshad thabs lnga gsungs pa las</note> ngag 'di'i dgos pa'i don brgyad <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5552"">shang ka ra nan ta</rs>s <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5832""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5831"">gtan tshigs thigs pa</rs>'i tI ka</rs>nas bshad yod <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">nga</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5616"">kha che</rs> nas 'ongs pa'i skyes chos yin te gsung ba</note>dang
column4: spyi don<note type=""gloss"">nyan rang phyogs gcig tu byas pa'i</note> 'phags pa'i gang zag gsum gyi dgos pa sgrub cing de gsum nyid <note type=""gloss"">'khor dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid</note> skyed pa'i yon tan gnyis kyis bstod pa dang
column5: de la phyag bya ba ste
column6: gnyis dang
column7: <note type=""gloss"">gang zag gang gis gdams ngag gi 'bras bu gang bsgrub pa zhes bshad nas</note>de dag so so'i tshig rnam par <choice><reg>phye bas</reg><orig>°e bas</orig></choice> <lb n=""1b8""/> rgyal bar bshad pa ni gzhan du blta'o
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-1,unreviewed,1b8 - 1b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b8""/> rgyal bar bshad pa ni gzhan du blta'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-1""><note type=""gloss"">gang zag gsum po de dag gang las byung zhe na yon tan gnyis bshad do
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa</rs>'i zhal nas go mi chen po gsung skad nas mkhyen pa gsum gi dbye ba la sogs pa <choice><reg>rnaMs</reg><orig>°s</orig></choice> 'dir 'chad phyis 'og du skabs su bab gsung nas lus phung 'chad zhes</note>nyan pa po skal ldan spyan drang ba ni <quote>rgyal sras gang dag</quote> nas te
column6: ‹rgyal sras gang dag khyad par gyi gzhi'o
column8: skye bo nas khyad par te gzhan don phyir yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'o
column10: dgra dang skal bas ma pham ma rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyi gdung mtshan ldan gdung 'tshob pas sras brjod pa bzhin 'tshob pa'i sras las nyan thos kyi dbang gis skye ba'i skye ba po yin pas skye bo ma lus ma smid pa smin pa mi 'dun pa 'dun pa ma grol ba grol bar gsum las tha ma bzung ba bsgral phyir ro
column12: byang chub ni byang chub chen po'o
column13: ›  'gro ba mtha' dag drang ba'i ched du byang chub dam pa don du gnyer <note type=""gloss"">ba dor na sems bskyed</note> pa'i blo ldan rnams <note type=""gloss"">gang yin pa zhes bsnyegs o

column1: slob dpon la ma ltos par mthong lam du</note>dang
column2: rang nyid byang chub gyi sgo mngon par rtogs nas <note type=""gloss"">rang rgyal 'phags par 'gyur ba gang dag sangs rgyas pas dman nyan thos pas mchog pas de dag dang mnyam med</note>slar <note type=""gloss"">'o na gtan du ba'i zhe na mthar thug gtan du ba med pas</note>yang thun mong ma yin pa'i lam de nyid mthar 'phyin par (byed) pa 'am
column3: rang gi byang chub thob nas slar yang lam dam par 'jug par byed pa rang rgyal rnams <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas 'di gsungs la 'jug mod kyi dnogs la gsungs nas gang yin ces</note> dang
column4: <note type=""gloss"">thub pas gsungs pa'i rjes su 'jug gi rang gi shes rab kyi</note>mi slob pa dang slob pa'i lam <lb n=""1b9""/> kyis 'bras bu nyon mong pa dang phug sdug bsngal gnon cing 'dor bas 'gro gnyan thos rnams te
column5: lam gsum (la) gnas pa rigs can gsum po yum nyan pa lasogs pa'i skal ldan de dag <abbr>thams cad</abbr> (chos) gyi sbyin pa la rtse gcig pa'i spro bas 'du bar spyan drang ba'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-47-09,unreviewed,3a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a1""/>kun dga' bo nyid<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-47-09"" status=""unreviewed"">'das ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas skad kyi byings shed yin nam paN+Di ta kun la rjes su ma byung gsung ste spyir bkas bcas la bya ba min yang 'di bsnyil lam bkas bcad las 'jig _rten _pa'i _legs _ldan _du brjod pa las khyad par du byed pa'o
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-48-00,unreviewed,3a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a1""/>kun dga' bo nyid<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-48-00"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas dgra bcom pa'i bshad pa tshar phyin pa'o zhes gsung zhes bden zla dang bdud dgra bcom pa yang sbyar pas so
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-35,unreviewed,3b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b1""/>phung po lngas zad pa ste
column2: _dang po gnyis dang de nas gsum pos ci rigs su rim pa bzhin no
column4: de nyid 'chad pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa ni rkyen dang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa gsum med pas _so
column6: dbang du gyur pa ni _spangs pa dang thob pa gnyis ka dbang du gyur pa ste zhes te phung _po _dang po bzhi _rdzogs pas nyes spyod dang sred pa dang lta ngan dang _srid pa'i 'ching ba _spang bya bzhi dbang po'i sgo bsdams pa la sogs pa las _grol nas
column7: _spyod _lam _dam _pa _dang
column8: _mngon shes _kyis _rdzu 'phrul gyi rtse _ba _dang _lha dang _tshangs pa'i gnas pa dang*
column9: _'phags pa'i gnas pa _yon tan bzhi thob pas _rang spyad kyi dgos pa la sogs pas 'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten _rang gi dang*_rang gi sems la dang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin dge ba la gtugs pa la sogs pas yon tan thams cad la 'dod dgur rang dbang thob pa'o
column11: sems dang shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba ni zhen [- 10 -] bsam chags gtor rmongs pa gtso gyur sred pa dang ma rig pa'i phyogs kyi nyon mongs dang nye nyon spangs nas ting nge gtan dang mi slob pa'i btang snyoms sgrib 'dzin _dang _shes _rab _thob _pas _gnyis _ka'i _cha _las rnam _par _grol ba'o
column13: cang shes mi 'jigs so
column15: pa ni mya ngan dang gnod pa smre sngags yid mi bde la sogs pa sdug bsngal dang
column16: ngan song _dang*_'chi _ba _bdag gis smad
column17: _gtan gyis smad
column18: _'chi ba med pa chad pas bcad pa'i 'dod pa'i mos smra rnams shis pa dang mi 'dod pa sha dang phrad la rtog log rtog la sogs pa 'jigs pa dang*
column19: _rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi chos dang*
column20: _the tshom la sogs pa mi shes pa'i dgos pa bzhi dang bral te bag tsha ba med pas ci'ang shes pa'o
column22: mdo sde las ni cang shes lnga'i tha ma 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med pas dgra bcom pa lci 'bab cang shes su gsungs te
column23: _khyu _rtsi 'bab sogs pa'i 'jigs pa med pas mchog dang glang thab mo po rta dang gzhan gnod seng ge yang ngo*
column25: glang po chen po ni rig pa gsum dang mngon shes drug la sogs so so yang dag rig pa gtso bor byed pa'i chos thob pas so
column27: bya ba byas bsgrub bya rdzogs pa ni nges par bya ba tshul khrims sems shes rab sdug bsngal las thar la sogs pas rnam grol rdzogs par byas pa'o
column29: byed pa byas sgrub byed bzang pa ni zhar ma rgyas kyang nyes med dang la 'dod pas 'jug pa'i bya ba sbyangs pa'i yon tan 'dod pa chung bas 'tsho ba chog shes pas 'tsho ba byams pa'i lus kyi las la sogs pa la sogs _pa _bya _bar _'os _pa _byas _pa'o
column30: _khur bor _bde thob ba ni bden pa bzhi la shes pa mi rtag pa la sogs pa bzhir spangs mngon du byas rgyud la bskyed pa la sogs pa grub pas phung po dang nyon mongs pa dang
column31: _dam bca' ba dang brtson pa'i khur bzhi dor te
column32: _phung po med pa dang rnam par nyon mongs las grol ba dang
column33: _rdzogs par byang chub pa dang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba bzhi thob pa'o
column35: bdag gi don rjes su thob pa ni ma rig pa dang rig pa so ye shes las phan pa ma yin pa rtsa ba nas spangs pa dang phan pa lag tu thob pa dag ston pa'i rjes su mthun par grub pa'o
column37: srid par kun tu sbyor ba zad pa ni srid pa gsum du skyes bu sdug bsngal dang sbyor zhing 'ching byed dgu las
column38: _lta ba dang _rtsa ba'i nyon mongs mchog 'dzin dang the tshom gsum dang*
column39: _phrag dog dang ser sna dang khong khro dang 'dod chags las 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dag dang
column40: _nga rgyal dang ma rig pa dang srid pa'i 'dod chags dag_rim bzhin zag pa med pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang dgra bcom pa'i lam gyis spangs pa'o
column42: [1 ]mdo la 'gyur snga ma las bka' yang dag par shes pa ni sgra 'dra ba la 'khrul ba yin gsung
column43: _dus gnya' zhes pa khyab pa'am bka' lung bsgo ba la 'dre ba la 'di khyab pa'o yang dag par kun shes pas nyid na sogs la mos pa sems shin tu grol ba ni [- 11 -]<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-35"">'o na kun dga' bo rgyun du zhugs par bshad pa dang 'gal lo snyam na
column44: _de dmigs kyis spyir btang zhes pa'i tshul gyis bsal ba ni gang zag gcig nas te bsgo bya sgo byed rtag pa can ni med pas shes pa'i rgyun tsam bag chags rnams kyis gang bas ci rigs pa'i 'gro ba _<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs> ba'i zhal nas phu su rna gang ba
column45: gang ga ti 'gro ba la len pa ste gang zhing 'gro ba lan zhes 'ong ba'o zhes len _pa'o
column47: gcig ni grangs snga mar chud pa las so

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2517-18-52,unreviewed,4b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b7""/>bstod pa dang dris pa'i lan legs par 'don pa la dpa'o
column3: sems dag pa ni zhum pa med pa ste dbang bcu thob pas sa gong ma pa dag gi thad du mi zhum pa'o
column5: so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa ni spobs pa mi bzod pa ste blo gros bzang pos chos kyi mdzod 'dzin cing chos smra ba chen po thob pas dbyangs kyi yan lag grangs med 'bum phrag bcu dang ldan pa'o
column7: 'khor du 'jug pa la mkhas pa ni 'khor zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa ste
column8: _rdzu 'phul bya ba dang
column9: ye shes _dang
column10: _spobs pa _dang
column11: _'od bkod pa _dang dris lan dang
column12: _dbyangs kyi yan lag dang
column13: _chos bstan pa dang
column14: _ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo gnyis dang*
column15: _gsang ba dpyad _pa dang
column16: _chos sgo dbye ba dang
column17: cho 'phrul dang*
column18: _dbang dang
column19: _sangs rgyas kyi yul byin gyis brlabs pa dang
column20: _byang chub kyi phyogs kyi spyod pa dang*
column21: _'jig rten dang sems can dang gdul bya'i khams brjod pa gsum dang*
column22: _chos dbyings brjod pa dang
column23: _zhing dag pa dang
column24: _sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad 'jug pa la mkhas pa tshad med panyi shus 'khor du bag mi tsha bas tshogs sdud pa la dbang ba'o
column26: brtson 'grus kyi rgyu mthun ni bskal ba mtha' yas pa las nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa ste
column27: brtson 'grus lhun gyis grub pa las thub pas 'dren pa skar rgyal la zhag bdun du bstod pas bskal ba dgu 'dus pa ltar bya dka' ba thams cad kyis mi skyo bar bde bar 'gro ba'o
column29: skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i la drug ste
column30: _shes rab kyi rgyu mthun ni chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang chu zla dang rmi lam dang brag cha dang mig yor dang gzugs brnyan dang sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa ste chos thams cad gnyis med pa skad cig la _byang chub pas
column31: _med _kyang _snang ba rnam pa brgyad po _rim pa bzhin
column32: _dbyibs sna tshogs _med kyang snang ba sgyu ma'i dpe dang mthun zhing re re zhing sbyar ba dang
column33: _sems dang _sems byung 'jug _pa _dang
column34: 'gag dang bzang btung la sogs pa'i tha snyad dang*
column35: _ming la sogs pa'i brjod pa dang
column36: _rgyu rkyen ltos pa dang*
column37: _nus pa nges pa dang
column38: _'gro 'ong la sogs pa'i byed pa rnam dpe brgyad dang mthun par chos thams cad rnam par 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'o
column40: ye shes kyi ni sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la sogs pa la mkhas pa ste
column41: _sems can gyi sems rtogs pa dang chos dbyings la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis 'thob pas dang pos ni sems can ma lus pa'i sems dang spyod pa dang mos pa dang de dag 'dul ba'i thabs kyang skad cig la shes nas 'dul lo
column43: gnyis pas ni rgyal ba'i [- 16-]      img. 47

column1: ye shes phra ba mkhyen pa bcu la mkhas pa ste
column2: _spyod pa phra ba dang skye 'chi dang rnam 'phrul dang*
column3: _mngon par 'byung ba dang
column4: _rdzogs par byang chub dang chos kyi 'khor lo dang tshe byin gyis brlabs pa dang mya ngan las 'da' ba dang bstan pa gnas pa dang gsang ba phra ba la 'jug pa mkhyen pa'o
column6: de gnyis bsdus pa ni sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa dang mos pa dang phra ba mkhyen pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa'o
column8: mdo 'di'i 'don pa ltar na ni sems can thams cad kyis sems can 'gro ba dang spyod pa dang mos pa phra mo sna tshogs la 'jug pa la mkhas pa ste ting nge 'dzin dang po'i bya ba nyid brjod par blta'o
column10: bzod pa'i ni gnyis te
column11: _gnod byed la bzod pa'i ni sems can thams cad ma dang pha byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa ste khong khro ba'i bag chags bcom pas so
column13: chos la bzod pa'i ni bzod pa rlabs po che ste dbang bskur ba thob pas ting nge 'dzin 'bum dang gzungs 'bum dang bzod pa tshad med pa shin tu sbyangs pa la dbang bsgyur pa'i dbang gis thams cad mkhyen pa la der las chod pa tsam mo
column15: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-18-52"">[- 20 -]   img. 51    las zad pas 'pho ba'i tshul ni sems can gang dag nas te ngan song nas bton nas mi dang lha brdzus skyes lus rdzogs pa thob cing 'dren pa dang 'phrad de dang bas 'dud cing mchod par sbyor ba'o
column17: dal ba'i yang gnod pa bsal ba ni de nas de'i tshe stong gsum nas de ngal sos pa'i bar ni rnam smin gyi sgrib pa bsal ba'o
column19: bcus dang nas ni las kyi sgrib pa bsal ba ste
column20: _las kyi mtha' ma dag pa gsum dang
column21: _'tshol ba ma dag pa spangs pa'o
column23: bde legs bsgrub pa ni sems can thams cad kyang nas te bsam pa dam pa dang sbyor ba dam pa dang bde ba dam pa gsum dang ldan pa'o
column25: bsngags pa grub pa ni de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i nas te
column26: _ched du brjod pa ni dgyes pas rang dbang med pa lta bur bskyed nas khegs pa'o zhes bstod pa'i tshig ste zhing 'di dman pa yin yang 'dren pa dag gi mthus 'di lta bu'i chos thob pa gzigs pas so
column28: chos de nyid gang zhe na dul ba la sogs pa ste rim pa bzhin du dbang po phal mgo'o med bsdams pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs skyes pa dran zhi ba dang gso gcer sogs med sbyong yan lag brgyad la sogs pa dang dge slong gi mi dge ba bcu spangs sdom pa la sogs pa dang byams pa pham 'dra la sogs pa sgom pa lnga'o
column30: rdzu _'phrul gyi cho 'phrul las _skus dbang sgyur dregs pa can gyi dregs pa gzhom pa'i ched du ba la zil gyis gnon pa ni de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nas te
column31: _shes bya la mnga' brnyes pas 'di 'chad spyod pas ston gdul bya nus sgra gcan la sogs pas _so
column33: nyi ma bsgribs _pa _med _pa _dang*_zla _ba _zhal _gnyis ni mdzes _pa'i dpe'o
column35: don _ni _stong _gsum _gyi _nas _te
column36: _'jig rten gyi khams zhes spyir bstan pa'o
column38: de bshad pa ri rab dang nas te lha'i gnas ni spyir ro
column40: dbang po ni brgya byin sum cu rtsa sum pa dang bcas pa'o
column42: rab byed ni gzhan 'phrul _lo
column44: lha _dang*_lha _ma _yin _ni _ri _rab _kyi _ngos _dang _khrod _ba_rten _pa'o
column46: tshangs _pa _so skye dang _gnas gtsang la ni 'phags pa'i gnas gzugs khams pa'o
column50: sku _mdog _ni _pags _pa _mdzes _pa'o
column56: de bzhis zil gyis mnan pas rim pa bzhin mdzes pa la sogs pa bzhi'o dang sbyar
column57: _de'ang  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi slob dpon</rs> gyis bshad pa gang zil gyis mnan na tshangs pa dang lha dang bdud dam mu stegs dang mi rnams zil gyis mnan _par _sbyar ro
column61: ri _rab la _sogs _pa gsum ni zil gyis gnon pa'i dpe'o
column63: 'di'ang bshad pa la gus pa bskyed pa'i ched du'o
column65: zhum zhum pa rnams kyi pa spong bas dang bar mdzad pa ni de nas yang nas te snga ma lta bu nyid kyi yul yin [- 21 -]

column1: img. 52 gyi bdag cag la skal ba med do zhes nas 'bad pa mi byed pas mi nyid kyis bsgrub nus par bstan pa'i phyir sku tha mal pa bstan pa'o
column3: de'ang lha la sogs pa dang gcugs pa bskyed pas so so'i mdun du re re ste sku lta bas chog mi shes pa zhes bya ba</TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2517-19-32,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 26,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 26""/> (D9, 83b) nas te lha la sogs pa bzhi ni 'jig rten na lus dang ‹ dang tha mal pa'i khong du 'dug pa la 'di pa'i kho nar nges pa ni › rdzu 'phrul gyi dbang dang dang rnam par dag pa dang rtog ge las che bar rlom zhing grags pa'i dbang du byas pa'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-19-32"">mngon rtogs kyi don nyid la <rs type=""work"">'grel pa</rs>r lus rnam bzhag 'chad pa na skabs dang 'brel ba'i dri ba ni shes rab kyi (D3787, 15b7) nas te
column4: mdo'i don spyir ji ltar blta bar bya ba dris pa'o
column6: 'di'i lan du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">rje btsun</rs> gyi lus rnam bzhag nyid 'god pa ni <quote xml:id=""d2e551"">bshad pa</quote> zhes 'brel ba brtsams nas <quote xml:id=""d2e554"">shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni </quote>zhes bya ba nas <quote xml:id=""d2e557"">yang dag brjod ces bya ba yin no</quote>'i bar ro

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2517-20-27,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/>skabs bsdu ba ni shA ri'i bu de ltar zhes bya ba'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-20-27"">spyi'i dbye ba ni de dag kyang nas te skyes bu zung bzhi ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rje btsun</rs> kyis bka' snga ma'i tha snyad la brten nas bstan pa 'di la 'jug pa'i rgyur nyan thos zhugs gnas bdun dang rang rgyal ba'i ming du btags par zad pas mtshan nyid ni gzhan kho na'o
column4: </seg>_khyad par gyi dbye ba ni des bsdus pa'ang nas te 'bras bu dang po la zhugs pa nas bse ru'i bar nyi shu'o
column6: brgyad pa nyid ni gang gi phyir nas so
column8: bye brag gnyis su dbye ba ni de la gang bcu drug po de rnams pa zhes nas te spyir brjod kyang skad cig bco lnga man chad la zhugs pa dang bcu drug pa la 'bras bur bzhag cing 'bras bu la ni dbang po'i dbye ba'ang ma bzhag par blta'o
column10: dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ni gang zag gi tshig la yid rton pas lam la kun tu brtson pa'o
column12: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ni shes rab kyis mtshan nyid nges par dpyad nas so
column14: dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bshad pa ni shA ri'i bu de la nas te phyir mi ldog pa bkol ba ni mi las 'ongs pa la'ang sa brgyad pa thob pa'i phyir mi ldog pa sngon dbang po rtul po'ang phyis sbyangs pas 'phos nas thob pa srid _pa tsam la dgongs pa'o
column16: sa 'di nyid du ni de mi srid par blta'o
column18: dbang po rtul ba'i don nyid ni shes rab kyi nas so
column20: phyi ma'i gnas kyang gsungs pa ni shA ri'i bu gang nas so
column22: chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba bshad pa ni shA ri'i bu de la nas te mchog dang 'bring gnyis po dbang po'i byed [- 56 -]   img. 87 bar pas thob pa'i 'bras bu dang bcas pa'o
column24: de gnyis kyi 'bras bu gcig tu bzhag pa ni shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nas te</TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-36,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/>skabs bsdu ba ni shA ri'i bu de ltar zhes bya ba'o

column5: </seg>

column1: bgyi ba ni gang la ming de 'jug pa'o
column3: ma mthong ba dang ma dmigs pa ni myong ba dang rtog pas sam de kho na dang mos pa yid la byed pas sam mngon sum dang 'thad pas te gnyis kar yang gnyis ka sbyar ro
column5: 'dis ni yul bden pa'i chos nyid gdams ngag gi gang zag yul rang bzhin de chos thams cad stong pa nyid bkod pas yul can mi dmigs pa'i ye shes bcu drug spyir bzhag par yang sangs rgyas ye shes la sogs pa shes zhes nyid gsung te</TEI>"

column4: la la ni yul gyis
column5: la la ni gang zag gis de gnyis 'phangs pa'i sgo nas te
column6: dngos su brjod pa dang don gyis bstan pa dang rgyud nas rtogs pa'i don gsum dang gnyis dang re re ci rigs par bstan par blta'o

column1: sgom lam la gdams pa la bzhi las spyir ston pa na dpe ni rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi nas te lam dang spangs pa dag ngo bo tha dad rang dbang can ma yin pas phan tshun gzhan du bzhag par mi nus kyang mtshan nyid gzhan du grub pa'o
column3: don ni rab 'byor de ltar nas te de dper byas</TEI>"

column1: rang gi lam nyan thos kyi rnam 'gyur gong ma'i spang bya bzhir gyur pa dang ngang gis bsdus pa chung 'bring bcu gnyis po ni khyad par gyi gzhir brjod kyang don gyis khyad par nyan thos kyi lo ga 'bro bcu las med pas du bzung bas drug ste de gnyis kyang _gzhan med pas so
column3: gzhir brjod pa de gnyis la dri ba bkod nas rtsa ba la 'jug pa ni nges par 'byed pa'i nas te
column4: _gang la rnam rtog gang bzhag pa ni spyi'am so sor ro
column6: ngo bo nyid mdor 'chad pa ni de ltar gdams ngag dang nas te sgom pa'i 'du byas na 'gal bas 'tshol ba'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i gang zag gi'o
column8: thos pa dang bsam pa ni gdams ngag gi don no
column10: rgyu ni thar pa'i cha mthun te phul du phyin pa ni dbang por ma gyur pa'i rab tu son pa'o
column12: bsgoms _pa _las _byung ba ni 'jig rten _pa'i _sgom _pa _smin _pas rtogs _pa'i _chos _su _gtogs pa'o
column14: nges par 'byed pa ni mthong lam mo
column16: de dngos su 'dren pas _cha mthun no
column18: drod kyi sgra don ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i nas te
column19: _gzung ba med pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i krang krong 'di mi bden par shes pa snang ba thob pa las gsal snang gi rtsom pa yin pas gtsub shing las drod phebs pa bzhin no
column21: rtse mo g.yo ba rnams kyi rtse mor 'gyur pa ste log ltas dge rtsa mi chod pa ni de 'phel ba dang ldan pa'o
column23: bzod pa ni brtan par son pa'o
column25: chos kyi mchog ni 'dzin pa med pa la zhugs pa'o
column27: rgyas bshad las dmigs pa la sogs pa bzhi ni so sor bshad pa dang spyi'i bsdu ba gnyis so
column29: dang po la</TEI>"

column2: _thug pa ma mchis

column1: rgyas bshad la bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzugs kyi nas te shes bya la sogs pa bcu la de dag bkag pa'i dmigs rnam gnyis ka sbyar ba'o
column3: de la shes bya ni phung po dang dbang po dang yul dang rnam shes dang reg _pa _dang tshor ba dang khams dang rten 'brel lugs dang lugs ma yin pa'o
column5: spang bya ni 'dod chags _la sogs _pa'o
column7: spyod _pa'i _lam _ni _sbyin_pa _la _sogs _pa'o
column9: byed _pa'i _skyes _bu _ni _bdag _la sogs pa'o
column11: rnal 'byor gyi lam ni dran pa nye bar bzhag pa la sogs pa'o
column13: 'bras bu mthar ma thug gnas skabs pa ni mig dang mngon shes so
column15: mthar thug pa ni mi 'jigs pa dang stobs la sogs pa'o
column17: de kho na gnyis las kun rdzob pa ni sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa'o
column19: don dam pa'i ni dben pa la sogs pa ste 'di dag</TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2517-22-23,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/>skabs bsdu ba ni shA ri'i bu de ltar zhes bya ba'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-22-23"">  'di _de _bzhin nyid la [- 87 -]   img. 118 sogs pa ni de thams cad kyi de kho na'i dbye ba'o
column5: yang la lar ni shes bya'i 'og tu spang bya nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ci rigs pa dang
column6: _khams gsum dang byed pa'i skyes bu la sogs pa dang
column7: rnam pa'i dbye ba dge ba dang mi dge ba la sogs pa dang
column8: _lam gyi yan lag tu rjes su dran pa bcu dang 'du shes nyi shu la sogs pa dang de kho na'i dbye bar skye ba med pa la sogs pa'am sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa ste
column9: _'di lta bu'i dbye ba bsdus pa dang rgyas pa dang phyogs re dang phal cher dang tshang ba dang mtshon byed tsam la sogs pa ci rigs par gsungs pa ni gdul bya dbang po dang khams dang mos pa du ma pa rjes su gzung ba'i don du chos can gyi dbye ba tha dad par zad la
column10: _'dir mdo la sogs gsal bar gsungs pas phyogs tsam bshad kyi gzhan du'ang de kho na ltar gzung bar bya bas rtogs sla'o
column12: 'on kyang mdo le'u brgyad pa 'dir ni go rim phal cher de dang mi mthun zhing chal chol du gsungs pa mang lags
column13: _spyir yang yum gyi mdo rgyas bsdus 'di dag la 'don pa du ma snang bas
column14: _ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon 'phags pa</rs>s kyang res 'ga' 'gres kyi dum bu mang po sdud pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rje btsun</rs> gyi man ngag gi bstan bcos 'di'i rtsa ba'i mdo gang yin pa rnam par dag pa de gtan la phebs par byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du go bar bya'o
column16: </seg>

column1: mtshan ma med pa'i 'thad pa nyid dpes ston pa ni gal te shes rab kyi nas te
column2: _kun tu rgyu 'phreng ba _rgya skad la sre mi ka zhes yod de bzo sbyangs su gtan mi 'thad 'phreng ba can nam ste can no
column4: can ni phyi rol pa'i bsam _gtan pa'o
column6: des bsam gtan bsgrubs nas mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i lta ba yun ring du bsgoms kyang don ma grub pas skyo nas
column7: _mtshan ma med pa'i yul 'di bsgoms pas myur du don grub pa las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu de la dad pa thob pa ste
column8: _gal te 'di'ang mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin na de nyid kyi de dang mtshungs pas 'di la dad pa thob pa'i rgyu mtshan der ci ltar 'gyur
column9: _dad pa thob pa nyid sgrub pa ni 'di lta ste nas te dang ba dang 'dod pa dang yid ches pa dang
column10: _de las thos pa dang bsam pa dang sgom pa thob pa'o
column12: mtshan ma med pa nyid du'ang ma zhen pas spros pa zhi ba la nges pa brtan pa ni de'ang mtshan ma'i nas so
column14: nyi tshe ba bdag med phyogs gcig bzang po ldan pa'am
column15: _yang na mos pa spyod pa nyid kyis gzhan sel ba'i yul can sgo nas don la spros pa phyogs re gcod pa la 'jug pas so
column17: mtshan med rtogs pa'i che ba ni de zhugs nas zhes te phyin ci log thams cad gcod nus pa'o
column19: rnam pa 'dis sngar gyi chos rnams mi 'jig pa'i 'thad pa'am spros par sbyar la bzhi las shes pa de nang la sogs pa'i ngo bor ma dmigs pa ni _de ci'i slad du zhes snga ma'i 'thad pa dris pa'i lan du'o
column21: thob pa ni 'bras bu'o
column23: mngon rtogs [- 88 -]   img. 119 ni _rang _bzhin no
column25: nang _gi la _sogs _par ma mthong ba ni _rigs pas dpyad na nang phyi gnyis ka de min de bzhi'i mtshan nyid can du ma grub pas so
column27: dmigs pa'i byed pa la sogs pa bkag pas de nyid sgrub pa ni de ci'i nas te rtogs pa'i byed pa po dang bya ba las dang byed pa ma grub pas so
column29: gsum ma grub pa de'ang nang la sogs pa'i chos dang 'brel ba can du'ang ma grub pas sgrub pa ni de ci'i slad du zhe na 'di ltar des shes pa de nas te nang gi tshor ba la sogs pa ni nang gi gzugs la sogs pa dang 'brel ba can la der bsnyad pa'o
column31: de ltar rtogs pa'i che ba blang dor chad pas gang du'ang mi 'dzin pa grub pa ni gnas kyi rnam grangs nas te gnas kyi rnam grangs ni gtan la dbab bya'i khyad par ro
column33: chos nyid ni rang gi rtogs pa'i nus pa ste rten 'brel gyi che ba de 'dra ba'o
column35: don de nyid bsdu ba ni bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad nas te mi dmigs pa'i khyad par can du rang dang gzhan gyi don thams cad 'grub pa'o
column37: mi dmigs pa'i khyad par de nyid kyang sgrub pa ni de ci'i nas so
column39: </TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-4,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/>skabs bsdu ba ni shA ri'i bu de ltar zhes bya ba'o

column5: </seg>

column1: phal pa ste sa bdun pa man chad do
column3: mdor ni don bzhi las chos nyid kyi ngo bo bstan pa ni de nas tshe dang ldan pa nas te sems bskyed nas brtsams pa'i lam gyi gnas skabs su byang chub sems dpa' zhes brjod pa'i tshig gi don nam brjod bya'i don nam gnas kyi don pa da ar+ya zhes bya ba gang zag der bzhag pa'i chos zhus pa'o
column5: lan gyi don ni tshig gi don med pa ste rtogs pa'i chos de dang de'i rten ni gang byang chub la dmigs na de dag 'byung ba shes rab kyi yul _byang chub nam mkha'i zhes pa'i tshul gyis _don dam par bdag gam chos ci'ang ma grub pa'i chos nyid kyis de'i yul can shes rab dang snying rje'i sa bon sad pa can mtshon par dgongs pa'o
column7: de la 'thad pa med par dogs pa de ci'i phyir zhes bsu nas byang chub la ni [- 100-]   img. 131zhes byang chub la dmigs pa'i sems kyi yul la rgyu las skye ba'am rang bzhin gnas pa sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i chos don la grub pa'am tshad mas dmigs pa bkag pa 'thad par gsungs pa'o
column9: ngag don bsdus pa ni 'dis zhes te rten ni dmigs pa'o
column11: skye mched drug gi chos nyid ni dngos su brjod pa ste thog ma med pa nas grub pa bcos bu ma yin pa'o
column13: de'i mtshan nyid kyi rigs ni don gyis 'phags pa ste yul can shes rab dang snying rje'i sa bon sad pa'o
column15: dngos por gyur pa ni bdag gam chos su grub pa'o
column17: rtogs pa'i chos kyi dbye ba so sor bshad pa la drod kyi ni nam mkha'i bya _rjes la sogs pa dpe dgus te
column18: _gnas ni blo'i 'jug gzhi dngos po ste de don la med cing tshad mas ma dmigs pa'o
column20: dpe dgus mtshon pa'i don gsal bar</TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-392,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/>skabs bsdu ba ni shA ri'i bu de ltar zhes bya ba'o

column5: 'di bas lhag _pa'ang bsnan du _yod _bzhin du ci ste _mi _ston snyam na
column6: _mtshan nyid kyi dbye bas

column8: _mnyam ldang dang

column10: _'bras bu gtod pa dang

column12: _yon tan gyi rten byed pa dang

column15: pas _shin _tu _bsgoms _pa'o
column17: chos _kyi _dbyings _'phags _pa _la _grags _pa'o
column19: nam mkha'i khams 'jig rten la grags pa'am
column21: rgyas par byas pa dang po rang la cher _byams pa la
column22: _de nas 'bring la
column23: _de nas cung zad dang tha mal pa dang
column24: _khyim mi dang grong pa nas phyogs bcu mu med pa la sgom pas so zhes bshad do
column26: gzhan gsum la'ang sbyar ba ni snying rje la sogs pa zhes de 'dod pa dang bsam gtan dang po dang gnyis pa'i sdug bsngal sel ba dang rnam par 'tshe ba spong ba la sogs pa ci rigs su sbyar ro
column27: lnga pa ni gzhan la phan pa'i thabs shes pa'o
column29: 'di la bdun las stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa med _pa ni tshe _dang ldan pa shA _ri'i _bu gzhan yang nas te
column30: _shes pa ni rang bzhin ji ltar bar _ro
column32: dmigs pas ma yin pa ni der zhen pa med pas so
column34: de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi ni chos thams cad la nas so
column36: chos kyi sdom dang rnam thar zla dang bcas pa gnyis kyi ni rtag ces nas so
column38: dus gsum dang*
column39: _khams gsum dang
column40: _chos gsum _gyi rnam pa'i dbye ba shes kyang dmigs pa med pa ni gsal lo
column42: drug pa ni snga ma rnams kyi rnam par mi rtog pa'i khyad par te pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'jug kyang byed pa po la sogs par mi rtog pas mtshon pa'o
column44: 'jig kyang ni kun rdzob tu legs par sgrub pa'o
column46: mi dmigs pa ni don dam par zhen pa med pa'o
column48: bdun pa ni don du gnyer ba'i khyad par ro
column50: 'di la gnyis las shes byar ma zhen pa sgom pa rnam par 'jig pas spong ba che ba ni tshe dang ldan pa nas te sgom pa _gzhig _pa _ni _b+ha _ba _b+hi _b+ha _ba _zhes _bya _ba _sgrub pa dgag pa de
column53: b+ha b+hi ba ni sgom _pa rnam _par 'jig pa'am sgom pa rnam par mi sgom pa zhes yul bden pa bkag pas der zhen pa 'gog pa'o
column55: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">sngon gyi lo tsA</rs> bas sgom pa rnam par sgom par bsgyur ba ni don ma rtogs pa'o

column1: shes par ma zhen pa gang zag dang chos thams cad ming tsam du shes pas rtogs pa che ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i _phyir nas _byang chub yul sangs rgyas ye shes so
column3: sems che ba ni de _gnyis _thams cad mkhyen pa'i _sems kyis _gzhan _don _kho _na _kun mkhyen dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa zhes pas la _gtod _pa'i _khyad _par _gyis gsungs pa'o
column5: </TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2517-23-52,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/>skabs bsdu ba ni shA ri'i bu de ltar zhes bya ba'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-23-52"">bzhi pa ni btags pa tsam gyi gang zag ming la sogs pas mtshon pa dang
column4: _de dag gi de kho na skye ba med pa la sogs pa la de ltar bkag pa dang
column5: _gnyen po spyi'i bsdu ba gsum gyis yin par yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> 'chad do
column7: </seg>

column1: sgom spang gzung rtog dang po dgu'i ni dris pa bzhi pa'i lan rab 'byor gzhan yang khyod kyis nas te
column2: _gnyen po'i mtshan nyid dngos la don dam par gnas bya ma grub pas mi gnas par gnas pa tha snyad pa grub pa'o
column4: chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'i dpes bsgrub pa'i don bzhag pa ni rab 'byor 'di lta ste nas so
column6: de'i 'thad pa spyir ni de ci'i nas te stong pa nyid la gnas mi gnas ma grub pas so
column8: de nyid bsgrub pa ni stong yang gnas pa ci 'gal snyam du dogs pa de ci'i zhes bsu nas rab 'byor chos kyi zhes stong par grub pa de la ngo bo med pas khyad par mi 'thad pa dang*
column9: _stong pa nyid ci ste snyam du dogs pa de ci'i zhes bsu nas rab 'byor zhes rang bzhin dpyad na gcig dang du ma la sogs par ma [- 150 -]   img. 181 grub pas so zhes bya ba gnyis so
column11: rten ni yul dngos por grub pa'o
column13: gnas dang ldan pa ni de'i ye shes de kho nar grub pa'o
column15: gnyis pa dgu'i ni gsum las nges par 'byung ba'i gang zag la sogs pa mi dmigs pa bstan pa ni dri ba lnga pa'i lan rab 'byor gang yang nas te
column16: _las dang byed pa dang byed pa po dang spang bya gang yang ma grub pas thob bya dang thob byed med pa'o
column18: sgrub pa ni de ci'i nas te kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang gnyis ka'i dmigs pa shes bya dang
column19: _lam dang 'bras bu dang
column20: _gang zag dang
column21: _gnas skabs kyi chos kyi dbye ba rnams rang bzhin gyis sgro skur gyi dmigs yod med la sogs pa'i spros pa thams cad dang bral bas so
column23: phyis bya ba'i mtshan ma med pa ni mtshan ma _gcod _pa'i _gnyen _po _yul _gyis bstan _pas _so
column25: de'i _'thad pa ni _gang _mi _dmigs _pas nas te
column26: gang bkag pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis chos de dag thams cad dmigs su med pa yin zhes dris pa'o
column28: lan ni chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa bkag pa dang
column29: _des mtshon pa dgag bya gzugs la sogs pa spang ste
column30: yod med thams cad ma grub pas so
column32: 'o na yod med thams cad ma grub pa nyid ci ste snyam nas de ci'i phyir zhes rtsod pa la chos kyi dbyings mi dmigs zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang
column33: _phung po mi dmigs zhes bya ba la sogs pas de dag so so'i mtshan nyid rigs pas dpyad na rab tu ma grub pa 'thad par gsungs pa'o
column35: 'dzin rtog dang po dgu'i ni rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i gang zag mi dmigs pa las te
column36: 'thad pa ni yod med kyi mtshan nyid la sogs pa'i spros pa dang bral bas so
column38: don ci yin zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pas med ces gsung bar rigs pa las mi dmigs pas dmigs su med ces gsungs pa ci ste
column39: _'di la rtags dang rtags can ci yod ces bsams pa'o
column41: lan ni spyir shes bya'i yod med tshad mas dmigs ma dmigs kyis rnam par 'jog pa yin yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa tshad ma'i skyes bu'i rgyud du gtogs pa'i chos thams cad dang de'i shes bya thams cad kyang de dag nyid kyi ye shes kyis dmigs par bya ba las ma 'das pas de'i ma dmigs pa'i yod pa ma grub pa'i phyir na mi dmigs pas dmigs su med ces gsungs pa 'thad pa'o
column43: de lta ma yin te gang zag gzhan la ltos nas dmigs par ma gyur pa'i yod pa 'gog na ni mi dmigs pas med ces gsung bar 'thad pa'o
column45: gnyis pa dgu'i ni drug las btags pa tsam gyi gang zag nyid dgag pa ni mtha' las 'das pa'i phyir rnam par dag pas rgyun du zhugs pa nas so
column47: de'i sa thun mong ma yin pa ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa mi [- 151 -]      img. 182   from bdr:I1KG5853     dmigs pa'o
column49: thun mong ba ni dkar po rnam par mthong ba la sogs pa mi dmigs pa ste
column50: _'di'i dang po gnyis ni la las thar cha dang nges 'byed gnyis la bshad do
column52: de dag bsgrub pa ni nang stong pa nyid kyi _phyir nas _so
column54: de _nyid _kyis _sa'i _byed _pa'ang ma grub pa ni sems can smin _pa _la _sogs _pa mi dmigs pa'o
column56: gnyen po'i skabs bsdu ba ni rab 'byor de ltar nas so
column58: lam dang 'bras bu ni snga ma phyi ma'i rgyur gyur pa la ltos pa'i tha snyad do
column60: 'bras bu dang lam ni phyi ma snga ma'i 'bras bur gyur pa'i 'o
column62: gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan ni yon tan gyi rten las so
column64: tshogs kyi spyi'i sgra don ni snying rje la sogs pa nas 'bras bu byang chub chen po 'dzin par byed pas so

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2608-01-30,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/>skabs bsdu ba ni shA ri'i bu de ltar zhes bya ba'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2608-01-30"">'bras bu ni stobs _la _sogs pa'o
column5: 'di dag _gi _'thad _pa ni [- 153 -] img. 184 dngos por grub na rdzun pa'i rtogs mchog tu mi 'gyur bas so
column7: de kho na ni chos kyi dbyings la sogs pa'o
column9: spangs _pa'i _la _gsum _ste
column11: spangs _pa _dngos _ni _rigs _pa'i _mchog _la _sogs _pa _las _brtsams pa'o
column13: 'thad pa 'di dag bden par grub pa na spangs pa gong nas gong du 'gro ba med pas so
column15: de'i gang zag ni rigs kyi sa la sogs pa las so
column17: spang bya'i gang zag ni lha la sogs pa'i 'jig rten las so
column19: rtog pa la bzhis te
column20: _lam dang 'bras bu rtogs pa nyid las ni sa'i rim pa'i sems bskyed rnams dang
column21: _rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las brtsams te 'di dag kyang dngos por grub na rtogs pa gong nas gong du 'gro ba las so
column23: de'i yon tan las ni bag chags dang mtshams sbyor ba spangs pas dang*
column24: _mtshan dang 'od kyi sku'i che ba dang
column25: _yan lag drug cu gsung gi che ba las so
column27: 'phrin las kyi ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas so
column29: de'i yul las brtsams pa ni de dag gi don du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can zhes so
column31: gsung gi yan lag drug cu ni gsang ba'i mdo las gsungs pas te bshad pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi slob dpon</rs> gyi man ngag bshad pa med par kun gyi khungs mthun par gsungs par snang ngo*
column33: </seg>

column1: chos kyi 'khor lo la</TEI>"

1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-40,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/>skabs bsdu ba ni shA ri'i bu de ltar zhes bya ba'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-40"">yang na 'di rnams <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA ba chen po</rs>'i zhal nas ni sgra'i gnas brgyad las tha ma bod pa skye shing zhes bya ba lta bu ma gtogs pa bdun las brtsams pa ste
column4: ' jig rten dang 'das pa'i byed pa po dang
column5: las su bya ba dang byed thabs dang
column6: ched du bya ba dang
column7: 'byung khungs dang 'brel ba can dang
column8: dbang du bya ba'am gnas gzhi brjod pa la ltos nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug tshan gnyis dang
column9: ci rigs par 'brel pa <pb n=""Gro chos skor 167""/> bar blta'o
column11: </seg>

column1: yang na 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa dang sbyar ba la ma ltos par 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa nyid kyi sgra don du blta ste sla'o
skabs bsdu ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nas so
column3: lam gyi rang bzhin ni shA ri'i bus nas te rtogs pa ni 'bras bu thob pa'o
column5: sum cu rtsa bdun ni mtshon pa ste de la sogs pa'o
column7: sbyong byed drug gi nang nas gtso bor yang yum nyid bsgrub pa la lnga las dri ba ni shA ri'i bus zhes so

column1: lan bstan pa ni rab 'byor gyis nas te skyes bu'i rtsal ni lam de dag gis 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i nus pa'i rgyu'o
column3: 'thad pa'i sgo nas rgyas par bshad pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam ni don dam shes pa'o
column5: skyed pa nyid kyi don ni yongs su 'dzin cing yang dag par 'dzin pa ni
column6: _sgrub cing brtan par byed pa dang
column7: _mthar thug par rdzogs par byed pas so
column9: bsgrub _lan de nyid 'thad pas pa ni tshe dang lnga pa shA ri'i bu sngon gyi dang por sangs rgyas bkod pa nas _so
column11: de la slob _sbyong byed gtso bo pa'i che ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi nas te gnas pa dang yid la byed pa ni 'dir rnam grangs so
column13: 'di dang ma bral ba ni gzhan don 'ba' zhig la gzhol ba dang ngo*
column15: de la klan ka spang ba la gnyis las yid la byed pa sgra ji lta bar bzung ba'i klan ka dgod pa ni smras pa nas te yid la byed pa zhes bya ba sems kyi 'jug pa mngon zhen la bsams nas te sel ba la zhugs pa nyid byang chub sems dpar rigs par ston pa'o
column17: 'di sel ba'i lan la bdun las sgra ji bzhin par bzung na rang la'ang nyes pa mtshungs par 'gyur ba ni rab 'byor gyis nas te
column18: _yang dag legs so zhes pa ma 'brel bar 'gyur bas 'di ltar blta ste ci'ang yid la mi byed pa yid la byed pa'i don yin pas mngon zhen la byas na ha cang thal bar brtsad pa legs pa'o
column20: pa'i tshig tu brjod pas don nyid du bzung ba ni yid la byed pa de kho nar ci'ang yid la mi byed pa sgyu ma lta bu'i yid la byed pa yin pa las
column21: _sgra ji bzhin pa mngon zhen nyid du btags pas so
column23: klan kar 'gyur ba ni skabs gzhan du rang gis khas blangs pa la'ang sgra ji bzhin par bzung ba'i nyes pa 'byung bas so
column25: ci'ang yid la mi byed pa nyid yid la byed par bsam pa ston pa'i lan rnal ma bsgrub pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te
column26: _nges 'byed bzhi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam ste gnas skabs lngar
column27: _sems dang chos thams cad bkag pas yid la byed pa de kho nar bkag pa ston pas
column28: _med pa dang stong pa dang rang bzhin med pa dang*
column29: _dben pa dang mngon par 'tshang mi rgya ba lnga gsungs pa'o
column31: skabs bsdu ba ni tshe [- 167 -]      img. 198   bya bas so
column33: </TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-393,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/>skabs bsdu ba ni shA ri'i bu de ltar zhes bya ba'o
