byang nas kying 'jiganas tshumab zhin gyi pa radu 'idapa khyed b.rabgyur ris gsungs so/ /migs baches pazhirang ba'agyor dpe ran sgu tshong gru zhig par gyuran debiskyes bugang zhig gru'i ma gu la mi 'jin debatsho bar 'gur cing [」]'dzin bzi bir mi'ugu ྲ bzhin tapa yis 'u phyin pojugadad gya cu bgyitshagasum ba'u rtsa bajan dadabams cadam thyen panyi gyi la dang mtshungs pa

ldan ba'i nid le 'jin si rum bzhi narang 'idi lami byodan srun medangab 'i mu htsab lis nyam sa par bgyur cing  / 'dringanas tshul pazhi nga 'idapab khyin grun ming pa'i gyu ྫོngabal sa nyams ber mi' ྒྱུra renis gsungags/ /li ma gyi la'en pam gong ba'i mim la 'in /rten nga banas gtang/ /zi pha' dog ping pos 'i thin da da/ /cimi led khis pa shin/ di brkyenar bcigi gan

da gyong ri ི sye bam pa sicam gtang pasu bu gan mu ུ 'jig brto rigs kyi lud rigs ྱི peim na ga regs pari 'tshang ྒྱba 'idaparangapabaridabapod kyangaba'isa'u phyin bajuganas thamasi  mdamathen pi'i babs kyis mo bsung na gya cub sems dpa'adi par mdor ni nor rgyu ro/ /khum pa so ligs par gnang nas tsho gnas na bde bar byin par 'gyu'ano/ de 'in/

'tsha nggyabar 'dod pa'id gi ga5dathags dang ges rapab kyis bgtsu na b.ramadong nan thos dparang sangasargyas kyis ra mi' ྒྱུra bdamangon par 'tsha rgyu' zhis pa dang [」]mthab dganyis pabanir pa'abyor 'di ྟ ste gub galharan ma byas pa'acu lagatang mtshong pa dag nyams par 'gyu ro/ /de bzhin tu bya chub sems dpa'agrun med pa'i byang tshugala'ad bayod kyang b.ro cu phyin bdug gi thims

da gis ragams kams na thams mdam ྱེna gams nyams pari 'gyur padang [」 ]sgya zag lhan pabyas na 'ad pa'i gnasasu phyin pastar bya chug cu 'tsho rgyabar 'ad pa'id gil yang thabs dngages rab kyis soms kyis zin nabams tshod mkhyen pa'i srid daphyin par bgyur rinis gsungasaso/ /yongs su 'a dzin bzhi rapa 'byor 'di bhe sti lob rgya 'i gu lan pand kyis bo ta bsgyis khu la
[image name: page 225.jpg]
[original page number: 225]

ma brtan par bgreb ramanus ba star slun med pa' gang zub la 'dod payod gyung babs dang shis bamedan nan theos dngapar rgyal par 'gyur ba dang [」]skyes thugs pan da kyis btab pa g.yas g.yonanas mi yis rtenan 'dod pa'i gnas su phyinapa lhar byang rub la dad payod pa'id gi bayang ba'eol du phyin badrug gis zin na rdzogs pa'i byang ུba kyi gnas su phyin par 'gyur re 'is gsu lo

hya ga ban dngas bal nyin bamedabasge tshur ris ci gu b.rog cu phyin brtsag gi gibaredag slun med pa'i gya cugad stol gil [」 ]slanam midang pa' gyi tshug kyong ga zigs zhas tshtsam bathams mnam shyen pashidakyil rajumatshol gig [」]de mi 'i gzhin [「]tshis dajrig gzhen pamed pas slun med pa'i ྱི tshung lri' nga'i gi ris gsungs lo/ de dag gidin bsrub ni/ zhe bar ni /

bcahag ladag nyi pes bya she/ /gangagis lam 'di gakhin dag yos/ kyud du ba gags pa khi par mim  di cisag sus ti  /ri lang phyi tshungi mimisangab 'i lim khyas khyid par 'di lanas songs ྒུbangabastun ni star pamad ba yino/[ 「]ni ྱེ pa bo'im tshan nid bag dpan [」 ]banadangaba'i ri syo la dang/ khinam si kyin sgrabs dag dang / /gnyis dang hung gnyin gling/

dan/ /yongs 'dzin bzhis gas dang / /lhan gyis ྒུba dang theg gsu gyis / /'bras pumangon sum mi bed dag /tham rten gyi mdzad po ste / /'din phyed pa'i mtshan nid yin / ces bste / de la ban paci mi gyi ma 'iphar parang [」]bde batshi'a'i'i lis sems dang / sgyob ba gnyi ga'i sdig bsngol se lal dang [」 ]sgyabs dadag gtan tu bar phyedapa dang [」]gnas redagani

rgab cas ston ba zhan/ /don dedag cir ba'i god bya ྫུbsems dpa'asems dpabachen pomi 'angig rtan ྤྱི lan pa'i nyi zhugs pa'inide pa' srob rgyud lcalas bkrol nus myang na las 'anas pulu 'a god denis parang [」 ]yangade bzhin ta re paba'i gyis zhugs pa yin tisamos man nams snu ga bsdul la dang 'id mibagad podar 'thugapa las yongs su bkol nas mya dan las

'amab ba'agoda'is padang / yang syob ba'i phyi tshugs bayini te phya chub sems dpa'asems dpa'atshin po mdon pong rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas soms can rnams kyis ldzog bsngal sgrang pa'idin datshos bstanas dedagatheg pagasum gyis myongan las 'dad bar 'argyur shis padang 1[) ]'jig rten gi sgyabs su phyur pa yin ni byang rub sems dopa'asems dpa'achen po

mnan ba'ardzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can skye bangagab dngan bdang 'chibarnams phung pom lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa las 'god deis pa dang [」]yang gyu rubasemasi dpa' sems dpa'achen posams tsan gyi gnas su gyur pa yin te bdom nid mngon ba' rdzogs par sangs rgyas gzugs me danas rnom pathoms cad mazhyen pa shid gyibalar 'de bamed paste bgag pami/
[image name: page 226.jpg]
[original page number: 226]

pa'i tshis sbon pa yini nozhes gsungs so/ /dpang gnyen ni 'ichibs mitshugs pa'i srid zhimanyam pa nid rtogs par bed pa yin te [」]rab 'bor gang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po'ajig rten gyi papung gnyen du phyur pa yini te   bdag nyid mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs kyi ba'ol gang yin pa deni gzugs ma yini nizhis nas rnam pathams cadamakhyen pa

nyim yin no/ /rag 'yor gyis gsol pa [」]bcom lngan 'das de lhan gyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen pornam pa thams cadamakhyen pa nyidadu mngon ba' rdzogs par gungs rgyas pa yin te  / gzugs nas thams cad mkhyen panyid kyi larel narnam pa' rtog pa gang yang med pa'i phyi 'i zhes gsungs so/ /gling gi phyid bani ra pa' gyor nus yongs su bskyor bam da pog

zhi bcini gi byis brjed do/ /de gzhin tugazlugs kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang gyi ma'i ma tha' yongs suchad pa'o/ de bzhin tu rnam bathams cadama'en pa'i bar dumatha' chad pa'on ba'o bzang pa'o mang dag paste'id lta ra hyunam dpad sred pa zad padang 'do chags dngabral bad 'gog pa dam dan las 'das pa'inis gsungs sa/ /yongs su lyin pani ra ba' gor 'aril gya

nub sims dpa' sim si dpala' chin posams can gyi gis le thugs rji tshin po bsgyedemangon par rdzo gas par sangasargyas nas sems can rnams la gzugs nas rnam pathams cadamakhyen pazhid kyi la sgyebamod pa dang 'igag pamed padang gunanas nyonamongs panang / rnam par gyung bamed pa'i tshis styonati [) ]yang dag por rab dgas labar bod ditshis gas gsos/ lo na kyin/

ggribag 'am rtsomal la gi gyis par sems can gyi din gyidapa ste de dab 'byor gyang rub sims dpa'asems dpa'achen po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas gzugs nas thams tshud ma zhen pazhi kyi lu nam ma'a'i nga tshum can na ni sa byabar sems tshan rnams latshos ston nyinyis gsangs pazhin no/ /theg pagasum gyi bras bum ngon ུna phyi ba ci misatham na ci cha/

b.ru yis pas yinate / dab ba ྱོ tshims bams na misib medangapadang bag gapa me dpu dang gunanas nyon mongs bar rnam par byung bamed pa'ing tshalo nan sted gong tshu de las mil mo/ da mi ྱི yin / ded ga'iphreg dbapong gomong migs ba'i phyi yinis gsus tho/ nyin ིsa tsad pani sar ligs chi chi ling bran nas na cig thin gi kho gang ba shig gago man/

zanas ma cig zlags kyid ngartsul nana'i de ga nid darul ro ngas mi 'ad 'o/ de ci' ྱིnga ིna / gzugs nyid kya gin ta med nidi la' grob 'am 'ingab lta gi la'agyur nyis banatsos bams nad ni 'imos dang sya mched da rten tsi 'brel par 'byung ba dang paros dubyi nim dug ging tsu tsan dedag tsub ri las mio 'a zis gsungs soto 'aci ྱེna bakhi mnang kyi/
[image name: page 227.jpg]
[original page number: 227]

zhes pani phyed po chos bcu cigi bshad pa'i don bsdus pa yin te [」 ]de dgakyang mdo' las lam rgyi gnas sgabs kyi phyid parar labras bu sangs rgyas pa'i phid pacirigis su gsungs nye   dedag kyang mtshonanas gsungs pa yinipas phyed pareri la 'angargyu phyed pa dang 'bras bu'i phyid paganyis yod daskyod te legs so / /yang 'grel patshung pa nas bed pa po dang po gsuman gzhi

yis pagyid b.rang [」 ]denas bdun lam shis pa'i phyid pa ring [」]phyed pa tham thams cad shes pa nid kyi ྱེda pa yinano nis bag de de la'ang mdo dang mngon ba' rtogs pa'i lung gis gnodapa medado/ /dani mtshan 'idade dag gis mtshen par bya bamatshan gzhi'ing bo nid bshad pan sbyor ba ni rub thoms cadamazhen pa gsum gyi sbyor bar 'dul [」 ]de dag gi tshis ni bicu jug ུgsus

las [「]ngo bganyi gis pa'i phbor ba'ingalin/non mongs rtags ngabamotshanam dpa khi sasan byog sa dganin pongam/ /khen da [」]zhes ga sang ste / de la non mongs nim ragi pa dang 'ijig tshogs bsaltu ba zhin la [」]de'inags ni non mongs pas gunas bslung ba'i lus ngag gi nnama'agyung 'in cing / mtshanam nid li na tu bi zhin mi shin ba yidil phyend pal brjed do/ ngi bin gin cisagan/

bora'izhing yang sgyar la [」 ]bye brag gi dpa patu byas nas mi mthun phyogs shes gya' sgrib pa da de spyong bganyen po' rtog pas dpen pa yinano/ /bzhi padidag gi mdon raba'abyor gyad nubasems dpa' sems dpa'achen podadag 'do chags dang ge sdung dang gti lcug bsal bas dpen ba'i rar bzhin du 'gyur ro / /didag gi rtags kyis dpen ba'i rang bzhin tu 'gyur ro/ /dedagagamin

masabapen ba'irang bzhinata' ྒྱུ'aro/ /'do chags dngabadod tshogs med po dang pa/ ne stang dang 'i sngang hrang  / gti mag dang gnyi mig medapas dpen pa'i rang bzhin du 'a ྒྱོུra ri 'is gsu sa so / /gnyis pa lam shes pa'ing go ni ni/ dga' des pad [」]chedu bya dang mi phazigasarang /khi na pang 'ir pa ba kag parang zhis po 'ims lnga gsus so/ de li da gakha gni sems mche/

medapa'igadan las langs pa'i din dug phyedapa dga' ba'o  des pa ni li ma ming migis pa' srem pa'i sgyorang ba sangs rgyas kya ྒྱུra des po'o/ /zhed du byab nisims can thams mad bams cad mthen pa'i yi shis lad god pa'i nino/ /mi migs pani sges ba pod pabasgrom par byab nang sgom pagasum mi migs pa'o/ /mngon pa'ashin pa bkagapa ni gyu rugalasames dpa' bsgul

mngan 'in babakagapa yinano/ do dgo las kyang khro gnyis thabs kyid bdadu byas pa dang [」]denas cimanas pa'i dpadadu byis ba dang [」 ]tham ga nyis shis rab kyidapad da byas pa shin nogs ngo/ /dedag gi mar yang raba'abor rgyis gsol pa [」 ]bcimi lhan gdas gya rul soms dpa' sems dpa'achen po gangagis sems canatham sacad yongs sum ngan la bzla bar gya shin
[image name: page 228.jpg]
[original page number: 228]

gocha btsal kyade lasems can dgadags pamid migis pa de dgani dka' ba b.ragyi dpar 'gyur ro'is pa dang  btsom ldan 'das gang sams can thams cad yongs su mya nganalas bzla bar b.lonas gocha btsal ba'i gyang rubasams dpa'asems dpa'achen pode dgan nyanathos kyas 'amarang sangs rgyas kyi sar lcang pa'i gnas mamachis so zhis pa dang [」 ]btsom lhan 'das byung rub sams

dpa' sems dpa'achen pos risims can thams cad myangan las bzla bdang rnam batham si mdamakhen pa shid kyi li shis kyidan ngagecha 'tshamag lazhis padang [」 ]btsomo lngan 'das gis mapa kyi piyolang phin pani ma babastedin sus kyung sgrom par mi ba sgyi ri lang bsgrom par mi ba rgyi ji ltar yang bsgrom par mi bapa sgyi' zhis pacang /[」 ]dga'abyo gyang rnabase mas dpa'asi mes dpabachin bog zhi

gis shesarab rakyilab resa'u byin pazab mo 'ari pazhen par mi byed bdini gyi mi ldogapar yongs subartag par gyi'inas gos ngas te gaslelo/ /gsumapa mas cad nis pa zhid bying goni gyi bani no/cigs banyis bu long yin po/ci mthun gogis bamed dngo li gcims gri li skyemed pa'i gi ི pasgro zhes pa'i mis btun gos tsas zi/ de la migs ban mi tshen gagasun/

la migis padang [」]mimathun pa'i gzung 'dzin gyi mtshan mal spyo ba thams mad da mi mthun pa dang [」 ]thogs bamed pani nyi mi bamu paci  paragazhirangalam dang rnam pa'i tshis rtogs parang [」 ]gzhimid banigis bdadashes phyami' migs pas bden pa'i gzhim da pa'i rtogs padang / 'grem nidi bzhin shid gyiganas sgub sa lari bzhin gshegs pa dadar ba'abyor 'gru'ing med pa'i

rtogs padang / spemedani dbazhin ni lo ga zugs masogs brjes sum sgyes pa'artogs po dang [」]rkad pa thamani tshis thams mad gyid bzhini nyid pamatshanam med pa'artogs pa'i / de dgar ba'agyor gtu ba sems dpa'asims dpa'agro'is rnam bathams cad mkhyin banyid lag zhil b.lib sam pas nis rab skyilarol nu gyin pazab ma'odil brtag patsi ba'onas gdad

btsoms ldam gdas tshos bstan ba'a'imi jig/rten bams mad dadami ma thun pa'i'is pa dang [」]chos 'di ging pamang phogs pamamachis bste / gzugs nas rnam bathams cadamyen pa ni kyi b.ri la thog si pa mamachis so zhis padang  tshos 'dahi gi zhimamachis bste / gzugs mas rnamabathams radamathyen panyid gyi lor dgazhi mir migs pa'isad bo ིsa tshemad po/

de bin tagazhan gsu ma yang gsungs te / ji ltar rebazhini gshegs pa'ir bzhin nid ma'os padadamasong bde bzhin dar pa'yor gyir bzhin nidagyang ma'ongs bdad masong bad [」 ]de bzhin gshigs pa'iri bzhin nid gang yin bde mimis thams nadagyi ri bzhin ni do/ /chos thamasatshad kyid bzhin gang yin bden dab zhin ga 'igs bi dbazhin shidan
bzhig sungs so/
[image name: page 229.jpg]
[original page number: 229]

mnang pa'ingi bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa'iri bzhin nid de [」 ]de ljar nar ba' phyo'an re bzhini gshegs pa'i rjis su sgyes so zhis pa dang [」]lha'i bu dag rab 'byor ni gzugs dbatshor gdang 'u ges dang 'duphyed dang rnam par gshis pa'i rdzis su ma sgyes te tshos de dag med cing ma ramigs pa'i byor ro zhes pa dang  btsom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid dang mnor ba'idi bzhin nidad/

gzhanam yin pa debazhin nyi dad tshes zhi dadangamos kyi dgyis dang tshos gnas banid dngos nges pa nyid dang yang dag pa'i mi thol 'di zib ste [」]del gzugs dang gzugs kyid gzhin nyid miramigs te [」 ]gang gi 'i gzugs nyid ming migs bde'i tshi gzugs kyi dibazhin nid dmigs parag la'agyu ces panas rnamamakhyen gyi bar dade bzhin ju gsungs so/ /nga bi ni kyid

baltsa ban/ ngaganang banu dag gdag ni //mtshon bu sta bur mtshon pasan/mtshan nidashin par bzhedapa yin  ces gsungs te gesa'o/ /de lngar syor ba'i mtshan nid shes pade las thar pa'imimathun pa'i tshigs tsholab las byung bde bshad pa la / mtshan med dbang sin la sogs / /yang dag sgrub lamakhas pari/ /rnam pa thams cad rtogs 'di la/ /bar pa'im dang mthun par 'dod/

chethog sang gte / ga ci'u 'ari la gyang cub sams dpa'asems dpa'arjen bosims thogam bskyed gnas bzung syernamabathams da mkhyen pa'i sims dongam bal bar b.ril du phyin bduganas gyung chub gyi lan lag rnams sgom zhing mtshanamar mi phyir ches gsungs temador bstan pa yinan/ da' din rgyas par bag da pani/ sas rgyus tsogs mi das da pa dpa/ spyi sogs saggo la

khatson gus da/ bsam ba cu tshag cong cipa da / rnam pa khi hadag ting 'ijin pa chos rnams patsi tham pa da hi da ྲnga ya'inis pasad nga po pui khlugs yings pang bano bo 'i ga khong su ngapongasagan ging tongo  ces gsungs so/ de bdagon mchog la mi phyidapa'i da/ bani thabs mkhas pas das gsum gyis sa chyas rnam sa kyi tshtsul khims kyi ུnga pod di dang bcin gyi yung god dani sar gyi

khung bomatshanamangagi phyedapa da ceg pa dang [」 ]sgyi sags nisyin bdad rtsal khrims dadang b.rodapadadabatstson 'gris dang bsam gtan da nis brnams metshen mar mi byid pa dang cis pa dang [」]bsamapa phun sumatshogs ches bani mis ras dang thags malas pa'ibis mabacan gang yin bdin sra na med pa yang dag pa'ardzogs pa'i bya rphab tu the tshom mamachis sazhis parang /

rnam pa 'a'i tigapa'i 'ing ngi 'dzin ni byang rub sems dpa'achen posims dang bo bskyed panas nyebar bzung stegang zhig gang gis gang du'atshang rgyab 'itshis 'ga' yang mi dmigs sa zhis padang [」]tshes rnams ces pani lha'i bdagangs kyang tshos thams cad rnam pa thams cad dumangon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas tebatshang rgya ba'i tshes gang yang ma dmigs te tshos thams cad shin jurnam pan/
[image name: page 230.jpg]
[original page number: 230]

dgapa'i ga tsa'as gsungs so / /rdzogs pa'i bang chub ces pa' rgang paganyis nithar pa'i mimathun sgyi tshis lnga laganas pa'i gang zag kyang dpang pornan 'tshang rgyabar sla ba dang [」 ]dpang po rdzul na 'tshang rgyal dka' bas 'bargyal pa dang [」]nyan thos gsum du 'gyur bas gsungs te [) ]btsom lngan 'das khla na med pa yang dgapa' rdzogs pa'i bingachug tumanganapar rdzogs par batsha rgyu

bgyib mi dga'onis padang [」]tshedang ldan pa ga'i'i lu 'id ni nan thos kyi ིga pa 'dini rang sangs rgyos kyi phig pe 'din sangs rgyus kyi phigapa'o zhis sems dpar 'gyurate tshes thamis cad kyi dibazhin shid la mi sgyeg na rdzogs pa'i bang nug tu 'gyur ri zhis pa dang [」 ]blan med pa yang da ge par rdzogs pa'i gyang chug tu 'tsha rgyub dga'aston mom kha' ni batshang rgyubar gya'o snam rdzom

sems dpa'i phyir rezhis gsungs so / /khar pa'ichi mthun gyi bras bu des par 'i gi pa'i chi dang mthun pa bshad po labazhi la sa bo kyi yi yes ni beo rtsams kyi cigs pani/sems tsan this cad zhi ga basjogs / de dag khi sims mnam sogs/ /dam pa dgani bcad bgad do  ces gsungasos/ de la dodanu bir migs pazhirang ba 'bo gu mngon pa'e

rdzogs par batshong rgyabar 'dod pos sems can thams nad kyidung dane ri mid pasamenyam pa ni kyi soms dang [」]byamis bachen pobaskyed par ba'o'is paganyis dang [」 ]'a'ing bo'i migs b.rim 'ongs pan sdag bstsaledang bral zhing bdi bigapa 'od pa'i ban bdang [」]tsho grob med b.rang [」]rnam par bachibamed pa'i sims gisum dang [」]chen po'ing mi gi sa bani par

ma'isims dang / sbund sring mo'isims dang / zu dadabu mi'i sims dang [」 ]srogs po dang yid gnan gyi sems dang [」 ]gnyen ngang gonag gi gnyin 'tshams kyisims sgyedaper gya'i zhis zung re bsgras pa lta syi ban rogasangase pa yin na/ /re mo'ir bang dmadzad pani/ gangag ni phyig pa las lcog tshing /sbini pal sogs laganas pi namadi dgam ni nga gong pa dang / /bsngags pa

btodagar b.lun pa nin/ /rtsa ི lyar  cesagasu si sa/ de la' be mo nung 'i migs banis dag ni mingad ge pa bculas ldog cing gzhan ldog tub jug ya dang [」 ]gdadog lda ga ba'i sdegs babo rjod cing 'thun padaga'i bar phyed bdang [」]'bring gir migs pani padag nid pa mis du phyin pa jugardzogs phazor phyed cing gzhan labasgrul phadang [「]gang dag gnas padag gi bsdags

babarjod cing 'thun pas dga' par byed pa dang [」]chen po'i ramigs pa nisags pas lastus te bdag nyid stong pazhid thams da dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung bsgromazhing gzhan 'god pa dang [」]gang dgasgom pa'i bsngags pa brjod cing 'thun bas dga' par byed bzhes gsungs so / /ye shes gsum pabastun pan [」]debanan bzod pani //rang gzhan rten can bden shis pa
[image name: page 231.jpg]
[original page number: 231]

zhis gsungs te  / bden pa bzhi shis pa' rtin can yonal [」 ]de yang bzod pa zhung ni sdi gabasngal shes par bkun 'byung sprang bar bya 'gog pamangon du bya lam sgom par bya [」 ]gzhan yang bsgul par gyazhes pa dang [」 ]'phri ni bdag nyid kyangargyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngan du byaba'i phyiri shis pa sgrid de mngon tum phye nyes padang [」]chen po bdag nyid kyang byu rub sems

da'i sgyin med par bdugapar bya  / gzhan yang bsgul par gya'azhis gsungs so / /ye nis bzhing ni tshos mtshogad gi sems tshan rnams/ sgyi ped sogs kyis shes pang gya [ ) ]ces gsungs se/ de lo tshos mtshog nung ni padag shid kyis kyang sa mis tsam yongs susgyin par bya  ginan sbyon par phed pol bsgrul par gyinyis padang [」 ]'bri ni bdag ni kyis kying gyung tshug

sem gdangapa'iman pa yashis pab syed pa'agya genin pang bsgrul pa' phyis padang [」]cen porimapa gnyi kyis yyang nam pathams mdam zhyin pa ni kyili 'is bsgyed par tho / gnan yang sgrub bar byi ིsa gsus so/[ 「]ri ma gun ma gi ringabags tigs pe'i sbyo ba phyin cim log bsgu ba sgyis ba'i gar bag byur mi sdog ba'id ge sun bgabkuogam nid

sa'atshams ྱི sgenas ngos gzang pani des phyed yan laganas pab si ste / mthong dang goms pa'i lam dag la /[」]bang bsi mas dpar gang dag gnas / de 'ari phyir mi tshog pa'i tshigs  / cesig sung soti / dba' syor 'di la so sa'isyi ba'is dang nan thos kyis dang bang tshub sems dopa'is dad de bzhin gshigs po'isar bsu dpadethams cad kyang de bzhin 'id las ྒྱུra bamed

ci rtog ba med bar yi san phyi mi ldig par shes pa' gya'inis gsungs so / de dag gi din rgyas par bshad pasdetshinagasumalas  sgyor lam la gnas pa'i rir miljog pa'ir ge 'dun bgad pa ligasum stye[ 「]rtags gyi byi basyodar bstun pa dang [」 ]sola'i ngi birgyis par bgad pa dang [」]don bsnu ba'o/ /da po ni / gzags las scogs pas lcog sogs rtsigs/ /

rnam ba ti ྱུra bjo pa sri / /nges khyed yan lag la gnas pa'i/ /phi mi ldog palematshan nyid 'ad [」 ]zhes gsungs so / /'di dag gi don kyang btsom lcan 'das phyir moi lcog pa'i byad rub semes dpa' rtigs dang mtshan malugs [」 ]bdag gis ji ltar batshal phar bgyinyis zhus pa'i lan tus thams cad kyingi bzhini rtigs nas rnam par mi rtigapa zhis sngor bshad pade ning yinan/ de lha

yin yang 'di rtags dang bsgrub bya'i ྱdpar bsam pal gnyisate / gzhan gyi bgad pa dgag pad [」]rang gi'adod pab shad ba'o/ /dang pon smib dpon dganari bang chubasems dpeb gzhan tshes can mnyam banag lam gyi yi shis dang ldan ba yini te lus dgagi'igi byed 'i lta bu da lnga na pa'i gir ri zhis pa'i bras rtags dang [」 ]yang byang rubase mas dpa' 'di tshis can nges par batsha
[image name: page 232.jpg]
[original page number: 232]

rgyaba'aca ste yi nis 'di lta bu dang ldan pa'i giririzhis rang bzhin gyis rtags gnyis bkodanas [」]khyab pani rapa 'yor bdag gi rgyud lamanyam ba'ag gi yi sheis sgyes pan lus dag girnama'agyur las yi shis kyi ྱdpa' gyis khyab par mthong pan byang rnag sems dpagagazhan lalang de bzhin bsgrub pa yi nonis zer ro / /deni ligs param sims te lus ngag garnim 'gyur las lam rgyu yashas

dang ldan bsgrub par nus su zin yangades phyi mi ljigapa nyid dusgub par mi nus te  /nanathes dang ra rgyal ba'i minam bzhag rgi li shis kyisamanges pa'i gi ri/ /gzhung gid gongs pa'i gyung mi gu ste khyed ltaran ga'ang bdid gagis 'bras 'u'i na chigs bstananam [」]rangabazhin gyisi gtan tshigs bstan / dngabo ltar 'ardzogs pa'i gyang chug las phyir mi lcig par gsungs pasa'

syil shes sab bar bed pa'agalal [」]gnyis bltaran yang mi rung ste 'dir gsungs pa'i rtags gang dang mi mthun pa'i gyi ro/ /gnyis bal gsum las [」 ]sgrob gyani mis 'i lazhugs pangag dpang bonan 'di ji skad gsungs ba'i gyang chub las phyi mi ldog pa yinano/ /gsum brtags kyi dan nirang dam gnan mdacung ste  /khyung rub sems dpa' gad la grub ba'i rigs

nugu bomangan sumar rjes dpag dad gung gang yang pa pasanges bzhig yin no/ /gsum brtags de'i gya bo ba ni rong bzhin dang brus tsumi 'jangab stededag gi'iphril bayang lung lasangis ba yin gyi gzhan gyisam 'in te / ra byong gyi si gyang ngi ltor btsal par brgyis gsungs ba'i gyiro / de dag gi din zyas par pagadob yobazhilas [」]dngapo 'id tshi rigasapa

laganas rtags banagacig gsungs pa las rtags 'didag kyang slob dpon 'pha gas pa ltang ni dang bsgyi 'isakhomams yinal [」]slob don sing ge bzang bo lhar na tham yongs su rdzogs pa'i si 'tshams yin ni zhis gsung ngo / ji ltar yin yangarang skyid pobani ni/ garugs mo sogs los lhag padang [」]kha tshom mi dal zad pa dang / /bdag nyid dege bal gnas shing /

gzhan dgari la'agod pa dang / ces gsungs so / /dadag kyang raba'abyor gya chubasemis dpa'asoms dpa'achen po gang gzugs dang tshor bdada'acugis dang ba'uphyed dang rnam pa'i shis phalas gyi  ljogab dadames bdang [」 ]thetsho ma zad panidi gono mtshog gsum gyi yon ton la dadang pas sgyabs gnasam yin pa la thetshem med pa ste [) ]rab 'byor gzhan yang gyi ril pa'i da gi

spyod bram ze gshan dag gi b.ramilta stedani gnas med ching betshom mi zishinas padang / midalabaradapani ligapar lta bar mi'i ྒྱུ sems can dgyal gdang gshin rji'i 'jigarten dang lcam yin dong yul me tha'al khob dadathen mi rnugs pa dang lhatshe 'ing sa bodad dad 'grodang pung ma rtsam sgyil zhis padang [」 ]bdag nyid kyang srog gtso dpa sbong banas mid gi baban syangad ni gzhatsan
[image name: page 233.jpg]
[original page number: 233]

[「]geb bcu sbong pa la 'god pani phyir mi ljog par rig par bye'ozhis gsungs so / /denas yangatshog bzhigasungs pa ni/gzhan bhi ྟིna can spyin sogs dang/ /khabama' tsan la som nyi mid / /bsas luslogs dang srib pa ni/ /rnam pa lhad mi phrogs dang  / ces bste  / gang gi mi spyin ba'i b.lol du phyin padangatshul zhrims kyi lagoladu gyin pard basyod/

yayogad phyinapadang brtson 'gyus kyi la logadaphyin gdang bsamaganan gyi tho bogacu phyin pa dang shis rab kyi pa'og du phyin pa laganas pa'i tshi thams mad kyi tshisims can gyi dan busgru ba gzhis padang [」]chos zabamol dogs pa dang kridaganyis da thetshomame dadezhis padang [」]lus kyilas 'jam pa dang ldan pa yinang gagi las 'jamapa dang ldan pa yin yidakyi las 'jam pa dang ldan pa

yin ches bdad  / 'dod ba pa'un par / gnodasams dpa ga'i lugs dang sgoda'aphyod be tshom bisli bapalngad mi 'grogs pa yini  / dab 'yuo rtsa mapa de gad rtigs dedagadangamatshanam ded gad ldan pan pyi myi ldig parari gapa' bya 'is gsas so/ 'ani batshod pa'ad phyi du pod dag gagyi dod kyi li shis thobanas gzhi dang myi'i gogs nam bi ིgan

bltan gnas sa bcu'i ba 'acu rtsi lam gyirtags bshad bci syi staman /slob dpon 'phags pan re dbang bornon 'dir bshang paltar yanal [」]rtalan de'ingis bamed da'is gsung la / yangan sgrib ba'adi dgashas rung btsam yani gyi gtan nas med panimi yin te / mdobargyud stong phalas  gyi mi ljegaba'i bya bub sems dpa' rmags pa dang ga'i chid pan

'gri ga'an ga gas cring ba'i ga'i po/ 'enas yang gagang sa pa ni/ bag la 1mgun 'thoms pad nga 1ngan parang ni shis pazhin nga / /zhing las mogam pagasatsa   nga  zhes bste / rab 'a byor gzhan ga sagyi ླིgakhapa 'i bya chubalas mas da ba'ase nalasar paba' ren pol mams ga sum byimirim pabase bsnan kha'ingabag matal thamaso ma dacame ded 'is phod/

gagri'aning 'ong yang bi zhul ba'isims kyis mi 'gro ma 'ing sted ngran bzhin tu 'grobag 'jug sdod ces pa dang [」]tshos gos long syo bal sromamed pas smad ta med padang [ 」 ]gtsangasgru'i nun tu syo bdang ldan padang nad zhung ba yin te /rtags dedang ldan gyi mi ljog pa'angi gapar gya'o zhis gi stangs so / che mo' rtogag pa la gan sa pa gyir mi gyog pa'i ྟgas tshiṭ

gagus te / yus la srin brnams mi'abung / /gu rya medasems sgangs pani/ /len da ser sna med sags dang / tshes nid ldon bar 'go  nid da/ sems can don tung ྒྱུba tshtsalirang / cis pa yimin/ dedag kyang das bgyor gshan ngagya ru bsams dpa' sems dpa'achen pa gang la srin ba'i ris sbong phrag bargrab na gnas shing lus lagadedag me da ri mis pad/
[image name: page 234.jpg]
[original page number: 234]

yadade dag lus dang ngag dang sems kyi ྒྱ ྒྱུ yongs su sbyong bar phyed docis pa dang [」]yang dedaganyed pa dad bgu spyi lhang phyed pam yin te sbangs pa'i yin tan bcuganyis yang dag par blangase spyod diis padang [」]dedagalasa'astsa'i sims dpatshul khrims ngan ba'isims dang 'khug ba'asims sgye ba med de'is pa dang [」 ]tshos gangangi snyed pa de bams cadan gshis 'ag ga la

reol cu phyin babartenasachos nyid dang yang dgapa' sbyorang pa' phyed demos gangatshos kyi gyis dang mi' phyor ba'i tshis de lti phu yang dag par rdzes su mi mthongang zhis pa dang / bdu sngig can gyis soms can daphyal bachen bo sprul ti / byang rub semis dpa' laba' syid da 'didig kyong debazhin gshogs pas phyir mi ldog par lung bstanani sims can daragyal bachen po sgyeso

dgo kyis gyang hu yyims thong gig   de ltan khyoram lo'is su'agung shonas zer gal [」 ]des mi'angigs par rgyal bamon phying gi ldagapa 'ashis par bya'is gsus so/ /'alod pa'i ིgas pa la gnas bei ྱི gi logapa 'ig cig shis gsungasate/ san byis baphyi bcamis dpa kham gnan shababastenas su la/ bcu ma hyubalar hi gas par

ces bste / babing phyor bcu slig tonan dpe sbyong gtsi byad du longasan saba'ad gyid da khyod kyin khrun mid pa yang dgapa' ju gos pa'i ga ུla tu 'tshang rgyu'ashonas pa'i lomade thams cid shigs shig 'inisangs rgyus kyi ga su sam yin ni / rang bzos byas pa'izhis zer bal longagami khlobashes padang / yang debazhin darnam bathams cadam byen pa nid 'u sbyo ba 'dan baber gabasyo

bshin phyis khyod kyis nan bos kyi lam gyis sdzo ga bsngal mthon phyinapa rgyis zer gyi dib da tungiganas mi ga yon phyi milhagu pa ris pe' gyi zhiso gsungs so / chosamatshog chen pel gnas pa gyi mi log pa'i rtags ni/ sangs tus nga phye pa pa'isyo pa sde [」 ]zhes gsungs pashin no/ da ni pa 'byod gzhan mang gyu rub sems dpa'asems dab 'chen po shis 'ab kyi la

slong shin bapu sgyong ba'id bzhin ga shegs pe saji skad bskun ba'i sa sra ba pa la sgyong cing mi bralan phying mi lug ba zhid ti rig pa ra bya gyag syong so / /thimis na gyi danabasum pani/rtags mi ni shud dag gis drod dang ni mo zod gnasodapa [」]zhas mtshogan mase laganas pa ni/rdzogs pa'i sa chub las mi lhog [」 ]ces gsungasati gla sla lo/[ 「]ci mi thongaba'il ma bal ga sahus pa'/

byi ci ldag 'i rlis khagad pa gsum ste / bsuni padang / band bedang [」 ]rtsob suba'o/ dong pon/ mthong pa'ingal ma ma bo cing padang / shes pa'i gra cig la natami ni/ /khya hub sems dpar minu ga pa'i  mtshad di yir bar shis par ba [」 ]zhis bste 'a'i yang rtag sa kyisgrib gubi lta sgrub ba ni phyig sa lnga phyig nyis sngar bam dparang bruer/ 'a' bced
[image name: page 235.jpg]
[original page number: 235]

zhig late sngar nges 'byed chamathun la gnas pa phyi'i mi ljiog par phub pas mthong lam la gnas pade ltar 'phyur pam yin namasnyaman [」 ]de'i nyis bamed dede tsam rgyis phyir mi ldog tsam grub kyang mthong lam la gnas pa phyir mi ljog du mi 'grub ste / dod kyi rtogs pa la gnas pa phyir mi ljog par ggub kyi ri mo'i rdzigs pal gnas pa phi'i mi lheg par grub pa gzhin
yangabastan pa'i na radilis mog sung si kyang gogar phor ba'a'id/
rje btsun gyis bshad pa yin no / de'i rini rgyas par bshad pal bzhi las [」]sdug bsdal gyi 'den pamathong pa gyir mi ljog ba'i rtegs ni/gzugs sogs 'u gre ldog pa dang /sois garan theg pa dman dag las
5 rtso lag bas na la sogru li khar nga ga yongs zad ྱེsa gsuongasas/ de 'ang bzhi las snul

bsngal mtshom shes pa'i bzod paniraba'abyor gyir mi ldog pa deni gzugs dang tshor bdad 'u shes dang 'byed dang rnamopar shes par shis pa'i 'ju gis las ljig gzhis pa dang [」 ]sdug bsal latshos shes pani gya chub sems dpa'i dang dag du sbigatocan 'i bar longs nye stong pa nid lamos pa bzlog gyang sams dang pobaskyed panas nyiber bzung ste sems brtan par bya'om go/

bar ta'i gis pa dang [」 ]sbag bsgrul 'arjes su shis pa'i bi rod banin thos kyis dadang rang sar rgyas kyis las phyir leg bden phyi mi lcig bces pa dang / snagabasdu' rjes su gis bani bya chubasems dpa'as mos dpababachen pa'i dodan bas mgatan bzhidang gzugs med pa'i snyims para'ajug pabazhidanga'agog pa' snyoms par 'jug kyang de dag gi brus khu yong sa ུ mi la/

bgi bing gi lhag par shisi par ba'i zhis gsungs so / /gan 'abgyung gi gidin pa la gnas pa phyir mi ljeg pa'i rtogs ni  / las so las yang pa'id dang ni / /'dongal sbyod la thabs labs dang / /rtag tu tshangs pang srod 'i dang // rol rnam par dag ni dang / ces gsungasas/ de lakun 'byung lachos shes bu'i bzo pa'itshis thams mad lamathong sang ga ljid dngagral

bste phus semes yang paste /rib 'byor gozhan yang phyi mi ljig po'i byang rubasems dpa'asems dpa'achen pon tshis thams cad nam mkha' ltar rtog bas sbyin panas sangs rgyus kyi tshis ma brnyes pa'i be'u lyur byod palam yin no 'is bdad [」 ]chos shes pani ྱིma gyin ngan gnas kyang thabs meolas pos sems chan longs su smyin par bya ba'i gyir 'dod pa'i yon ton snga la gan/

nag sems can rnams la sbyin pa gtang ིsa pa dad  rjes su shes po'i bi zod gni 'dod pa'i yin na lnga la yongs su mi spyode rtag rgyun mi 'imad paramang sa pa' srod ring gnodapagangagis gzhan mi dga'abaci' phyur ba'i gnodapa gang yang mi byed dezhis padang [」]rjes su gis ba den phye cu gyi sems yid la phyed tsing 'tshoba'i phyi'i bud med dang skyes pa ze slong pa'i lind dag
[image name: page 236.jpg]
[original page number: 236]
darnams dang / /tshogs dbang sogs gnyis pa'i / /g.yul 'phyed / ces gsungs pa yin no/ /de la'ang 'gog pa latshos shis pa'i bzod pani rib 'phyor gdunabasems
mi byed 'dil bu btsa' bar 'gyur rezhis pa'i lang ston par mi phyid pa ni phyi mi lcog par 'gyur 'enis gsungs so / /'gog pa'i bdin pamathong pa'i gyi' mi ldig ba'irtags ni/ yung sogs par chad /

dba'asems dpa'achen po gi saringab kyi lama'olang shin palaspyodanga'i tshi phung phord pa'ams dang skemached da rin cing 'relapara'abyung ba'isyirabad rjes su sgyor gal mi gnas ces padang [」]rjos shes pa ri paramad byed pa nan bo'i ga tam gyisgyo bad rjes susyor pa la mi gnas shes padang [」]rjes su ges bu 'i ba zodabani dmag gi tshigs kyi ga tam gabi sbyor ba dadang rjesag su sgyo

b.lazhiganas ches padad [」]rjes su gshes bani dpang sogasacis bste dpang por [」]dbangi ba'i nyin dang [」]dbang bo'i lul gisama'agog pa la rim bi lhor grong gi gtam dang [」]srod phyer gi gtam dang [」 ]srong brdal gyig tam gyi sbyor ga roi rjigasu sbyor po 'i mi gnas shes gsungs te   gro skyebamang po'i rten yin bstar dab syang sems dang sems gi rtan dum tshungs pa

dang / ya de bzhin du grong phye sgye bomang bo'arten yin bstar dpang bo'artin la yang dmang po rten paramatshungs parang [」]yang grong brdamatshong gal sogs pase lornams kyi long spyod par byab yin bstar yul yang dmang pol long sgyo gya ba yin b.ramatshungs pas mtshon te gsungs pa yinano / /sgor ba gnyis kyi khyad par ni da po' ggeor ba ri' rjis la sbyor ba yin no/ /gamu la mye

bani glang gad baphyed gu yin no/ /lam gyi bin pa luganas pa phyir mi ljig pa'i rtags ni /ser sna la sogs la / sgyo dang rjes su syo ba yi/ /gnas pa sosong bgag gdang/ chos ni rub tsas ི yigs shid / /rang gis yangeso pa zhid / /sa gsum la'i gnas pa dang / /chos kyi danodu srog gtong po  /  zhis gsus so/ del 'ang lam 'tshos

shesab 'ib zod bci spin ba'i ba'adomacu phyin ba sgyo cing le rasna'i syong ba'ami gnas so/ /tshug zhims kyi parelacu phyin pol sprong 'ing tshu mi khrims dan pa'i gtam gyi sgyongab dang rjesas sgyor bal miganas so zhis pa dang [」]chos shesapanirang gis la gyir ldog ba dang mi lhig pa'i rigs pamed de / ri lta bu 'i tshis rul tsam gyang yang dag bar rjes su ma mthong ba'i phyi 'i'isar

dang rjes su shes pa'i bzod pani rang gis la tshos pa'igang pa gnyis te ྒྱུna tu zhugs parang gis la nges palta'ar rang gisamakhyon pa gsumamam [」 ]bral ba thob papor cad med pa'i rnamagrol dang gyad par gyi lamagasum langes pa yini te [」 ]bdag ni batshang mi rgya'o snyam pa med kyi mngon pa'ar rdzogs par 'tsha rgyu'osnamadu sems so zhis bdang [」]rjes su shes pani dam pa'atshon
[image name: page 237.jpg]
[original page number: 237]

yongs sug zlung ba' phyar paradag yongs su gtong par byed srog yongs su gtong bar phyed de'is gsungs pa yin no/ de dgag din bstu bani /re 'angabi skad cig phun dam ni/ /llo lngan mthong pa'i pam gnas kyi / /phyi mi lcog pa'i rtags dag yin / ces gsungs te gosla'o/[ 「]rim thong pa'i lim gems par byedapu'i lam bshad palags/
dang / a pa'ing war pang rgyol pa shin  ces gsungasaso/ de land padang po gnyis kyi dan nimado las kyir mi log pa'i rtigs rnam pa

ste/ yul gyi khyad par gyis zabapa dang [」]yul can gyir bzhin bshadapa dang /[」]bshad bya'i ྱda par gyis zab pa'o/ /de ladang pon sgom ba'i lamini zab ba se/ /rab so stong pa 'ing pang rgom / /zab pade 'i spo'ang hra /

thamagamadam khyen pa'i tshis rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i gnas zab mob stan da gsol zhis pa la [」 ]legs so zhil gnang nas dpa 'byor zab me'is gab ni sbong ba nyid dadametshan mamed pa dang sgyon pamedapadang mngon bar 'udu bya bamed padad sgyebamed pa dang 'dod chags bralab dba'agogapadapamya nalas 'das ba da zhi bad de bzhin nyid da tshos kyi dyus dang yang dag pa

mamabag khla dgas so zhis gsung saso / /rkang ba tham ni rib 'byor gzugs kyir bzhin nidare la gzugs med [」]gzugs las gudan yong dbazhin nid mid de / gzugs kyiri bzhin shid nidi lta bu'o/ /tshor banas rnam shis kyi b.radu yang de lto bu gois gsungs te  / gzugs kyi di bzhin nid gzugs med pa' bstun bas tshos can 'asgo 'ogs pa'i mtha' las grolal

gzugs las gun yangade bzhin nyid med par bstan bas deng tshas nyid la sgyur pa'i mtha'al las grol phar bstun pa yin no/ /khyad par nan gyilam lagasum ste / ngobongam gzung pa dang [」 ]de'i ྱི b.radang [」]delaban dpa'i sgyon sgang pa'o/ de ladang boni[」]des led yan lagem thong ba'i / /lam dang sgromapa'i las nid la / /yang dang yang dusemus dang / /'dzul dang nges

rtog sbrom pa'i lapa [」]ces gsungasaso / /zhe bakhung sem pa dada'ajul bdangangis pa' rtog pagasum thes padang bsam pa dbasgom pagasumamam [」]ting de 'dzin gyi sgyor ba dang dngos gzhidad rjes kyi ིsa dab gsumam bshad do/ da'iran kyangamadolas shes rab kyi phatshol du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i gnas zabamo 'didag lasems dpar 'gyur 'jal bar 'phyur nges par rteg par rgu

thes gagungasaso/ /gnyis pani/ den ྣna jags yin pa'i gyis/chung dang 'phring dang chen parnams/ /chu pa'i ུnga segs daphyel yis / /rnam pas rdam pa dathar bzhid do / / zhes gsu ngasaso / do la gnyen po nung tshar gsum nir pa'abyor gis rapa kyi parog tu phyin padang phral bas sgubapa gangag kung gi byim stedadu dgon mtshog mtshod padang [」 ]'dzags bathamasan
[image name: page 238.jpg]
[original page number: 238]

la yon phulapa dang [」 ]ba'ol tu phyin pa drug la sbyad pa bas sgom lam chu ngu gsum ram pa ltar bsod nams 'phel le zhis pa dang [」 ]yang 'bring po gsum ni sgal pa gang gakung gi byim snyed dutshos kyi spyin pa dang [」 ]sgral pa re snyed du
dran ba nyi bar gzhag pa nas sangs rgyas kyi tshis ma 'des pa'i bi rul batstson pa dang [」 ]sgal bde snyed du sbyin padang nad du yang dga'ajog gidi gi gagya ུ

tub sdos pa bas sgom lamagasum 'im paltar bsod nams 'phel bdang [」 ]sgrom lam chen pogasum ni dus sngam dngabadabaradus gsum gyisangs rgyas sras bcas kyid ge ba la yidarang bas bsdes babs sgom lamachen po'i chudul gnas papasodanams cheb dang[ 」 ]sgrom lam chen pa'i 'ri nirapa'aphyor mngan par 'du phyed bso ni 'tshang ྒྱ bar ginyis te shis dab kyi bzhob

phyin pa la spyod palatshos thams cad stong pa nid ngu snang nge nis padang [」 ]sgom lamachen po'i tshan po ni byang rub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po stong pa zhid la gnas ging shes 'ab kyi pharaladu phyin pa dang mkhrul bar 'gyur te di'i bsodanams kyi lang po yang sdam dag pas 'phel bar 'gyur re'is gsungs so / /sgom ba'i lam dgapo'adi dag nis gnyis banasas bcung par gya sra bya

dog bug ging glongapa'i ginyin po 'i ni si chang bring phyiu yin nyes dgu da'i mapa bzhin ngu sbyar ro/ /di li brtsad pa'i sgyon slang pa la ba'i sti / bgod nams kyi grungasanges mi bamad padang [」 ]dgag sgrub kyi ྱ bami limad pa dang [」]'ded pa'i din mi'agrub parang [」 ]sgyatshogs kyi tshus pa mi 'amad pa'i sgyon slang pa'o/ /da pon/ sras med bsogs bstan brnamag/ /dam gra'

nad b.rodam yin / /kun rdzogad ri thugs brje ba'i /rgyam bun de dag zhul pa zhed ces pa ste  de lo nang padad poganyis ni bcom ldan 'anas sbong ba nyidal ni rad pa mi rimigs grangs kying mi dmigs  gzhal ba yang mi'i migs  tshad kyo mi'i migs ti / bcom ljon 'das de bsan tshis dedaga'adon dang yi ges tha dad dub rgyi bam dmigs so zhis rtsod pal

de'ilanadu btsom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa [」]ragaba'abyor dede bzhini te / tshos de dag la don dam par donadad yi gis tha dadatubya ba ma dmigasaso zhis gsungs te 'dod pas lan btab pa yinano / /rkang pa tham gnyis ni yun rdzob tu khyab pam gub pas lan 'debs pa yini te [) ]rab 'byor 'an kyang brjod da med pa'i rin lam zid bzhes bya ba'am [」]grangs med pa dang

bstennamaparagis pa padun po nyida'agags pa yin no/ rajug pa nin thos dag 'du shis dang [」]tshor bas sgyonas sems gnas pa'i 'u shes sngon ju gtong b.li nal [」]byu rubasems dpa'ani [」]sems dal bdon tu gnyer ba'i lis mabs ma yin par gzhan 'dod pas yinil [」]'phags bdagon mtshog sprin gyimadolas  / gzhan don cu shis par byababa'atsugs snga

gong ba yin no/ /gnas ba'i bu shes sngonang gtongabanim yinano/ zhes gsungs pa'i gyi ro/ de lta yin yang sa'i ྙིnga pho' lor lobanupa'i midalas  gya ུba sims dpa'i tshir ba 'de bad sdag bsngul dang gan snyoms gsum dang [」 ]sosa' spyi lodang [」]1naphes dang [」]rargyal bgasam gyi'arugane ge' gog pa yi na zhis gsungasaso  dari ུba de la lod ga' byeda'i

rubal gagis te/ byang chubasems dpas ji lta byedapa dang [」]nan thes kyis ji ltar byed pa'i ril lo/ da pon 'gog dang ces pa'i rtsa 'gril gyis 'amadapa yin la [」]dedag gi sa 'tshams ni b.lagasopa dgon mchog sbin las mdadagapa'ardzogs pa'isongs rgyas dngaskul pa grangs med pa gnyis kyimasanges par 'byung pa'i gya rubasems dpa' ningi ltir 'dod pa paba'in da thod ga gam

[original page number: 261]

zhams bas dug/ zhamag sungs la / de yangs brgyud ba yanan da gyis yanan/ /ga ki pami tshisam 'on pamadzodalas /sa brgyud rnam gnyis rjes 'phrel dang / cig rgal song ning yongs nas ni  cigs mi 'thun par gsum par 'phro  thod nal phyin ྙོmas 'jug yin [」 ]ces bstan no/ded ga gi dan nang bad bag dan sabargyu ces pa ni bsamagatan bzhi da/

bsgu la mad pasarnams b.la'adadru ba gagi shan/rnam gnyis ni beg bcas zhi rags kyiranam btsan dang [ 」]zag med gnen pa'im bcan / di gnyis li ྫེsu 'grel pani zagapa dad gcas pa'i bsamagan dad bonas gri ི lil radatupa yab gro garang [」 ]denas bsamaganadad gob thug padama' yo bganyis cigacu byas padang [」 ]zagapa med pa'ibisamaganan dang bon sa cil phed/

rgam rad mnarada'u bga ba dang / denas bsam gtan dang pol byugaparamar 'ong paganyis cigata byas pa'o/ danigazhung da ting ngi 'dzini la rji lta snyoms par 'jug pa'i stsul bstun pal gnyis te  / sgor ba gnyis la ji lhar snyoms par bajug pa'i rtsularang [」 ]dngo gzhigasum la ji ltong snyoms par 'jug pa'i rul lo/ /dang po na 'igogadang bcas pa'i snyims 'jug dgur [」 ]rnamad

mam susang lasanas ches bste /'ani sing gennam par pabasgyi sa pa'iti nga ba'idi / snyoms para'ajug paradagu ga'u gsasu song bste lugs dang bun ga dang [」]'o sa ba ste lugs las bzlog pa gonyis yin no/ de bar ngabaripa samagan dang ponas bsu nas paradu sems gnanam pacug par bsamagatan ba'idang gzhugs medapa'i snyoms par bajug pabazhidang [」]'thog pa'i

'ang bzan sgul stnams par 'jug baan/ /lugs pas blogapa ci ba pogapa 'i'ing nge'adzin mas lasanas 'u shis med 'ju shis med min bsnyoms par 'jug delas las nas cims kyis chi yang med pa'isyi mchedanas bsamagatan dad po 'ilar gyi ding 'jin pa stem sa pa li jugapa yin te / de yang dang po' gag pa'i 'ingi 'idang banas padagu yin no/'dig

lasangagasanam ba' bahums ba'abarjed bar snga byi sing pennam par bsgyi sa bar ni mi bste 'i brlo bani ngingab cin bga'a'ig ma garenas sathamasaman gyi sims lasnyonas par 'jug nus lasgum di lam yin ba'i gyi ro/ dadas ga zhigasu mami god ba' htogs pakhis pamanamad kyis bsta ni/ / deb dngaboni' gig pa 'il ra ca ces dngas pas bamamagananar ponas

gzu nas lagog pa'i b.racams kyis ba cig mdobs gsungs te bsam gtan dang bonas gnyis pa dang / gnyis banas gsumal la seoms par 'jug gozhis pa shin no/ /denas gnyis pa ri' gog pa'i bar du mi 'dur 'gro'is la sde'agegabs bar dumi 'du ba' tshed pa'i par 'grotsagi ste bsam gtan dang po la stoms par 'jug go / de las langs nas 'gog pab snyomag par 'ug
[image name: page 262.jpg]
[original page number: 262]

delas lasanas bsam gtan gnyis phal snyoms par 'jug soka denas 'gogapa la 'jug go  de nas bsam gtan gsum pa dang [」 ]yang 'gog phal snyoms par 'jug panas thams cad gyabar dushas par bya'o / /de nas gsum pan mnyam bzhagamanapas 'tshams bzung ces pa'agazhung lhagams gsungs te brgyad pa lasogs brgal nas thod rgyal du'ajug ces pas tham bstanate / de'i

res bab zhibs mganan dad gzugs med yin la rgal ba'i din ni par gyis la'agongs shing 'grob ste / 'gog pa nas 'basas pa'i tshimar la'agong padang 'dod gnas par ba'i tshi ra 'gong pa yin ེda ltaran gnas pa'is pabacu yod gyang bgogapa dada'acu shes med min phanatshun dang bsam gnan dang podang 'dod pa'isi mas la banatshun largal ba'i dan me da pas pho ral gyi dan ni rgyun

zhin la'i dag kyadang don gyirim las ringargyad dang bdun dngajugadang lnga dang pazhidang gsum dang gnyis dang cigasga lanas zhes rigs kyang grangs kyi ིmi par bsrang par zad do / /'didag gidinal slob dpon shan ti bas seng ge rnam par brgyis pa gnyis rdzu ba la mi gas la par dgongasanas mi spyod bani ma ligs te mngo las gsus pa'i gyirari lotshdza bltar nasengage rnam par bsgyings paganyis bshid

desar dad 'dul [」]'dod bar rtogs pa'i mis pas mnam bar mabazhag pa dang sbelanas mar babs pa cig dang / yang nas ces pa dang gagog pa'i b.radu ces pa'i mi tha' ba zung pas yang 'grob gnyis bstanapa yinano/ /slob dpon gyig sung lasani sing geramapar bsgyings pag zhis dang [」]dngos gnyi sngar gsum dbaston pa'i bam gnyis gsal ba shin no/ de'i yang tha ma ni mishan

bzhagam yin bas par bcad de 'gog panas mar babs pazhigadang / bsam gtan dang ponas yara'adzig pazhig ste gnyis yin no / de lta sgrom pa'i lam bstun nas dani di'i sma byag zung 'acin gyirtag pabashad pal bzhi las gzung pa'i rtog pa dang lo bgad pal gnyis te [」]/ shes bya'i dbang dbyas padang [」]lam ྒྱིdbang du byas pa'o/ dang pon[) ]mdo bsas chyas dang sangs

rgra gig gu nga la yos sagu gnar yig palde  /rtsos nams kyimidod hyun bci shis pa'i nig paganyis zhi blog pa'isginas gsu sate  / de ba gu ུgas mas dpa'as mas de 'itshan po blan medapa mdadag b.rogs pa gyi rug tam non sardzogs pamabatsa bgarabatsham bas b.roba' hyin bsug gi mid rgyus pa shis par bu bhi ིnas kyang semam dang rem sa asalgachan/

bo 'ithas mi chlu bad lhar rtogs por bsgyir/ /kha 'astsulapa [」 ]dedi bzhin no/ dede bzhinate de ltar slob ba'i gya chub sems dpa'asems dpa'achen pos ni tshis thams cad gyi mdod rgyus pashis para'agyur ro/ /gsol pabatsom lngan gdas ji ltang na tshos thams cad gyimadod rgyus pa 'atsal gophogs [) ]bka'astsal lo /gzugs nas ro mi bathams nad mkhyen pa ni kyi ri lin
[image name: page 263.jpg]
[original page number: 263]

nadages mtshas thams cad kyimadod rgyas pa shis par 'gyur ra / /gselapa gzugs kyid bzhin nyid ji lta bu lags [」 ]btsom lcan 'das kyis bka'asnul pa [」]de bzhini slang la sgye bami dmigs [」]'jig pami dimigs  gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi dmigs pa 'dini gzugs kyidi bzhin 'id do/ del gyud rubasams dpa'asems dpa'achen pos bslab

phyos zhes lanas rnam pabasams cadamakhyen pa nyid kyilar rugasu saso/ /sangs rgyus kyi ma bzung pani sgrub pa'i tshis lanan tan mi byed pa ste / de yang bi sgid bshad pa'i nis bapa kyi batshoga'u phyin pa la slob cing bslabs nas kyang bayol du phyin pa duganas thoms cadamathyen panid kyibar thibi pa' byod nag du kyi las thams tshod srings par 'argyur ro/ thabs malas pa'adi lta bud

ldan ba din dbazhin gshigs pas dgongs par rig par gye' zhis bzlog pa'i sgronas gsungs so/ /lam gyid bangad byas chogapani / cus gsum phonan med pa dang / /legs pa'i lamani rnam gsum la / /gzung pa'i rnam rtog  ces bajugag suongs so/ /das gsum gyi lamani sloba' dpon 'bagos pa na' sgyor pa'i lam dang [」]mthong pa'i lamadang [」]sgom pa'i lam la gas saso/

dedag la yon tan med par rtog pa yang bzlog pa'isgronas gsungs te /hyang chab sems dpa'asems dpa'achen bo do mi stong la nid thams nad dang /[ \u0f92\u0fb1\u0f74] chub gyi phyogs kyi tshos rnams dang  / sangs rgyus rakyi sa 'i tshis thams cad bamabs pa' rig par gye'azhis padang 1 shesarapa kyi b.rolag du gyin pamadon par sgrub padang shis padang [」 ]shesarab kyi bayol du phyan bsgom b.re la phan yon roi

dag yod bcacigi pabagya'azhis so/ legs pa'i lam gsumam shis po'isgonas gzung par rtog pag sum mi syong ba'i lam phung bol sogs bzhib ro rkyen ma'ogamalas bdad [」]mthong pam ni tshis thoms mdanamam kha'asaltar rtogs padang [」 ]sgom phom rtogs b.ri goms pa' phyodabade mi gnis lho/ de da gagyidang btsom ldan gdas kyis ba ka'asnol pa [「]go zugs zhi ba dang ga las pad/

gsog dang snyeng po mad bas shis rab kyi b.rol 'u phyin pal sgyu par gya'anis padang [」 ]nam mkhalastong ba nyi dadumangan bar sgrub pas shis rab kyil so 'u phyin bamanon bar sgrub b.rabya'is padang [」]namam khalastong ba 'id sgom bas shesarab kyi larogatu phyin ba bsgom bar bya'azhis gsus so/ /khams cad gyi dan bstus bani / 'di cig ste / sgyong pa'i rnam pa'i spyod yul ma
can[)]￤

zhisag sung sate / gzung pa'i rtag paganyis yod pa'icig ni sbyong ba'il mami shis pa'isgrib pa yin no/gzung pa'i rtigapa tham ni/ gshis pa se mamasad sems byu nams / 'ijug pe'i lum an yin bzhed de [」 ]zhes pa nimadongabastan pa yin no/ do'i 'i ྒྱུga par pashad pani/ selams chi skyad dang bya cub kyi/snying po yid la mi phyed dang / zhig padamanapa ying phyen tso / /rdzogs pa/
[image name: page 264.jpg]
[original page number: 264]

ྒྱུ chub yar mi phyed /som dang sgom pamed pa dang 1de dag las ni bzlog nid dang / ji gzhin don min rnamartog pa / sgrom pa'i lam la shis par gya / ces gsungs so / de batshogs lam dbyang rub gyisims mi skyed pa'i rtig padang 1 bskyed kyang snying pochos kyi sgu yidi lami byed ba'i rtig padang [」]sgyor lam datheg padaman pa gzhan don lami ltab yid labyed pa dang [」]mthong lam dbyu/

rtsa beng gahung gid pami phyedapapa zhidang[ 」 ]yang dgapa'i skrub sanyams pos shis rab kyi laleg da phyin bsgrom pa'irtag pa dang [」]misgom pa'i rigapa dang  / de gzhi gdang / gi gam 'i ba'im pa 'angog po sbeb zhidang[」]kyud pa ra gyi lam tu bi lo ba ba'inamartogs ba'iramag rtog ces bya ste / dab be'ad gin sgim ba'i lam ryis shan hyan bya ba'i rtag pa'o/ de dag blog babasgi na ga gas ba

ri ma' ྱོ rgyis gsolo pa / bcom ldan gnas gya chub sems dpa'asems dpa'achen bos gis rang kyi b.rolag da byin  gas ུna nga sri'adamigacusphan sla par 'phyur / bka'astsal b.lems dang bob sgyed banas nye bar bsazu ste rnying bya gu tshug gyi b.rad slad par gye'ashis b.rang [」]de ltor mngon pesgrub bar byo'o/ de ltar bsgrom phor byi'azhis padang [」 ]yid la gyab gzhan gyigi mi baphyed pas

shis dpa kyi ma bosadu gyin gapa sgyad par byashonas padang  rnam bathams mdamakhyen pa zhid yid lagyub mi 'ar gas shis dab gyi pa'ol du phyin ba sgyod ba' gya nyis lasartogapadadang pobazhi rimi babazhin tu bstan to/ /denas gzhan lnga nigasol babon ci ligs / bsgrom pa' phyed pas thams cadamyenapa nyi blob pam [」 ]rab baba'o'adi rim 'in zhes bdad gon ci lag sa ma bsgoms

sa thams 'dam khyonapa nid mobongabam [「]ma ka'astsal bde nim yin nezhes pa dang lon ci lags [「 ]sgoms kyang bsgoms lam bsgoms kyang ma bsgroms pas rnam pathams tshadamakhyen panyi theb pam [) ]paka' stsal bde rim yin mniis pa dang [」]gon ci lags / bsgromos pasakyang ma lags ma bsgoms pas kyadam lags pas rnam bsdums cad mazhen panid theb pam / bka'

snal bdinim yin ni zhis par [」 ]gsil ba'on rnam bathams mdam nyin pa nyid ji lha theb par bsgyide ba ka'asbamal pa [」 ]de bzhin nid ji lta ba bzhin no/ /ga sol bde bzhin 'id jil galags  bag bstsa lapa / yang dag pa'im tha' bi lta ba bzhinin/ga sol ga[「]yadadagapa 'im ba'aji lta bu 'gras / bga'astsal pa/ chos kyi phyi sa ji lta ba bzhin no 'is gsungs so/ da ni lo

pa'i rtag pa 'gad pal gnyis las 'dzin pa' ྙིga pa dngapo na syi din gsum gyis bstun te / shes bya'idabar byas padang [」 ]lam gyid bdang ྱsa pa dang [」 ]zunamong gi'igis bsdu ba'o/ /dang poni [) ]sems can gyatags pa'i spro yul dad/ tshos gtags pa da sto min nyid ches pa ste /de banang pad poni gangazag gi bdag gags par yod panyid ngarnogs paste /gsol pa/ tshos kyi phyis
[image name: page 265.jpg]
[original page number: 265]

ngasta bu lags [」]bka' stsul pa [」 ]bdag gi khams dang [」]sems can gyi lams dang [」 ]srog gi khams dang [」]gang zag gi khams ji lta ba bzhin ne zhes gsungs so / /rkang pa gnyis pa ni [」]gzugs la ga sogs pa'i mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i tshis btags par yod pa zhidadu rtog pa dang [」]mkhyen pa gsum gyis yul du byas pa'i tshis hlang lam dang rnan

bgasum 'un rjo ba'u styong bamin partog pa'o/ /de dag kangagasol pa [」]shesarab kyi pha'ol du phyin pal spyod bas gzugs nas rnam pathams cadamathyenapa shid kyilar la bslu bra par brgyi'am zhes padang [」]btsom ldan lodas kyis bka'asnulapa [」]gzugs nas rnamapa thams cadam ྱེna panyid kyi bar langabri bdadamasnan bamed par bslab par ga'ezhis gsungs so/ lal gyi

dbang du byas ba'i rtag pani/ mgas dang rapa bye gag nyi dang /dngos pi phyid dang theg gsum dang / khon nar gapam yi dngapa/ /spong la rnam pa ra 'azrigs pal / 'iphinapar bye bes pa'i rtag pa cug ste/ migis pa da mi ིgas pababasgrinas lam mtshags pa yod pad / garags bsogs paragacu phyid pa'i padaganyid dang khon gyi bus bu'ug sa 'bru

dem bong phyed bad / gtul gya zeg ba gsum gyings par 'bang bayong pir [」 ]dadapas byin pa'i yin dag pam yin padang [」]'alor gsumad togobs dge ba'i spod brnam par bgulaba'o/ /ma'os de dag gnyen bong sgronas gsungs ted ba' ger shis rab ki 'i lig 'u phyin palasgyodapa ni migs galaganas shong sanams yongs u rdzogs par mi gyid de gi sa ra ba kyin

cabyan gcami gas su med  / ba chug tang cigs su me da pa' ྱིra ris padang  /gazlag sa nas sangs khyus kyis lilar dmigs pa' ryur pas tshos ragacu byi bi mi phyi zhis pad [」 ]dab byor gzugs nas sangs ྒྱུsa kyi mi'ilar gyi na ci nis rab kyi b.les dubyon bamazhi phyode/ de ci' ྱི zhin [」]chos thams mad nim ngin par 'us ma byis bapa'i gyi lonasal

dab byor ngas blan med pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i bya zug tumangon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yang dag par ngesapa dad mnges pa dang lig par nges pa'i sitshos gung yang ma migs te zhes pa dang [」]rib 'gor tshos nying gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rmang bcas pa'i 'jigarten gyo yon gnas su byur ba'itshis nid de nid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sal pa yang yin [ \u0fb1\u0f72]

gnas khu 'byur bzhis padang / dba' ྱོ tshos rnams kyitshis nyid khong hu da par gas la gei sarapa kyi b.lel du byin pa la srad par ba'i tshos rnams kyitshis nyid 'ding gyig par mi bya 'is gsusaso/ /spyi rin bsdus pa ni/ 'dzin pa phyed par nga pe ste /[ 「]shis phya rnamapar bsgragasapa gī  ces pastyi  gang bag rdzas 'bin gyi lig pa yini ninis ba'i dino/ /'dzin ba'i

[original page number: 266]

rtogapa gnyis pa bshad pa ni/ sems can btags dang de' zla te/yul canade yas rnam 'joms pas / /sgro ba'i lam dnga'asrel pa yi / /mi mthun phyogs gzhan rnam pa dam [) ]zhes gsungs te  de 'ung rkang pa tham theg mar grung ste / de 'ang ganga'i gsaman [」]sgom pa'i lam dang ces pa'o/ /de yang gabazhig snyaman [」]sems can shis paste rgyal banas sangs rgyas kyi b.ral

gtags pa dang [」]de'i rnamabajog gi ྒྱ btags pa'i yul can rteg pa'i mtshan nyid la brjod do/ /'on yang sgrom lam dadang 'phrel pa nyes pa yin pa gang las saman [」 ]sgom lamade yis rnam par 'joms zhes bye'o/ /de gnyen po'ir pang gis gsungs pan ba tsom ldan 'angs kyis paka'astsul pa [」]raba' gyo ba sand ni ming dang mtshan ma lamangon bar zhen pam yini nyi zhis so/ 'e'i ri

rgyas par bgad bal gsum ste / 'ris bu da [」]lam dad [」 ]shes byal rtog pa'o/ dang po na[) ]gdag ni ngabazhin gun mazhen ni / /gsu gyi sgil parnam gsum dang [」 ]ces bste  / rnam padang lam dang gzhi bams mdaji lta ba bzhinamartogs pasamyen pagasum gyi sgrib pha 'armongasapa'o/ /dgarab 'byor rnam pagang dad rtags gdadang mtshanam dedagade bzhinagashigs par

thugs sachad bde'i phyi rnam pathams cadamathyen banyidaces ྒྱ'o zhis pa dang [」]raba'abyor gya nub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen pos lim thams tsad bskyed par ba [」]lam thams cad shes par gshes pa dang [」]raba' gyor thams cad shes pa banin dang gyi'i tshis 'di dag yin la [」]dedagani nan bos dang rang sas rgyas rnams kyis shes kyi nyis gsus so/ /lam gyi dag

du byas pa'i rog pa ni / zhi lam/ ces bste shes rab kyi parol duphyin g.yongs sum ges pas thams cad zhi ba'i lam la kun tu mongs pa'o/ /de 'ang gnyen po 'ing bang gis gsungs pani ra pa'abyor tshib yang mi gnas pas yong dgapa'i mi thalamangon du byashe[ 「 ]rnamapa thams cad mazhen gnyidaces byab nimis cig gis rnam pamams mdamathyenabazhid dbarjodadi / 'di lta 'i

birnamapas pa zhis pa'o/ /shes bya'ing bing du byas pa'i rtag pano/da bzhin ning sogs dang / mtshungs par ldan dang mi ldan dang / mimanyam sdag la sogs dpa / /nyinamos rtsis kyirang bzhir dpa ga nis sumed lazhun myongs la/ zhes bste shes bya'ir pazhin zhid bsogs pa'i tshis zhid yang dgapa'i din dmapa lasogs pa larmongs bdang [」]tshes tsan gzugs dang cigs/

thadad dum tshungs pa' ldan bdapami lcon pa latshongs padang [」]shes rab kyi layogadu phyin pa'adi ba du kyis bstan padang nan sgyel gyi tshis dang miminyim pa la rmongs pa da / sdug bsngal shis pa'abya bal sogs bden pa pazhilarmongs pa dang [」]nyon mongs parnams kyir bzhin globur bayin pa'armongs padang [」]lam gyirnam pakrung dor dang gnung 'jin gnyis su mad pal rmongs

1ma tha sasan re sa na ba bsanam bsu ma ba ca' bapa'as mam ca' bgaca bi pa gid ga cin ིda par gab 'i mad cos ki gyis na pa 'a ྱི shis pam kyi lonu thi gnyis pya ིma par [ 」 ]gag phyi shis lab kyi lo'ang phyis yis u yi ki namamadag bgan bis dparas saru kyi mi grel la shi par [」]ras gyi gan pa

ma ུ blu ga sa sa ba mas bsatsam gab ma bgam ma4/ gi ུ pasapam ci mar mi b.rami rlang pa gni pos shis cang shin ི ིsa ི ི ུ 'ilasgra 'i ching 'i shi shi 'atsa ma thud ma 'a sa ུ tha 'a 'as ུ bo ku shis ུ ི ི ga yi ུ 'a/

legag tung / bceman lān gas kyis ma 1khasbamapa  gzhig ngog ིsa khu med bakhi mas ming mi gosan ga nyis ྤི med pakhi cis bed pa da gu tso 'i sags ma'aso / 'bi rton ba'i lingad nangasli khab ni/ rnam pa' rtog babazamar gzhi phi / cos bang sye spyes khu ran ga pa ba' cin pa'ig par gong soba'o /[ 「]ci sgam ba'i ma gya nyid bab mad pan / aman 'a ིna

a mas hu las thatsam hu ba ba' ham/ am ba sa ham be la/[ \u0f72] srum ོna su tsha mas canam/ chu ེsa ུ la ིna/ la bas ma tshog yis sgralag yi pems sodam cin poing ni/ tam ba na hanyan pa shed cing kru sisapo/ 'angalin gakad gnar gab bamam gnyisagar gro ma gi pho ra lim garang pag yion sams 'u nyan la

man ga thlam  khamam mamab ma re ma su bdam macam bgad/ yom ku na ma 'i/ nga 'i gras ce pa yimi/ dki pam yongag 'i ti/ ra pon sram par  gagan ི bi lo/ 'ang phi ga cimab zhi la ི ི ani sram 'i gi ma dpyi gi gam  194[d] 'egatsham thanag ma  chi

ra ba na bsgra me/ thas ba ེsa ma 'an ha ces nen camanam mabaman sabs sran/ dis gam ba'i ིgam pam zho gan napa ban pa'i[ \u0f72] ི gi pas ུ ga sa ki ི zhig ུ yi gi shi sa ི gi  kri ི ི sa ིུsa gi ི ི ིsa ུ 'i/

u gru ba mas ma tsan ma bag shahen pam/[ \u0f7a] wi bib saba'i le la yi mi ི saha na ge la ིsu ི ི ིsa sru shi ོna ི konang baphrus thu ningab yon gu gi thu leg 'i gi ba zhi ྲིgas sa u 'ilas man gi sa ྱི bag shanid ra ga ma cu ga sa gi ུ na pi chi ba ci ི dol/

syod cing nnamapa thams cadam khen pa ni thoganas lom dang me tog dang 'bras bus sems can rnams 'tshobar byedade [」 ]de la lom ni byang chub sems 'arten nas sems can rnams ngan song las sgrol ba'o/ /me togani lha dang ma'i sgyi bulo/ /'brus bun bya chub gsum thob pal sogs pa'ozhis gsungasaso/ /danisangs rgyus tho ba la b.ram dmed pa
ba'oga'u byin ba ru gag 'e/

pa ba bron 'i ngan ྱི pho nad med pa'i ི mi ba mang pal gsum lhe  / 'athrus ga'isgonas bebedisigazungab dang / yigs ma gyisgonas 'bas bub sten padong  sgyu bras la log sgrung sbra ba'o/ dang bon  snyeg sas spye lon thos dang / /bas bu ིgas pabu tshom so da pa/ chya rtsi sems dpi sgyi me dal /gnangapa'i pi rnams pe mang nas /ches pasad pedang  sod

ranu giging gzhi gi ni/ kha sa ྒྱsa shid gyil ngeme di [「]khang tshi ging 'i 'i pi 'ing khices pas don ga song sate / dab baban slong ga sus gyi ji khen sim sa can ji gli pe tham samading grabe cem padang pangs bas ryus kya sa lo ga nas par gru na di'i sodanams ching dub shelal ma [「]gi sa pa bab ci ma lan gnasamangado/ dadepab shigs bamadado/ ba tshos lan 'das kyis ban/

sagrug [」]debagadang gangan gab gigad pong ci gas dpa thyan bsims dad gong thed pa'i sod nams chis 'alil te dong ba'i ra ba sram nes bgu long gican pang mi bodashis gdang [」 ]stong gsu byis mas can brob cim gad rangargyub ba'is laganas pa rgyu blta 'om mi / sjong gsum gyi sims tshen bams nad bya ུ lase mas dpa' ྒྱོ med bapas thugs pesgun gya ded gan/

gad nam bde khu ca ma/ mis dparu hu ba u ga' ba'i ram bachamar yangami gra 'is banas pe 'i bgu li daja pa ri bi rod ba'i mabasu ོti / spya medab btub rapa'i shod na mi ིsa bun li zhi la/bya rtsa li mam cangapa 'a ga cha ba tsu tshum sa pabari li ma med pa'imoganyanis ga yin/ /bci ba nlag bang gran pa ni bi hag ba ga ga con ning khi gan ྲོུ/

gni ni/ khrang gabo nag shing bang ni pe gringab ni ni cig bakhale / gcan med pagi nge ba cin ི na ci ི ུ lin pang gi na phin pa nis cim bab cisan than gsaramabamamam bam chin ni ྱི dis bingi su nigasamacis/ /cin si ba du su 'igam cis/dab sgra 'i gagam bi bi sagu 'i gam cinas/ san bi sa gu 'i ma cin/ / man ni ji sa gu nigasam cis/

gagu gag / dag cin ga babanag ci pa thi ba ki cis gug ni risag ba yid pa [」]man nyi shedangapa hyingab ci bro/sgyi led pa / 'chungab med po/ cipas sabani diras pimanadabapo/[「]ga ga bci tan pa'o/ khim banagi po/ athan ni ིma na ni led bshin gi gas po/ de gi pis this pan gan ni gam hin shi khyes bsta na b.rad gongs nas chig lan/

khags bam gsusas/ darachu ྒྱ bas la las sgrub sbra pa lasgol bani /'dilani/khagu sma namasargyudam rgol / /zhes bste / b.raca med pa'i pam rgyis lebab 'i thams cadamazhen pa'ing gidada'amigs bdad gdagabod rnam pa'id namados gsangs pa'adi bdados por sgrub rnamasamagatogs pa'idab gis rgol ba' byed ci ri'i lan gnag pad de 'ad gartog

bsganas  rgol bsgyud ma rol ba'o/ de'i na byas per bshad pami rig su band pa gsum gya si mamacog sungs pa'in dpagasum dpapor thrang ste/ sgra banams kyi log ྟོga pa nam po thu dgad gta lashid [」]ces slel le / lon sul gang pa li gi pa 'artogs snyaman [」 ]cimigs bces panas sgrom pa laces pa'itshamis po nang gam pe ga pa ratogs pa'ong  kho

ku'erar gul can gangabartananas staman [ 」 ]rnam pa un ma khyi 'i rten man [」]zhes bag sum gyi ba 'in gon sa bstan mib thams mdamanyin pi nying gnye nipa'o/ khrin atang bcu da gal ji lhar log pa' rta ga ga nya min [」 ]pe'i na ji bedang lan gi sgonas rim papazhin bamad pam tshigosas bcad paganyis dang gang bcig gis gsungs pa'ir pini/ migs pa 'tha dad da'i ni ngos

rajasag rlung bar parnamingapa ma byenid phre dngapa padam byi nam gu khor zhis gsungs te / di lo rgol lan dpo ning migs paces ba sto/ de'i migs pad pas medi cis bding 'grelan sa bcom lhan ranasatshos thams cad dados bomamatshis pe lags nathams cadamathen gnyid gyi zigs pami 'asad de 'is sle la bal [」 ]raba' sho sbyor b.las khang ba'i nga ba ni med ches gsu gi/

nodam ba' med hyang zhu rdzogang migs pe phathad ces doni ryis gnas pa yino/ /gnanyis bani ba comag lhan gdas tshes thams mad dngas khabi med pa'irang li des par gzhing bi pag sin thegs gang gis zengs ྒུsa kyi zhing sgyong shis sgrol gal [」 ]dab ba gyo chis thems tsa dingan bond pa'ing ba ning ba'aji pa' bye tshing sang sa khus kyi tshing gobadang semisi man sgin par ped do'is gsu so/

bsu bcam ba tunam then ba bsi shes la shul bgangamed pasadangs pom cis pa'as mam chis pa' rtags panyi daja ga pa rgyu shis gol ba'ilan ga ka'asnam po ga rlab sems dpapa masem gud pang zhin po gisong pa kyi 'ayos 'u gyi 'asglo ngab 'i ba bi zhin kyil rkad na rag po 'od mi lam med cis skyon gyi na mob cim yin ninis pa na di/ kho ི zhing llan

gnab gtos gyang bdad tubs masanas btsom ldan 'anas chi lags [」]'jig rten gi kanyun rdzob kyang gzhan la don dam kyang gzhan zhig lags samazhes sgolab li [」 ]rab byo'ar di dag gzhan shes byab ni mid kyi ུna rdzongab gyi di bzhin nid gang yin gdodonadam ragyid bzhin nid donas gsus so/ /leg par rtogs pagazhan btsu tshogs khu bcadapa gnyis pas sbong ba ni/

sbor dang da gon mchog gsumapor/thabs bcas thub pa'i riogs pa rang /[」]phyin ci ligan lam bcas dang /gnyen po ma mthun phyogs dag dang [」 ]zhes gsungs so / de la 'ang dris lan lhapa ni sbyor dpaces pa'i din ti btsom ldan bdas byung cha bsems dpa'asams dpa'achin po gangal sbyod pa lags [」]bka'astsalapa [」]gzugs nas rnam pa thams cadamakhyen pashid kyi bar stong zhis bya bar

sarnam pa gnyis su mi'aphyur bde ltar sbrod de'isaso/ /rlag pa ni ra ba'abyor rgyis gsolapa [」]btsam ldan 'anas sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes brgyibade gang gi zig slong gas lags  bka'astsal ba/ rab byor yang dgaba'i din nis nga rgyas zhes bya sho  / 'di lhar res yadagi pa'i misamadon bar rdzogag par sadas rgyas bos de'i gyi sangs rgyus zhis gye

zhes pa'o/ bangun batshes la log pa' rtog pa slo ba ni ba tsom ldzan 'angs bang tshub ces bsgya na gyu chub ches bgyi 'ard gang gi cig sla dgas gab 1'astsalapa / dab byor gyu rub ches byab deni stongab nyidadadadagazhin nyid dadamanar pade bzhin shid kyi tshigasla dgas sazhis  'byung do / rgyad pard ge 'und gon mtshog la leg pa' rtogs pod gag pani bong mag mi nga sa 'i li/

sgeodaba'i gi'ui mi bamad snyaman sa bcom ljon 'anas dmigs paba'i tshung gyisi nye ba'araganas pami lagasan b.lo'u phyin pajugar stongapa nyi thams mad laji sto syod par 'gur zhis sgol ba mapa kakha'asnamal [」 ]dba'yong gnyis kyi tshul ྒྱིsa red gabasglobamedade  / gi nyis pami byon sems dang bob skyed banas sems kyim bsgyedapaba'i la gyi gi brnam par baphe la'i/

gosogs cas sii/[ 「]dgang ni tshis thams cad medan bams cadam khyen po ྒྱི phabs lamalas pami radang snyamanas b.rogam lun 'edas bamis mdamazhinapa ni thob pa 'i 'a ྒྱུrangapaba'im bis lamakhas b.re gang pags zhis pal  dba'abhor ri' ྱོ ུba se mas dingapa' sems dpu' chen pos mis dang pobasgyedabapar khong zu sye 'i la tshos mamog nad rang gimaman shing kyis slongabs

nas semis can yongs se syin par ged bdad sangs rgyus kya zhing yongs sud gopa' phyed donis pa'o/ /panapani btsom ljen 'das dades pod dngos bo mid pa dang gnyigi dang gnyigam yin b.ramangon bar rdzogs par btsa bami rgya na ma cin bar rtogs per 'gyur bzi lha bu 'i gamachis zhes rgol gal / bgakhtso las / slyo bamed cing slos bdang phul ba ni ma ngon par rtog sa pa 'in/

bas lan bstan no/ /khi tshigapa ni ga sil ma btsom lhan 'das gya rtsab sems dpa' simasad pab chen po' syos bani gang lages ches pani rgil bste phyin ci lig med par thal ba'o/ /khan ni btsom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsulapa [」]gzugs nas rnam bathams cad mkhyin banyid kyib rartag padangagirtag pad bad bad sbeg bsdul bathames cad ni sbros pa'i nyis bshin no gabacug nyil

ci byang rub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po lam gangags gyung rub sems dpa' sgyon mamachas par 'gyur zhes lam la mi'ithad par rgol bal [」 ]bka'astsal pa [」]raba'yor lam thams cad la bslabs nas gdub sems dpa'i sgyin med par 'jug ste  / nam rda rdzol lta bu'i ni di 'dzin theb par ma gyur gyibar dathams cad mthen pa nyid thob par mi byid do/ /ting ngi 'dzin de thobam thag/

cig cigadang tshdzun pi'i mis dpa kyis thams radam zhyen banyid theb par bod de zhis pa yininyi [ 「]mdo rad slob dpon sing ge b.rang pos sduma'i phrong mdzad do/ bcug sum par bunu bani pa ni tshis thams da dngos pomad paso gnyen pod mim thun phyogs mi' phad snyam pa'i ྒོla lan [」]dba'aba'ar de la byung chubasi mas dpa'asems dpa'achen pos tshos gang rigis padadamathong bas bslabs nye mang

dag/ garimi 'inatami gzhen [」]nanathos dngarong sang rgyas kyi tshis rnams ni shis padad mthong pas bslabs te mngin jumi gi'o[」]rnam pa thams cad mazhyen banyid kyi yi shis kyi tshis thams ma rnam pa thams nad dmangon du gye'azhis pa yin no/ /batsho tshul dang bunu jug pa ni/ mtshan nyodami sgom pa shes gsus te / rab 'gyor mtshan nid med pa'i b.rel 'u phyin pabaslab pa

ri b.re'ang sla bas chotsham mi mtshan ni gang nga mig so ba cami rgyu linyis pam  / dag bugur byimi mamomal / bo thebs ldan gas khon bzug san sob zhung ba'ims phams nad pab srab par mis gyi mnyi sa ྒྲོla ba khing na/ dga' gyo tshis khal shig lam tshin ni shodan nimatshan ni ri labaslub pa 'basgyu na[ 」 ]mtshan nyi mi ngogamatshan shid pabs ba par mi gi  man shi yid /

bobang gsubapa'ami gyi shis padang gsol bachos thams nad metshin shid mam chisan ci lta shis khab kyi parol cu byin bsgrem b.rabasgyur gi rgol pal [)\u0f7a ]ba kakhastsamalalapa [」]ches bams na sgom parnamapar pa'ajig pani shis rapa kyi la'oso 'u gyin bsgom payonas gsus so 1/[ 「]mi ngan ga tta gsi pa'i ryan gyi gel pal nan gi lig le las skra bis tshub tsi mo'im don pa

ba' rtogs parnam par dge ba bsad brin to /[ 「「]ni ma khyen pagasum gyi rtogs pa bstun pa' byed pa' ྒྱིmthar gyis pa'i mngon bar rtogs pa ba gdan [」]smyin pa shes gyang dag dang / /sangs rgas la sogs danadang tshes /dngos med ngo pa ni gyis de [『]momar gyis pa'i ga par bzhed [」]ces gsu saso / de yangamade las raba'abon gyis gsol pa [) ]btsom lngam 'das tshes

thamasacad dngos pomamachis pa'ing banidal [」\u0f92\u0fb1\u0f74]nga rub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pemathar gyis spyodab dang mthar rgyis slobo ba dadang mthar gyis nan tan gyis blun med pa yang dag pa' rdzogs pa'i gya chug tumangon ba' rdzogs par 'tsha rgyubar 'gyur [」 ]btsom ldan 'das kyis bka'asrolal [」]rababagyor deos po'i 'u shes chan rnams dngos pom dpa'i 'ju shanis lad god par pe'o rnam pan
ra pa neng gga ngo gi si pa ni ryin mi 'ag ma' sa  li gabyeg par chya ba'i

san med bayangad dgu ba' rjegs pa'i gyu chug ru 'jug ste / mthar gyis slob par 'gyur ro nis gsungs te sgyor bstan pa yin no/ /so sa'i rang bzhin ni rapa babyor bya chu bsems dpal sems dpa'achen po sems dang pobaskyedapanas nyebar bzung ste zhes pas dngasanas de spyin ba'i b.rolacu phyin pal spyod pa'i tshi bdag rakyung sbyin ga gtong /b.rol gyu sbyin gaga'ajug [」 ]sgyin ba'i ligasapa

rad / gam sgan bgatong bam yar 'azhun gam dgakham phye do/ deb zhi ུ tshung khrims dang / brtsingag nga  bcen thug da/ bsam gnan dgi sa bang kyi lilagacu phyin pa'i la canug skung te dedag khrus rirami lasama'as b.redam gi na les dparang sa skyis kyis pa ga'o sanam byo cub yems da 'i syi mi dpar 'acajug go/ rji ma lasas ྱོga ki ni gapa' phyen/

b.rajug bsathams can khangs susgan ba byedo/ de nas bam sa cad mabyen ba kong par gab te / thos kyil longabasge'ar/ /denas sems man nams zig pagasum papa gotanas yongs su grong la shi de zhi sa bas gningapar pon na ti maphar ྒྱིsa pad gabastun no/ donas rjes su ngan parag yalo songs ྒུgas rjes su cin pacing gab gyong bi lta na bu bu gus mas ra ba'asems do'/

chen pas sa rgyas rjes su ngan bsgrom khen [」 ]mdadagapa rdzogs pa'i sangs ྒྱུsa ci mi tshin be'i mtshan su gtu ra ga nyis dang [ 」 ]sgya ga ser gyi mdigadang 1'o 'dom gang gdang [」]de byu bzid bob rgyod bcur yid pami phyi do/ de cing gis shin [「]'dilta de dag gango gini med do/[ 「]gi zimid pas ni'os bomad prangan par michis ti /jan bamad cing yid labyed pamed bcisas/

ryus rdzas su ngan pa'azhis parang / de bamin rtsar ba byor tshedasu dan pani sgem pa yin zhen [」 ]dgeb dang mid gab dad lung tum pi stan ba'imis yid lami phyidapadajanapa med cing yid pobar med pani tshig rjesasungan pa'inis padang [」]dobazhinand ge'adzi rjegs dan panar pa' phyor bcom lhan gnas kyi na thos kyid ge 'dzu tshul khrims da ni nge'ajinar ges babar rnam pa gro/

gar snung pa breb ba'isi shes mtshong bskye khu zung pa nirang go zog mkhatsad podang mapor shid pami phyeng par dan bamed cing gi pi gyu mod pani gi'u rjeg su ngan pa'is pasadagon mchomag gsumag rjes su dan lagi sangs lo/ de bzhin ra nul khri lis rjes su ban pari ra lag khrimasamashatoms ki sgyen medabs ting nge 'acin yong spi ji la par ped pal gan gnyi dil dadas pomad pa'i pi/

nadanu yad ba phye cing / dngo lo nyid tangan pamed cing yidapabyu med bsnyi rtsal khrim sa rjegasu dan pa'is pad [」 ]gtongab rje sas ngan pani dings pomad paba'ing gni ྱི tshul gyis gtongabarjes su dan pa'abye ste bdagani sgin pa gtong pa'o/ dis poni'adi'i / 'dil gto bar gya'o sna gtu mi sims nyedan bamed cing yid pakhyur medapani gtongabarjes su ngan ba'ashois padang / lha

bab tham bam nas cathag sa sa pas bye lab ma'asazon/  ིsa this bsi sa bun cig yi na la ni ི panadaganatsam yilas  rabon mapa sagyi ma shi pa gag khomanang khims mam mnan yi zhi gab con ba bu bui ba khisazu na ga yi kyin pa'i gī pam yapa ci ི spyi pa yog ma 'is pis/

ragams thebs ུbsam ba' 'is zlub bi sma cig min gi/rtogs pagaci shis par bya  ce sa ba rje / sbos brun min gi pa'asagyi gi leog sa bsu ma mar gyis gim sab gu ma rgagung bcin thus bab ྲgin gyi ba ma gyin ma'ig sa paba'ig lu gang pang mang bzhig mngan ba ྱོ bi ga yig cig gis sa pa hun bamaman ྱི gamo pi tshing syir babs gas ban mtshan ba'al

ba cis bams dadamangon bgagyur bste / de cibub pa bya za bsams dpa'inam srin ma shin pa'i skad cig mngi rtag so bar nis pa'i gyanas po dibab babasagyed ril gyi cub sam gar pa'i simasadapapa cin po sgyin bgang yongs sugatong ba'i shis papa ki yis ta byin pas zin papas gnan dam yin/ /deb zhin rul khrim sanas ba'os da byin pon gas dang / han bte b.ragazhag pa

na bu hub bi bog sa ti tshams rnamasadang / sas rgyus kyis bi mesarnams dang / mtshan namasadang / dpe gyu bzang borams gongam na pa sgrub ba'ad nis pal kyi ziga'u phyin sa zin gams gnan ma'i tshin/ /[「]ba 'a gyi ིsa ra kyi la logu gyinar ga'i bjong lod pari sems bsgyed pacig gis pa'aros 'u phyi pa zuiganas mtshan dad pa ྒྱ bar bo' la ྱི mas rnams kongs gu po/
pa' byed da'is gsusaso / /ga nyis pa dpes stonapani/ ji lta sgyes bu zonun ryung /rtog thabs cig gis bskyod pa

yan/ /wams cad cig char 'galo ba lhang  sgrad cig gcig shes de bzhin no/ zhes bste  / depe rasges pa'irig khabs cig gis ze ba ci ga bsgyod pon thebathams mad 'gul para'abgyur balharang /byung rubasems dpabasgad cigam 'im non ba' rtogs payaganas pa'i sri ba lu 'un/

res cig gis kyang zag med gyitshis thams cad yongs su ljogs par phye dade [」]rag 'yor 'di la bang rubase mas dpa' sems dpa'achen po yis rab kyi b.regacu phyin bal spyod ba' tshimatshanam dang bral ba'i sims kyis sbyon gtongapa yinate / dmi tshis thams cad 'byung bamedapad ma'onabar bu bya bamed gal sems chan rnams yongs su sgyin pa'abyed de / sangs rgyus kyi ིnga yos su bcin no/

do/  ka ni gnyis parnam pa' sbyin pa'i zag pamod pa'i mis thams cad skud cig lamangon bar bang nub pani /ga4ེtshos kang thims ma kyi / /rang bzhin shes rapa parol ྱིna/ /rnam smyin chos nyid gnas skabs skyes/

deni sa ci ga ga cim yi shis  zhes ba ldei / dgar po 'otshatams ra dpazhin nis rapab kyil yopa da phyin bamatsha namamed pa'igs pa'i'i shis sgad cig cig gisas brgyud ba yanamand kyigs nasga bas kya tshis zag pamed pa'itshims bams na mngana'ugyung pa yin no/ di pang mad las / dag bugyur gil gyu rubalasems dpa'achen bo gis pas kyi b.re' 'u byin bab sgyo ba'imirang gninag lin/

hri de 'dzinam gtog sa ba ti ri bajin bams mdadzdzogs par phye dade  / rtsa ྗེ lta bu'i gingi 'dzin gyong sas tshdzogs pa' gye do/ rgya cu kyi phyigs kyi tshos sum bcu rtsa bdun ne bar bsgrabalas nye gnas so [ \u0f92\u0fb1] chu bse mas dpa'isyi me dpam zhugs nis sangs rgyus kyis yongasasu rdzogs par bed de'is gsuosaso/ /gsum pamatshan nyid med pang sgru cig lama'an ga'ardzogs paras/

nag pa ni/ spyin pal sags sbyong ga yis /ches kun mingabam 'a'ang gnas nas /tshos rnamasamathan ni me da pa'i sgrad cigam ni ga cig gis rnyogs / nyis bstei / rab byor ringal gyu bub sems dpa'asamis dpa'achen boshis pa kyi lil dubyin pa sgo ba'i sa ིlas se sag ུ'in ri lin pa'i gu bozngu laganas ི sgyin g.yongs su gnong/ ru khyimagasung ngo/bsor sgyi'i/

ben 'grus tshi ma ma/ ti ngi 'acin sgram mo/ shes pongasgrom mo/ de bzhin bsgram lha lud sgyi rgyu dngabazla da mig yord bsgra b.ran dngabibi' gong dang sgrul pa lta bu 'i paraju ga sungs so / /ba'ing zhiganyis su med par mngon pa' rdzogs par gad cu ba pa ni/ rmi bamor mi dimathong nyi /gnyis kyi tshal dumam thong ltar [「]chosarnoms gnyis su med pa'i/de ni ྐུda cigag cig gri kha'o/

nyes ba phye denas dgu' gyo gyis btsom lhan 'das la 'disgrud ches gsol no /da ci ྱི nga na chos khomis na rmil ma nas sgul bste 'ui par du ba tshal par babye / ba 'asna lapa [」]shes bapa kyi 'a'oga'u phyin pal sgyo ba'i mi bam mi ma tho/ rmob mam thong bami mi thong danyis banas sbyal paba'i bar ུmim thongasgrul bam thong mthong pamim thong ིsa gsungs so/

mdzan par rtags pa' rgyun gya 'grel pa bcud gyi zig le las skabs btun pa sgyad cig ma'i mngon bar rtogs pa'i rnam par bye ba bshad zin to/ /de ltar sgroms pa las thobapa'i 'bras buchos kyi sgra bshad pal bzhi lti [」 ]don dam pango bonod kyi sga dang / kun rdzob palong sgyo rdzogs pa'i sgra dang [」 ]sbal ba'i sgra dang [」]de dag gi 'phrin las bgad pa'o/ dang phol gnyis ྤྱེ

ngabongos gzung bad /de brten pa'i yin tan gyi tshos so/ de ladang pob gad pan /[」 ]thu ging po 'ing skra ni/ / zag me da pa'i chis gang dag [」]thob ྒྱུra rnamazhun rnam dgapa  de dgarang bzhin mtshan nyid can [) ]nyes gsungs te / da bi ni kyi skuni bgi bamed pa'i lon nan bamos cad thob pa'i 'i gis de degarang bzhin gyis sgyebamed pa'i mtshan nyid man gyi tshos nyidarnam dgal

brjodado/ khon glo'ar gyi jims ma dag gam snyaman [」]rnam dag nyis paste blo bur gyi rrims kyadadag ba'o/ de'ang yinas dgapar brjodapani rim kyin ces pi'o/ debar rabab gor gzhan yang zagabamed pa'i tshos rmilam lha ba dngos podang mi ltan b.rad si limadapa'irangapabazhin nanarang gimatshan nid stong brnam pa thams nad yongasas dogapar rgyur bdedagasams cad kyirang bzhinag

bamatshan ི chig pa 'id lta ste/ / mtshan nyid medapadeni ri bzhin gshegs pa ra gri bcom pa yangangag pa'ardzogs pa'isangs rgyas shes gyaste / di bgying rubasems dpa'asems dpobachen pos bslab pa' bya'og sungs so/ /tshos kyiskali yon nyen gyi mogazag pamed pa'i tshis ba ga da pan deli 'as gzhung padang [」]deganan las khyan par dul lagis padang [」 ]gdu bya ba ji ྗra snang garang

shobasu babazhis bstan to / de lad ponari pa'aphor ྒྱིsa gsomal / btsom lcam 'das zagapa med pa'i tshis de dag gad lagos [」]btsom lhan 'das kyis ba ka'asnul pa zhes pa'i dan te  / de yang zag bamed ba'i 'i shis kyi tshios ying bur chigigasungs bdang  mtshanadad dpe gyud kyi tshis rgyas pa' sten pa'imi din slib dpon sang gi bzang bas bstsuba'id ngos pob zhis sems tsan gyi dan byed ba'i

'rin los dngasbya nas gsas so/ de ltalang ba'i' denagya sungs te / dang pobanu ni nan thos dad thun mong pa dang / denas gnyis bya cu ba se mas dpa'ad zhun mong padang  / denas pagu ni sangs rgyus kyi ུna mngam yin pa yin no/ de lad pobun ni chigs su bcadapa gshis kyis ba snus pa'irangaponi/ rgyu tshub phyogs mthun tshad med dang /rnam par thar dad mthar gyis mi/boms 'dugapa

dadag nyi dpa khad parapa rui la gnyi danyes pani gya chu gyi phyogs dngab 'phun pa'i tshis sum banu ra gnyis dang [」 ]tshad med pabazhidang / nong gzhugs can du 'acu gis pas gyi rol gyigazugs labaltub dang [」]nangagazugs canam yin par 'ju ges pas gyi rol gyig zugs la lta ba dang [」 ]sdugapa'i rnim pa'athor pakhus kyi mang natu byaste rdzogs par gnas sazhis byabadang / gzugagame

[original page number: 276]

ba'i snyoms para'ajugapa bzhi dang [」]'dzu shis dang tshor ba 'gog pa cigaste rnam par thar pa brgyud dang [」]snyoms 'jug dgu ni 'di la 'dod pa dang sdig pamidagi bas byen [」]rtogapa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa [」]dpen palas skyes pa'i dga'ab dang bde bcan bsamagatan dang pod [」]rtogapadang dyod banyibar zhi nas nang yongs su da ste  / sems chyargyun cag ta gyur pas rtog pa dang pyed pam/

pas zhingi 'acinalas skyes pa'idaga'ab dang gad bcan bsamagatan gnyis padang [」]dedaga'o b.las 'do chags deng ga linas danapad nga ldan zhi shis bzhin tug tang snyems su gan she  bde bayus kyi myong pa bdeb lang phyod bgatang snyoms pa'is brjod bdaga'apab med pa'ingapasamagatan gsum padang / de bde bang sgras lcug bsngal la yang sros ching yid gdeb dang mi ba'ir bsams 'u

pas dedagamed bad [「]gnad snyoms dang ngan pas yongs su dag pa bsam gnan ba zhi gal nyi bar bsgrubs te gnas si zhis pa'i bsamagatan bzhidang / gzuogs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugapa pazhidang [「]'gog pa'i sims para'ajug pa'o/ /zad par phrun nis da jud med gungad ston god ser bod dmar pod dgar pod nam ma ba'adangarnam ba'ashes banyis ba zhan/ /'dagaṭ

don ni ming dang ngamigis paphru mol rtinanas rgyas par bsgoms pan mthar goms b.re'i snang pa rgyas para'i byung pazhinati / dpiran bad paran mam kha' dang nud lta bu lamatshon na bu ga'i ring dngamam ma kha' lha bu lasems b.ru sgorgyas par bsgoms pas mthar re dag gi stang brgyas para'abyang 'is gsungs so/ tshos dngapapo lnga bag danas deli lig ma lhag sungs pan / ze ba byas gnan pa' sgyematshodan

ga tu gye brnam brgyud dang /non mongs med dang sgyon maphyan dang / mngon shes so sor yang dgarig / ces bsten gzugs chan ru bu shes pas gyi li rgyi la rogs mdang [」]chen bo jil rgyis gnon padang [」 ]nang gzuog sa tsan ma yini para'aju ges pas gyi rol gyig zugasazhunang [「\u0f7a] chin poril rgyis gnon pagan de bzhin steg pa dang mi sjag pa'ang zin ྒྱིsa gnan padapa / nang gzugs mod par

gis pas 'dag sngon lodang / se' podang / dma'i ga dang /dgar pozil rgyas mnanasamathong gnyis pa rgyud dang [」 ]zidag gnyinanas gzhan non mongs bsgyi ba'i si phin slongabadang [」]'alodagadangagyudan las 'das pa'i mi thab rta ga bas sgyonanasamazhyen padang / mdon ba'igashis pajugadadapa/ sos pang dgapar rig pa pa'i'i/ dani byi chub lems dpa' da thun mong gi tshis band pan

rnam pa thams cad dgazhidang //dbang pacu / zhes gsungs te / lus yongs su dgapa dang [」]dmigs pa yongasasu dag padang [」 ]sims yongs su dag padang [」]yi shes yongs su dag bstebani dang /dpang banuni/ tshering padang / sems nyi de 'dzinal dpang pa dang [」]lusangam yid gsum gyilas dgapa dang [」 ]gang 'dod par skye ba dang [」]sagazhi la sogs bganga'adod du bsgyur bar ུsa pa
