al bas ladalang b.rar /[「]gang gad pa'asgran lam bgrub sarang  / gang bdong ba'ing bu phyed par [」]ji ltabar ngabi si pali mis dang / sde snodamalas pa shis palims mdapang gshis pa'o/ /sangasargyag khon la gin mongam yin pa'i tshis dguni ris su bamad pa phyidang gsum lhag gis gsungs pa'id ngapaboni/ sbom gsud pa mi 'jigs pa ri ི garang [ 」]bsrung

yad rnamagasum da/ ngran panyir ba'agarnam gsumadang /bsnyel pami mdara'i choms zhid dang / ces bste / sngang bshad pa'itshis rnams dang [」 ]mi'ajigs brnams dang /[」 ]sgya dang gsung dang thugs kya syong brnam por dag pa bsrung pa med padang / chos nyin par bdod papachags padang [」]mi 'dapa la khong khro bdang [」]gnyig laganyigs pen pa'ingan pa nyi bar gnagapad

sams tsan gya dan bya ba' dus las 'das pa'i bstel bamed paste / tshos lnga bgadado/ tshos lhagam bzhi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis bas gsungs pani / zag chags yang dag btsomapa da / spye la thugs rje chen poror / /thub pa khona'i ma 'ingis tshes / /bco brgyud bshad pa gang yin dang/rnam pa thams mad mthen nying dang / ces bste /nan rgyal la lus kyi gnas ngan len yod kya

sasgya sa byas sras par  spye borams mad ba rnying brjes nga sdamaband bstonar pa'im khrajes pa'ims dang/ rnam bathams nadam khyin bzhid yin ladang gis bsus paga'i shis da pom shis kyang yi ti /mad b.li gsungs pa'i gi ro/ /srilin bslus pa ni chos gyisu nyis garod pa yin /cemab ste / zagapa med ba'ilas rims ki tshas nid bachos ྱིsyu brdod/

yatshad bsargyas pa'ar bgad palagashas las / dngabo nan mongs bamed pa'i gyud pa rgyas par bgadapani/ nan cagan mengs me'i lha [「]mi mi na mongs yongasyong shi / /srod sogs su'a'i nyo longs rams rgyanag tso rgyal ba'i ron longs mongo / ceso ba ste / nan bes kyi na mongs pa med pa'i 'ingi 'dzi ྒྱིsa mi'i na mongs spyong la  rphab ba'i 'ing ngi ི ngin gyis cinag ma

byabam sa nad gyi nyon mongs basbrong pa shin no/ der gyu ུba sems dpaba'asames dpa'achin penis ba kyi b.rosu phyin pal spyod ba'is sims nan ser snanan da gse 'asna las bzloganas spini 'i 'alil cu phyin las sla ིsa ba thung phomalus pa'i ming na khanas pa'i gyi sa su btu 'jog gnyis gsus so/ /khyad par ga nyis pa sgyon nas mkhyin pa'i ྱོda pa'ani/ sang sa ུsa ྐྱོna/

nas ma khin pani/ /ldan gyis grub dang chags spangs dang /khogs pamed dang rtag gnas dang /'jig kun lan 'dabs par phyed  ces gsus te / de'ang ral 'byor rgyis gsol pa [」]btsom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rangasangs rgyas thams cad la mamachis pa'i ngimatshar smrad gyi tshis byang rub sems dpa'asems dpa' chen po lamachis pa gang lags [」]bka'asbalal [」]raba'abyor

de'i phying shin ta legs pir nin ma zung gig dngabasha dpar gya'o  'dil gang rub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po ིsa rab kyi 'el tu phyin pal spyo pa'i tshi rnam par sgrin palas byung ba'i b.rolacu phyin pa dug la gnas te  / rnam par sgrin palas byung pa'i stong ba nyid thams cad dang dran banyebar gzhag panas sang rgyus kyi tshisama'ades pa'i bar la gnas shing [」]phyogs da gyog

mu ིnag kri 'a di len gyi lamagasas li mis can gangal sbyon lanas pa los cu phyin pajug dang  bsam gtan gnid [」]gzugs med pa'i snyims pomabajug pa dang / byams bdeng ྙི rjidang dga'u ba dang gta snyoms dang [」]danab nyebar gzhi go banas thams nad ma khyen btid kyi par gyitsams thams na kyis phan 'dogs sozhis gsungasaso/ dmi ིsa khi sag 'i khon/

dan gtam gal di lyar sgnang pa'i tshmam lag nyis te / spyod dag pa la ji lhir 'dod ba'in snang padang [」 ]mdagapa 'ammi snang ba'o/ /dang pon[) ]hphu ni longs su sgyi gyang nas /gang dang gang la gang dang mi  gangade gub pa phyur pa/ded de pa'i snang ngo / zhes bste / gtul bya gang dang gang yin gdus gang dang gangagi si 'ul pa' byed pagang gis 'ul bde snang bayin

de' dan ni botsa ma tshu ni danas phyang tshtsob sems dpa' sem sod pa'achen pogis rab kyi parob 'ui phyin pa zab mekhab spyod nga'i tshi tshes thams mad dngas po mid pa'ingi gnid dngimatshan mamed papa dgeb dung ming ge bdang 'ijig/rta nilas 'das padang [「\u0f72]khanamathol dpakhan mthe bamidapadang / zag pad bcas pa dbag pamad pa dang/ 'dzusag byas dang 'us mi gyas dang

'didagani nan bsad rang songs rgyas rnams kyirgyur 'gyur ba'o/ /'did gni rnim pa thams cad ma khyen pa'i ྒྱོra 'abgyur ba'onis brgyil la 'god paramadzad paningomatshama'acheste sgad daphyar pa'itshas sozhis gsungasaso/ /gnyis pani/ rtsa' rgyal phos char bsgyang/ /sa thon mi nu mi   langs rgyas rnams ni byang gyur gyung /[ 」]sga lo ba samod pas bzong mi niong/ /

zhes gsungs te  btsom ldan 'anas tshes thams cad rmilam dngasgra brtan dngamig yor dungasgra ma dang smrig sgra dang sprul pa lta gu lagasan dge ba dngami dge bdang [」]'jigarten dpa 'jigirtenalas 'das pa dang [」]zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pamed pa dang [」]'dus byas dang 'dusam byas dang [」]nyan thos dang rang byung chub kyi rgyur 'phyur ba'o / 'di dgan bla na med pa yang dag pa

rdzogs ba'i byang chub laji ltar bgod par 'gyur [」 ]ba kakhasnal pa [」]raba'abyor 'dil byis laso si'i sgyi bo thos li dngami ljan bsatshos dedag yang dag par dmigs pas lus dadangag dang yid kyis bsadanamasam yin pa dang mig yo ba'i las mngon par 'dum phyidadonis gsungs sa /dedag gi'in bsda ba ni  de lngar mang po rgye'i phyi/ / sas rgyas nyag parades par lo

den rakha medapa'abyur / /rtagabashis kyong brjor ba yin / zhes bste / gtsol gya yodas thams chad da 'kha padang [」 ]'alor pam styongs kyil racusemasaman gyi danamadzad pas ryan rtag pa yin no/ de 'ang btsom lhan gdas kyis ba ka'asbabal [」 ]byo chubs mas di pa' sems dpa'achen po gisi rab kyi garil du phyin pal spyod patsho tshos phams cad dngos bo mad pa'/

nganadidang / mtha'alas 'das bstongapa nyid dang [」 ]thegam dang bam med pa stong pa nyid la 'di gnid ge bdang ming gigadang [」]'jigarten padang 'jigarten las khu dang / zag bcas dngab gemad dang / 'das da 'das mgas dang [」]nanathos dang rang rgyal bdang [」 ]blan med pa'i bi cub kyiryur ba'argyur gnyes byabar dgad par mngad po ning mtsha ྱེ smad du byung ba'i mis so

dani sug nyis ba long spyi rdzogs ba'i sgub gdapa la gnyis te / ngogos gzung pad [」 ]mtshan dang dpe gyu khyad par dub gan dpa'o/ /dang pon/ mtshan ni sumachu tshoganyis dpa/ rape byud brgyud rtsung bodag nyid ri/kheg chen ni bamimapa spyi phyir/thuo ba'i long sgyo tshogs sgyar per/ ces pabaste/ dab 'genas gzhan yang gya rtsa
gsungs so /
tubams cad nnamapa thams cadang / de bzhin gshigs pa gra btsom lo yang dgo ba' rdzogs pa'is das rgyus ྱི sgyi  / sgyes bu chen bolomatshan sum bcu chi

sems dpa'asems dpa'achen po nis 'ab kyi bayol du phyin pa'adi la bslabs ci tshes de dogathams cadathoganas [」]blan med pa yang dag pa'ardzogs pa'i byad nug tu mngon ba'ardzogs par sangs rgyas te [ 」 ]thams cad /

gnyis kyis brgyan pa [」]dpe byad bzang po rgyud cus brgyan pa [」]byud chubasems dpal sems dpa'achen po rnams la [」]theg bachen pomatshog gi tshis kyi ling syodablan med pa'iradaga'ab dang bde bdad chim pa dang [」]ragatta dga'ab sngon par 'gyu re'is de lta lashes rab kyi pa rog cu phyin bal bslab par bya'azhis gsungs so/ /mtshan dang dpyud bgad pan 'di gnyis kyi

par ni slib dpon shan ti bani mtshan gtsobo dang / dpe bdade'i 'a'or yin no zhos pa dang [」]jo 'ubum pan rematshan ni ryan lta bu dang [」 ]dpe byad deli phru lha bu yin skad te [」 ]'on kyangamatshan ni ngi bo dang dpe byad ni ri'i khyad par gsal bad dngas pa dang smyon pa da rgyus pa dang mdzes pa dang snam pa la sogs pa'i ring bzhin jagasal lo  de lta 'ang mtshan bshad pal gnyis te /ngobongos gzung bad /

di' ྱུbas mapa'o / /de par bonu ri ba'abagyer re b.ri bzhin gshegs babiskyis bu cen brimatshan sum bcu tsha ga nyis gong zhen [」]zhis panas 'i ma pa bzhin tag sungs ba'i dan ni chigs su ba cadapa ldas bstun pa'i tshigs su bam dpadang bos ni mtshon lnga bstun te / derar di phyag tamams 'a lor lo'im tshanar pu syul zhabs [」]khyag dang mgas sor rrags phel parang / phug ni mings

gnasi'adapazhing gzhon gtsags /'i 'ispun mthun dag mthel dang  cis pab slebam la sgrelas phyig pas 'a'or le'imatshan dang [」]sdem babartan pas 'apas kyim thil mnam pa dang / bsnga ba ba zhis phan 'dogs pas so' mo'athel bad [」 ]bza' bdang btungab byin bas gzhon sachags padang / rom tsheg dugyar pa gyin pas mjun mthob ste/ rkang bag gi pomab 'i ra/khran

bgazhisadang [」]lhag pa'i phyogasamathob shin/ de nas chigs u bcadapaganyig parimatshin brgyu bstan no/ de lang /sor mo'ing dang gnying yangs sgrun cima'ing / zhabs mo mim ngan sphuni phyin phyis / /byin pa en yalan byag ri mengs 'doms kyi sra bsgrubisasun ba pa'imatshom   cem bste / ga si nga bya zar par byas pos sod mo 'ing bdang /[」]srog gnas pa baphan

btags bas gting ba yas bdang / srogag codapa sgras pas sgumazhi drang pa dang [」 ]dgi bslangs pas yong bu mi ma'on padang [」 ]dge bsgrel bas su phyen du' gyil laradang [」 ]cigi gaslob la li gug par bslabs pas phyin pa en mdong dadub dang [」]slo ba'i syi lom spyis pas phyag ringazhing mnges pa dang [」 ]sgye bothams mdamangs pa' syod pa la bkod padang gsang pa'i chig bsusalas

sgrub nubapa yin no/ de nas chigs su bcadapa gsum bsamatshon bcun bstun pani/ bags pa gseramangog pags pasrab pa dang /khla ni ringinas gilas legs 'azhungs dang / /'alamadzod spyos brgyan 'e stod seng ge 'ar / /'i'i dpung pa'imagozlam thal gong rgyos  / ces bste / ges bzang po gyin bas gosa'amadoga'adab dang [」]khong bamasas byin bas 'jam zhi srub bad [」]'u'i

sras bas gapas su 'gyi parang [」]sgyi bozams ced pab sanyen ga gang phyis pa phi mato slus brgyan garang [」 ]gnan gyi jig khad dam bsadi paskuse dgi 'dub dang  stan pa'asgru ba dmathun per slras bas dpung bslam padang [」 ]nan papa pan gyigs pas bathol go rgyas pa'o/ de' ིga su chigs u bamad pa'in nungabagatshang pasamatshan gyi tshom dug ga us pani/ 'di laro mi khim pa/

khamabs snang/ skaran chu bad sta su zhing gas/ /gamag tam babu lngan lngagams ri tshenges par / /tshangs gyungs 'grum pa seng ge'i rgyu da tshems / ce sa bste/ nad g.yog khyas pas 'om tshog da ldan b.rang /[」 ]sgye lotshamalalogs pa gyin pasanu shing gab bdang / gnas kyudapa' can byin pas gtsug tor dang ldanab dang [」 ]cig 'jam par smras pas lhags ringag

da / gnan tshos bstan pasatshodas pa'i gyas dang / cig khul ba sbras pas sang gi li 'grum pa 'daba'o/ denas tshem sa chis bamanam kyigi lenud bcam las tshos dug stonapani/ shin tadagar dung tshang matam thams bas dadang / /gras na pa' bu bamapar  da/
sabu cim thon 'bing spun 'ingamatshog gi/ /'ad ba'a'i dag sum bcu ma gnyis mtshan [」]/

abasarga/ btsan lab shu skabs pasacem sad1khabarang / bā sna ba sbras bsatshemasamanam padang [」 ]brdzun slas pas thags bzang bdang [」]phram sgras pas bzhi liun tshang padapa  lems man la yid 'u'ong bar bsalhus pas sganamathon 'azhingadang /khing bo sba sa pas ba'i ི gi blab ste / dgang go' ri dganir bzhinag shigs pa'imatshan sumapi nu na ga nyis so zhis gsungs so/ /mtshan

sgab sgru bdamag cab hab na/ cangab mthan gapa mam / ara la phyedapam rga gapa 'i/ de bing nar jrogam pas/ /aan ni ི ga yang sa sgrum   cesag sathum gig ྐིpa  kho' hu pa co gnad bam cigasu na ga' ི pam 'a binas khyi ྤེ khon maparang  1ngadagasams bag na pad pi kham ba byen pa hi la pa 'ad pi'i/

sabya bags bya ga/khams gyi nga / cenabaha gar btsam bas man bingab ྲུna bra ba chung 'in/ den sa gan ba nga gi ླga ang ma pin 'ie lan [「]5nga gsaglis pa phel ma mogam [) ]sgrab ིnga ha'i sawa na da/ /gdo la mji gud 'i dzid pa'ashin   shazhe sab spri tshotshan ga nan ga sgub ba' ྱིri gi payang gapa mas pa'i shigam pes brgum ba'i sda ma/

las sgung babashad bstur yan na/ dani pi bya bar bobargyubazur gdabamachigs su band papabacu ga nyis kyis gsungs so/ de dig kung sgid dam dolas debare bzhin gshigs pa'i dpi byad bzang bob sgyed nug shen [」 ]'di lta ste shis pa'i dan shin na/ de ga zig lenu byas padang pos ni dpa byad brgyedabastuni/ /zub pa'i sin mozas mdog da [」 ]mad gi zi bamathod so ma

rtamasas rlung byang byan byas phra lar pa/ rtsam mthon dngamunu ba med / chemab yin/ denamachig le 'u gyas pa gnyis pas tshom dgub su ga pa ni/long gamim don nabs lanam dang /[ 」]seng gi glung chen thyad ni /[ (\u0f74]ma chog stabs gshigs gapas phyags dang  mnges mni gla ba dang bgil gagatsags  zhes bste/ lo ba mim na parang [」 ]zhabs mazham phir pa / se ger

slang bochi dang lu mchog gi stabs su bzhud parang [」]byung bltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa dang [」 ]g.yas phyogs dang mdzes pa dang drang por gshigs pa dang [」]shin tu legs pa yin shes 'byung ngo / de nas chigs su bcard pa gsum las tshos b.run paldus pa ni[) ]syi do byas 'a pom par 'tsham / /gtsang dang cham dang dug pi smra / /mtshan na yongs su rdzogs pa dang / /skul la lag lang

ging bzang  ces bsde  cim par 'atsam pani ིma rgyis gzhol bzhes pa dang / rkar ba bu nu mi zhing mdzes banyes gsungasaso/ de na sa chigs su bcad pabazhi pas depa byad drag pabalhogapa ni/ gom sroms dang ga ga yi ri/ / na dang ga'omag can ིngang / /spu zhum ledarang phyas padang / /yi dgimis pa'i sa nid dang / / ces bste/ de bar po ni gam ba snyoms payi/

1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml,1_021_01,,ex21012023-09-181,unreviewed,149a3 - 149a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21012023-09-181"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">   <milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (149a3) (p. 303:3)]""/>

column3: rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba rnams kyi nang na smra ba'i glang po dam par gyur pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6973"">slob dpon shes rab</rs> zhes bya ba dang
column4: theg pa mchog gi sgor zhugs cing brtul zhugs kyi khur bzung nas dben <lb n=""149a4""/> pa'i gnas su sgrub pa'i snying por mtshan nas brjod par dka' ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3912"">slob dpon tshul khrims skyabs</rs> zhes bya ba'i zhabs kyi rdul la reg pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3911""> mang du thos pa'i dge slong gzhon nu rin chen</rs> zhes bya bas legs par sbyar ba
column5: rdzogs s+ho
column8: bkra shis so
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_003_05_C_Gro_brgyad stong grel chen rnam bshad.xml,1_003_05,,ex3052025-01-1013-159,unreviewed,Gro lung chos skor 477,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3052025-01-1013-159"" status=""unreviewed"">

column3: <lb n=""Gro lung chos skor 477""/>oM swatiḥ

column1: <l>srid pa gsum gyi brgyan du mdzes (d)e'i
<l>yid (y)ong (snon) kun ldan d(p)u(ng 'di)
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7036"">bkra shis <abbr>dpal ldan</abbr> 'od zer</rs> las 'khrungs
<l>chos kyi s(py)an mnga' rnams kyi gzigs dang
column3: </l></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_003_05_C_Gro_brgyad stong grel chen rnam bshad.xml,1_003_05,,ex30520250110201,unreviewed,84a5 - 84a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""84a5""/> bshes gnyen dam pa dag gi rjes 'brangs shing
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex30520250110201"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""7""/>
<lg> <l>skye ba kun du bdag gi blo gros ni
<l>dpag med yon tan tshogs kyi 'byung gnas kyi
<l><lb n=""84a7""/> legs gsungs 'di' cung zad ngal byas pas
<l>'gro kun srid mtsho che las myur sgrol shog
column5: </lg></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_003_05_C_Gro_brgyad stong grel chen rnam bshad.xml,1_003_05,,ex3052023-11-241,unreviewed,84a7 - 84b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""84a7""/> legs gsungs 'di' cung zad ngal byas pas
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3052023-11-241"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (84a7–84b1""/>don gyi gnas rnams ni phal cher <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">slob dpon bdag nyid chen po</rs>s<!--probably rNgog Blo ldan shes rab (db:3786)--> sbyar ba
column2: 'di nyid kyi don bsdus ba dang
column3: 'grel ba rung ba'i bshad sbyar gyi rjes su 'brangs te rtogs par bya'o

column1: 'dir ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">kho bo</rs>s skyes bu dam pa de'i gsung gi bdud rtsi'i zer ma la gces spras byas te
column2: <lb n=""84b1""/> tshig gi cha ji tsam rnyed pa de brjed byang du bkod pa yin no

column1: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4464"">'phags pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa</rs>'i don cung zad
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyi brjed byang du bkod pa yin no
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_003_05_C_Gro_brgyad stong grel chen rnam bshad.xml,1_003_05,,ex3052023-11-2489,unreviewed,84b1 - 84b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""84b1""/> tshig gi cha ji tsam rnyed pa de brjed byang du bkod pa yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3052023-11-2489"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Post-colophon verses (84b1–84b3)""/>
swa ti ḥ
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""1""/>
<lg> <l>rgyal yum sbus pa dum kun mchog gyur kyang
<l> don rgyas tshig nyung shin tu rtogs bka' ste
<l>  de don 'grel la dbang du gyur ba yi

<l> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">rgyal sras bzang po</rs>s <lb n=""84b2""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3709"">rgyan gyi snang ba</rs> mdzad
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""2""/>
<lg> <l>des kyang mi gang la rjes 'jug gdul bya la
<l>rgya bod 'dran<anchor xml:id=""a7""/> zla bral ba'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">gro lung ba</rs>s
<l><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4464""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3709"">rgyan gyi snang ba</rs>'i rnam bshad </rs> phul byung mdzad
<l>'di la ma rten 'grel chen phyogs mthong med
column3: </l></lg> </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_003_05_C_Gro_brgyad stong grel chen rnam bshad.xml,1_003_05,,ex30520250110213,unreviewed,84b2 - 84b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""84b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex30520250110213"" status=""unreviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""3""/>
<lg><l>don 'di mthong nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mkha' spyod dbang po nga</rs>s
<l> bka' brgya phrag mang po dang du blangs
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dad ldan rngor bsam bza' mi rnams</rs> dang ni
<l><lb n=""84b3""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7036"">dpal<anchor xml:id=""a8""/> ldan bkra shis mgon </rs>gyis sbyin bdag byas
column3: </l></lg> </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_18_chu mig pa chen poi rnam thar.xml,2_050_19,,ex50182024-09-161,unreviewed,1b2 - 1b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50182024-09-161"" status=""unreviewed"">lung dang mngon par rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan zhing
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3975"">kha mo ze'u zhes grags pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chu mig <lb n=""1b3""/> pa chen po</rs> de

column1: dpal rdza ra'i sa'i char ze'u'i rgyud du 'khrungs
column2: dgung lo bco brgyad la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">dge bshes 'bre shes rab 'bar</rs> la mkhan po zhus nas rab du byon te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">dge bshes khyung <lb n=""1b4""/> rin chen grags</rs> la dbu tshad dang spyod phyogs brlabs shing zhar chos <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4206"">stag</rs> gnyis la gsan skad

column1: de nas mkhan po la pha rol du phyin pa lo drug gnan te mdo 'grel dang bcas pa <lb n=""1b5""/>mtha' dag par mkhyen
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_18_chu mig pa chen poi rnam thar.xml,2_050_19,,ex50182023-09-20-094538,unreviewed,4a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50182023-09-20-094538"" status=""unreviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (4a4-5, p.357)] ""/>
<lb n=""4a4""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3975"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen chu mig pa chen po</rs>'i yon tan gzhal du med pa las
column2: phyogs tsam mtshon pa'i phyir <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">snar thang</rs> du sdebs pa'o

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Post-colophon annotations (4a5, p. 357)]""/>
<abbr>zhus so
column7: </abbr></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_028_02_ dBang phyug rin chen _ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i sgrung 'grel.xml,1_028_02,,ex28022024-09-2015-39-31,unreviewed,[503:6] - [503:7],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex28022024-09-2015-39-31"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">thub pa'i gsung dang de'i dgongs <lb n=""[503:6]""/> 'grel rnams
yang<anchor xml:id=""a4""/> du byas ste<anchor xml:id=""a5""/> legs par bshad mod na'ang;
<rs type=""person"" ana="""">bdag</rs> blo byis pa'i dbang gyur 'gal 'khrul rnams
<rs type=""person"" ana="""">daM pa rnaMs</rs> kyis bzod par mdzad du gsol
<rs type=""person"" ana="""">bdag</rs> gi phan sems rgya mtsho las 'ongs pa'i
sgrung 'grel<anchor xml:id=""a6""/> ngo mtshar <abbr>rin chen</abbr> phreng ba 'di
skye rgu'i blo yi dbul ba brtan<anchor xml:id=""a7""/> bcoM nas
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">kun mkhyen rgyal [503:6] ba</rs>'i dpal gyis 'byor gyur 1

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">bdag</rs> kyang <rs type=""deity"">'jam pa'i dbyangs</rs> kyis rjes bzung ste
thos bsaM sgom pa'i dpal 'byor gyis phyug cing
<abbr>'bras bu</abbr> sku 4'i dngos grub myur thob nas
<rs type=""deity"">kun tu bzang po</rs>'i dpal la spyod par shog
dpe<note type=""gloss"">'</note> legs la dag pa 'di
column3: <anchor xml:id=""a8""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6857"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa</rs>

column1: <anchor xml:id=""a9""/> yon tan dbang phyug gis <lb n=""[503:7]""/> bsam pa bzang ba'i dgongs<anchor xml:id=""a10""/> sgo nas × bzhengs pa lags

3_072_01.xml,3_072_01,,ex72012025-02-2416-45-50,unreviewed,157a1 - 157a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""157a1""/> bdag gir zhen rnams skal ba dman
column3: gzhugn don 'di ni dus gsum kun du yang
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex72012025-02-2416-45-50"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5181"">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyan gyi bstan <lb n=""157a2""/> bcos 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i rgya cher bshad pa mdo'i don gsal bar byed pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i don la 'jug par byed pa'i tha snyad tshad ma'i tshul rig cing sde snod gsum la blo'i snang ba rgyas shing yum gyi dgnogs pa mdo 'grel dang bcas pa kla yun du sbyangs pas nges pa'i don la blo gzhol ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4005"">bsam bstan bzang po</rs>s
column6: mdo <lb n=""157a3""/> rgyan 'grel
column7: 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i don tshig nyung bar bsdus shing thams cad mkhyen pa gnyis pa bla ma bka' lung shes rab sing ge dang
column8: khams gsum ma 'gran bzla thams cad dang bral ba shes bya kun la lta ba'i mig cig por gyur pa bla ma mkhas pa chen po nus ston gyi gsung gi man ngag gis brgyan te
column9: dga' ba'i lo <lb n=""157a4""/> lo sgron gyi zla ba'i kar phyogs tshes brgyad la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dpal ldan snar thang gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du rdzogs par sbyar ba'o
column13: </seg>

column1: 'dis 'gro ba du ma la yum gyi dgongs pa ster bar gyur cig
ston pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo 3 stong bzhi brgya brgyad bcu gya bdun pa'i dus su'o
column3: dge'o legs so
column4: bkra shis so
column6: </TEI>"

column2: rang bzhin *rjod* byed dang des brjod pa gnyis ka kun rdzob yin la *
column3: *<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19062023-07-2412-53-22"" status=""unreviewed"">tha snyad dang de'i gzhi dag gis mtshon pa'i chos nyid rang bzhin skye ba myed pa de la don dam pa zhe bya
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3829"">pu to ba</rs>'i zhal nas bden pa gnyis sprags klungs bzhin du spangs pa yin pa la
column5: rang cag nyin srib la 'byar ba bzhin du song nas <pb n=""7A""/><?oxy_comment_start comment=""bdun""?><?oxy_comment_end?> <lb n=""7a1""/> $$
column7: kun rdzob du las 'bras lasogs pa yod yas tsa na rdzas su 'dzin
column8: don dam pa stong byas tsa na kun rdzob kyi las 'bras la yang skur pa 'debs
column9: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">slob dpon</rs> pas kun rdzob bya ba phu byas pas yal nas 'gro ba tsam zhig tu gsung te
column10: rang cag la ye gting tshugs pa <lb n=""7a2""/> bzhin du 'dug na gsung pa'o
column12: <quote xml:id=""d2e839"">[dam pa'i don ni gcig nyid de
column14: gzhan dag rnam pa gnyis su 'dod
column15: cir yang ma grub chos nyid de
column17: gnyis dang gsum sog ga la 'gyur
column21: ]<anchor xml:id=""a18""/></quote></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_06_F_C_NO_M_Anonymous_bden chung bum_etext_C.xml,1_019_06,,ex19062023-07-2412-58,unreviewed,14a4 - 14a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19062023-07-2412-58"" status=""unreviewed"">bden pa gnyis thabs dang thabs las byung ba nyid du lung gzhan gyis kyang sgrub pa ni
column2: kun rdzob ces pa ste
column3: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshogs dag la bya ste
column4: kun rdzob yang dag pa <lb n=""14a4""/> zhes bya ces <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">dge bshes ston pa</rs> gsung ba lags par gda'
column6: de'i skas myed par don dam rtogs pa mthar phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi steng du mi phyin ces pa las
column7: lam gyi rtogs pa nyid du skye ba shes rab kyis don dam pa'i bden pa bsgoms pa las skye ste
column8: <lb n=""14a5""/> de nyid la tha snyad brjod pa'i bdag nyid dang thabs thams cad dgos pa sngar bstan pa bzhin du yin la
column9: skye myed sgom pa la bde' 'gro'i rten thob dgos la de la yang thabs kyi cha dag dgos te
column10: </seg></TEI>"

column2: rnaMs kyi don gsal byed steng ta'i srol byed 4r gras te

column1: 3_071_04_bru_Zha_lu_rin_chen_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,3_071_04,,ex71042024-11-08-15-20,unreviewed,2a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71042024-11-08-15-20"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: kun kyi rgyan zhes pa la sher blos rgyas 'bring bsus 3 kun la dag ring kyi byin gyis chos mngon pa so ste snod kun dang ring ral yrings pa kan zhes bmd

column1: dang po ring zhes min</TEI>"

3_071_04_bru_Zha_lu_rin_chen_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,3_071_04,,ex71042024-11-08-15-34,unreviewed,18b3 - 18b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18b3""/>dmig pas la shes pa nyid la 'jug ste sngu yang khyab chen po la smon pai phyir dang phis kyang raM pa thaMd mkhyen pa nyid du pbo sngos pai phyis shes
column2: sning po mchog dang zlu 'di las kyang rgyi ba dgru'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71042024-11-08-15-34"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3820"">'dul dkar</rs> na re degi mtshid zhi bi rnaM pa zhes pa ni byede'i dmig pa rtogs pa yino zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba zang rngog</rs> 2 <lb n=""18b4""/>gsung ba mi legs kyi 'gyur yang sngon gyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'brom</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">'buM pa</rs>s 'thun par byas pi stong pi mtshid kyis bdag med pa dang de'i mtshid kyis zhi bi rnaM pa 4 dug dang zhes pa de legs te
column2: </seg>

column1: brgyad stong 'gren dang 3ki'i 'grel pa dang 3ri'i mod 3 ka dang 'thun pi phyir zhes
column2: </TEI>"

column1: 3_071_04_bru_Zha_lu_rin_chen_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,3_071_04,,ex71042024-11-08-16-31,unreviewed,18b4 - 18b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18b4""/>gsung ba mi legs kyi 'gyur yang sngon gyi<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71042024-11-08-16-31"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">'jaM gsar</rs> na re
column2: ma tas zhi ba bsdun <lb n=""18b5""/>bden gyi 4'i thu+ong gi rnaMr 'dod pa mi tig te
column3: 'gyur yang sngon gyi swo <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3820"">'dul dkar</rs> dang don 'thun par byaso
column5: </seg>

column1: 'grens bagzhan gyis syong pa nyid yin pai phyir bdag med pa nyid do zhes bdag med spyod pa don dang zhi ma bdag yed kyi don du 'chad
column3: gser gluing pa skyong pa 'd
column4: rngog la zhi ba 'dor smin 'dir</TEI>"

column1: 3_071_04_bru_Zha_lu_rin_chen_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,3_071_04,,ex71042024-11-08-16-04,unreviewed,22b1 - 22b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""22b1""/>pas bsgrus pa yin la deg dang ldan paMs brdun pa man mhod ni zag bcas sgiM laM deg dang mi ltha soings brgyad yan chad du zag med sgoM laM zhes 'chad zhe sin 'der ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71042024-11-08-16-04"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: kha che <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">gzhonu dpal</rs> na re mos pa pa 2 pa 3 pa 4 pa dang
column2: bsngo ba ya lnga pa drug pa bdun pa dang rjesu yi rang <lb n=""22b2""/>pa brgyad pa dgu pa dang
column3: bsgrub pa dang rnaM dag sgoM laM sa bcu pas bsdus zhes 'chado
column5: </seg>

column1: mches ci'i phyir mos pa rnaM pa 3 zhe na de la rang ngon du mos pa ni chos kyi thos par byed pi rgyina yin la gzhan don du mes pa ni yul ci ska thob par byed pi rthan yin la</TEI>"

3_071_04_bru_Zha_lu_rin_chen_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,3_071_04,,ex71042024-11-08-16-09,unreviewed,24b9 - 25a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""24b9""/>la gnyen po chung du'i chung du nas skye na mi mthun pa'i phyor ni chu'i chung du la swongs nas 'gag par ri ngs zhes tshig ste sbyar ro zhes bya ba ni lta re dags po sngo chu de g'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71042024-11-08-16-09"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: gzhan <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po grags se</rs> na re gzhung ji lta med ltar ni mi rigso zhes tshig sbyar te de 2 ltar na yang spang <pb n=""25a""/><lb n=""25a1""/> gnyen dod mnyaM por rigso zhes bya ba ni rgol ba'i don yin shes zero zheso
column3: </seg>

column1: 1_003_03_Gro_rngog lo rnam thar.xml,1_003_03,,ex3032023-07-1009-32-56,reviewed,24b6 - 25a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex3032023-07-1009-32-56"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">bdag nyid chen po thugs legs par sbyangs pa'i me long yongs su dag <lb n=""24b6""/> par<anchor xml:id=""a55""/> legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis rnam par sbyar ba'i gtsug lag gi tshogs mtha' yas pa kun du snang bas <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">gangs ri 'i khrod</rs> na gnas <lb n=""24b7""/> pa'i blo'i mig<anchor xml:id=""a56""/> yongs su dag pa'i skye bo rnams la kun du<anchor xml:id=""a57""/> ston par mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4459""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">skad 2 smra ba chen po blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyi rnam par thar pa</rs>
column2: <anchor xml:id=""a58""/> de nyid <lb n=""24b8""/> kyi sras kyi thu bo sdom brtson  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">sde snod 'dzin pa chen po <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">gro lung pa</rs></note>blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> shes<anchor xml:id=""a59""/> bya bas rnam par spel ba yod do zhes<anchor xml:id=""a60""/> lung rin po che'i tshogs <lb n=""25a1""/>kyis rnam par phyug pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4136""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> dge ba'i bshes gnyen<note type=""gloss""> chag </note>nyi ma</rs>'i gsung las <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5838"">dge slong 'phags pa</rs>s gsal bar thos nas
column3: <anchor xml:id=""a61""/> gtam gyi skyes rmad <lb n=""25a2""/> du byung ba de<anchor xml:id=""a62""/> lta bu rna ba'i snod du nye bar lhung na ci ma rung snyam du bsams nas
column4: <anchor xml:id=""a63""/> ring du 'gro ba'i pho nya dag la nye bar 'gugs pa'i spying yig rnam <lb n=""25a3""/> par springs pa'i don
column5: <anchor xml:id=""a64""/> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4387"">dpal rte'u ra'i gtsug lag khang</rs> na gnas pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams</rs> kyis bsgrubs pa 'di <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5838"">bdag</rs> gi sug tu <lb n=""25a4""/> thengs<anchor xml:id=""a65""/> nas
column6: <anchor xml:id=""a66""/> lcags pho<anchor xml:id=""a67""/> rta'i<anchor xml:id=""a68""/> lo zla ba gcig pa la shin du<anchor xml:id=""a69""/> dag par byas pa'o
column8: dge'o
column10: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_084_01",,ex83012024-11-2110-40-15,unreviewed,310a4 - 310b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""310a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex83012024-11-2110-40-15"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5277""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3761"">chos mngon pa'i mdzod</rs> kyi 'grel pa mngon pa'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba ¦
rgyal ba'i bstan pa lnga brgya phrag bdun pa'i mthar nye ba na
shes bya rnam par <lb n=""310a5""/>'byed pa'i blo gros mtshungs pa med pas thub pa'i bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing*

thugs rje dang 'phrin las kyi dpal 'byor bzang pos skye dgu rnams smin cing grol bar mdzad pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che</rs> dang*
shes bya'i nam mkha' la mkhyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas shing snyan grags kyi od zer gyis phyogs ma lus pa khyab par gyur pas sdom brtson mkhas pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur cing*

gangs can gyi rgyud kyi gnas brtan chen <lb n=""310a8""/>po <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3977"">mchims thams cad mkhyen pa</rs><!--mchims nam mkha' grags?--> la sogs pa'i zhabs kyi rdul rnyog pa med pa'i spyi bos len pa ¦
mang du thos pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4090"">shA kya'i dge slong 'jam pa'i dbyangs</rs> kyis
column2: <pb n=""310b""/><lb n=""310b1""/> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5733"">dpal sa skya'i chos grwa chen po</rs>r dbu(?) brtsams na(nas?)

column1: <rs type=""place""><rs type=""person"">sa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po chen po</rs>'i pho brang cong to'i mkhar</rs> du legs par grub par byas pa'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_035_05_ brTson grus grags_dul ba spyi don gyi rnam bshad.xml,2_035_05,,ex35052024-12-0614-36-49,unreviewed,[123b2] - 123b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[123b2]""/> dmyig bskyed byang chub mchog thob shog
column3: dpal ldan yid 'ong dpe' byed lhun gyis * grub pa'i bya brgyus su
column5: skal ldan rnaMs la yid bzhin nor bzhin bsgrub mdzad bla ma'i gsung
column7: bdud rtsi lha bu'i chos brtsaMs bdag nyid 'khrul pas nongs bgyis bla ma dang
column9: dri myed rin chen gter la mngon suM gyur pa rnaMs kyis bzod mdzod
column11: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex35052024-12-0614-36-49"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"">spyir bstan pa'i ti ka shes rab <lb n=""123b3""/>sgron ma</rs> zhes bya ba mtshan smos par dka' ba'i yul mtha' ya[s] chen po <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3818"">shag kya'i dge slong brtson 'grus 'bar</rs> gyi gsung dri ma med pa'i ro myangs pa dang

column1: smra ba'i seng ge chen por gyur pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">shag kya'i dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs> dang
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3946"">shes bya'i naM mkha' la blo gros kyi nyi ma shar ba'i dge slong gzhon nu seng ge</rs> dang

column1: 1_010_03_F_C_NO_M_X or Jad_bstod pa.xml,1_010_03,,ex10032024-09-1111-36-00,unreviewed,158a6 - 158a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""158a6""/> nu byang chub<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10032024-09-1111-36-00"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""deity"">bde' bar gshegs pa</rs>'i bka' rab 'byams<anchor xml:id=""a4""/> dri ma med pa'i gsal byed
column2: rmongs pa rnams kyi long khrid pa bla ma rnams kyi gsung gi rtogs pa'i myu gus (read gu'i?) rgyud brlan pa
column3: mtshan thos pa tsam gyis 'gro ba skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad spyod pa
column4: dpag du med pa'i don 'byung pa'i gzhi rgyal ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo rgyas 'bring gsum rtogs pa'i shes rab thun mong ma<anchor xml:id=""a5""/> yin pa dang ldan pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana="""">bla ma</rs>s
column5: dad pas rta la brtson 'grus<lb n=""158a8""/> kyi lcag gis bskyod pa'i (read: pas?) chos brgyad spangs pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gnang ba'i dus su
column6: gus pa dang dad pas gzhi bzung brtson 'grus dang shes rab kyis khyad par can gyi don la phyogs pa'i
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3863"">shag kya'i dge slong gzhon nu byang chub</rs> kyis legs par mnyan pas
column8: tshig dang don gyi rtogs pa phyin ci ma log pa mnyam pa med pa (read pas?
column9: or
column10: pa las) thob pa'i dge ba des skye bo kun yum la mos pa dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag</rs> nyid kyi rtogs pa brtan par 'byung par shog
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 4_113_02 theg chen rgyud bla.xml,4_113_02,,ex113022025-02-2416-01-14,unreviewed,60a3 - 60a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex113022025-02-2416-01-14"" status=""unreviewed""> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5476"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos kyi rnam par bshad pa de nyid snang ba</rs> zhes <lb n=""60a4""/> bya ba 'di mtshan nyid phyogs kyi lung rigs la rnam par byang zhing khyad par dpal dus kyi 'khor lo laswo pa rdo rje zeg pa la blo gros kyi snang ba rgyas pa'i bshes gnyen chen po slob dpon a mo g+ha sa rgyud bla'i Ti ka 'phags pa thogs med kyi 'grel pa gzhir bzhag cing sa bcad chos rjes bzangs pa'i lugs bzhin du <lb n=""60a5""/> phye ba rgyud bla'i thun mong ma yin pa'i chos skad lung rigs kyi zur thon par bya dgos rnaMs brten pa cig gyis shig ces pa'i gsung yig gis bskul ba la brten nas ¦ chos rje jo nang pa yab sras kyis bka' drin las nges pa'i don la shes nas dad pa thob pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4125"">shAkya'i dge slong lha'i rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis ston pa 'das nas <lb n=""60a6""/> lo nyis stong nyis rgya dang nyer gsuM song ba'i dus lcags pho rda'i khrums stod kyi nyer ba ° la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5732"">dben gnas nam mkha' mdzod</rs> du sbyar ba bstan pa la phan pa rgya chen por gyur cig
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3032024-10-1509-38-46"" status=""unreviewed"">de la dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">'bum pa</rs> ltar na
column5: rnam bshad mdzad ces brjod do

column1: <mentioned>gang gi zhe na</mentioned>
column2: bstan chos chen po 'di'o

column1: <mentioned>gang la brten nas ce na
column2: </mentioned>

column1: mi pham mgon la gsan nas so
column3: <mentioned>gang gis ce na
column4: </mentioned>

column1: 'phags pa zhes pa'o
de yon tan gyi khyad par ci dang ldan ce na
column2: de'i mtshan don dang ldan pa yin pas rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa brjod la
column3: de yang rgyu dang bcas par brjod do

column1: rang gi don ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs pas sdig to mi dge ba'i chos las ring du bsrings te spang bas 'phags pa ste spangs pa dang
column2: thogs shing chags pa med pa'i de kho na'i ye shes mnga' bas thogs med de ye shes so

column1: gzhan don ni nyid kyis gzigs pa'i lam bstan pas gzhan sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu las skyob pas skyob nyid do
column2: ga nas gcig tu 'gro ba'i sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rje'i chags pa goms pa ni ba gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu'o
column4: 'jig rten chos mchog man chad du dmigs pa'am chags pa med pa'i shes rab goms pa ni rang don gyi rgyu'o

column1: mi pham pa ni dgra'am yon tan gyi bde bgo skal gyis so
column3: des na spangs pa dang ye shes te rang don no
column5: mgon po ni thugs rjes gzhan gyi don mdzad pas na gzhan don no
column7: de la gsan pa ni bar du dus byas te dga'
column8: skye gnas gcig <lb n=""[Ar chos skor 300]""/>
column9: rgyas 'bring bsam pa ldan du'o
column10: bring gsum gyi don rgya che ba dang zab pa gsal bar byed pas bstan bcos chen po'o
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex023-2024-10-08-15-23,unreviewed,51a3 - 51a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""51a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex023-2024-10-08-15-23"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3745"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">jo bo</rs> yang 'chol pa sgoM par bzhed la
column2: de yang khyad par can dang khyad par can ma yin pa <lb n=""51a4""/> gnyis so
column3: </seg>

column2: de las khyad par can ma yin pa _ni de las dang po pa'i nas sa bcu pa'i bar du'o
column4: sa brgyad pa yan chad kyi rnam kun mngon rdzogs la dbang du bya ba'i don du sgom pa'am 'bad rtsol gyis sgom par byed pas ma khyab pa yin no snyam na
column5: _de yang sngar goms par ma byas pa'i rnam pa gsar pa sgom pas 'bad rtsol gyis sgom pa de'i rigs su 'dus pa yin no
column7: rtse mo'i mtshan nyid ni nim pa za ba goms pa'i tshul gyis rnam kun mngon rdzogs bsgoms pa las dbang mas pa las dbang du gyur pa thob pa'i sgom pa'am sbyor ba yin no
column9: de'i don yang goms pa lhun grub tu byung ba'i mkhyen pa gsum gyi rnam pa phyogs re'am mtha' dag la dbang du gyur pa thob pa'i mkhyen pa gsum gyi rnam pa bsdus nas sgom yin no
column11: dbang du gyur pa thob pas ni rnam kun mngon rdzogs la sogs pa las sa pa las khyad par du'o
column13: sgom pas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos sku las khyad par du'o
column15: ltos sa tha dad la ltos nas
column17: klog slob pa bzhin du rnam kun mngon rdzogs dang ngo bo yang gcig la rgyu 'bras kyang yin no
column19: mthar gyis pa'i mtshan nyid ni
column20: _brtan pa thob pa'i don du mkhyen pa gsum gyi chos</TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex2032024-10-1010-32-20,unreviewed,60a5 - 60a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60a5""/>mtshan ma med pas kyang de med par grub bo
column3: de med na zag bcas kyi sgom lam yang med par 'gyur ro
column4: _<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2032024-10-1010-32-20"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">jo bo 'da'</rs> dang
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">a</rs><note type=""gloss"">phya</note> dang
column6: <note type=""gloss"">dri med pa nas gten dang
column7: </note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">su ka ta sri</rs> ni zag pa ni nyon mongs pa'i tshogs yin la de dang bcas pa'i sgom lam ni 'jig rten chos mchog man chod kho na yin la
column8: mthong lam thob pa <lb n=""[Ar chos skor p. 365]""/> yan chad na nyon <lb n=""60a6""/>mongs pa skye mi srid pas
column9: sa dang po yan chad zag med yin no zer ba ni mi rigs te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">seng ge bzang po</rs>'i 'dod par 'chad na ni de nyid kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa drug sgom spang du bshad pas kyang gnod do
column11: </seg>

column1: de ni sa bon la bsam pa yin no snyam na
column2: _sgom lam gyi gnas skabs na mngon du rgyu yod pa yang mgon po byams pas
column3: _yid dang 'dzin</TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex023-2024-10-08-15-232,unreviewed,67b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""67b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex023-2024-10-08-15-232"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4294"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">khyung </rs>dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">'da'</rs> na re
column2: sa bcu' pa'i dkyil stod la yin te de byang chub seMs dpa'i mngon rtogs yin pas so

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex2032024-10-1010-26-26,unreviewed,[Ar chos skor 401],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[Ar chos skor 401]""/>ni mthong bas thob pa'i gang zag yin no zer ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2032024-10-1010-26-26"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">'da'</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> ni khyad par gyi lam gyi lnga po ni sa bcu ka'i yin te
column4: _sa dang po thob pa ma gtog la sbyin pa dang ldan pa de bogs dbyung ba khyad par can la mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa la sogs pa yin no

column1: de bzhin du bcu pa'i bar du sbyar ro zer ba ni de <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">seng ge bzang po</rs>'i 'dod pa ma yin te
column2: _des don gyi go rim du bshad pas de ltar na go rim 'khrugs par 'gyur pas so
column4: gzhan yang dang po'i khyad par la yod la gnyis pa'i dngos gzhi la med pa yang mi 'thad do
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex023-2024-10-08-15-59,unreviewed,82a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""82a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex023-2024-10-08-15-59"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4189"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dwags po</rs> na re byang chub sems dpa' rang la rgyun du zhugs pa lasogs pa'i don yod pas dngos kyi sgra yin gyi brtags pa ni ma yin zer ro
column2: </seg>
'di ni rigs te nyan thos kyi skabs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyun ni lam yin la de la zhugs pas der 'jog pa mtshan nyid pa yin pa bzhin du
column3: _sangs rgyas kyi rgyun lam la zhugs pas der gzhag pa la sogs pa yang dngos su 'gyur bar rigs so
column5: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i mdo las byang chub sems dpa' nyid la rjes su 'brangs pa la sogs par bzhag pa'i phyir ro
column7: de las rgyun du zhugs pa'i rgyu la gnas pa gnyis brgyad pa dang gsum 'bras bu bzhi dang*
column8: _rang sangs rgyas dang brgyad gsungs te
column9: _kun dga' bo dge slong de dag ni chu</TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex203_2024-09-1111-40-41,,[Ar chos skor 660],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[Ar chos skor 660]""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex203_2024-09-1111-40-41""> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rj[e] btsun khyug</rs> gi lugs<anchor xml:id=""a5""/>

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex2032023-07-2115-18-21,unreviewed,[Ar chos skor 662] - 170a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[Ar chos skor 662]""/>tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba byed pa la bdag gi mdo de nas ji ltar 'byung ba de ltar shes rab gyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ma yin no
column3: zhes chos dang gang zag gi bar du dbyen bcug nas 'bral bar byed pa'o
column5: bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnal ma dang phral nas
column6: _mdo las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan can gyi bdud kyi las 'a las 'byung bar 'gyur zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pas
column7: _shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan bdag gi sems la 'jug pa'o
column9: phral ba dang bcug pa de nyid bstan par bya ba'i don du bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas nas
column10: _byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi 'khor gyis bskor zhing bdag nyid kyi drung du 'ongs nas cang mi smra bas de nyid ston par byed pa ste
column11: _yul sangs rgyas ma yin pa la sangs rgyas su bzung nas dga' ba skyed pa ste
column12: _bdag gi sbyor sbyor ba snga ma yang dag pa yin zhing phyi ma log pa yin na sangs rgyas 'dis bdag la snga ma la skul zhing phyi ma spong du 'jug par bcug pa las
column13: _de ltar mi snang bas 'di nyid yang dag pa yin no zhes nges par byed pa'o
column15: bdag gi sbyor ba 'di log pa yin na bdag gis sangs rgyas ga la mthong _snyam nas kyang brtan par par byed pa'o
column17: nya5_sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa
column18: sbyor ba sgom pa la yon tan shes pa dang*
column19: 167b8 dang *o yong ba sngon du 'gro la
column20: de nyid la yang mtshan nyid shes pa sngon du 'gro bas de'i 'og du mtshan nyid ston ste
column21: de la mdos ma zin pa'i 'gon pos mdor bstan mdzad pa ni byad pa sgrub pa'i dbang du byas te

column24: de'i grangs kyi dbye' ba ni

column26: ming gis byed brag du 168(bis9a1 byas pa ni XXX zhes pa lasots pa'o

column1: 3_076_01_dbu_ma_rtsa_grel_rab_gsal_skyabs_mchog_dpal_bzang_W1PD153536-I1KG13965-17-212.xml,3_076_01,,ex76012024-09-1612-39-18,unreviewed,97a2 - 97a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""97a2""/>dge ba de yis skye dgu<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex76012024-09-1612-39-18"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5209""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3715"">dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab</rs> ces bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ¦ tshig don rab tu gsal ba</rs> zhes <lb n=""97a3""/>bya ba
column2: gsung rab kyi de kho na nyid thugs su chung nas ¦ 'chad brtsod brtsom pa la snang ba rab tu rgyas pa'i ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">sde snod 'dzin pa nyi ma seng ge</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dpal gsang pa 'dus pa</rs> dang
column4: mtha' bral dbu ma chen po sogs ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">'phags pa klu sgrub</rs> yab sras kyi gzhung lugs la gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus pa'i so**d pa dge ba can pa <lb n=""97a4""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">yong dbon po shAkya seng ge</rs> dang
column5: lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par smra zhing

column1: chos tshul 'dis la mi phyed pa'i dad pa can
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mdo stod pa sangs rgyas 'bum</rs><!--maybe dbus pa blo gsal db:4091--> laswo pas bskul nas

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4080"">shAkya'i dge slong skyabs mchog dpal bzang po</rs>s ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3725"">dpal ldan zla ba grags pa</rs>'i 'grel ba bzhin du
column2: dbang <abbr>phyug gi</abbr> lo ¦ smin drug can gyi <lb n=""97a5""/>zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi tshes bcu gsum la sbyar ba'o
column4: <abbr>yi ge</abbr> pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6844"">lung dang rigs par smra ba ¦ seng ge rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis <abbr>bgyis so</abbr>

column1: 'di la <abbr>brten nas</abbr> <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs dang dus dang gnas skabs <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnab par gyur cig
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_20 zhang ston chos kyi bla ma'i rnam thar.xml,2_050_20,,ex5020_2024-09-1111-32-43,unreviewed,10a2 - 10a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5020_2024-09-1111-32-43"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""10a2""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3890"">bla ma yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen</rs> lung dang
column2: mngon par rtogs pa'i chos kyis thugs brgyud ltam zhing
column3: kun gyi bla mar gyur pa'i yon tan nam mkha' ltar <lb n=""10a3""/> mtha' yas pa las mos gus kyi dran pa gso ba'i phyir
column4: phyogs tsam zhig
column5: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">snar thang</rs> du bsdebs pa'o
column7: <anchor xml:id=""a1""/></seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_086_02 dpal bzang_chos mngon mdzod rnam bshad.xml,3_086_02,,ex8602_202409182,unreviewed,95a7 - 95a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8602_202409182"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon ""/>

<lb n=""95a7""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5283"">rnam bshad</rs> 'di ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">tshig nyung dus gzhung gi don rgyas par rtogs par 'dod pa</rs> <abbr>dag gis</abbr> yang dang yang du bskul nas
column2: ° brtson dam pa mkhas pa'i <abbr>mchog grub</abbr> pa mnyed pa'i skyes bu <abbr>chen po</abbr>
column4: snyan po dra gsung phyogs bcur ‹'ba'›phrog pa
column5: rnam par dag cing lhun gyis grub pa'i <abbr>'phrin las</abbr> kyi bskal pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi <abbr>rnam par</abbr> 'dren pa
column6: mtshangs <!--em: mtshungs--> pa med pa
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">yang dag pa'i dge ba'i <abbr>bshes gnyen</abbr> <abbr>smon lam</abbr></rs> gyi mtshan <lb n=""95a8""/>dam pa'i zhabs rdul spyi bos yang dag par len pa
column8: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6029"">shAkya'i dge slong <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> ston dpal bzang po</rs>s sbyar ba
column10: rdzogs so
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_086_02 dpal bzang_chos mngon mdzod rnam bshad.xml,3_086_02,,ex8602_202409183,unreviewed,95a8 - 95a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""95a8""/>dam pa'i zhabs rdul spyi bos yang dag par len pa

column1: sde snod mgnon pa mi'i sde bdun dang
column2: <abbr>bye brag</abbr> bshad mdzod nying khu lta bu yin
column3: mngon mdzod gzhung don bde blag rtogs bya'i phyir
column4: rnam bshad nying khu pa'i 'od 'dra 'di
column5: rang dang gzhan la phan phyir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:6029"">bdag</rs> gis bzhengs
column6: dge gshegs daM chos 'di dang mi 'bral zhing
column7: 'gro ba °°<lb n=""95a9""/>° mthug <abbr>rnam mkhyen</abbr> pa la 'god par shog

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">mkhan chen pa</rs>'i phyag dpe 'di
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5284"">dbyang dpal</rs> gyi legs par bris pa 'di dge zhing <abbr>bkra shis</abbr> par 'gyur gcig
column3: shub+haM

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-42-55,unreviewed,27'b2 - 27'b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""27'b2""/> rtags kyi don phyogs kyi chos dang de'i chas khyab pa nyid yin pas shes bya dang tshogs pa don gyi ldog pa gzhan du 'dus te lnga las tha dad du gyur pa med do
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-42-55""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4207"">blo chung ngur gyur kyang mchog du rlom pa kha cig</rs> <!-- Tshad bsdus=me dig pa--> mi srid pa ni mtshon bya la ye med pa dang ma khyab pa phyogs cig la med pa dang khyab ches gzhan la'ang zhugs pa yin pas de gsum du nges te <lb n=""27'b3""/> mtshan nyid yin pa la de gsum dang bral dgos pa dang de gsum dang ma bral na mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro
column4: de gsum dang bral ba tsam gyis mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ma nges so zhes zer ba

column1: de'i ltar na mtshan nyid kyi skyon mi srid pa dang khyab ches pa gnyis su nges te mtshan nyid yin pa la de gnyis dang bral dgos pa'i phyir dang de gnyis dang ma bral na mtshan nyid <lb n=""27'b4""/>  ma yin pa'i phyir ro
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-39-07,unreviewed,41b7 - 41b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""41b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-39-07"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786""><!--rngog lo-->blo ldan bzang po</rs>s gzung yul dang 'jug yul gang gis <lb n=""41b8""/> kyang khyad par du ma byas pa'i yul bden pa dang ldan pa dang rtog pa dang bral ba mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid du 'dod do
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-40-09,unreviewed,44a8 - 44a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""44a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-40-09""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">blo ldan bzang po</rs>s the tsom dang ldan pa'i gzhi la shes 'dod 'jug rung du brjod pa'ang phyir rgol bsgrub bya'i chos la log rtogs dang ldan pa dang yid dpyod kyi nges pa dang blo kha ma phyogs pa'i gzhi la ma khyab pa dang
column2: bsgrub bya'i chos la log <lb n=""44a9""/> rtogs med na thal ba'i rtags ma grub la log rtogs yod na rang rgyud la shes 'dod med par 'gyur bas bsgrub pa'i thal 'gyur rgyun chad par yang 'gyur ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-2416-41-11,unreviewed,50b2 - 50b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""50b2""/> yin par 'gyur ba las<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-2416-41-11"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag cag gi bla ma <lb n=""50b3""/> dag</rs> dpe la yod pa tsam la mi rtag pas khyab pa nges pa'i shugs la mnyan bya'i yod pa la 'ang mi rtag pas ma khyab pa'i dogs pa mtshan nyid nges pa'i tshul gyis chod pas rjes 'gro dang gzhi la bkag pa'i ldog pa gnyi ga bsgrub bya ma grub pa'i snga rol du nges su rung par gsung mod kyi
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-2416-41-36,unreviewed,51a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""51a1""/> pas shes bya la mi srid par dogs pas rtag pa la khegs kyang mi rtag pa dang 'brel par mi 'grub ste rtag mi<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-2416-41-36"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag cag gi bla ma kha cig</rs> yod pa tsam la mi rtag pas khyab pa nges pas sgra'i yod pa la mi rtag pas khyab pa shugs la grub par smra te
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-2416-42-31,unreviewed,72b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""72b7""/> bya'i  mtshan gzhi dang
column2: mtshan nyid do
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-2416-42-31"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag cag gi bla ma dag</rs> bsgrub bya ni gnyis te
column4: rtags kyi nus pa'i yul gyi bsgrub bya dang
column5: skyon yon bsam pa'i bsgrub bya'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-41-02,unreviewed,80b8 - 80b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""80b8""/> na nog dang lkog shal dang ldan pa 'ang ma grub par 'gyur te ba lang dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-41-02"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">blo ldan bzang po</rs>s rlom yul gyi bsgrub bya ba lang gi brda'i <lb n=""80b9""/> rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba yin la nog dang lkog shal la rlom yul gyi bsgrub byas khyab pa'ang 'dod pas spyod pa'i brda' lan cig zhugs pas nges pa yin no
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-35-29,unreviewed,96a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""96a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-35-29"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4503"">tshad ma yid kyi mun pa sel pa</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">blo gsal zhing rigs par smra bas rtog ge ngan pa'i gzhung 'jig pa brtul zhugs mchog la legs par gnas pa'i dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s nye bar sbyar ba
column3: rdzogs s+hO
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-35-30,unreviewed,96a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-35-30"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""96a4""/>mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas bsod nams dpal gyis brjid
column3: legs gsungs dgongs 'grel chos kyi rin chen mdzod
column5: dam pa'i 'phreng mdzes dge legs gang chen mtsho'
column7: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusm:named_reference"" ref=""db:4362"">bri'u las gtsug lag khang</rs> du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag</rs> gis bris
column9: dge zhing bkris
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column1: dgos 'brel du <choice><orig>b(k)od</orig><reg>bkod</reg></choice> pa'i dgos pa ni
column2: nges pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa dang
column3: don du 'gyur ba'i the tshom gis 'jug pa dang
column4: gzhan gi log par rtogs pa spang ba gsum bzhag nas
column5: gzhung mdzes par bya ba yin no
column7: zhes <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5530"">skabs gzhan</rs> <choice><orig>‹du›</orig><reg>du</reg></choice> gtan la phab pa bzhin du shes par bya'o

column1: 'on kyang <quote source=""db:3694"">'di skad bdag gis thos pa</quote> zhes bya bas gtsor brjod pa'i don ni phyin ci ma log pa <lb n=""2a7""/> dang dngos nyid du yin ba dang
column2: rtogs pa ma yin <choice><orig> ‹par›</orig><reg>par</reg> </choice><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob dpon gzhan</rs> gis bshad pa bzhin blta ste
column3: 'dir ni cung zad nor par bshad pa yin no
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_07_rNgog_shes rab snying bshad don bsdus.xml,1_001_07,,ex1072023-02-2412-02-43,reviewed,2b1 - 2b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b1""/> 'das pa'i bar du gcod pa ni gnyis ste
column2: nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang phung bo'i bdud do

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha<choice><orig>ci‹g›</orig><reg>cig</reg> </choice> </rs> las las kyi bdud dang lngar gsungs ba der ni nyon mongs pa dang las gnyi gas phung po<choice><orig>lha‹g›</orig><reg>lhag</reg> </choice> ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i<choice><orig>‹ba›r</orig><reg>bar</reg> </choice> du gcod pa'i <lb n=""2b2""/> phyir ro
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_051_03_ral gri_bslab pa gsum gyi rgyun gyi me tog buda ocr.xml,2_051_03,,ex51032024-10-2515-46-27,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex51032024-10-2515-46-27"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4897"">bde bar gshegs pa'i shAkya'i bstan pa'i bslab pa gsum rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i sa tshe_mtha' rgya mtsho lta bu la shin tu sbyangs pa'i blo gros can theg pa chen po'i dkon mchog gsum la shes nas dad pa thob pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">shAkya'i dge
slong bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5680"">gtsang me tog mdangs can gyi dgon pa</rs>r sbyar ba rdzogs so
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_03_D_gTsang nag pa bstan pa byi dar bya.xml,1_013_03,,ex13032023-09-0715-44-14,reviewed,5a2 - 5a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13032023-09-0715-44-14"" status=""reviewed"">
de ltar sangs rgyas bstan pa'i don chen sgran
chos 'jig <lb n=""5a2""/> ces ltar snang ba mang po yis
zhing 'dir ring por mi thogs <choice><reg>zhub</reg><orig>'dub/zhub (?)</orig></choice> 'gyur bas
skyes bu spyad ldan rnaMs kyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus</rs> <lb n=""5a3""/> gyis
<note type=""gloss"">ga</note> gzhung 'di chos kyi snying po la spyod kyang
'jig rten kun gyis cir mi shes pa'i
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">dge slong seng ge</rs>s <lb n=""5a4""/> snyigs ma'i mi rnams la
rang gi rnaM thar gtam du bsnyad pa yin
bstan pa'i gzhi dang rgyas dbye' bsgrub pa la
yang dag yang dag ma yin rnam dbye' dang
<note type=""gloss"">cha</note> rang gyi kun spyod gtam pa rnaM lnga 'di
shag kya'i bstan la rnaM <lb n=""5a6""/> dag byi dor yin
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gro lung pa blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyi mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4468"">lam rim</rs> 'am <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4468"">bstan rim chen po</rs> bzhugs so
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml,"1_005_01

1_004_02",,ex4022024-09-1315-30-44,unreviewed,118a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""""/>thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur bar gsungs so, ,yang sangs rgyas<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex4022024-09-1315-30-44"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4468"">bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che la 'jug pa'i rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par [118a2] bshad pa</rs>
column3: byang phyogs kyi rgyud kha ba can gyi ljongs su byung ba
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bla ma rje btsun dam pa rnams</rs> kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i ze 'bru spyi bos len pa<anchor xml:id=""a69""/>
column7: lung dang rigs pa'i gtsug lag dam pa rnams la yongs su sbyangs pa'i ngal ba mi dman zhing mi zhan la mi nyung byas pa
column9: <lb n=""118a3""/> rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dge ba can
column11: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">shAkya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> zhes bya ba thub pa'i brtul zhugs la legs par gnas pas rang gi dran pa goms pa spel ba'i brjed byang tsam du nye bar sbyar ba rdzogs
column13: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml,"1_005_01
1_004_02",,ex4022024-09-1315-23-40,unreviewed,118a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""118a3""/> rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dge ba can
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex4022024-09-1315-23-40"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">rje klong rdol rin po che</rs> nas phran <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4132""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">klong rdol</rs> drung yig</rs> la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">rje gro lung pa</rs>'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4468"">bstan rim chen po</rs> 'di'i par zhig byung na brko rogs gyis gsungs kyang
column5: phran rang nyid sngon bsags kyis sbyin 'bras phra bas gser dngul sogs kyi mthun rkyen [118a6] 'dzoms dka' bas tshe 'dir 'grub pa'i re ba dang bral zhing
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml,"1_005_01
1_004_02",,ex4022023-10-11102522,unreviewed,118a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""118a3""/> rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dge ba can
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex4022023-10-11102522"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">mi dag pa dang lhag chad phra mo byung ba rnams
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">rje klong rdol bla ma</rs>'i nye gnas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4132"">drung yig dam chos yar 'phel</rs> gyi rang gi blo gros kyi mig gi dog gnas gang shes thams cad gsar du bcos nas dag par bgyis pa dang
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml,"1_005_01
1_004_02",,ex4022024-09-1315-25-43,unreviewed,118a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""118a3""/> rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dge ba can
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex4022024-09-1315-25-43"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4132""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">rje klong rdol bla ma</rs>'i drung yig</rs> 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad nas ngal ba chen pos lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas
column5: bstan bcos 'di nyid la sogs pa'i rnam dkar dge ba'i phung po che chung ji snyed cig byas pa thams cad ma gyur nam [120b3] mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la
column7: byams pa dang snying rje'i rtsa ba can gyis byang chub kyi sems rin po che myur du rgyud la skye ba'i rgyur 'gro bar gyur cig
column9: dge ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi <abbr>dug gsum</abbr> 'phel ba'i rgyu dang [120b4] sdig pa bsags pa'i rgyu la mi 'gro bar shogs shig
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_023_01_Shes rab mtha' can_mngon rtogs rgyan 'grel ba.xml,1_023_01,,ex23012023-09-18-101,unreviewed,188b4 - 188b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex23012023-09-18-101"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""188b4""/> <rs type=""work""> ma rig bdun sel bde legs pa yon tan gzhi </rs>

column11: de'i rjes 'brangs <rs type=""work"">rnam nges gzhung 'grel pa</rs> mdzad
column13: de dag la brten <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">seng ge bzang po</rs> yis
column15: mdo'i thun mong rgyan gyur gsal mdzad don
column17: mig gis sgra ltar 'phags pa'i bla'i yul
column19: blo sman<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3918"">bdag</rs> gis rtogs par nus min pas
column21: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">grol sde 'gos? kyi 'grel </rs>dang <rs type=""work"">ti ka</rs>
column24: <rs type=""work"">'buM phrag gnyis kyi 'grel rgyan</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">shes rab 'bar</rs>
column26: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">ye shes tshul <lb n=""188b6""/> khrims bkra shis brtson 'grus</rs><!--maybe BDR PORK1459 pa tshab dga' ba gdong pa gnas brtan ye shes tshul khrims--> dang
column28: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">seng ge rnam gnyis grags rdo rje</rs> dang

column3: snang ba skye 'gag byed pa'i phyir ro

dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">chos kyi seng ge</rs> na re mtshan nyid tha snyad kyi mtshan nyid ni chos 3 tshang pa yin no
gsum pa gang zhe na
mtshan gzhi la grub pa dang
column2: rdzas su yod pa dang
column3: rigs mi <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""13a2""/> mthun gyi spyi dang
column4: dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin no zhe na

column1: de ltar na mtshan nyid kyi rigs mi mthun spyi dang dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin nam mtshon bya'i rigs mi mthun spyi dang dngos 'gal du gnas pa yin
dang po ltar na bum pa mi rtag par mtshon pa la rgyu rkyen las skyes pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe
column2: mtshan nyid <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""13a3""/> skyon med du thal
column3: chos 3 po de thang pa'i phyir ro

column1: 2 pa ltar na dkar zal ba glang du mtshon pa la nog shal lasogs pa 'dus pa mtshan nyid du bkod pa'i tshe mtshan nyid skyon med ma yin par thal
column2: mtshan nyid de mtshon bya'i rigs mi mthun gyi spyi dang dngos 'gal ma yin pa'i phyir ro

column1: ma grub na nog shal lasogs 'dus pa <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""13a4""/> de chon
column2: ba lang gi tha snyad byar rung gi ltago pa yin par thal
column3: ba lang gi tha snyad byar mi rung dang dngos 'gal yin pa'i phyir ro
column5: ba lang gi tha snyad byar rung nyid bzhin no
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column2: mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad de mtshan nyid ma yin pas nyes pa dang po med do
column4: chos 3 tshang pa de mtshan nyid tha snyad kyis rang ldog la brten par ma zhugs pas mtshan nyid kyi tha snyad de rigs mi mthun yin yang khyab ches par thal ba'i skyon med do
column6: chos 3 tshang pa de mtshon ldan gyi <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""13b8""/> gzhi la zhugs pas
column7: mtshon bya la mi srid par htla ba'i nyes pa med do
column9: zhes zer ro
column11: </seg></TEI>"

ldog pa la brten par mtshon pa'i tshe mtshon <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""14a5""/> bya de rten kyi rigs mi mthun dang bsal bya rigs mi mthun 2 su yod pa de khong du ma chud par rang gi mtshon bya rigs mi mthun du 'thad do zhes zer ba ni shes pa bas smra ba rings pa'i gtam yin no
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column2: mtshan nyid dang
column3: mtshan gzhi rab du dbye ba dang
column4: de mtshan nyid kyi skyon du bsgrub pa dang
column5: de la brtsod pa spang pa'o

column1: dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3887"">'jam pa'i rdo rje</rs> na re
column2: rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni
column3: chos gang zhig mtshan gzhi la ji ltar bkod pa ltar grub cing don ldog kyang par ma grub <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""14b8""/> pa'o zhe na

column1: bum pa dngos po'i tha snyad ud mtshon pa la ba lang gi tha snyad mtahn nyid du bkod pa de rang ldog rzdas ma grub ma yin par thal
column2: gzhi la grub ma tshang pa'i phyir
column3: 'dod na rang ldog rdzas yod du thal lo
column5: des na rang ldog rdzas ma grub kyi mtshan nyid ni chos gang zhig don ldog kyang par ma grub <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""14b9""/> pa'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: rtags tshad ma
column2: khyab pa med na mtshon 'dod med pa mtshan nyid kyi skyon <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""16a4""/> yin pa nyams so

column2: sems can rtsam po la ba lang gi tha snyad khyab byed du mod (read: med) par mtshon <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""16b3""/> ************* mtshon par mi nus pas mtshan nyid kyi skyon can yin no
column4: de yang mtshon bya la ltos pa'i skyon ma yin ste mtshan nyid kyis mtshan gzhi la ma khyab pa'i skyon yin no zhe na

column1: rten rtsam du yod pa de gang zhes dri'o

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5573"">bdag gi yongs su 'dzin pa</rs> na re rdzas chos ldog chos kyi mtshan nyid ni rim pa bzhin du rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos ma lus pa la khyab byed du rten pa dang
column2: rang dang rdzas 1 pa'i chos 'ga' zhig la rten yang 'ga' <lb edRef=""inst:5593"" n=""18b9""/> zhig la mi<lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""22b3""/> rten pa yin zer ro

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha <abbr>cig</abbr></rs> mthun phyogs mi mthun phyogs kyi tshyad <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""43a2""/>  ni bsgrub bya chon dang bsgrub bya'i chos kyi spyis don mthun pa dang mi mthun pa de yin no zhe na
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column2: la brten pa'i phyogs chos ma grub pa lta bu'o
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0115-56-43"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la grub kyang phyogs 1 la ma grub pa ni sgra la <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""46b4""/> rtsol byung khyab byed du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'am
column2: sgra la rtsol byung rten rtsam du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'o
column4: zhes zer ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_01_3_087_02_Chu mig pa_rnam rgyal.xml,"2_045_01

3_087_02",,ex45012023-03-0211-59-11,unreviewed,46b7 - 46b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0211-59-11"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
tshogs pa rtags su bkod pa'i tshe ya rgyal 1 chos can la brten yang ya gyal 1 chos can la mi rten na phyogs chos ma grub pas khyab pa yin ste
column2: ya gyal khegs pas tshogs pa khegs pa'i phyir
column3: tshogs pa chos can du bzhag pa'i tshe
column4: rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la ma grub kyang rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la grub na <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""46b7""/> phyogs chos grub pas grub pa yin te
column5: <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>rigs kyi bye brag<?oxy_comment_end?> snang pa dang stong pa'i tshogs don chos can bsgrub pa'i tha snyad du byar rung ste
column6: bsgrub chos ma dor ba yin pa'i phyir zhes rtags su bkod pa'i tshe
column7: bsgrub chos ma dor ba de stong nyid la ma grub kyang snang pa la grub pas snang stong tshogs pa la brten pa'i phyogs chos grub pa bzhin no
column9: <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""46b8""/> spyi rtags su bkod pa'i tshe bye brag cig chos can la ma grub kyang bye brag 1 chos can la grub na phyogs chos grub pas khyab pa yin ste
column10: rigs kyi bye brag grub pas spyi 'grub pa'i phyir
column11: spyi chos can du bzhag pa'i tshe chos can gyi bye brag 1 la rtags grub kyang chos can gyi bye brag 1 'ang rtags ma grub na phyogs chos ma grub pas khyab pa yin no
column13: zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">chos 46b9 kyi seng ge </rs>smra'o
column15: </seg></TEI>"
