'dus tshul la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsa ba</rs> na re rgya che ba mkhyen 3 nang du rgya chung ba sbyor ba chos+ku 'du ste rgya mtsho'i nang du chu'i thigs pa 4 no gsung ngo
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex703-2024-10-04-15-47,unreviewed,11b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex703-2024-10-04-15-47"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ref=""db:"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge bshes khyung <abbr>rin chen</abbr> grags </rs>na re 3 po spyi sbyor ba chos+ku byeg yin pa'i phyir
</seg>
spyir bye brag 'dus pa mi tsam dang bud med bzhin no zer
column2: dge bshes 'bre shes rab 'baran re gsum pa rang bzhin sbyor ba chos sku gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir rang bzhin gyi nang du gnas skabs 'dus te rig pa dang bde sdug bzhin no
column4: zer ba la mkhyen gsum gang mkhyen gsum tsam mi skye med mngon sum gyis rtogs pa'i mkhyen gsum yin
column5: dang po mi rigs te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi sgo nas zhes bstod phyag gi sgor gsungs pa'i phyir ro
column7: gnyis pa'ang mi rigs te de gsum rgya che ba dang spyi dang rang bzhin ma yin te tshogs sbyor na med pa'i phyir ro
column9: </TEI>"

column2: laM shes mtshid pa dang byang 'phags
column3: rnaM khyen mtshid pa dang rdzogs pa'i sargyas 2 rim pa bzhin rnaM par bjog pa'i rgyud des bzhag pa'i sras pa yin zhes zer ba mi rigs te

column1: chos sku thob pa chos can
column2: gzhan don mthar thug ma thob par thal
column3: 'ongs sku ma las longs sprul
column4: de las 'phags chung gsum byon pa ni sras yin no zhes gsung pa ni</TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex703-2024-10-04-16-31,unreviewed,11b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex703-2024-10-04-16-31"" status=""unreviewed"">
3 pa rtsod spang ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slo+on pa</rs> na re mkhyen 3 dang 'phags 4 bdag mi 1 cing dus mi mnyam par thal rgyu 'bras yin pa'i phyir
column2: </seg>

column1: 'dod na 'phags pa yin pa nyams te
column2: mngon rtogs dang mi ldan pa'i phyir zhes pa'i rigs pas gnod la
column3: gang nas kyang yum sras su bshad pa med pas sgrub byed kyang med do gsung pa'i skyon med do
column5: ji srid du dus mnyam pa de srid du yum sras su mi 'dod la yum sras yin pa de srid du dus mnyam pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir gnod pa med do
column7: sgrub byed yod par yang bshad zin 'chad par 'gyur ro
column9: gnyis pa zhar las 'ongs pa'i don gtan la dbab pa la rtsod pa ni shes rab kyis 'phags bzhi skyed pa'i yab byed na yum du 'gal la mi byed na sras 'phags bzhi mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhe na
column10: </TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032024-10-17-14-01,unreviewed,22b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032024-10-17-14-01"" status=""unreviewed"">yang yab sras <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">gnyal pa</rs><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">gzad pa</rs></note> rnaMs na re theg suM gyi laM lnga mtshan 4 yuM du mtshon <lb n=""22b6""/>chos thaMd rang 4n Na par rtogs pa mtshod yino te
column2: </seg>

column1: sdud pa las
column2: ye shes tshul sgo thabs dang rtsa ba ji snyed pa
column4: de kun shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog las byung
column6: zhes pa dang
column7: pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur bas de'i phyir yum
column8: zhes bya'o zhes pa dang
column9: brgyad pa yum las phye bar gsungs pa'i phyir ro
column11: zhes bzhed pa dgag pa la gnyis
column12: sgrub byed ma nges pa dang
column13: gnod byed dgod pa'o
column15: dang po la sgrub byed dang po gnyis yum gyi mdzad pa yin la
column16: gsum pa ni mtshan rtags gnyis kyi spyi yin te mdo las kyang mtshan btags su phye ba'i phyir te
column17: lam lngar phye bar rjes dpag rnam gnyis zhes brjod pa bzhin no
column19: gnyis pa la gnyis
column20: rigs pa dang
column21: lung ngo
column23: dang po la bzhi
column24: ma khyab pa dang
column25: khyab ches pa dang
column26: mi srid pa'i skyon dang
column27: mi 'dod pa dang mtshungs pas dgag pa'o
column29: dang po ni rdzas ji snyed pa [ - 9 5 -  ]pa mkhyen pa yum ma yin par thal
column30: rang bzhin med rtogs kyi cha ma yin pa'i phyir rig tsam bzhin no
column32: 'dod pa la rtogs dang mtshan ma khong du chud pa yum du 'dod pa dang 'gal lo zhes pa ni rigs pa'o
column34: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i gzhi shes yum min par thal
column35: dngos po gzhi grub la rtags bdag gis stong pa yin gyi dngos por rang bzhin med rtogs ma yin pa'i phyir
column36: 'dod na yum las phye ba'i ya gyal yin pas yum dngos su 'dod pa nyams so zhes pa ni khas blangs kyis so
column38: gnyis pa ni rang bzhin med rtogs chos can
column39: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin te
column40: phyin par 'gyur ba la zhugs pa'i phyir ro
column41: khyab pa med de pha rol phyin 'gyur nyid der phyin pa yin pa'i zhe na
column42: </TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032024-10-17-14-33,unreviewed,25a4 - 25a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""25a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032024-10-17-14-33"" status=""unreviewed"">

yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">kha 1</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">'dul 'dzin dkar mo </rs></note>na re rnaM pa skye <lb n=""25a5""/> Na mngon suM du rtogs pa'o
column3: </seg>

column1: zhes zer ba dang rnam pa skye med du rtogs tsam mo
column3: dkar chung ring mo zer ba yang ma yin te
column4: gang zag thub pa kho na'i ma yin pa'i phyir
column5: khyab pa yod de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa dang
column6: thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid
column8: ces 'dir smos rnam mkhyen thub pa kho na'i mngon rtogs su bshad pa'i phyir ro
column10: yang dmigs yul rdza sa rigs ma lus pa mkhyen pa ma yin pa'i phyir khyab pa yod de
column11: rnam pa gang dag dang zhes 'dir smos rnam mkhyen gyi rdza sa rigs ma lus pa mkhyen par gsungs pa'i phyir ro
column13: yang byed pa chos kyi mkhor ma lus pa bskor bar mi nus pa'i phyir khyab pa yod de
column14: gang dang yang dag ldan pas 'di gsungs zhes pa'am
column15: tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste zhes
column16: 'dir smos rnam mkhyen gyis chos kyis 'khor lo ma lus pa bskor bar gsungs pa'i phyir ro
column18: de lta ma yin nyan rang chen po pa'i mngon rtogs 'dir smos rnam mkhyen yin par thal lo
column20: gnyis pa rang lugs bzhag pa la gnyis las mtshon bya ni 'dir smos thub pa'i [ - 1 ) 7 -  ] [ ， ]rgyu 'bras ngo bo'i rnam pa rdzas rigs ma lus pa kun mkhyen pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o
column22: mtshan nyid la gsum
column23: mtshan nyid kyi rang ldog ngos bzung
column24: rigs mi mthun sel tshul
column25: shes byed dgod pa'o
column27: dang po ni thub pa kho na la yod pa'i yum rtog ldan gyi 'jug yul du gyur pa'o
column29: bye brag tu spyi mtshan gzhir byas pa la nam mkha' sgyu ma ltar byed pa'i cha ni ji lta ba ji snyed pa kun mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid do
column31: gnyis pa ni dang pos thub pa kho na'i chos su mtshon la gnyis pas rnam mkhyen shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa min pa bsal nas der mtshon cing
column32: gsum pas 'dir smos rnam mkhyen gyis spyi'i rigs mi mthun sel la
column33: nam mkha' ltar 'byed pas ji snyed pa'i cha sel
column34: sgyu ma ltar 'byed pas ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i cha sel lo
column36: gsum pa ni spyi mtshan gi dang po la dgongs nas
column37: sangs rgyas kyi ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces so
column39: gnyis pa la dgongs nasarnam kun mkhyen nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de zhes so
column41: gsum pa la dgongs nas
column42: yul ni rnam pa gsum po zhes so
column43: bye brag tu ji lta ba dang ji snyed mkhyen pa la dgongs nas rim pa ltar
column44: zhi ba'i rnam pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o
column46: zhes pa dang
column47: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dmigs pa ni dngos po med pa'o zhes so
column49: gsum pa rtsod pa spong ba'i slob lam rnam pa skye med du rtogs pa chos can
column50: rnam mkhyen ma yin par thal
column53: kun mkhyen gsum du phye bas na
column54: rnam mkhyen du bshad pa dang 'gal la
column55: mtha' gzhan bkag pa'i rigs pas kyang bsal lo zhe na

dang po la 3 <lb n=""62a7""/>las gzhan lugs dgag pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">gnyal zhig</rs></note> na re
column2: sgrub pa tsaM gyi mtshid ni gzhan don du rnamkhyen chen po 3 thob par bya ba'i phyir chos thaMd mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob par byed pa yin la
column3: byeg du chos sku thob pa'i don sbyor ba kunas slong byed kyi bsaM pa'i go gyon pa 'jug pa seMs bskyed pa <note type=""gloss"">go</note> ni sgrub
column4: </seg>

column1: theg chen la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus kyi tshul bzhin du zhugs pa ni 'jug sgrub
column2: bsgoms pas byang chub chen po dngos su skyed pa ni tshogs sgrub
column3: bsgoms pas rnam mkhyen dngos su 'byung bar byed pa ni nges 'byung sgrub pa'o
column5: zhes gsungs pa ni ma yin te
column6: spyi mtshan dang bye brag gnyis ched du bya ba tha dad pa'i phyir spyi dang bye brag tu mi 'thad
column7: sbyor ba'i cha'ang sgrub par thal 'jug pa sems bskyed la 'jug par dam 'cha' ba yin go sgrub dam bcas pa sgrub par byed pa yin pas de de'i mtshan nyid du mi 'thad
column8: chos mchog chen po na yod pa'i mkhyen gsum sbyor ba'ang tshogs sgrub tu thal
column9: rnam mkhyen dngos su nges par 'byung bar byed pa'ang rgyun mtha'i bdun paranges 'byung sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas spyi mtshan du mi 'thad do
column11: gnyis pa rang lugs ni gdams ngag thob pa'i byang sems kyis chos dbyings rigs la brten nas dmigs yul nam mkha' sgyu ma ltar rtogs te
column12: chen po gsum gyi ched du theg chen la brtson 'grus te
column13: </TEI>"

column1: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5624"">rab tu gnas <lb edRef=""inst:4423"" n=""2b3""/> pa'i rgyud</rs><note type=""editorial"" resp=""PH"">The identification as the Pratiṣṭhāvidhi is tentative.</note> dang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5625"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon kun dga' snying po </rs> las stsogs pas mdzad pa'i bstan bcos rnams <app><rdg wit=""inst:4428"">gcig</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:4423"">cig</rdg></app> na'ang <app><rdg wit=""inst:4428"">ma rdzogs</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:4423"">rdzogs</rdg></app> shing <app><rdg wit=""inst:4428"">gzhung</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:4423"">bzhung</rdg></app> mang du <app><rdg wit=""inst:4423"">mthor</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:4428"">'thor</rdg></app> ba'i phyir
column2: <lb edRef=""inst:4428"" n=""1b4""/>de dag cig tu lag tu blang pa ma <lb edRef=""inst:4423"" n=""2b4""/> 'ongs pa'i skye bo blo chung pa rnams la phan pa'i phyir

column5: rdzogs s+hyo

<quote source=""db:5569"" n=""D22a5-6"">'brel pa bkag pas bdag med gnyis bsgrubs par bshad de 'brel pa med na byed pa po'i bdag dang bzung 'dzin med <lb n=""4a4""/> pas chos kyi bdag med bshad</quote><!--not a literal citation of SPA. column1: 2_038_04_ Shes rab rgya mtsho_bslab bya'i gnas gtan la 'beb par byed pa'i legs bshad khyad par gsum ldan.xml,2_038_04,,ex38042023-09-18-114223,unreviewed,52b7 - 53a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex38042023-09-18-114223"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">sngon chad shes bya'i gnas la <lb n=""52b7""/> sbyangs pa dang
lhag pa'i lha'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang

shes bya phal cher 'bad pa chung dus shes
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4737"">bslab bya'i gnas gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i legs <lb n=""53a1""/> bshad khyad par gsum ldan</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
column2: dang por <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4009"">'jam pa'i dbyangs dkon mchog rin chen<anchor xml:id=""a1""/> </rs>gyis <note type=""gloss"">bka' drin gyis</note> legs par bskyangs shing ¦ bar du <rs type=""person"" ana="""">mkhas pa'i dbang po <abbr>gzhon nu</abbr> rgyal mchog</rs> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa'i gsung gi smin <lb n=""53a2""/> [p]ar byas te ¦ mthar rnam dpyod kyis <abbr>blo gros</abbr> rtsa bshad kyi lung 'grel pa dang bcas <abbr>rnam par</abbr> dpyad pa la [b]rten nas ¦

column1: dgag bsgrub [sgrub] kyi [b]slab pa'i gnas la <abbr>blo gros</abbr> kyi snang ba rgyas pa ¦

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4009"">shes rab rgya mtsho</rs>s  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4312""><rs type=""place"">mnga' ris</rs> pa'i sde snod 'dzin pa <lb n=""52a3""/> chen po dkon mchog bzang po<anchor xml:id=""a2""/></rs> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pas bskul ba'i ngor ¦<abbr/> <hi rendition=""#Time"">lcags mo <abbr>phag gi</abbr> lo</hi> ¦ <hi rendition=""#Time"">smal po'i zla ba'i bzang po'i tshes</hi> <anchor xml:id=""a3""/>la: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dpal snar thang gi chos sde</rs>r rdzogs par sbyar ba'o
column3: dge'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column2: 'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">gnyal</rs></note> nyan rang la chos kyi bdag med rtogs pa yod pas de mi rigs so zhes so
column3: </seg>

column2: des na thabs la khyad yod kyi shes rab la khyad med do zhes so
column4: skyon de ni med de chos kyi bdag med rtogs pa yod na shes bya'i sgrib pa spangs par thal te blo gros chen po nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa ni gang zag gi bdag med pa mthong bas rnam par dag par 'gyur ro
column6: shes bya'i sgrib pa ni chos kyi bdag med pa mthong bas rnam par dag par 'gyur ro zhes bshad pas so
column8: gzhan yang rgyan stug po rnam par bkod pa las
column9: phung po gang zag bdag med par
column11: rab tu rnam phye mthong 'gyur zhing
column13: chos kyi dngos po ma bshig par
column15: nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'gyur zhes dang
column16: chos la bdag med mkhas pa rnams
column18: rgyal ba'i sras po sgom par byed
column20: ces pas so
column22: gzhan yang 'od srungs kyis zhus pa las
column23: nyung 'bu srin bus zos par gyur pa'i
column25: nang gi nam mkha' de ni chung ba ltar
column27: nyan thos 'dus ma byas pa rtogs pa yang
column29: de ni shin tu chung zhing chung bar lta zhes so
column31: shes rab la khyad med na thabs med shes rab bral bas nyan thos nyid du ltung
column33: zhes pa dang 'gal lo
column35: phyogs snga ma'ang mi 'thad de tshogs na spyod pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi gzhi shes de nyan thos kyir thal te gang zag gi bdag med tsam rtogs pas so
column36: khyed nyid kyi sa bdun pa man chad nyan rang du ldog srid par bzhed pas de la gnyen po gzhi shes kyi mtshan nyid khyab ches shing nyan rang gi gzhi shes kyi mtshan nyid kyis ma khyab bo
column38: gnyis pa ni gzhi shes spyi dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang [- 5 6 -] grags chen bco brgyad kyi sher phyin mngon rgyan 'jam gsar 'grel pa bzhugs
column39: {8 chub sems dpa' dang sangs rgyas kyi gzhi shes kyi mtshan nyid ni
column40: rten dang theg pa gsum las dbang po rtul po dang 'bring po dang rnon po dang rnon po'i slob pa dang spangs rtogs rdzogs pas rten bdag med par rtogs pa'o
column42: gsum pa brtsad pa spang ba ni gal te so so skye bo la gzhi shes mtshan nyid pa yod par thal lo zhe na 'dod pa nyid do
column44: de ltar na 'phags par thal lo zhe na
column45: gzhi bdag med par mngon sum du rtogs pa med pas 'phags par ga la 'gyur
column46: rnam kun gyi mtshan nyid la gsum las rtogs pas btags pa dgag pa ni skye med rnam 'dul gsum bsdus nas sgom zhes so
column48: gzhan dag ni dbang du bya ba'i don du skye med gsum bsdus nas sgom pa'o zhes smra'o
column50: ma yin te gzhi lam rnam pa'i don spyi shar bar thal te
column51: dgag pa dngos su gtogs pa'i phyir ro
column53: 'dod na 'phags pa'i mnyam gzhag gi sbyor ba rtogs bcas su 'gyur ro
column55: so so skye bo'i dus na'ang gang zag gcig la rtog pa du ma dus gcig tu skye bar thal lo
column57: 'dod par mi nus te rtog gnyis gcig car 'jug pa med
column59: 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa rnams
column61: rim gyis 'byung bar yang dag rtogs
column65: gnyis pa don la gnas pa dgod pa ni
column66: theg chen gyi rnam kun gyi sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid ni theg pa gsum las dbang po rnon po'i slob pas chos sku'i rgyu gang zhig dbang du byed pa'i sgom pa yin te rgyu sbyor ba bzhi'i bdag nyid dang zhes dang
column67: dbang du bya ba'i phyir zhes bshad pas 'grub bo
column69: mtshan mtshon snga ma de dag 'og ma gsum la go bar bya'o
column71: dbu ma rgyan sogs de snga bod la khrid rgyun ma chad tsam de 'phel kha shin tu rgyas pa ni dus de tsam nas dar
column72: de'i rjes su 'bras yul skyed mos tshal du spyir sbyang bya'i gzhung la rje byams chen pa'i rnam thar las
column73: rgya bod la grags che ba'i po ti bzhi bcu rtsa lngas gtso byas te khrid ces gsungs kyang
column74: nges sbyong gi gzhung ni phar tshad 'dul mngon dbu ma sdom gsum ste pod chen drug dang
column75: bye brag graṭ chen bco brgyad po rnams khrid srol yod pa gsal kha can gyi lo rgyus ma mjal yang
column76: bshad grwa de nas 'phel ba'i sa lugs kyi bshad grwa khag gi mkhas pa'i rtsom gshis las rags tsam gsal thub la
column77: de'i yan lag tu bka' rnying sogs kyi phyogs la'ang bshad grwa shin tu mang po 'phel
column78: bar las rim gleng slong gtam

column2: mkhyen gsum ni mtshon bya dang mtshan nyid kyi sgo nas bstan pas mtshan nyid pa yin la
column3: rnam kun ni mkhyen gsum nyams su len pa'i sgo nas bstan pas sbyor ba yin no
column5: yang mkhyen gsum ni chos nyid dri ma dang bral ba rtogs pas zhi ba'i rnam pa yin la
column6: rnam kun ni mi mthun phyogs spong pa'i gnyen po dri ma zhi byed yin pas mi zlos so
column8: seng bzang gis dri ma phyogs gcig dang bral ba la dri bral du dgongs nas mkhyen pa gsum char dang zlos pa spangs la
column9: 'phags pas dri ma ma lus pa dang bral ba la der dgongs nas rnam mkhyen kho na dang zlos pa spangs so
column11: des na sbyor ba lhag ma gsum gyi zlos pa spangs te rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes so
column13: gnyis pa ni skye med rtogs pa'i blo yang yang bshad pas mkhyen pa gsum zlos so zhe na
column14: ma yin te dmigs pa dang rten dang byed pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro
column16: gsum pa ni nyams len gyi thabs yang yang bshad pas sbyor ba bzhi zlos so zhe na
column17: ma yin te rnam kun dang rtse mo dbang du byed pa rgyu 'bras dang
column18: mthar gyis pa dang skad cig ma [- 5 6 -] grags chen bco brgyad kyi sher phyin mngon rgyan 'dzam gsar 'grel pa bzhugs
column19: {8 brtan pa rgyu 'bras yin pa'i phyir ro
column21: 'phags pas rnal 'byor sgom pa dang spyod pa rjes su sgrub pa gtso bor gyur pa'i rgyu 'bras yin pas zlos pa med do zhes so
column23: bzhi pa ni 'bras bu lan gnyis bshad pas rnam mkhyen dang chos sku zlos so zhe na ma yin te sbyor ba bzhir bzhag pa'i dus su rnam mkhyen sbyor ba'i yul gyi sgo nas bshad la chos sku 'bras bu'i sgo nas bshad pa'i phyir ro
column25: yang na rnam mkhyen yul gyis mtshon nas bshad la
column26: chos sku ngo bo'i sgo nas bshad pas mi zlos so
column28: gnyis pa cung zad rgyas par bshad pa la brgyad las dang po rnam mkhyen la gnyis te
column29: ma 'brel bar brtsod pa spang ba dang
column30: rnam mkhyen mtshon byed kyi chos dngos so
column32: dang po la gnyis las rgol ba ni rnam mkhyen ston na
column33: bden gnyis las gang tshe shes dang shes bya dag
column34: bdag nyid rjes su mi mthong ba
column36: zhes snang med dang
column37: btags pa'i don gyis dben pa'i
column39: ji ltar snang ba 'di kho na
column41: brten te skyes pa thams cad ni
column43: thams cad mkhyen pas mngon sum gzigs zhes pa snang ba dang bcas pa'i ye shes 'di lta bu'o zhes ston par rigs pa las de mi ston par sems bskyed la sogs pa ston pa ma 'brel lo zhe na
column44: gnyis pa lan ni 'di dag gis de mtshon nas ston no
column46: de yang sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i lam gyi dngos po dang
column47: yan lag gi rgyu'i sgo nas 'bras bu mtshon par bya ste
column48: rgyu bcu rdzogs pas 'bras bu kun mkhyen nyid zhes pa ltar ro
column50: yang na ched du bya ba dang nges par 'byung ba sa bdun 'bras bu gzhan rgyu yin pas rgyu 'bras kyi rnam pa ma lus pa yin pas de rtogs pa gcig rnam mkhyen yin no zhes yul gyis mtshon pa ste
column51: sangs rgyas ye shes kyi sems bskyed pa la sogs pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rnam pa ma lus pa yongs su gcod pa'i rnam mkhyen yin pas de dang por bshad do zhes dang
column52: 'grel chen las rgyu dang 'bras [- 6] [7 -]   bu'i rnam pa ma lus pa thugs su chud pa la ltos te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces brjod la zhes pas so
column55: sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i lam gyi dngos po dang
column59: sems bskyed pa dang zhes pa la gsum ste
column64: dang po ni sangs rgyas dang de'i sras kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang
column65: byang chub kyi sems kyi phan yon shes pa'o zhes so
column67: de yang nges par rgyu gnyis te
column71: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus zhi bya'i phyir
column73: 'jig rten phan par byed pa'i sems skye'o
column78: rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos dang dge 'dun la
column80: dad dang dang ba skyes na sems skye ste zhes dang
column81: bslab btus dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan bya ste

column1: [- 1 \]] [7-]  kha rgya gnyan cig mthong lam dang mthong spang skye 'gag byed bzhin pa dang des dben pas so zhes smra'o
column2: kha kar cig rgyud sgom spang dang mthong spang gis ma dag pa dang dag pas so zhes grag go
column3: dang po gnyis ltar na sangs rgyas kyi sar yang dag ma dag rtogs pa'i khyad par yod par thal te
column4: ma dag pa dang khad nye ring yod pa'i phyir dang
column5: spang bya dang skye 'gag byed bzhin pa dang des dben pa yod pa'i phyir ro
column7: phyi ma'ang mi rigs te dang po dag pa dang phyi ma ma dag pa rtogs par thal te rgyu mtshan mtshungs pas so
column9: gnyis pa ni chos bzod chos shes la dag ma dag gi brda ma btags pas spyad bya ma yin pa'am byed na yang mthong spang gi gnas ngan len gyis ma dag pa dang dag pa rtogs pa tsam gyis 'jog go
column10: ji skad du bag la nyal spangs pa'i don du bar chad med pa'i lam sgom la
column11: gnas ngan len spong ba'i phyir rnam grol gyi lam yin zhes gsungs pa'i don yang skye 'gag dus mnyam pa yin no
column13: gsum pa brtsad pa spang ba ni gnas ngan len la rigs mthun skyed pa'i nus pa yod dam med
column14: dang po ltar na chos shes kyang ma dag pa rtogs par thal lo
column16: gnyis pa ltar na dgra bcom la yun ring por yod par bshad pa dang 'gal lo zhe na
column17: spong byed gnyen po ma skyes bar du yod la skyes pa na med pas skyon gnyis ka las grol lo
column19: bzhi pa gang gis 'byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ni dbang po rtul 'bring rno gsum gyis dang
column20: rang gi rgyud la gang zag dang chos kyi bdag med pa dang
column21: gzhan gyi rgyud la bdag med yod pas dang
column22: bden pa re re la rnam pa bzhi bzhi rtogs pa'i dbang gis so
column24: lnga pa ji ltar dbye don ni ye shes skad cig bcu drug po 'di rnams ngo bo gcig pa'am tha dad pa ji ltar yin zhe na
column25: 'di la gsum las

'di ltar chos bzod kyis chos nyid ma dag pa mthong ba na de 'jal gyi ye shes de nyid kyi gzhan rig gi chos nyid rtogs pa dang

column3: chos shes kyis chos nyid dag pa mthong ba na ye shes de nyid kyis gzhan rig dang rang rig gi cha'i chos nyid rtogs pa'i cha nas rjes bzod rjes shes su 'jog go
column4: de ltar yang bzod pa dang shes pa thams cad kyang mtshan ma med pas gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can du rig par bya'o zhes chos nyid kyi yul can kho nar bshad pas shes so zhes grag go

column2: dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">'ban</rs> mnyam gzhag skad cig gcig tu skye ste
column3: bsdu ba las 'bras bu'i mngon par rtogs pa skad cig ma yin la zhes pa dang
column4: don dam pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi dbang <lb n=""48b5""/>du bya ste skad cig ma gcig yin la zhes bshad pas so

column1: </seg>

column2: de'i rjes la skad cig bcu drug rim can du skye ste so sor rtog pa'i mngon par rtogs pa skad cig ma bcu drug yin zhes pa dang
column3: brtan pa gnas pa rgyas pa spros pa dang bcas pa'i dbang du byas na skad cig ma bcu drug tu bshad pas shes so zhes smra'o
column5: gnyis pa ni mnyam gzhag de mthong lam ma yin par 'gyur te rang gi mthong lam sdug bsngal la chos bzod tsam gyi sngar grub pa'i phyir ro
column7: de'i khyab pa ni 'phags pas 'jig rten chos kyi mchog gi mjug thogs su sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang zhes bshad do
column10: gnyis pa don la gnas pa dgod pa la gnyis te
column11: nyan thos dang theg chen gyi mthong lam mo
column13: dang po ni bcu drug breng chags su skye ste
column14: de la skad cig bco lnga ni
column16: ma mthong mthong phyir mthong ba'i lam
column18: bcu drug pa la de 'bras gnas zhes pa dang
column19: mi shes pa kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na
column20: sbyor ba'i lam dang mthong ba'i lam gyi sems kyi skad cig bco lnga gang dbang byed pa'o
column22: kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na
column23: mthong ba'i lam gyi sems kyi skad cig bcu drug pa la brten nas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gang dbang byed pa'o zhes bshad pas shes so
column25: gnyis pa theg chen la bcu drug rim pa bzhin skye ba yin te
column26: skad cig gcig tu skye ba la gnod byed brjod pa de rnams kyis shes so
column28: [- 1] [\]] [4 -]  gsum pa brtsod pa spang ba la gnyis te
column29: lung dang 'gal ba spang ba dang
column30: rigs pa dang 'gal ba spang ba'o
column32: dang po ni don dam pa so sor rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi dbang du byas te skad cig ma gcig yin zhes pa dang
column33: 'bras bu'i mngon par rtogs pa ni gcig yin no zhes bshad pa dang
column34: bden pa 'dren ma la dmigs pas log par zhugs pa thams cad gcig car spong bar bshad pa dang 'gal lo zhe na
column35: dang po gnyis ni bcu drug po thams cad sgom thun gcig la skye ba la de skad gsungs pa yin zhing
column36: tha ma ni khams gong 'og gi bden pa ma phye ba la dmigs par bshad pas mi 'gal lo
column38: gnyis pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthong lam gyis nyer len gyi phung po ngo bo stong par shes pa de'i khyad par 'bras bu dang rgyur gyur ldog stong par rtogs ma rtogs mi 'thad de bum pa med par rtogs pa na de'i khyad par 'ga' zhig yod pa'i sgro 'dogs ma chod pa mi srid pa bzhin no zhe na
column39: byang chub sems dpa'i drod kyis kyang 'jig rten pa'i sgom byung gi shes rab kyi phung po ngo bo stong par rtogs pa na khyad par gzung ba dang 'dzin pa rang bzhin med par rtogs ma rtogs mi 'thad do zhes mtshungs so
column41: gzhan yang nyan thos kyi mthong lam gyis phung po gang zag gi bdag med par rtogs pa na khyad par 'bras bu dang rgyur gyur ldog gang zag gi bdag med par rtogs ma rtogs mi 'thad do
column43: ngo bo gcig la rtogs ma rtogs gnyis mi 'gal lo zhe na
column44: 'dir yang de skad smra'o
column46: rtog pa dang don dam du thal ba ni sngar spangs zin to
column47: gsum pa mtshon bya'i sgra don ni chos nyid sngar ma mthong ba mthong bas mthong lam yin la mya ngan las 'das par phyin par byed pas lam yin no
column49: gnyis pa de'i spang bya sgrib pa la gsum las mtshan nyid la gsum ste
column50: rtog pas btags pa dgag pa dang
column51: don la gnas pa dgod pa dang
column52: de la brtsad pa spang ba'o
column54: [- \] 1] [-]   dang po ni kha mngon pa cig mthong lam skyes pa'i stobs kyis spang bar bya ba zhes so
column55: kha gnyal cig nyon mongs pa gang zhig gis mthong lam gyi rgyun bzlog par bya ba zhes zer ro
column57: gzhan se ston dag ni gnod bya rgyu ma tshang ba med par 'byung ba la bden pa'i chos nyid dang ye shes sngar ma mthong ba mthong ba'i rkyen de dang phrad pa'i stobs kyis bzlog bya yin pa gang zhig gang gis dbyen zhes grag go
column58: dang po ni mi rigs te mthong lam skyes pa na rang gi spang bya 'gags nas med pa'i phyir dang
column59: mthong spang la mngon gyur gtan med par 'gyur ro
column61: gnyis pa'ang mi rigs te shes bya'i sgrib pa mthong spang la ma khyab pas so
column63: gsum pa'ang ma yin te mthong spang yod pa na mthong lam ma skyes shing mthong lam skyes pa na mthong spang med par khyed nyid 'dod pas phrad pa med pa'i phyir dang
column64: de mthong spang mthong lam la ltos nas gnod bya lhan cig mi gnas pa'i 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid yin pas mthong spang las don ldog gzhan 'gyur yin pa'i phyir dang
column65: gang zhig gang gis dbyen pa la rnam gcad med pa'i phyir ro
column67: gnyis pa ni sgrib pa tsam gyi mtshan nyid dgag byed pa'o
column69: mthong spang gi sgrib pa'i mtshan nyid ni dgag byed pa gang zhig kun btags su gyur pa'o
column71: gsum pa ni gal te tshogs sbyor gyis spong ba de dag kyang mthong spang du 'gyur ro zhe na
column74: de ltar na spyang bya thams cad mthong spang sgom spang gnyis su 'dus par 'gyur ro zhe na
column75: 'dod pa yin te thogs med kyis mthong ba'i lam thob pa'i de yan chad mthong pas spang bar bya ba las bzlog pa zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad ni sgom pas spang bar bya bar blta'o zhes dang
column76: de'i 'grel par kun tu btags pa las gzhan pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa rnams zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go zhes dang
column77: mthong spang gi 'grel par thams cad kyi phyogs gcig go zhes bya ba ni sgom pas spang bar bya ba dang
column78: zag med ma gtogs pa'o [- 1 \]] [-] grags chen bco brgyad kyi sher phyin mngon rgyan 'jam gsar 'grel pa bzhugs
column80: sgom spang gi skabs nas thams cad kyi phyogs gcig go zhes bya ba ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba zag med ma gtogs pa'o zhes gsungs pas gnyen po gang gis spong yang rung rigs kun btags lhan skyes gnyis las gzhan med pa'i phyir ro
column82: gal te mthong spang sgom spang du 'jog pa la mthong lam sgom lam dang phrad dgos pa las de med do zhe na
column83: so so skye bo la mthong spang sgom spang gtan med du 'gyur te mthong lam sgom lam ma skyes pa'i phyir ro
column85: gnyis pa mtshan gzhi'i dbye ba la lnga las
column86: gang las dbye ba'i gzhi ni mthong spang tsam mo
column88: ji snyed dbye ba'i grangs ni gsum las rtog pas btags pa dgag pa ni</TEI>"

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">dha</rs> na re sa bcu pa'i dkyil stod la yin te byang chub sems dpa'i mngon rtogs yin pa'i phyir ro

des na smad la mthar gyis pa tha ma la skad cig ma zhes so
column3: de mi 'thad de sa dgu pa dang bcu pa dang bcu gcig pa'i smad kyis rim pa ltar bar du chod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar med de
column4: de ni rnam pa kun mkhyen nyid ces pa dang 'gal bas so
column6: gnyis pa don la gnas pa ni sa bcu'i rgyun tha na'o
column8: gsum pa brtsod pa spang ba ni gal te mthar gyis pa'i bstan byar 'gal lo zhe na

column1: rtse mo tsam de'i bstan byar bshad pa'i phyir zer na khyab pa med la
column2: de nyid dang rtse mo thams cad bstan byar bshad pa'i phyir zer na phyogs chos med do
column4: spyir bstan byung la dmigs bsal ma byung pas de nyid bstan byar 'gyur ro zhe na dmigs bsal ma byung par mi 'grub ste rnam mkhyen la bar chad med par bshad pa'i phyir ro
column6: gnyis pa ni slob pa'i chos sku'i rgyu rab tu gyur pa rnam mkhyen dngos su skyed pa'o
column8: gsum pa ni log par sgrub pa dang bcas zhes te [- \] 4 5 -]   bden gnyis kyi mtshan nyid ma shes pa'i log rtog bcu drug go
column9: de mngon du rgyu rags pa tshogs lam nas spong la phra ba 'di skye ba la phyogs pa na de 'gag pa la phyogs pas spong ngo

column224: rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyu rin po che sna tshogs las grub pa ngos re re la dpag tshad nyid brgya lnga bcu yod pa ji tsam gyis mdzes par byas pa'i tshad nyi zla la len pa ltar yumarnam mkhyen gyi rgyu yin pa grags chen bco brgyad kyi sher phyin mngon rgyan 'jam gsar 'grel pa bzhugs
column225: { 8 la ma yin par 'dzin cing nyan rang gi mdo sde rgyur 'dzin pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel ba med pas nyams pa'o
column227: ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang khams kyi rgyalapo snyom pa dang
column228: kha zas ro brgya pa bor nas drug cu pa za ba dang
column229: nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa dang 'ching bu snyom pa ltar
column230: yum bor nas nyan thos kyi mdo sde las rnam mkhyen btsal bar sems pa ni gong na med na chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum las nyams pa'o
column232: lnga pa ni yum gtan nas mi spong yang re shig g.yengs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu brgyad ni gzugs nas byang chub kyi bar du yul mang po la rnam par rtog pa'i spobs pa dang 'bras bu dang lam khri bar mi nus pa la yi ger 'bri ba kho na yum yin par 'dzin pa ste gnyis po las g.yengs pa'o
column234: yum dngos po med pa yin no zhes 'dzin pa ste gsum ga las g.yengs pa'o
column236: yi ge kho na der 'dzin pa ste gnyis po las g.yengs pa'o
column238: gzhung yi ge yin bzhin du yi ge med pa la der 'dzin pa ste gzhung las g.yengs pa'o
column240: yul dang grong la sogs pa yid la byed pa dang
column242: bkur sti gces spras byed pa dang
column243: bstod pa dang grags snyan sgrogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i ro myang ba ste chags pa dang
column244: sangs rgyas kyi lam ma yin pa bdud kyis bstan pa theg pa gnyis kyi lam las de'i thabs la mkhas pa tshol ba'o
column246: gnyis pa'i grangs bzhin du zhesate spyir yum nyan pa la sogs pa'i chos spyodani dpon slob tshogs pa las byed dgos la de dag kyangaganyis ka yon tan dang ldan pa dgos pas mthun rkyen ma tshang ba ni gsum ste
column247: dpon slob gang rung la brten pa dang
column248: gzhan gyis brjod pa la brten pa dang
column251: de la dang po bcu bzhi ni slob dpon yon tan med pa'i phyogs su byas pa slob ma de dang ldan pa'i phyogs su byas pas slob dpon la brten pa zhes kyang bya
column252: slob ma yon tan med pa'i phyogs su sbyar bas nyi shu rtsa brgyad du [.""?></TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-14-19,unreviewed,8b7 - 8b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-14-19"" status=""unreviewed"">

gnyis pa <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">kir ti'i</rs></note><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre shes rab</rs></note>ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs><lb n=""8b8""/>mkhyen gsuM rgyu'i dus na sbyor bzhi 'bras bu'i dus na chos sku rgyu 'bras kyis khyad par du ma byas pa rang bzhin yin la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs> rgya che shos mkhyen gsuM du sbyor bzhi 'du bar 'dod kyis nga ni sbyor ba'i chos sku bsdoms par yang mkhyen gsum 'dus so zhes smra'o
column3: </seg>

column1: 'di mi 'thad pa la gsum las rang bzhin gnas skabs su mi 'thad pa ni snga ma'i rigs pas shes so
column3: gnyis pa 'thad kyang rang bzhin la grub pas gnas skabs la mi 'grub pa ni rang bzhin shes pa tsam la bde ba srid pas gnas skabs su sdug bsngal la yang bde ba srid par 'gyur ro
column5: gsum pa sbyor bzhi chos skur mkhyen gsum 'du ba mi 'thad pa ni nyan thos kyi gzhi shes de byang chub sems dpa' sbyor bzhi'am sangs rgyas kyi chos sku gang du 'du 'jig rten slu bar zad do
column6: </TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-14-42,unreviewed,9a3 - 9a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-14-42"" status=""unreviewed"">

column2: gsum pa ni <lb n=""9a3""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs></note> mkhyen pa gsuM ni dus gsuM car dang 'brel ba rang gzhan thaMd kyi rgyud la thun mong ba 'phags pa'i gang zag thaMd kyi rgyud pa skye ba thos bsam gyi gtan la dbab pa'i yul shes bya rgya mtsho lta bu yin la sbyor bzhi chos sku ni bdag nyid dang 'brel ba'i rgyu<lb n=""9a4""/> 'bras kyi gnas skabs mngon rtogs nyung zas skra rtse'i chu tshod tsam yin pas der ci ste mi 'du zhes gsung ngo
column3: </seg>

column2: 'di yang rgya che shos shes bya tsam la me'i 'bras bu ma yin pa'am grub pas chung shos du ba'i shes bya la de 'grub par thal lo
column3: gal te gzhi shes kyi rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas skyed byed mtshan nyid du 'god do zhe na
column4: mtshon byas khyad par du byas pas rang ldog rdzas med du 'gyur ro gsung
column6: gnyis pa don la gnas pa ni gsum ste
column7: mtshon tshul dngos dang
column8: nus pa gang yin dpyad pa dang
column9: mtshan mtshon du sgrub byed do
column11: dang po ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba mtshan gzhi sangs rgyas bskyed pa'am sangs rgyas la 'jig rten ston pa yin te zhes pa mtshon bya'o
column13: mkhyen gsum gyi rtogs pa skyed byed ni mtshan nyid do
column15: gnyis pa ni rgyu kha yar ba'i ma yin gyi tshogs lam du sbyor ba bsgom pa tshogs pa'i dang tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang tshogs pa nus pa thogs med kyi gnas skabs ci rigs par yin no zhes</TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-14-48,unreviewed,9a5 - 9a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-14-48"" status=""unreviewed"">

bzhi pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">ar</rs></note> mkhyen gsuM mtshon byed kyi chos sum bcu la mkhyen <lb n=""9a6""/>gsuM zhes bya la des sbyor ba'i chos sku bsdus so zhes grags so
column2: </seg>
de ni 'khrul te mgon pos mtshon byed kyi chos rnams bstod phyag gi yul du bzhag pa med par de'i nang du 'dus pas ci zhig phan
column3: gnyis pa ni gang zag nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams kyi don sgrub pa la gsum gyis chog pas dgos pa la ltos pa'i grangs nges so
column5: gsum pa ni gnyis las sngar gyi lan ma thebs pa spang pa ni yum brgyad du bshad pa la lnga la ma bstod pas nyung bar thal ba'i lan ma thebs so zhes na
column6: rnam kun mkhyen nyid ces sogs bshad la gzhi shes nas bstod pas go rim mi 'thad do
column8: gal te gleng gzhi'i le'u dang go rim mthun pas skyon med zhe na
column9: 'dir yang de dang grangs mthun pas skyon med do zhes mtshungs so
column11: gzhan yang mkhyen pa gsum la mjug sdud byed la lnga la mi byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ci yin zhes mtshungs so
column13: </TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-22-17-51,unreviewed,152a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""152a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-22-17-51"" status=""unreviewed"">

column2: mdo gnyis la rmi ka sla'i khyad yod do <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">'dul 'dzin</rs> zer ro
column3: </seg>

column1: mdo gnyis las rang dang gzhan sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul ba nam mkha' la 'phags pa la sogs pa mthong ba [- 3 t; \] -]  dang
column2: rmi lam na grong mes tshig pa la sogs pa'am pha la sogs pa shi ba rmi ste sad pa na chos thams cad rmi lam ji lta ba bzhin du yin pas bdag sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams la rmi lam lta bu'i chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa'i sems skye ba 'di gnyis ka'ang rtags so
column4: de gnyis la sangs rgyas rnams mthong 'gro la chos kyang ston byed pa
column5: de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya zhes so
column7: rmi lam na dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sems can mthong ba na bdag sangs rgyas pa'i zhing de na ngan song gsum po thams cad du med par gyur cig ces spong ba rjes su dran pa ste rmi lam na ni sems can ngan song gsum nas mthong
column9: skad cig de la ngan song rgyun gcod smon lam 'debs ces so
column11: rmi lam na grong la sogs pa tshig pa mthong na bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa la g.yo dang sgyu med pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa yin na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bya ba'am yang na gang gi phyir mi ldog pa'i rnam pa dang rtags dang mtshan ma de dag bdag la yod pa yin na bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis grong khyer me shor ba 'di zhi bar gyur cig bsil bar gyur cig med par gyur cig bden pa'i byin brlabs brjod pa na de zhi zhing rlom sems ma skyes pa'o
column13: nyi khri las phyi ma dang gnyis ka brgyad stong pa las so
column15: nyi khri las rmi lam mam sad pa'i tshe gang gi tshe grub kyang rtags yin pas gnyis ka'i rtags so
column17: brgyad stong pa las glang rmis kyi tshul du sad pa'i gnas skabs na'ang yin pas gnyis ka'i rtags so
column19: gal te khyim la sogs pa la la mes tshig la la ma tshig na ji ltar nges par bya zhe na
column20: rtse mo ni thob la la la tshig pa ni khyim bdag gis chos spong ba'i las byas pa tshe 'di la smin pa yin no
column22: yang khyim nas khyim la sogs pa tshig na rtse mo ma thob kyi steng du byang chub sems dpa' nyid la chos spong ba'i las yod pas sbyang dgos pa'i rtags [-3 f; 2 -]  te bzlog pa'i sgo nas bstan no
column24: bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis me'i phung po zhi
column26: de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya zhes so
column28: sad pa'i rtags lnga ni gnod sbyin la sogs pas yid la zin pa la ched du byed pa'i bden pa'i byin brlabs snga ma gnyis gang rung brjod pa na song zhing rlom sems ma skyed pa ste
column29: mi'i 'jig rten 'byung po'i gdon dang nad mang ba
column31: phan dang snying brtser ldan pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis zhi
column33: 'on kyang rlom sems med cing nga rgyal skye med pa
column35: de ni mi ldog lung bstan yin par rig par bya zhes so
column36: de song yang rlom sems skyed na rtse mo ma thob par shes par bya'o
column38: 'o na de 'gro bar mi rigs so zhe na
column39: bdud kyis byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa shes nas mi ma yin pa 'gro bar bya ba'i ched du brtson pa cher byed la
column40: byang chub sems dpas de ma shes pas rlom sems skyes te chud za ba ste
column41: ci ste de ni bden pa'i byin brlabs sna tshogs dag
column42: 'byor pas bdag lung bstan snyam rlom sems 'byung ba'am
column44: gal te byang chub sems dpas gzhan gyis lung bstan rlom
column46: rlom sems gnas pa de ni blo chung rig par bya zhes so
column48: byang chub sems dpa' rang nyid ming dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang dben pa'i gzhi gsum gyi bdud kyi las mngon par shes pas pha rol bdud gnon pa'i thabs su phyi nang gi bshes gnyen bsten pa'o
column50: de lta bas na byang chub dam pa tshol ba yis
column52: bsam pa bag ldan mkhas pas nga rgyal nges bcom te
column54: nad pa'i tshogs kyis gso phyir sman pa bsten pa ltar
column56: g.yel ba med par dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya
column58: sangs rgyas byang chub mchog zhugs byang chub sems dpa' dag
column59: pha rol phyin dang bcas te dge ba'i bshes su bstan ces so
column61: bdag nyid gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang zhing dag pa dang
column62: sems can smin par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ste tshogs lam gyi las khyad [-36 3.]  par 'phags zhes dgos so</TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-15-03,unreviewed,11b1 - 11b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-15-03"" status=""unreviewed"">

column2: 2 pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">kha 1</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">rma bya</rs></note> snang ba la bden par zhen pa dgag bya'i chos yin<lb n=""11b2""/> te
column3: 'dir ni sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pa'i
column5: bden par rtog pa bzlog bya yin zhes gsungs pa'i phyiro zhes zer ro
column6: </seg>

column2: de dgag pa la gnyis te
column3: brtags na mi 'thad
column4: rtags ma nges par thal ba'o
column6: gnyis pa thun mong gi mjug bsdu ba ni rtags la sogs zhes sogs so
column8: gnyis pa mthong lam gyi rtse mo la gsum ste
column9: spang bya rnam par rtog pa dang
column10: 'bras bu byang chub chen po dang
column11: mthong ba'i lam dngos so
column13: dang po la bstan bshad bsdu ba gsum las
column14: dang po la gnyis las gzung rtog bstan pa ni nges par 'byed ces sogs te 'di la bzhi ste
column15: yul dang
column16: ngo bo dang
column17: dbye ba dang
column18: 'og shes su sgrub pa'o
column20: dang po ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpas blang bar bya ba 'jug pa'i phyogs dang
column21: nyan rang gi lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpasador bar bya ba ldog pa'i phyogs la'o
column23: gnyis pa ngo bo ni gzung ba ni gzung ba'irnam rtog ces te snga ma la blang bar bya ba'o zhes gzung bar rtog pa'o
column25: yang na yulagazung ba yin pas kyang ngo
column27: de dag mi mthun phyogs ji ltar yin snyam na
column28: bzang ngan gang du zhen kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spang bya yin te sgrog bzhin no
column30: gsum pa ni gzung rtog de dgu'i bdag nyid do
column32: gnyis ka bsdoms pa la'am zhe na so sor zhes so
column34: bzhi pa ni yul ji lta ba bzhin min pa'i bdag nyid dag tu shes par bya'o zhes so
column36: 'grel par byang se'i ni chos thams cad mi dmigs par rtogs pa'o
column38: nyan thos la sogs pa'i chos ni mi rtag pa la sogs par dmigs pa'o
column40: yul 'di ltar gnas pa bzhin 'dzin pa la yin pa'i rang gi ngo bo dag tu shes par bya'o
column42: de'i rgyu mtshan ni dngos po dag bden pa ste mi mthun par 'jug pa nyid kyis phyin ci log tu zhen pa'i phyir ro
column44: gnyis pa 'dzin rtog bstan pa ni de ltar zhes sogs te
column46: yul dang
column48: gnyis su 'byed pa'i rgyu mtshan [-3] [3 -] dang
column49: dbye ba dang log shes su sgrub pa'o

column1: dang po ni rtag gcig la sogasapa'i rdzas su grub pa'i 'dzin pa gcig yod par rtog pa ni sems can la bdag yod pa'i rten can gyi rtog pa'o
column3: yul dgu la rdzas su yod pa'i gang zag ni 'dzin pa po ma yin gyi phung po lnga'i rgyun la btags pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'dzin pa po gcig par rtog pas brtags par yod pa'i rten can gyi rtog pa'o
column5: gnyis pa ni yul dgu po'i 'dzin pa po yin no zhes zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o
column7: gsum pa ni so so skye bo la rtag gcig la sogasagang zag rdzas su 'dzin pa shas cher yod la
column8: skad cig rdul phran la btags par zhen pa nyan thos 'phags pa la shas cher yod pas de'i rten du bshad do
column10: sa bon byang chub sems dpa' la yod pas de'i spang byar bshad do zhes ma ha gsung pa ni legs so gsung ngo
column12: bzhi pa ni dag tu ste gnyis su 'dod la de dag so sor yul gyi dbye bas dgu'i bdag nyid do
column14: lnga pa ni yul dgu tshan gnyis po gzung ba bden pasastong par bsgrubs pas yul can rdzas subatags pa'i 'dzin pa yang bden pas stong pas de la bden par 'dzin pa'i rtog pa log shes su sgrub pa yin gyi yul snang ba tsam du yang med par bsgrubs pa ni ma yin no
column16: de yang rdzas dang btags par yod pa'i sems can gnyis pos gzung bar bya ba'i don dgu po khong gnyis kyis ji ltar gzung bde bzhin du med pa'i phyir de bzhin du yul can bden pa gang gis 'dzin par 'dod yul bden pa gang gis yang 'dzin par mi 'thad pa de ltar 'dzin pa gnyis po de dag yul bden pa 'dzin pa'i ngo bo stong pa'i mtshan nyid do
column18: don ni khong gnyis kyis yul bden par ma grub pan de gnyis bden pa 'dzin byed du mi 'grub la rtog pas bden par 'dzin pas log shes su grub bo
column20: 'grel pa'i gags byed pa ni mthong lam skye ba'o
column22: nges 'byed cha mthun gyi rtog pa dang khyad par ci yod ce na
column23: seng bzang ltar [- 3 7 (0 -]   na gzung rtog gi dbang du byas na snga ma ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang
column24: gnyen po gnyis yin la gnyen po'i gzhi gcig pu la byang se'i blang dor gnyis su byed pa yin no
column26: yang snga ma ni nges 'byed cha mthun dang mtshungs ldan nyan rang las khyad par du 'phags pa'i cha nas yin la 'di ni mthong lam rtse mo mtshon pa'i cha nas yin no
column28: snga phyi gnyis ka'i gnyen po ni mthong lam yin no
column31: rgyas par bshad pa la gnyis las
column32: gzung rtog la'ang gnyis las dang po ni gzung ba'i zhes sogs te 'di la bzhi ste
column33: yul dang
column34: ngo bo dang
column35: dbye ba dang
column36: gnyen po'o
column38: dang po ni don dam par yul can dben pas yul dben pa ma rtogs pas tha snyad du rtogs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang sa brgyad pa la sogs gsum parnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi rigs su nges pa dang
column39: lam snga ma bsgoms pas phyi ma 'grub pa dang
column40: shes pa mthong sgom gyi ye shes so
column42: dmigs pa ni gnyis pos rtogs bya snang yang bden pas stong pa la ma 'khrul ba dang
column43: mi mthun phyogs spong ba dang gnyen po 'phel bar byed pa dang
column44: mkhyen gsum mi shes pa'i dri ma dang bral bas rang gis mkhyen gsum rtogs pa dang
column45: nyan rang gi sa thag sring bar byed cing rang gi lam rgyun dang ldan par 'jug pa dang
column46: lasani phrin las te sems can mngon mtho nges legs la 'god pa dang
column47: bya ba'i 'bras bu ni byed pa po byang chub sems dpa' lam la bkod pa'i bya ba'i 'bras bu myang 'das la 'god pa'o
column49: gnyis pa ni rnam rtog ste yul dgu la zhes pa'o
column51: gsum pa ni de ni rnam pa dgur 'dod ces so
column55: bzhi pa ni mthong ba'i lam gyi sbyor ba'i gnas skabs nide rtogs pa thob la yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o zhes</TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-15-06,unreviewed,12a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-15-06"" status=""unreviewed"">

dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">kha 1</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya pa</rs></note>sgrub bya snang ba dang bden pas stong pa tshogs don yin la de dag kyang rim pa ltar kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa yin no
column2: </seg>
rjes dpag gis tshogs don gzhal yang rigs shes ma yin zhing
column3: rigs shes kyis stong nyid rkyang pa gzhal yang rjes dpag ma yin no
column5: yul bden gnyis ngo bo gcig blo rigs shes rjes dpag ngo bo gcig go zhes zer ro
column7: gnyis pa de dgag pa la gnyis te
column8: rtogs bya'i yul dang
column9: de rtogs kyi blo mi 'thad pa la
column10: dang po la gnyis te
column11: stong nyid yongs gcod don dam bden pa dang
column12: des na bden gnyis ngo bo gcig pa mi 'thad pa'o
column14: dang po ni snang stong tshogs don bsgrub bya yin pa ni bden mod
column15: stong nyid don dam gyi bden pa ma yin par thal te blo'i yul du yongs gcod du grub pa'i phyir ro
column17: ma haltaran lugs dang mthun par yar song zhing mi mthun par 'ongs zhes pas seng ge rnam bsgyings gnyis brjod pa'o
column19: nas zhes pas ya tha bzung la 'gog pa'i bar zhes pas ma tha bzung ba yin pas bar gyi yar 'gro ba gnyis po dang

de ltar na dngos po la du ma bsgrubs nas gcig bsgrub pa dang gcig bkag nas du ma bsgrub par thal te du ma gcig dang 'brel ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro

column4: gnyis pa ni cha med kyi du ma cha med kyi gcig dang 'brel la cha bcas kyi du ma cha med kyi gcig dang 'gal zhes pa'am du ma rang rigs kyi gcig dang 'brel zhing gzhan rigs kyi gcig dang 'gal zhes pa'am yang gcig du mar bden pa gcig tu bden pa dang du mar snang ba gcig tu bden pa dang 'brel zhing 'gal bas gcig bkag nas du ma 'gog pa dang du ma bsgrubs nas gcig 'gog pa 'thad do

column17: des na dngos po la rtags tshad mas grub pa na bden dngos kyis stong pa'i don grub pa yin te gcig dang du mar 'dzin pa'i sgro 'dogs kyi don khegs pa na bden dngos su 'dzin pa'i sgro 'dogs kyi don khegs pa'i phyir ro
column19: des na gcig dang du bral la bden dngos kyis stong pa'i brda btags pa tsam gyis stong nyid kyi tha snyad du bya bas khyab pa grub pa yin no
column22: yang na rtags kyi mtshan gzhi 'dzin pa'i tshad ma dang

column26: dang po ni dpe dngos med kyi steng du bden pa'i gcig dang du bral la rtog pa'i rtog pa myong pa'i rang rig gi blo bden pa'i gcig dang du bral du 'dzin pa dngos su grub cing yul bden pa'i gcig dang du bral gyi rnam pa shugs la grub pa yin no
column28: gnyis pa ni bden dngos la rtag dngos zhugs na gcig dang du ma gnyis ka ma yin pa'i bden dngos su 'gyur bas de tshad mas khegs pa ni rtags mi mthun phyogs dang tshogs pa khegs pa yin no

column32: gcig dang du ma gnyis ka ma yin pa'i dngos po tsam dngos su khegs pa na gcig dang du ma gnyis ka ma yin pa'i bden pa'i dngos po shugs la khegs pa yin te bum pa tsam khegs pa na gser bum khegs pa yin no
column34: gsum pa ni mtshan gzhi bden pa'i gcig dang du bral rang rig gis grub cing bden pa'i dngos po dang des stong pa dngos 'gal du'ang rang rig gis grub cing bden dngos dang tshogs pa khegs pas des stong pas khyab pa nges pa yin no

2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-3010,unreviewed,[4a3],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[4a3]""/> yang don ldog mi 'dra ba so so ma yin gyi sngar * pa'i 'jug yul la mi slu ba'i shes pa zhes pa'i don du 1 pas tshad ma'i mtshan ynid kyang de nyid yin no

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-09-2410-28-16,unreviewed,4b5 - 4b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-09-2410-28-16"" status=""unreviewed"">2 pa tshad mas sgro 'dogs ji ltar gcod pa'i tshul ni: <lb n=""4b5""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>s: <l>tshad ma'i stobs kyis nges pa 'dren
<l>nges pa'i 'gal zla sgro 'dogs yin
column3: (RT VIII.46ab)</l>

column1: <l>zhes bya ba ltar, kun du tha snyad pa'i tshad ma'i stobs kyis 'jug ldog byed pa na nges shes 'dren dgos te</l>
<l>yod med nges pa'i 'bras can min
column3: phyir na tshad ma nyid mi 'gyur
column5: (PV I.200ab) zhes bya bas so
column7: (=RTRG ad RT VIII.46ab)</l>

column1: <l>de ltar tshad ma'i grangs pa'i nges shes des <lb n=""4b6""/> sgro 'dogs gcod pa yin te, </l>
<l>nges pa dang ni sgro 'dogs yid
<l>gnod bya gnod byed ngo bo'i phyir
<l>'di ni sgro 'dogs dben pa la
<l>'jug ces bya bar shes pa yin
<l>zhes bya bas so
des na mngon sum gyis sgro 'dogs gcod ces brjod kyang mngon sum min gyi, rjes kyi nges pa gcod pa yin te, ku sha lag pas bzung nas zor bas gcod pa bzhin no
column3: (=RTRG ad VIII.49ab)

column1: <lb n=""4b7""/>'di dag gi don nges par bya ba la gcad bya sgro 'dogs kyi rang bzhin: gcod byed nges pa'i rang bzhin ni: des ji ltar sgro 'dogs gcod pa'i tshul 3 gyis nges par byed par gsung kyang, rtogs sla zhing, 'og nas rtog pa'i rab dbye'i skabs su yang 'chad pas na 'dir ma spros so
column3: </seg></TEI>"

<l>rjes su dpag pa ran glas nges

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-18-35,unreviewed,16b7 - 16b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16b7""/> yul, 'jug yul 3 du byas nas, mngon sum la 'jug yul yod kyi zhen yul me dpa dang, 'grel pas kyang snang yul nyid la gzung yul du bshad pas, snang yul dang, gzung yul tha dad du mi 'byed do

column2: sgyu byed shin du bzang ba sde bdun mdzad pi gzhung dang dbyer med be nus pa yino
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-3012"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> gyi dongs pa yid mngon yin na 'das pa yin pas khyab cing 'das pa las 'das pa li skye ba'i phyir na yid mngon la rgyun med ces 'dod pa'i

column1: <lb n=""N004""/>khyor su bshad nas dgag pa yin du mang pa mdzad pa ni lung de la skyon rjod pa dbyes pa tsam du zad kyi yung de la ni chunga kyang mi bgod
column2: </seg> skyon brjod pi gzhi khas mangs spyir te
column3: des na 'di ni ri dang kyi grib ma la ri dags bsams nas mtshon 'phon pa dang 'dra
column4: mtshon nyid la gnod pa tsam</TEI>"

column1: <lb n=""N007""/>gzhalya du ba'i tang las de rtog pi rjegi tha skad 'brus
column2: du ba'i rtag las la mo'i don tshang gyi rnal pa shar nas de la gsang du mu ni shes pa tshad ma zhes yang na phyil gyi don bzhalya don gyi rnaM pa shar nas don la bsar du mu bi shes pa tshad pa don rtog tshad ma 'brus
column3: zhes pa des ba na rigi rjeg

column1: <lb n=""N008""/>pang mtshan nus gsung

column1: rang gi tshad 'bras ni ngosu bshang bya'o
column2: pa'bras rtog 3i rtog pa 3 las dang po mthad pi cha dan pa pa ni don ni 'brus 'jog pa mi rigs te phyis kyi don yod pa la skyon med cing zhes pir dang po ni de la blos kyis gyi don tos pa don</TEI>"

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-283,unreviewed,N007 - N001,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N007""/>mi bzhed pir
column2: de ltar phyi'i don bkag nas rnor shes pa ni se bdun mdong pab pi gang du yang bden med du sgrub pi rigs pa so khyab pi stong gan la 'bebs pi tshul cu dad kyang la gsungs pir
column3: ring pa smra ba'i pa nyung yang rnaMr rig pa tsam gyi tshuls ma 'das par mon
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-283"" status=""unreviewed"">de ltar <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje thaMd mkhyen pa</rs>'i  zhal               <lb n=""N008""/>mnga' nas kyang de ltar grub mtha' 4 las slo+on phyil gyi don slon pi tshe med pa ltar mdzad la bye nang la 'jug pa na rnam zhal gyis bzhes zhesungs ci ste 'dir yang
column6: gang gis dngos rnam dpyad na
column7: zhes 1 dang du bral gyi gyi ba sungs mino zhe na gsungs mod kyi des ni dngos mtha' dag rangin mes

column1: <lb n=""N001""/>gtan la 'bebs pa ma yino
column2: </seg>

column1: 'o na tsi zhe na blo 'khrul pa la gzugsn sna chog sdu snang ba di snang ba ltar bo nang grub pa 'gog pa yin thog ni tshul bsgrub pi rigs pa las ne des na bu ma bden 3 gyi 'gre pa par yang lon phyog gus la tsaM par gsungsigs bu la gan gyis</TEI>"

2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-284,unreviewed,N003,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-284"" status=""unreviewed"">deg ni bzhung gi dongs
<lb n=""N003""/>pa sgrib par gyur pa tsam zhig du zod des na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje thaMd mkhyen pa</rs>s sa gsungs ltar
column2: blo das 1 gis gang rung 1 rtong na 1 shos kyang rtogs pas khyab pa ni ldig dmigs kyi don to
column3: </seg> degis sbyor pa'i don 3 ngos bzung nas 2 pa tshul sgrub pa la dngos phyogs ni rang ri mngon gyis 'grub la khyab pa'ang</TEI>"

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-285,unreviewed,N005 - N007,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-285"" status=""unreviewed"">2 pa ltar na de 2 la 'brel pa med pas ldig migs nges mid la

column4: snang zugs 2 po rdzas tha dad yine

column2: snang bas sreg chang gi gi rgya mthong ba'i gags sbyed yir
column3: dper na snang 1 mtshan rgyu dang
column5: de las bdan pa'i dbangos dan

column1: <lb n=""N007""/>rdzas 1 dang rdzas tha dad ni sngar dpyad pa las shes
column2: </seg> yang snor snang dbes cho

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-286,unreviewed,N001 - N002,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-286"" status=""unreviewed"">'di'i lan la mtha' rnams bska ba ga sungs nas 'chos gzhi dang ni
column2: gzhan dang ni tshon gyi chos zhes spyod pa la brtens bsgrub bya'i chen kho na pa mi yod te dpe'i chon 3 po la dang po yir te shon gyi sa bon pa yis de des pa dang

column1: <lb n=""N001""/>rjes pa dpag byas pa yod ces brjod pa la brtens kyang cho rjes su pag bya kha na la mi po ste <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>s dud pa ba dang shad don rjes su pa bya lang po pir rjes su pa bya'i sa byang b kyi zhe na dang rjes su dang bya la yod ces brjod pa la bsten pa nyes pa dpa' bo de chon kho na la gog pa yin gyi
<lb n=""N002""/>sgras byag mo ba'i rgyun gnas skabs kyi nges pa yod pir phyogs kyi 'brel pa gtan la 'babs pa'i gnas skabsu phogs kyi sgro de bsgrub ba'i chon kho na la 'jug pir
column2: </seg>

column1: 'o na 'dis yang chen gyi chon zhes brjod pa la brtens sku bya'i chon kho na lasog pa yin phyos kyi 'brel pa gtan la 'bs</TEI>"

2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-287,unreviewed,N007 - [73b8],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-287"" status=""unreviewed"">gle chon gyi chos zhes brjod pa 'khrul gzhi yod la
column2: phyos zhes brjod na bskas ming du 'gro bas 2 ka ltar mi rjod phod gyi chos zhes dang ming gis rjod na go bde mod khar zan

column1: <lb n=""N007""/>'jug pa la lab pa bskyor ci dogs snyam na
column2: dngos ming de ltar rjod na lrub pa ci yang med mod kyi don kyang shed chon gyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>s 'gro ldog pa zhes tshul 3 brjod pa yige mnyaM pas rjer mi bde ba dang
column3: phyogs 'thong pod medang
column5: zhes bya ba lasog pa'i tshog le'ur byas pa mi 'grib pas mkhas

column1: <lb n=""N008""/>pa rnams kyis bad pa mtshad yang star kyi de 'jug thos pa bzhugs kyi don go na stod pang nas pa yon pa yang ba'i yang hyir zhes dang gyi thin pa la zhus kyis den togs pang nyes pa brgyad pa ma yin mnyam pas bsgus kyang pa yong du spangs pa yino
column2: des na kyi skyed ni rtog kyang ba pa dang nas

column1: <lb n=""[73b8]""/>…<rs type=""work"">gtan tshigs thigs pa</rs> las : * kyis don go yang nye bar b* pa * yi ge mnyam pas bsgrub dka' ba yongs su spangs pa yin no
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_04_gtsang_byang_sems_bzhi_brgya from transkribus.xml,1_013_04,,ex13042024-10-2411-43-47,reviewed,6b4 - 6b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b4""/>skyon mi 'byung ste de yang de la klan ka brjod pas 'du ba ma yin ces sbyar te
column2: de la gang la klan ka ji lta bu dus na kyi tshe zhe na

column1: gang la dang yod dang ces dang de la mun ces pas bstan te
column2: de la phyogs med ces pas skyon thaMd phyogs 'dzin las 'byung pa la dbu ma pa la gon te du ba yang khas mi len pas skyon gyi gnas med te dper na ni mkha' ni zhags pas bcing zhing dang du bya ba'i gnas ma yin pa bzhin no
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13042024-10-2411-43-47"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4557""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3721"">byang chub seMs pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi' <lb n=""6b5""/> (brgya) pa</rs>'i dka' ba'i gnas bshad pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">dbu ma smra ba'i dge' slong brtson 'grus seng nge</rs>s sbyar ba
column6: Ithi
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex112_2023_05_08,reviewed,3b8 - 4a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b8""/> ma myed par tshig gis bzlog par myi nus so
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" ana=""corpusmd:the_tshom"" xml:id=""ex112_2023_05_08"" status=""reviewed"">des na don du myi 'gyur ba'i the tsoM 'jug pa'i <choice><corr>yan</corr><sic>yang</sic></choice> lag sngar yod pas don du 'gyur ba'i the tsoM nyid myi dgos pa dang
column4: don du myi 'gyur ba'i the tsoM ldog pa'i yan lag gzhan sngar gnas pa yang bzlog par myi nus pas dgos 'brel kyi ngag don myed do zhe na

column1: de ni bden te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag cag</rs> dgos 'brel kyi ngag 'jug pa'i yan lag du khas <abbr>len to</abbr>
column3: <pb n=""4a""/><lb n=""4a1""/> 'on kyang 'dir ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""> slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gi bzhed pa tsaM bkod pa yin la de'i 'dod pas kyang don du 'gyur ba'i the tsoM don la shas cher rtog pa la 'dod do
column5: de yang myi 'thad pa ni dngos po'i nyes pa yin bas 'di ci byar yod
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex112_2023_05_082,reviewed,4a6 - 4a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4a6""/> rnaM pa gnyis ste 'bras bus nye bar mtshon pa dang
column2: byed pas nye bar mtshon pa yang de nyid do
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex112_2023_05_082"" status=""reviewed"">de las <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3773"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos kyi <choice><corr>grags</corr><sic>drags</sic></choice> pa</rs>s 'bras <choice><corr>bus</corr><sic>bu</sic></choice>  nye bar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa de gtan la <lb n=""4a7""/> dbab par 'dod pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa'i tshig gi don 'chad pa ni <quote source=""db:3779"" n=""37b4"">myi slu bar byed pa'i shes pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa yin no</quote> zhes bya <choice><reg>ba'o</reg><orig>ba.do→ba'o</orig></choice>
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex112_2023_05_083,reviewed,4b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex112_2023_05_083"" ana=""corpusmd:yid_dpyod"" status=""reviewed""> yid dpyod rnaM pa bzhi po rgyu mtshan myed pa dang
column2: log pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang
column3: yang dag pa'i rgyu mtshan gtan la ma <lb n=""4b8""/> phebs pa dang
column4: phebs kyang brjed pa ni the tsoM du 'du la the tsom yang gnyi gar gyur ba myed pa'i yul 'jog pas log pa'i shes par du'o zhes <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> sems so
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-07-1715-14-27,reviewed,5a1 - 5a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a1""/> pa na [-› 'jug bsdu ba ni<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-07-1715-14-27"" ana=""corpusmd:blo_rigs"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag</rs> gis ni 'di ltar rig go
column3: shes pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste
column4: yang dag par rtogs pa dang
column5: ma rtogs pa dang
column6: log par rtogs pa dang
column7: the tsoM mo
column9: de la dang po ni tha snyad pa'i yang dag par rtogs pa kho na yin bas tshad ma'o
column11: gnyis pa ni tha snyad pa'i rtogs pa'i byed pa dang bral ba yin bas snang <choice><corr>la</corr><sic>pa</sic></choice> ma nges pa dang bcad pa'i yul can no
column13: gsuM pa ni myed pa'i don rtogs par <lb n=""5a2""/> byed pa la log pa'i shes pa mtha' dag go
column15: bzhi ba ni gang yang rnaM par myi gcod pas gang yang yongs su myi gcod pa'i phyir don <choice><corr>'jug</corr><sic>'jig</sic></choice>  pa'i nus pa myed pa'o
column17: yid dpyod mtha' dag ni log pa'i shes par 'du ste
column18: don myed par 'byung pas don myed pa'i rang bzhin dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro
column20: dper na du ba dang dus mnyaM du yod pa'i dngos po rnaMs ni me myed kyang 'byung pas mye'i 'bras bu ma yin ba'i rang bzhin dang ma bral <lb n=""5a3""/> ba bzhin no
column22: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-241713,reviewed,5a3 - 5a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a3""/> ba bzhin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-241713"" ana=""corpusmd:tshad_ma"" status=""reviewed"">

column1: mtshan nyid la log par rtogs pa spang pa ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5557"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pa</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5549"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon shag kya blo</rs> phyi rol kyi nor bu'i 'od la nang gi nor bur sgro 'dogs pa tshad mar 'dod pa dang
column4: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5534"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon dul ba'i lha</rs> ni phyed kyi dus su nyin bar bu 'ongs par mthong pa'i rmyi laM kyang shes pa tshad mar 'dod pa dang
column5: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5570"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3771"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po</rs>'i slob ma kha cig</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5570"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">mu stegs kha cig</rs> <choice><corr>dung</corr><sic>dang</sic></choice> <lb n=""5a4""/> dkar po la ser por 'khrul pa yang dkar po'i mdog dang dbyibs la tshad mar 'dod pa rnaMs spangs pa'o
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-24.17.241,reviewed,6b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b3""/> myi byed pas dor bar don du gnyer ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.241"" status=""reviewed"">des na <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gis dor byar bsdus pa dang
column4: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5534"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon <choice><corr>dul</corr><sic>du</sic></choice> ba'i lha</rs>s don gsuM par bshad pa gnyi ka 'khrul pa yin no
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-07-1715-34-59,reviewed,6b8 - 7a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b8""/> pa gnyis nyid ni ma yin te
column2: rang rig pa las ngo bo tha dad na rig pa nyid ma yin bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
column4: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin ni rig pa'i rang bzhin kho na yin ba'i phyir ro
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-07-1715-34-59"" status=""reviewed"">'di ltar <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> mngon suM rang rig pa'i rang bzhin don daM par yod la
column7: rjes su dpag pa <choice><corr>rnam par rtog pa</corr><sic>rnaM par rtog par rtog pa</sic></choice> ni don daM par myed kyi <pb n=""7a""/><lb n=""7a1""/> kun rdzob du yod do zhes zer ba ni

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""I'""/>
myi rigs ste</seg> rang rig pa las ngo bo tha dad na
column2: [-› mi rigs te
column3: ] rnaM rtog dngos por yod ba la gnod byed myed pa dang
column4: tha snyad du yang bsgrub byed myed par thal pa dang
column5: dngos por yod pa'i bsgrub byed yod pa'i phyir ro
column7: </TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-24.17.282,reviewed,7b7 - 7b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7b7""/>gnyis pa bsgrub pa dang rjes su brjod pa'i tshul ston pa ni
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.282"" status=""reviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3735"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon ka ma la shi la</rs> na re
column3: mtshan nyid ni grub pa yin te mtshon par byed pa yin ba'i phyir ro
column5: mtshon <choice><corr>bya ni</corr><sic>bya'i</sic></choice> ma <lb n=""7b8""/>grub pas bsgrub pa yin na mtshan nyid dang <choice><reg> </reg>

column1: <orig>{ma grub pa'i khyad par}</orig></choice>mtshon bya phyin ci log du <abbr>thal lo</abbr> zhes gsungs so
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-24.17.30,reviewed,7b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7b8""/>grub pas bsgrub pa yin na mtshan nyid dang<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.30"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> na re
column2: gnas skabs ni gnyis ste <choice><corr>mtshan nyid</corr><sic>mtshan</sic></choice>  gtan la 'bebs pa dang
column3: mtshan nyid kyis tha snyad du byed do
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-07-1715-43-33,reviewed,8a2 - 8a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a2""/> na gzhi myed par ram
column2: gzhi la
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-07-1715-43-33"" status=""reviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5629"">slob dpon rab du zhi ba bzang po</rs> 'di skad ces
column4: mying dang mying can kyi 'brel pa ci zhig bsgrub par zad kyi
column5: mtshon bya grub pa la mtshan nyid bsgrubs pa'am
column6: mtshan <lb n=""8a3""/> nyid grub pas mtshon bya bsgrub pa ni ma yin te
column7: rtog bral ma 'khrul ba nyid la mgnon suM zhes 'dogs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba'i don la <choice><corr>bsdu</corr><sic>ba su ba</sic></choice> ni
column8: <quote source=""db:3779"" n=""40b1-2""> rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul ba nyid <choice><corr>ma grub pa</corr><sic>bsgrub pa</sic></choice> yin quote</quote> zhes bya ba'o
column10: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-24.17.31,reviewed,8a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a4""/> 'di la mi mthun pa myed do
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.31"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""3773"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">slob dpon</rs> kyis 'khrul ba ni log par snang pa yin no zhes bshad pas de bral ba gzung yul la ma 'khrul ba grub po
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-24.17.32,reviewed,9b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.32"" status=""reviewed"">de bden <lb n=""9b5""/> te des na <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5594"">chos mchog chen po</rs>r <quote source=""db:5594"" n=""ad PVin 1 40,3"">grur zhugs pa'i 'khrugs pa lasogs pa</quote> zhes rgyu gsuM bshad do
column3: 'dir ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gis legs par ma brtags par nges so
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-24.17.33,reviewed,10a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.33"" status=""reviewed"">glan ka spang pa ni don gzhan myi 'dzin na bcad pa'i yul can du thal ba dang
column2: 'dzin na dbang po'i shes pa la myi ltos na
column3: 'on long myed pa dang
column4: ltos kyang don gzhan 'dzin bas 'on long myed par thal ba brjod pa las
column5: yul gzhan yin bas nyes pa dang po spangs so
column7: de'i rgyun <lb n=""10a5""/> 'dzin bas don gzhan myi 'dzin ba'i phyir 'on long myed pa'i nyes pa myed la
column8: de'i nyer len la ltos pas gtan tshigs myi ltos pa yang ma yin no

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-24.17.383,reviewed,15a2 - 15a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15a2""/> las
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.383"" ana=""corpusmd:mi_dmigs_pa"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> ltar na dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur ba ni bltar rung pa'o
column4: de ni myi dmyigs pa'i khyad par yin no
column6: myi dmyigs pa <lb n=""15a3""/>zhes bya ba ngo bo dang khyad par bltar rung pa 'gal ba ma <abbr>yin te</abbr>
column7: khyad par sgro btags pa'i phyir ro
column9: sgro gdags par bya ba ni rgyu mtshan yin la de yang sa phyogs kyi chos yod na buM pa snang par brtag par bya ba'o
column13: de'i rang bzhin yang buM par snang pa'i shes pa'i rgyu nus pa <choice><corr>thogs</corr><sic>thog</sic></choice> myed tshang pa'o
column15: sgro gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan de'i shes par byed pa yang shes pa cig la <choice><corr>'dre</corr><sic>'dra</sic></choice>  ba'i don gzhan snang pa'o zhes so
column17: </seg></TEI>"

<abbr>gzung yul</abbr> <abbr>yin</abbr> <abbr>snang yul</abbr> <abbr>ma yin</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> mu <abbr>dbang po'i</abbr> <abbr>mngon sum gyi</abbr> <abbr>bzung don</abbr> <abbr>lta bu</abbr> zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> <abbr>'dod do</abbr>¦

2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml,2_044_04,,ex44042023-01-2413-25-34,reviewed,8a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a2""/> spang pa'i phyir ¦ zhes de dang mthun par gsungs so ¦<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44042023-01-2413-25-34"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">snga rabs pa dag</rs>¦ <abbr>mtshan</abbr> mtshon grangs mnyaM <abbr>yin</abbr> pas <abbr>mtshon bya</abbr> <abbr>gcig</abbr> la <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> du ma dang ¦ <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> <abbr>gcig</abbr> la <abbr>mtshon bya</abbr> du ma <abbr>mi 'thad</abbr> ces 'dod pa'ang
mi 'thad de
