column1: 2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml,2_044_04,,ex44042023-02-2308-02-07,reviewed,9a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a9""/> tha snyad bya rung du sgrub pa lta bu.<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44042023-02-2308-02-07"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

de'ang <abbr>rgyu tshogs</abbr> pa las <abbr>bras bu</abbr> 'byung <abbr>rung gi</abbr> rtags <abbr>yin par</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5554"">lha</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5549"">shAg</rs> 'chad pas dgag <abbr>rtags</abbr> pa ba <abbr>yin par</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mkhas pa kha <abbr>cig</abbr></rs> gsungs mod ¦</seg></TEI>"

2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml,2_044_04,,ex44042023-02-2308-08-03,reviewed,15b2 - 15b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b2""/> rang gi spobs pa bcoM nas:  rang gi 'dod pa'i don<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44042023-02-2308-08-03"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

dang po grub mtha' dang sbyar ba ni ¦<quote source=""db:5564""><!--this is not a literal citation--><rs type=""school"">bye brag tu smra ba</rs> ni ¦ <abbr>gzugs sogs</abbr> thug phrad du snang pa'i don dngos <abbr>bzhugs</abbr>¦ phyi don mthong pa tshad ma ¦ phyi don <abbr>rtogs</abbr> pa <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> smra bas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras <lb n=""15b3""/> rdzas tha dad dus <abbr>mnyam par</abbr> 'dod ¦

<rs type=""school"">mdo sde pa</rs>s ¦ don lkog na mo <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ don dang 'dra bar skyes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> shes pa tshad ma ¦ don <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>btags</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> smra bas <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras rdzas tha dad dus <choice><sic>mnyaM par</sic><corr>tha dad par</corr> </choice> 'dod do

<rs type=""school"">rnaM bden pa</rs>s ¦ bzung ba'i rnaM pa <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ 'dzin pa'i rnaM pa tshad ma ¦ rang rig <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> <lb n=""15b4""/> 'dod pas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras bde sdug myong ba ltar dus dang <abbr>ngo bo</abbr> <abbr>gcig</abbr> du 'dod do

<rs type=""school"">rnaM brdzun pa</rs>s bzung <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rnaM pa sgro <abbr>btags</abbr> <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ 'dzin pa'i rnaM pa tshad ma ¦ rang rig <abbr>btags</abbr> pa ba <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> 'dod pas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad <abbr>'bras skra </abbr>shad snang pa ltar <abbr>gcig</abbr> pa bkag <abbr>pa'i</abbr> tha dad du <abbr>'dod do</abbr></quote> ces <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> <abbr>las gsungs so</abbr> ¦</seg></TEI>"
2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml,2_044_04,,ex44042023-02-0311-17-56,reviewed,15b9 - 16a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b9""/> mun blo dag

column1: <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4767"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">

<rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3770"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tshad ma mdo</rs> <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:5553"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">sde bdun</rs> 'grel pa <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">'grel bshad</rs> bcas <pb n=""16a""/><lb n=""16a1""/>pa'i snying po rigs pa'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa gsal byed nyi ma'i 'od </rs> ces bya ba ni ¦

don du gnyer ba'i slob ma 'gas bskul ba'i ngor ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4017"">shAkya'i dge slong dz+nya Na shri</rs>s ¦ drag po'i lo sa ga zla ba'i dkar phyogs la ¦ <rs type=""place"" ref=""db:6173"">dpal ldan gsang phu'i chos gra</rs>r sbyar ba mchog tu dge <abbr>legs</abbr> su gyur <abbr>cig</abbr>
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column2: gnyen po mi srid pa’i phyir ro
column3: (zh)es phyis gsung ngo
column5: </note>yang na dpyad bzod la gnod pas na ’khrul pas na tha snyad byas so zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">slob dpon gzhan dag</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">gangs pa</rs></note> ’chad do
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_075_02.xml,3_075_02,,ex75022023-09-282,unreviewed,41b4 - N007,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""41b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex75022023-09-282"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5200"">don pha rol tu phyin pa'i nyaMs len snying po rab gsal</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dpal ldan bla ma daM pa</rs>'i gsung la snon 'khrid ma byas par
nyaMs su len bde bar bya ba'i phyir
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4311""><abbr>rdo rje</abbr> 'dzin pa naM 'kha rin chen</rs> kyis bka'i bskul ba'i ngor
<rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5707"">'khyog dgon pa</rs>r <hi rendition=""#Time"">chu pho spre'u'i lo bden bzhi'i chos 'khod skor ba'i dus chen kyi nyin</hi>
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4077"">sod nams dpal bzang</rs> gis sbyar ba'i

<abbr>yi ge</abbr> pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5201"">btan bsal</rs> <lb n=""N007""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5201"">bdag</rs> gi dgyis
column2: </seg>

column1: 'di bzhengs dge bas 'gro drug seMs can rnaMs
shes rab yuM kyis dbyings_su skyes nas kyang
seMs can</TEI>"

column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-50"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs> na re sgan sgon 'chi ka ma'i rig pa lasogs chos can
column2: rig tsam phyi ma skyed nus ste
column3: rig tsam yin pa'i phyir
column4: da ltar rig pa 'di bzhin no

column1: zhes pa'i rjes           <lb n=""8b7""/>dpag gis 'grub po zer ba la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-12,unreviewed,8b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b7""/>dpag gis 'grub po zer ba la

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">gtsang nag pa</rs> na re
column2: des la khyab pa nges byed kyi tshad mas rig tsam la rig pa phyi ma skyed nus te rig pa phyi ma thug med skyes bus kyis khyab pa grub pa skad cig tsam dang po ltar na bsgrub bya ghub zin pas rtags don med la
column3: </seg>

column1: gnyis pa ltar na den rgya</TEI>"

3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-16,unreviewed,9a1 - 9a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a1""/>'thud kyang skad cig brgya las med pas des de brtan par mi 'grub po
column3: 'di ni rang rig mngon sum gyis thug pa mngon sum gyis thug pa dngos su khegs pa 'thug med du shugs la grub zer ro
column5: de dang 'thun par dmyal pas kyang ngo
column7: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-16"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: slo+on <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">gtsang drug</rs> na re
column2: rig tsam la rig pa <lb n=""9a2""/>spyi la skyed gus mthong tsam gyi de de'i rang bzhin can du 'grub na
column3: </seg>

column1: byas yod la 'jig pa mthong tsam gyis kyang de de'i de can du 'grub par thal lo
column3: 'dod na ltos med don med du 'gyur ro
column5: skye 'jig tshul mtshungs pas 'dir yang rig pa la mthong pa'i rig pa sphyi ma bskyed nus chos can</TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-21,unreviewed,21a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""21a5""/>dus mnyam pa grogs yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-21"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs> na re dngos kyi dmigs pa byang chub dang ched du bya ba'i dmigs pa gzhan don de ni shes par bya'o
gong ltar na mdo bzhin du'o
column3: mdo las ji skad bshad na bsdus dang rgyas pa'i sgo nas brjod ces zer
column4: </seg>

column1: gnal ba dngos su zer te
column2: dngos su brjod pa mi</TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-212,unreviewed,47a2 - 47a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""47a2""/>gsum 'phags pa'i lnga ste rim pa bzhin no
column3: mod rgyas 'bring las ni bsam gtan bzhi pa spyi yid re smos pas nyer cig snang ngo
column5: 'du byed med par mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa mngon par brtson pa dang lam 'bad pas bskyed gnal pa zer te
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-212"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: slo+on<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">drug po</rs> ni re
column2: 'du byed ni 'bad rtsol <lb n=""47a3""/>yin pas 'du byed med pa'i sgra mi 'jug go
column4: </seg>

column1: 'di ni dbang po rdul yang sngon goms pa'i stobs kyis 'bad rtsol nas chung pa la byo' gsung ngo
column3: gnas tsaM dus mi 'pho ba la</TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-27,unreviewed,28b3 - N005,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28b3""/>sogs 'du 'god med byas na chos brjod kyi sra 'du 'god med pa'i gzugs sogs byas na chos can brjod pa'i sgra yin te de gnyis ka ltar na yang de gnyis kyi tshogs don rtogs pa yang khyad med do ber ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-27"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">gnyal pa</rs> na re sgra mi rtag byas na chos can brjod pa dang khyad par gzhan mi <lb n=""28b4""/>ba nge pa'i sgra yin te
rang gi brjod bya mi rtag pa dang chos du ma'i rten sgra gnyis tha dad du brjod pa'i phyir ro
sgra'i yi rtag byas na cig shos te de dang de tha dad du brjod pa'i phyir ro
column3: tshogs don rtogs pa la khyad yed 'dra'o

column1: de bzhin du bzhugs sogs 'du 'god med zhes dang
column2: gzugs

column1: <lb n=""N005""/>sogs kyi 'du 'od med ces pa dag rim bzhin te tshogs don rtogs pa la khyad med zer ro
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-31,unreviewed,33b3 - N006,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""33b3""/>ni bsngags la rung dus chog shes pa kha cig la ni smad pa lta bu'o
column3: de dag kyang dgogs bzhi gtsor byas na dogo sas can yin la
column4: dgos pa gtsir byas na
column5: lem por dgongs pa yin te gsung cig la gnyis ga sbyang du rung ngo
column7: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-31"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: de yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog lo ts+tsha ba</rs> na re
column2: bka' <lb n=""33b4""/>thaMd dgongs pa dang
column3: lhem dgongs gnyis su 'dus zer ba 'thad do

column1: rigs kyi dbye ba la brtsod yang 'dir ni rigs tha dad bcu gsum gyi dbye ba rung pa ma yin zhes pa'i brtsod lan du 'thad do
bhyar se kho na theg chen gyi rigs can ma yin par 'thad pa ni 'dod do
column3: yos nyid

column1: <lb n=""N005""/>bris bas spyir sems can thaMd la gnas pa yin pa'i sphyir byang se nhos na rgyas 'gyur gyi rigs can ma yin par thal ba khyab pa med do
column3: rgyas 'gyur gyi rigs sems can thaMd la spyir gnas pa'i phyir zer na ma grub po
column5: ji ltar ces pa'i don khyed dngos por smra ba rigs dngos por myur

column1: <lb n=""N006""/>pa skye mched drug ni nus pa'i khyad par kun gzhi la yod pa'i zag med kyi chos skyed pa'i nus pa la 'dod pas kyang zhes bya'o
column3: </seg>

column1: 'jim pa cig las ces pa dang theg pa gsum gyi dpe sbyor na sdzas tha dad rigs cig pa'i bum par sbyar bas yog la nga phyi tha dad bcu gsum gyi dper</TEI>"

3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-35,unreviewed,40a3 - 40a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40a3""/>bskdul nas de yod pas 'gal ba yed par sems mo
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-35"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6950"">a du la</rs> na re
column2: byang se'i nyon mongs kyi nus pa bzhi las
column3: 'khor bar skye ba'i nus pa dang
column4: rigs 'dra bskyed pa'i nus sa gnyis mi yong
column5: sdug pa snga sa skyed pa'i dang
column6: gnyen po ye+es skye ba'i gas byed pa gnyis <lb n=""40a4""/>yong zer ro

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-41,unreviewed,57a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""57a2""/>phyan bzang pos brgyan pa gsum 'dug pas de bzhin gshegs pa mtshong nas dad ste

column1: 2_050_03 Skyid ston_Theg chen rgyud bla ma gdams pa.xml,2_050_03,,ex50032023-09-191,unreviewed,[5a3],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50032023-09-191"" status=""unreviewed"">chos 'di'i lo rgyus <rs type=""person"" ana="""">paN di ta chen po byaMs</rs> (<rs type=""person"" ana="""">rgyal ba byaMs pa</rs>'i chos 2 yod pa'i) <rs type=""person"" ana="""">pa'i mgon po</rs>
column2: zhes bya ba <rs type=""place"">ma ga da'i dgon pa</rs> 1 na bzhugs pa la
column3: rmi laM <lb n=""[5a1]""/> (btsun pa 1 gdugs dkar po 1 phub nas lha'i 'khor mang po dang 'dug) du <rs type=""place"">tsan dan gyi mchod rten khri 'phang 4 pa 1 </rs>gi nang du <rs type=""work"">rgyud bla ma</rs> dang
column5: <rs type=""work"">chos nyid kyi gdaM[s] ngag</rs> 2 btsug nas <rs type=""deity"">byaMs pa</rs> dngos kyis ngo sprod byas te
column6: spyir rgyu rkyen 2 'bras bu 3 du dril nas ngo sprod pa dang
column7: <lb n=""[5a2]""/> bye brag tu rgyu chos nyi mi 'gyur bar ngo sprad pa dang
column8: bsaM mi khyab 4 lo ngo sprod mdzod
column10: phyis gnyid sad pa dang chos 'ga' seMs la byung kyang ma rga ba las
column11: 'phags pa dngos kyi thugs rjes
column12: <lb n=""[5a3]""/> bzung kyang nga la chos 'dzin pa'i nus pa med_do snyaM mo
column14: de nas sngar skor ba byed pa'i <rs type=""place"">mchod rten 1</rs> la
column15: 'od snga na med pa de nas byung_ngo
column17: de nas gdaM[s] ngag yod daM snyaM nas phye bas byung_ngo
column19: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_01_Chu_PVin commentary.xml,3_087_01,,ex87012023-10-04-131522,reviewed,151b7 - 151b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87012023-10-04-131522"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""151b7""/> bdag nyid chen po'i gzhung don ji bzhin 'chad pas gzhan gyi the tshom gcod
column3: rang rgyud thal 'gyur gtan tshigs rnam par dag pas nus pa shin du che
column5: tshig don legs par 'phrod cing snga phyi 'brel pas 'jug ngogs shin du bde'
column7: de ltar chos gsum tshang ba legs par bshad pa bstan pa'i 'od zer yin
column9: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3747"">mi 'pham mgon</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3720"">klu las (em: la) dbang bsgyur</rs> dang
column11: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3771"">phyogs <lb n=""151b8""/> las rgyal</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773""><rs type=""work"">rnam 'grel</rs> mdzad pa</rs> ste
column13: kun kyi legs bshad 'dzin pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">chu mig pa</rs>s
column15: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">chen po'i pho brang dge ba'i gnas</rs> su sbyar
column17: legs bshad bstan pa'i 'od zer kun du 'phros pas 'gro ba thams cad kyang
column19: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i mun pa stug po rab bcom ste
column21: ji ltar ji snyed shes bya'i don kun <pb n=""152a""/><lb n=""152a1""/> blo yi mig gis legs mthong nas
column23: spangs dang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin byang chub chen po'i go 'phang thob par shog
column25: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">gangs can</rs> 'dir 'ongs gzhung [*] lugs 'di 'chad 'di yi don
column27: legs par bshad dang ma bshad log <lb n=""152a2""/> par bshad pa'i don
column29: thams cad len 'chad 'dor la 'gal zlos med phyir 'di
column31: blo ldan legs bshad don gnyer kun gyis blang bar rigs
column33: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773"">dpal ldan grags pa</rs>'i gzhung don blta bar 'dod pa gzhan gyi blo
column35: sprin tshogs stug pos bsgribs pa'i mkha' la nyi ma blta ba bzhin
column36: <lb n=""152a3""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">bdag</rs> gi blo gros dri ma med pa nam mkh'yangs pa'i dbus
column38: rnam par nges don (nyi ma)'i dkyil 'khor skyon med rab tu gsal
column42: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_01_Chu_PVin commentary.xml,3_087_01,,ex87012023-03-0911-03-47,reviewed,152a3 - 152a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""152a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87012023-03-0911-03-47"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4023"">rgya shes rab dbang phyug</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4022"">'jang shag kya dpal</rs> <lb n=""152a4""/> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4020"">rkyel grags pa seng ge</rs> las sogs pa chen po rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos blangs te mang du thos pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol du phyin pa'i don dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">slob dpon chos mchog </rs>gis mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5594"">ti ka 'thad ldan</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5597""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5551"">kha che dz+nya na shri</rs>'i ti ka</rs> lasogs pa mthong ba'i don
column4: bsams <lb n=""152a5""/> pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis legs par gtan la phab pa'i don ston par byed pa
column5: blo la zin pa tsam gyis mkhas pa'i mchog du 'gyur zhing mkhas pa rtag tu mi nyams par byed pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5290"">ti ka chen po</rs> 'di
column6: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">shag kya'i dge slong gtsang chu mig pa seng ge dpal</rs> gyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag <lb n=""152a6""/> khang</rs> du brtsams te <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5595""><choice><orig>ya°</orig><reg>yar</reg></choice> lungs</rs> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5596"">khra 'brug gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du yi ger bkod pa'o
column8: rdzogs s+ho
column10: <note type=""gloss"">bkra' <abbr>shis so</abbr></note>
column13: dge'o
column15: <note type=""gloss""><abbr>zhus so</abbr></note>
column17: </seg></TEI>"

column1: <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3775"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">'brel pa brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa</rs> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3776"">slob dpon mkhas pa chen po chos kyi <abbr>grags</abbr> pa</rs>s mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5560""><rs type=""place"" ref=""db:5558"">rgya gar</rs> gyi mkhan <pb n=""4b""/><lb n=""4b1""/> po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha</rs> dang ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5561"">lo tsa ba ban+de nam mkha</rs>s bsgyur

column1: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5482""> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> ces bya ba'i 'grel pa</rs>'i bshad pa slob ma la phan pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6964"">nang rig pa'i bstan bcos sde snod 3 la mkhas shing
column2: sgra dang <lb n=""86a5""/>tshad ma dang snyan dangs dang sdebs sbyor lasog pa tha snyad kyi gtsug rnaMs phal cher shes pas gsung rab kyi tshig don la mi 'jig pa'i spobs pa can ¦ shar dags po'i lo tstsha ba sarva j+ña mi tra</rs>s
column3: sa mo glang gi lo gro zhun zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi tshes bcu la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5765"">chos gra chen po dpal gyi rtes thang</rs> <lb n=""86a6""/> du rdzog par bris pa'o

column1: 3_076_02_W1PD153536-I1KG13965-1-518.xml,3_076_02,,ex76022024-10-2110-56-18,unreviewed,N006 - N007,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N006""/>kyi de 'dra'i 'dod tshal ma dr mi khyar gang gi sgo nas 'jog
column3: pa rjer bya ba mang ba par slom 'i'i bzhes pa mdor bsdus 1 brjod na
column4: khyab pa 'dud kyi yul zhi bi dbyings pa der skabs 'di'i phag pi mtha' nyid yin par slo+on nyid kyi bzhed pa yir
column5: rgyal tshab dam pas bzhes pa ltar du ring te
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex76022024-10-2110-56-18"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">slo+on chos kyi bshe+en</rs>

column1: <lb n=""N007""/>gyis de kho ba nyid mngon du mi byed pa'i rten can zhes pa'i grel par de kho na nyid ces pa la
column2: </seg>

column1: de po ba nyid ni gang mi bd pa'i mtha' zhi ba nyid
column2: de longon du mi bye ces pa ni
column3: bsgoMs pas yang bar bya ba nyo+ongs pa rnaMs mi spyong ba'ir te
column4: de yong na slo+on gyi zhal sa bas
column5: stos kyi laM ni byedMs yi su shes pang byas</TEI>"

column1: 3_076_02_W1PD153536-I1KG13965-1-518.xml,3_076_02,,ex76022024-10-18-65-35,unreviewed,6a6 - 6a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a6""/>de skyab gyi cha la rnams kyi ched du gnyer bya'i gtso yin dgos shes pi ched du yir
column2: rnamkhyen thog mar 'chadar ngs mo
column4: seMskyed sog 'chad s rgyub ci yin zhe na de g 'chad ni rgyun yod
column5: yul gyis yul ba mtshob po sgo bas rnamkhyen de 'chad pir
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex76022024-10-18-65-35"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">rnog lo</rs> chenos
column2: rgyus 'bras mtshon gyi don du bsrungs na <lb n=""6a7""/>yang
column3: slo+on seng bzangs kyis ni yulying dun mtshon pi don nyid yin par 'gre+en gyi skabs dang po rdzogs ma tham tu gsal bar sungs pas
column4: slo+on gyi dgongs pa ni rus 'bras mtshan se kyi don du mi bcung
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">rngog lo</rs> chenos rgyus 'bras mtshon gyi don du gsungs pa 'phang pi bzhes mdzad snang bas de mtha' <lb n=""6a8""/>tu 'gal bar mi bzungo
column7: </seg>

column1: yulyis sprul mtshon tshul ni ches bcu mngon du skyod pi mkhyab pa mthrug rnamkhyen du bzhag ni mod kyi shing thob pi tshul pa spyod yi rten seMskyed seMskyed nas sgrub pa kyi sem pi tshul bas bsdul
column2: de'i snogs sang ngos bsdu ba ni seMskyed po shang pa 2 la
column4: rangs gan dog</TEI>"

column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5868"">riGS pa smra ba riN chen byang chub</rs> kyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">dpal ldan gsang phu ne'u thog gi chos grwa chen po</rs>r sbyar ba re shig rdzogs s+ho

column2: ngo bo tha dad pa'am
column3: ngo bo gcig la ldog pa tha dad pa yin zhe na
column4: gcig pa bkag pa'i tha dad pa ma yin te
column5: <abbr>thams cad</abbr> dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro
column6: dngos po tha dad pa'i nges pa'ang myed de bag la nyal la sogs pa 'ga' zhig dngos po gcig par 'gyur ba'i go skabs yod pas so
column7: dngos po 1 pa'i yang nges pa myed de rgyud bzhir phye ba'i rgyud tha dad pa rnaMs ngo bo tha dad par yang 'gyur ba'i <lb n=""56a4""/> phri ro
column8: des na dngos po gcig gam tha dad kyang bla ste mtshan nyid tha dad pa dgu yod pas sgrib pa dgu'o
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre chen po</rs> na re yum sras yin par sgyu 'bras su mi 'gyur ste rnam par bzhag 'jog gi yum sras yin pa'i phyir ba glang dang nog lkog shal 4n no
'di ltar gzhi shes rnas rtog rgyu nkan r sa phags pa rnam
<lb n=""12b1""/>bzhag 'bras bu
column2: lam shes rnam 'jog rgyu byang chub sod pa'i rnam bzhag 'bras bu
column3: rnam mkhyen rnam 'jog rgyus hyang rnaM bzhag 'bras bu yin ste
column4: mado las go du shi ka sa'i dngos po'i sku 'di ma syes pas ni dpe na gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro yis
column5: rnam pa thaMd mkhyen pa nyid mnyes pas ni de 4 n gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs

column1: <lb n=""12b2""/>su 'gro'o zhes gsungs pa dang
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-40,unreviewed,18a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a4""/>yin pa'i yon tan nye bar rgod pa son du 'gro las phyag 'tshal zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro

column2: so so'i skye bo la sbyor ba dang po 3</TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-42,unreviewed,18a6 - 18a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a6""/>khyab pa ma grub na dus mnyam pa las rkyesam phyis 'byung pa lang skye
column2: dang po ltar na rgyu 'bras dus mnyam par 'gyur la 2ra pa ltar na rgyu 'bras phyon chi log du 'gyuro

<lb n=""18a7""/>shes rab gyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes kyang bya
column2: </seg>

column1: jo je lta bu'i tin se 'dzin zhes kyang bya
column2: seM ga sgra sgrogs pa'si ting nges dzin zhes kyang bya zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
column3: mkhyod don dam bden pa mngon sum du rtogs pa rnam mkhyen dngos su skyed pa yin zer ba yang ma yin ste
column4: rgyun mtha' ma yin pa gzhan na yum yod par bshad pa'i mdo dang bstan bcos</TEI>"

column1: <lb n=""N002""/>dang

column3: kun dga' po ngas khyod la dad pas rjes su 'byang pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang pa dang byad pa dang lan 1 phyir 'ong pa dang

kun dga' bo snyigs ma lngar skyos pa'i seMn dman pa la mos pa de dag ched du de sngan gshegs pa thabs dods rgyas kyi chos bstan to zhes de dag du 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan mang du gsungs pa yino zhes 'chad do
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">'brom nam <note type=""gloss"">'</note>go bla ma</rs> na re don dang mi mthun pa kho na <lb n=""56b5""/> yin te rtog pa 'khrul pa 'ba' zhig yin pa'i phyir zhes gsung pa ni ma yin te
column2: rtog pa chos kyi dbyongs las 'khrul ba'i phyir zhes 'god na ma nges ste
column3: sngo 'dzin tshad mas kun rdzob tu don dang mi mthun par thal te chos kyi dbyings la 'khrul ba'i phyir ro

column1: rtags tshad ma khyab pa khas blangs 'dod na tshad ma yin pa shes so
column3: rtogs kun rdzob kyi

column1: <lb n=""56b6""/>gnas lugs la 'khrul ba rtags su 'god na ma grub po
column3: gal te grub na 'di dag spong pa la gzung 'dzin gyis stong pa'i chos nyid rtogs m'i dgos par 'gyur te
column4: kun rdzob shes pa'i tshad mas spong pa'i phyir thag pa la sbrul 'dzin no
column6: 'dod na mthong pa dang bsgom pas spang par bya ba'i zhes pas bsal ba'o
column8: gzhan yang kuns skon dang rnaM byang

column1: <lb n=""56b7""/>dag kyang kuns ston dang rnaM byang ma yin par 'gyur te gzung rtog 2 kyis de dag du rtog pa'i phyir ro
column3: rtags rang rig gis grub cing khyab pa ma grub na don dang mi mthun pa shaMs la 'dod na de dag yin pas bsalo
column5: </seg>

column6: rten 'brel lugs 'byung lugs bzlog gzung ba rang 1 na med pa khyad par du byas pa bsgoM pa chon
column7: se rang mtshon pa rang rgyas kyi laM du shes par bya'o
column9: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-12-062"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6949"">jo bo a du la</rs> ltar na gzung pa bden pa med par shes pas saM
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">bla ma

column1: <lb n=""N003""/>'bum pa</rs> ltar na de snang tshod du yang med par shes pas pas don rtog pa song pa'i phyir dang
column2: snga ma ltar na 'dzin pa bden pa'i rang de na med par ma shes pas saM
column3: phyi ma ltar na 'dzin pa snang tshod du yang med par ma shes pas 'dzin pa'i rtog pa mi spong pa'i phyir
column4: rtags dang pos nyan thos kyi laM'og du bcad cing dra pas byang chub seMd pa'i laM gong du bcad pas la bar mar

column1: <lb n=""N004""/>grub pa yino
column3: </seg>

column1: rtags dang po ni mdo las gzugs ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yino
column3: de ci'i phyir zhe na
column4: gzugs kyi rang 4 na ni zab pa ma yin phra ba ma yino zhes pa dang
column5: 2 pa ni lta'i na dag bdag la chos can pa ni sgyu ma lta bu dang
column6: bdag la chos nyan pa ni sprul pa lta bur dag brtsal bar bya ste
column7: de ci yang nyan pa med ci yang mngon du</TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-12-202,unreviewed,N004 - N005,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-12-202"" status=""unreviewed"">'byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ni slo+on 'phags pa ltar na med du bya ba gzhan gyi don du dngos su rang don dang rang gzhan 2 ka'si don dang gzhan don 'bas zhig sgrub pa las rim pa dag na du rang don dang
column2: dra don

column1: <lb n=""N004""/>dang
column2: gzhan don gyi mogs pa 3 du phye bar bshad las
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> lo tsha ba</rs> ni <rs type=""work"">mdo sde rgyan</rs> las
column4: phal cher don med don yod dang
column6: rnaM kun don yod shes bya ste zhes pasi rjes su 'brangs nas chos mchog man chad dang sa dang po nas bdun pa'i bar dang dag pa sa 3 rang don dang dra don dang gzhan don gyi mogs pa zhes bzhed pa ni
column7: 'di nas bya ba 'di ni bsgom pa'i laM zhes pa

column1: <lb n=""N005""/>dang 'galo
column3: </seg>

column1: de na sa 2 pa nas bdun pa'i bar dang bskyad pa dgu pa dang bcu pa la mongs pa 3 rim pa 1 na du bzhag ste
column2: rgyal phra mo tsam yod pa dang de med par rang gzhan mnyaM par rtogs pa dang gzhan don sargryas dang 'dra bar byed pa'i phyir ro
column4: bar skabs kyi dbye ba dang yan lag gi dbye ba'i 'byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ni chung rims nas skye basi rim pas so
column5: </TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-12-11,unreviewed,116a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""116a2""/>yin te
column2: bszadg tshig dang mdo cig gis bstan pa su 'bras yin na dngos po tha dad par gyur pa las 'd nas rdzas 1 du bshad paszeng dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-12-11"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">ma la <note type=""gloss"">bzad pa</note></rs> na re yon tan rdzas 1 nyid bshad tshig gis rgyu sbyor ba las 'byung ldog nas bstan la
column2: </seg>

column1: mdo tshig gis de gang zag gis thob nas bshad pas rgyu sbyor ba yang 'byung ljog dang de gang zag gi thob ldog</TEI>"

1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-295,unreviewed,N004,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N004""/>skabs na yang chos thaMd rmi la dan b'ra ba nyid du blta'o zheso
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-11-295"" status=""unreviewed""> 'grel par bcu b po 'di dag la

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre chen po</rs> na re rmoM lM gyi rtags dang bo saM dang dag pa ste lnga dun 2 kas lnga pa dang bdun pa 32 dang
column2: gnyid ma slog pa'i phyi ma lga yino zhes 'chad do
column3: 2 pa rtse mo'i rtse mo la rtsa bas bstan pa dang
column4: 'grel pas bshad pa'o
column6: </seg>

column1: dang po ni 'jam pa zhes pa ste
column2: </TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012023-09-15-113344,unreviewed,148a9 - 148b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""148a9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012023-09-15-113344"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4580"">blo gros kyi mun pa sel bar byed pa chos kyi sgron ma</rs> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">ri bo gangs can kyi rgyud</rs> du byung pa
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">'bre</rs> rje ?? khri thog bzang gi rigs las gzhon nu la rab tu byung pa
column3: bslab pa la?? spras su byed ba
column4: <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> kyi bstan pa la ma byed pa'i dad pa can?
column6: lung dang rigs pa'i bstan <lb n=""148b1""/> bcos <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4580""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">mngon rtogs rgyan</rs> gyi 'grel pa</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3893"">slob dpon 'od zer mgon po</rs>s sbyar ba rdzogs so
column8: ×  shis par gyur cig
column10: </seg></TEI>"

<rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">daM pa bsngags pa'i snar thang gi dben gnas</rs> <abbr>su</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6458"">ze'u</rs>s phyag dpe las bris shing zhus <abbr>dag go</abbr>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 'khor 'das kyi chos <abbr>thams cad</abbr> blta' ba'i me long</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
lung rigs <lb n=""26a8""/> kyi gzhung 'grel mang du thos shing legs par sbyangs pas tshul <abbr>bzhin</abbr> du rtogs shing
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3854"">rigs par smra ba'i btsun pa blo gros seng ghe</rs>s
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6812"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsod <pb n=""16b""/><lb n=""26b1""/> nams 'bum</rs> gyi don du
nye bar sbyar pas 'di re shig yongs su rdzogs s+ho
column3: <note type=""gloss""><abbr>zhus so</abbr></note></seg></TEI>"

<lg><l>'gro ba'i bla ma rgyal dang rgyal sras <rs type=""person"" ana="""">byams mgon klu sgrub</rs>  rjes 'brang bcas

<l><rs type=""work"">rnam 'grel rgyan</rs> dang <rs type=""work"">rnam nges chos mchog bde byed zla ba</rs>'i lugs [374]pa[a]brgya gya brgyad ༄༅

column2: ming gzhan <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5526"">grub mtha' sna tshogs bshad pa bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i sgron me</rs> 'di ni sngon gyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">slob dpon</rs> dag gi gzhung lugs du ma mthong zhing thos te de dag gsal la ma 'dres par rigs pa dang grol bar smra ba'i spobs pa can <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">yul dbus kyi btsun pa rigs pa'i ral gri</rs>s bkod do
column4: </seg></TEI>"

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5281""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3761"">chos mngon pa'i mdzod</rs> kyi <abbr>rnaM par</abbr> bshad pa slob ma la phan pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di
column2: mdo'i  dang <app><choice>rgyud</choice><orig>rgyu</orig></app> sde mtha' dag la <lb n=""121b2""/> dbang 'byor pas daM pa'i chos 'chad pa dang rtsod pa dang rtsoM pa'i tshul la spobs pa dge' btsan ¦ mi <abbr>'phrogs</abbr> pa'i mkhyen rab dang <abbr>thugs rje</abbr> rmad du byung ba mnga' ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4131""><abbr>ye shes rdo rje</abbr> dpal bzang po</rs> zhes bya ba'i bka' drin las lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid khong du chud pa mang du thos pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4130"">shakya'i dge slong <lb n=""121b3""/> <abbr>blo gros</abbr> grags pa</rs> zhes bgyi bas

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge' ba'i <abbr>bshes gnyen</abbr> mang po</rs>s nan <abbr>chen pos</abbr><!--or ""chen po nas""--> yang dang yang du bskul ba'i ngor du
<hi rendition=""#Time"">shing pho spre'u'i chu stod gyi zla ba'i tshe 1<anchor xml:id=""a3""/></hi> la
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mkhas pa'i skye bo</rs> du ma'i bsti gnas dam pa <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5950"">ra ti dga' ldan gyi chos grags  chen po</rs>r<anchor xml:id=""a4""/> nye bar sbyar ba 'di re shig <lb n=""121b4""/> rdzogs s+ho

column1: 1_009_01_Phya pa_grub mtha_etext.xml,1_009_01,,ex9012024-10-0913-15-03,unreviewed,33b1 - 33b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex9012024-10-0913-15-03"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><pb n=""33b""/><lb n=""33b1""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4505"">bde bar gshegs pa dang phyi rol pa'i gzhung rnam par 'byed pa</rs> zhes bya ba ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">blo gsal zhing rigs par smra ba brtul shugs legs par gnas pa ¦ rang dang gzhan mtha' dag gi gzhung la <lb n=""33b2""/> ma rmongs pa dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5586"">rtog ge la 'bar ba</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""=Tarkajvālā""?><?oxy_comment_end?> dang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">shes rab sgron ma'i gtig</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""=Prajñāpradīpa-ṭīkā""?><?oxy_comment_end?> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">btsun pa spyan ras gzigs</rs> kyis phye ba dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3732"">slob dpon zhi ba mtsho</rs>s sbyar pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tshad ma de kho na bsdus pa</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""=Tattvasaṃgraha""?><?oxy_comment_end?> dang
column3: <lb n=""33b3""/> <rs type=""work"">de'i 'grel pa</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""=Tattvasaṃgrahapañjikā""?><?oxy_comment_end?> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3735"">slob dpon ka ma la shi la</rs>s sbyar ba dang
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3725"">slob dpon zla ba grags pa</rs>'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3726"">dbu ma la 'jug pa</rs>'i gzhung rnams las bsdus ste
column5: legs par sbyar pa rdzogs s+ho
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_05_W1PD89051-v19_img339-374.xml,1_019_05,,ex190522024-11-19-14-11,unreviewed,1b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b4""/>te
column2: gzhan du bris pa bzhin
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex190522024-11-19-14-11"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs> mdzad cing de nyid kyi bla ma <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">gser gling ba</rs>s khyed dbu ma'i bden pa gnyis kyi 'jog lugs cig yi ger bris la skur dang gsung nas mdzad pa yin pas khungs btsun par ni des grub
column2: </seg>

column1: jo bo lta ba dbu ma bzhed pa la bdun chags phyir 'brangs pa'i bsa ba 'du ti</TEI>"

1_019_05_W1PD89051-v19_img339-374.xml,1_019_05,,ex190522024-11-19-14-24,unreviewed,2a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex190522024-11-19-14-24"" status=""unreviewed"">

des ngas 'di skyong ba yin pa la srog gi bar chad du gyur pa 'am tshe'i 'du byed gtong bas <lb n=""2a3""/>khyod la 'di bcol lo byas nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">bla ma gzhan zhig</rs> la gtod pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3827"">dge bshes ston pa</rs> 'da' ba'i dus na gsung ba bzhin du yin pa las
column2: </seg>

column1: de bzhin du gtad pa ma byas na
column2: bla ma de'i bka' lung tshig cig las ma gnang yang
column3: de nyid sgom bla ma la dad gus la brten nas phyag 'tshal mchod pa 'bul</TEI>"

column1: 1_019_05_W1PD89051-v19_img339-374.xml,1_019_05,,ex190522024-11-19-14-35,unreviewed,2a6 - 2a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a6""/>'gro ba yin
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex190522024-11-19-14-35"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3443"">pu to ba</rs>s de na 'dug pa kun la
column2: glang bu bdag pos 'ded 'phro lam du bzhag nas don gnyer du seng na
column3: glang bu de nyid du bslad na bdag po log nas 'ded pa yang srid khyim tshes lasogs pas ngo shes nas 'ded pa yang srid rang gi khyim du phyin te yong
column4: lam las 'khyogs na <lb n=""2a7""/>rkun mas khyer nas bsha' ba yin
column5: </seg>

column1: rang cag kyang glang bu 'ded 'phro la bdag pos bzhag pa dang 'dra ba yin gyis lam las ma 'khyog par cog ge srod cig byas pa la
column2: ma nyan par thams cad lam las 'khyogs nas rkyun mas bsha'
column3: gong me'i phyu gu ma tshar bar ma shi na phyu gu rnams tshang nyid du</TEI>"

column1: 1_019_05_W1PD89051-v19_img339-374.xml,1_019_05,,ex190522024-11-19-14-48,unreviewed,6b7 - 6b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b7""/>gzugs brnyan 'dra ba de la ni
column3: bcos ma bden nyid ji ltar yin
column4: ces pa'i tshul gyis
column5: rgyu dang rkyen nye ba la ltos nas snang ba tsam yin pa'i phyir
column6: dper na me long dang bzhin nye ba tsam la ltos nas snang ba'i gzugs brnyan bzhin no
column7: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex190522024-11-19-14-48"" status=""unreviewed"">

column2: 'dir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">spyang nga</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">rnal 'byor pa chen po</rs> thi ba'i <lb n=""6b8""/>skad la bre mo byung ba'i gtam rgyud kyang gsung
column3: </seg>

column1: tshu rol mthong ba la snang ba nyid la mi mthun par snang ba mang ste
column2: thams cad bden la thams cad kyang brdzun zhes bslab btus chu'i khams brtag pa'i skabs su chu nyid 'chags pa la bar gyi skal pa nyi bu thegs par gsungs pa mdzod dang ma mthun pa</TEI>"

column1: 1_019_05_W1PD89051-v19_img339-374.xml,1_019_05,,ex190522024-11-19-15-01,unreviewed,8a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a4""/>kun rdzob kyi gnas lugs sgyu ma lta bu yin pa de thos shing bsams la yang dang yang du goms par byas na
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex190522024-11-19-15-01"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">gsang phu ba</rs> bzhin du dngos por mngon par zhen pa je srab je srab 'gro zhing
column2: </seg>

column1: mthong ba'i lam skyes yan chad du gnas lugs sgyu ma lta bu mngon su 'gyur ba yin pas de bzhin du lag du blung
column3: don gyi</TEI>"

column1: 1_019_05_W1PD89051-v19_img339-374.xml,1_019_05,,ex19052024-11-19-15-09,unreviewed,13b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19052024-11-19-15-09"" status=""unreviewed"">
dmyigs pa la cu zad <lb n=""13b6""/>gtad bzod na la mar toms kyis langs na rtab 'chos pa dang
column2: snad pa byung ba yang yod la nad lasogs pa lus sems la gnod pa mang du 'byung ba'i nyin yod pas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6689"">dgon pa ba</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">pu to ba</rs> kun mdzad pa bzhin du
column3: </seg>

column1: rgang lag kun brgyang de dag gi tshigs kun yang mnyes bsubs la lus mnyen lugs kyis</TEI>"

1_019_05_W1PD89051-v19_img339-374.xml,1_019_05,,ex19052024-11-19-15-20,unreviewed,14a5 - 14a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""14a5""/>tu du yang skal pa de snyed du thabs kyi cha dag gtsor goms par byas pa yin
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19052024-11-19-15-20"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">dge' bshes gzhon 'byung</rs> <rs type=""place"">ra sgreng</rs> du byon pa'i dus na de la tshe 'di nyid  la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob pa'i man ngag yod zer mi kun yang yod du re nas 'dug pa la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">pu to bas</rs> tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i <lb n=""14a6""/>dngos grub 'thob pa'i skal ba can 1 rang bag gi kha dog 'di 'dra bar mi skye
column3: skye pa rang yang yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po bzo' bo bye brag bcwo brgyad dang rigs pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa lasogs pa yod pa'i sar skye ba yin byas gsung ba ste
column4: </seg>

column1: chos thams cad la go ba bya ba cig khe na ga'</TEI>"

column1: 3_066_04_skyi ston grags pa rgyal mtshan_BCA comm_etext.xml,3_066_04,,ex66042024-09-1615-06-08,unreviewed,81a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex66042024-09-1615-06-08"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">rnyed dka'i sky* 'byor mi lus kyi
snying po len pa'i thabs kyi mchog gyur pa
byang chub sems gnyis spyod tshul lung rigs la
brten nas <lb n=""81a4""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4221"">kyi ston 'jam pa'i dbyangs</rs> kyis bshad
dge ba 'di yis 'gro kun sems bskyed de
byang chub spyod pa'i tshul la legs zhugs pas
tshogs gnyis rgyu chen rgya mtsho'i mthar son nas
column3: sku gsum nor bu'i dpal la spyod par shog
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column3: nyes bshad rnams dor nas
column4: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5733"">dpal ldan <abbr>sa skya</abbr>'i gtsug lag chen po</rs>r sbyar ba'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: <note type=""gloss"">yuM la bstod pa ston pa</note> de nyid <note type=""gloss"">kyi</note> yum gyur gang yin dang

pa sa bcad lo rgyus dang bcas pa dang*/_sha dge slong la spring ba'i sa lam gnyis dang /_sgom chen grags gzhon gyi zhus lan no/_/gsum pa mngon pa'i sde snod la byams pa dang
'grel ba'i chos rnams ji ltar byung ba'i lo rgyus dang /_mngon pa kun las btus kyi ti ka sa bcad dang bcas pa dang*/_kun gzhi rgyan gyi me tog dang /_mngon pa mdzod kyi ti ka
gsum
_sa bcad dang bcas pa dang /_bskal pa rgyan dang /_kri kri'i rmi ltas bcu bstan pa dang /_lta ba thams cad mngon par bshad pas de thams cad bshad pa'i grub mtha' rgyan gyi me
_tog dang /_phyi rol pa'i drang srong rnams kyi ming lta log sum brgya dang bcas pa dang /_phyi nang gnyis kyi 'khor 'das gnyis kyi 'dod tshul slob dpon klu'i byang chub kyis byas pa
bsdus pa dang /_bden bzhi rgyan gyi me tog go_/sde snod gsum ka'i thun mong ba thub pa dgongs rgyan gyi ti ka dang /_rdo rje gdan rgyan dang bsngo ba rgyan gsum mo/_/ phyi rig sde bzhi
sa sa
_la</TEI>"

column1: 1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex801202023-01-2014-39-35,reviewed,1b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex801202023-01-2014-39-35"" status=""reviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773"">slob dpon chos kyi grags pa</rs>s mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tshad ma rnaM par nges pa</rs> 'di la don bzhï <note type=""gloss""><abbr>gsum</abbr></note> ste
column2: bstan bcos rtsom pa'i rgyu dang
column3: rang gi bstan bcos kyi 'bras bu dgos 'brel <note type=""gloss""><abbr>gnyis</abbr> kyis bstan bcos rtsom pa la 'jug pa</note> dang
column4: bstan bcos kyi rang bzhin dang
column5: bstan bcos kyi don nges pas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3771""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3770"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mdo</rs> mdzad pa</rs>'i <choice><sic>dgos</sic><corr>dgongs</corr> </choice> pa nges pa la spro ba bskyed pa'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex8012023-01-2014-49-18,reviewed,2a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8012023-01-2014-49-18"" status=""reviewed""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5534"">dul lha</rs> dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5550"">shan ti pa</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs> ltar na</note> dang po la lnga ste
column3: 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'i rtags dgod pa dang
column4: don las don dang 'dra ba skye ba dang ¦ don yang ming <lb n=""2a5""/> 'brel pa <abbr>med</abbr> pa dang ¦ ming 'dzin <note type=""gloss"">ming snang pa tsaM gyi spyi rigs</note> pa la don dang 'brel <note type=""gloss"">par snang</note> pas khyab pa<note type=""gloss"">s rang gi mtshan nyid kyi ming snang yang <abbr>gsum</abbr> gyis </note>ming don <note type=""gloss"">dang</note> ma 'brel bas don las skye bas <note type=""gloss"">skye basskyes pa la</note><!--TODO check arrow-->ming mi snang pas khyab pa dang
column5: shugs la grub pa <choice><orig>yul la{°}</orig><reg>yul la</reg></choice> ltos pa'i sbyor ba dang ¦ dngos su bstan pa yul can la ltos pa'i sbyor ba <abbr>gnyis kyis</abbr> skabs kyi don bsdu ba dang
column6: sgra don bdag cig kyang don las skye ba la ming mi snang pas khyab pa dang
column7: zhar la rnaM rtog srid pa'i yul yid kyi rnaM shes yin pa'o</seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex8012023-01-2014-55-54,reviewed,2a7 - 2b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8012023-01-2014-55-54"" status=""reviewed""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs>s de yan chad kyis don gyi mthu skyes kyi rjes 'gro'i khyab <choice><orig>(pa bshad)</orig><reg>pa bshad</reg></choice> zin nas de'i ldog ston gsung ste de ltar na khyab pa grub pa na sgrub bya grubs du 'gyur bas 'di <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">chos mchog</rs> ltar </note> sgra spyi <choice><orig>mi‹ng›</orig><reg>ming</reg></choice> snang pa dgag pa la lnga ste
<note type=""gloss"">'di rtag pa rang rgyud du byed kyang rgyas thal gyur du byas so</note>'dod pa ma gnod pa'i thal 'gyur bstan pa dang
column2: brjod pa snang pa brda dran pa la ltos pas 'bras bu'i rtsa ba'i thal 'gyur gyi khyab pa sgrub pa dang
column3: 'dod pa la gnod <pb n=""2b""/><lb n=""2b1""/> thal 'gyur gyi khyab pa sgrub pa dang
column4: de'i 'dod pa la gnod pa'i thal ba dang
column5: bzlog pa'i rtags kyis rtsa ba'i sgrub bya sgrub pa'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex8012023-02-2415-18-33,reviewed,5b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b4""/> sgrub byed<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex8012023-02-2415-18-33"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">
lung tshad ma dgag pa la <abbr>gsum</abbr><note type=""gloss"">gsum<abbr>bzhi</abbr></note> ste
column2: skyes bu'i lung dgag pa dang
column3: rig byed dgag pa dang
column4: <note type=""gloss"">gsum</note> sgra kun rang gi don la tshad mas dgag <note type=""gloss"">dang
column5: don bsdu</note><note type=""gloss"">gsung</note> pa'o
column7: <!--TODO anonymous citation without mention of a named or unnamed person--></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex8012023-01-3110-23-53,reviewed,7a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex8012023-01-3110-23-53"">

<lb n=""7a4""/><abbr>gnyi</abbr> ga la rigs pa'i gnod pa la <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5549"">shag kya blo</rs> <note type=""gloss"">'i <abbr>rjes su</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs></note> <abbr>lasogs</abbr> pa ltar na</note> <abbr>gnyis ste</abbr>
column2: spyir bstan pa dang ¦ dpe la sbyar ba <abbr>gnyis kyis</abbr> mngon suM gyis gnod pa dang
column3: 'thad pas gnod pa'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex8012023-01-2015-15-29,reviewed,13b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""13b3""/> dpe dang

column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_038_03_ bSam gtan bzang po_me tog phreng rgyud kyi TIk+ka legs bshad rgya mtsho.xml,2_038_03,,ex38032023-09-181,unreviewed,102a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex38032023-09-181"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""102a4""/> <rs type=""person"" ana="""">dgra bcom pa chen po sa ga'i lha</rs>s <?oxy_comment_start comment=""Visakhadeva, P7673""?><?oxy_comment_end?><anchor xml:id=""a1""/> mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4735"">'dul ba'i bstan bcos me tog phreng rgyud kyi TI ka bla ma'i legs bshad rgya cher bshad pa legs bshad rgya mtsho</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4123"">bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa dka' bzhi pa shes rab seng ge</rs>'i <anchor xml:id=""a2""/> gsung la [b]rten nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4005"">mang du thos pa bsaM <lb n=""102a5""/> gtan bzang po</rs>s rnam g.yengs spang te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">ston pa </rs>myang ngan las 'das nas <hi rendition=""#Time"">lo sum stong bzhi brgya dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa'i dus</hi> su
column2: <hi rendition=""#Time"">gdong ngan gyi lo sa ga'i dkar phyogs tshes brgyad<anchor xml:id=""a3""/> </hi>la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs>r rdzogs par sbyar ba'o

column1: 'di la brten nas sems cad thams cad kyis blang dor gyi gnas rtogs nas
column2: 'jug ldog phyin ci ma log par byas te rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sar bsgrod par gyur cig
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3829"">pu to ba</rs> yan blo sbyong chen po dang ka
column5: gcig?
column6: de nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4104"">glang thang ba<anchor xml:id=""a5""/></rs> × <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4156"">dgyal pa chos 'bar<anchor xml:id=""a6""/></rs> × <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3874"">'chad kha ba {ye shes rdo rje </rs>P3447}<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3859""> se spyil phu ba {chos kyi rgyal mtshan </rs>P3448}× <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""><!--TODO person ID in APIS-->lha chen po {Lha chen lung gi dbang phyug</rs> P3449<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4048"">} lha 'gro mgon {Lha 'gro ba'i mgon po</rs> P4137<rs type=""person"" ana="""">}<anchor xml:id=""a7""/></rs>× <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3977"">mchims namkha' grags</rs>
