column1: 3_067_02_BCA_W1PD153536-I1KG13956.xml,3_067_02,,ex67022024-09-1610-30-07,unreviewed,122a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex67022024-09-1610-30-07"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">'di ni <lb edRef=""inst:4711"" n=""122a5""/>bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyis sde snod du ma'i don thugs su chud cing yon tan du ma'i dpal 'byor gyis 'gro ba mang po'i 'dren pa chen por gyur mang po'i 'dren pa chen por gyur pa yongs kyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge ba'i <lb edRef=""inst:5152"" n=""73a5""/>bshes gnyen mkhan po nam <lb edRef=""inst:4711"" n=""122a6""/>mkha' ches</rs> dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mkhan po zhang chos rgyal rin chen</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mkhan po byams pa'i dpal</rs> lasogs pa slob ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang pos gsol ba btab pa'i ngor
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4068"">shAkya'i dge slong skad gnyis <lb edRef=""inst:4711"" n=""122a7""/>smra ba blo gros dpal bzang po</rs>s gtso bo che par <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mkhas pa chen po shes rab 'byung gnas <lb edRef=""inst:5152"" n=""73a6""/>blo gros</rs> gyi 'grel pa dang bstun gsal bar bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5802"">dge slong ston pa brtson 'grus seng ge</rs>'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_11_Shes rab 'bum_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa.xml,1_019_11,,ex19112024-09-1013-25-17,reviewed,15b2 - 15b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b2""/>nan tan du goms par byas pas thun mong mchog gi dngos grub myur du mngon du byed par gsungs s+ho
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19112024-09-1013-25-17"" status=""reviewed""> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4616"">dpal ldan dus 'khor <lb n=""15b3""/>bde stong gnyis med kyi
column5: bsgrub thabs mdor bsdus rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa</rs>
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">shakya'i dge slong chos grub dpal</rs> dang ni
column8: grogs <lb n=""15b4""/> mchog dga' yis <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4608"">bdag</rs> la legs bskul phyir
column10: snyigs ma'i dus na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rgyal ba gnyis pa</rs>'i tshul
column12: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3905"">kun spangs chos rje</rs>'i gsung bzhin <lb n=""15b5""/> rang bzo'i
column14: dri ma med pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4608"">shes rab</rs> ming can gyis
column16: legs par bris la nyes nongs bzod par gsol
column18: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_11_Shes rab 'bum_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa.xml,1_019_11,,ex19112023-09-15-125911,reviewed,15b7 - 16a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19112023-09-15-125911"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<lb n=""15b7""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4616"">dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
column2: dpal rdo rje <pb n=""16a""/><lb n=""16a1""/>'dzin pa gnyis pa dpal ldan <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3905"">bla ma dam pa kun spangs pa chen po</rs> <note type=""gloss"">thugs rje rtson khrus</note>'i zhabs kyi rdul dri ma med pa spyi bos len pa
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4608"">shakya'i dge slong shes <lb n=""16a2""/>rab 'bum bdag</rs> gis bla ma dam pa nyid kyi phyag len bzhin
column4: bla ma dam pa'i gsung dang gdams pa la brten nas <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5654"">dpal <note type=""gloss"">byo°°</note>nags rgyal gyi dben gnas dkar leb</rs> du sbyar <lb n=""16a3""/>ba 'di yongs su rdzogs s+ho
column8: dge'o
column10: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_11_Shes rab 'bum_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa.xml,1_019_11,,ex19112023-09-15-125912,reviewed,16a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16a3""/>ba 'di yongs su rdzogs s+ho
column5: dge'o
column7: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19112023-09-15-125912"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5626"">shakya'i btsun pa nyi ma rgyal mtshan</rs> gyi dpe'o
column8: dag go
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502_10502023_05_022,reviewed,1a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502_10502023_05_022"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gro lung pa</rs>'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4473"">bstan rim chen mo'i don bsdu</rs>'am <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4473"">lam rim</rs> bzhugs so
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1011-29-41,reviewed,3b6 - 3b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b6""/> gnyen ni
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1011-29-41""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s chos bzhi dang ldan pa la brten dgos par gsungs te
column4: mkhas pas lta ba khyad du mi gsod pa
column5: <lb n=""3b7""/> btsun pas tshul khrims khyad du mi gsod pa
column7: tshe 'di don du mi gnyer ba
column8: byang chub don gnyer ba'o
column10: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502_2024-08-3013-38-05,reviewed,3b7 - 3b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b7""/> btsun pas tshul khrims khyad du mi gsod pa
column3: tshe 'di don du mi gnyer ba
column4: byang chub don gnyer ba'o
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502_2024-08-3013-38-05"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">rje btsun sgam po pa</rs>'i <lb n=""3b8""/> zhal nas
column8: chos gsum dang ldan par gsungs te
column10: <quote>shes rab chen pos gzhan gyis lam sna 'khrid pa
column11: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa
column13: tshe 'di la ltos pa ma mchis pa'o
column15: </quote><!--Source=sGam po pa gsung 'bum'-->

column1: </seg></TEI>"
1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502_2024-08-3013-39-04,reviewed,3b8 - 4a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b8""/> zhal nas
column3: chos gsum dang ldan par gsungs te
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502_2024-08-3013-39-04"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5639"">bla ma rin po che</rs> yis
column7: <quote>gsol ba 'debs pa'i bla ma'i mtshan nyid ni <pb n=""4a""/><lb n=""4a1""/>gang gi drin gyis bde chen nyid
column9: skad cig nyid la 'char ba gang
column11: bla ma rin chen lta bu'i sku
column13: rdo rje can zhabs pad la 'dud
column15: </quote><!--Source=dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus--></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-19072023-05-24,reviewed,4b8 - 5a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b8""/>yin gyi chos dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa dang*
column2: _nyon mongs pa dbri bar byed pa yin gyi 'phel bar byed pa ma yin pa dang
column3: _mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu dang phan yon bstan pa yin gyi
column4: _'khor ba'i rgyu dang phan yon ston pa ma yin no
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-19072023-05-24"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i zhal nas
column7: <quote> <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> <pb n=""5a""/><lb n=""5a1""/> dngos bzhugs tsam na bla ma dkon mchog bzhi pa yin
column8: sangs rgyas 'das nas 'khor dag yod tsam na bla ma de sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa yin
column9: da lta sangs rgyas las lhag pa yin gsung ste
column10: de la rgyu mtshan gsum sangs rgyas thams cad <lb n=""5a2""/>kyi 'phrin las bsdus pa yin pas na bla ma de sangs rgyas las lhag
column11: snyigs ma lnga'i dus su skyob pas bla ma sangs rgyas las lhag
column12: byang chub kyi lam dngos su ston pas bla ma sangs rgyas las lhag go
column13: de ltar yin pa yang
column14: tshogs chen po yis <lb n=""5a3""/>lung ston dpal la phyag 'tshal lo
column16: sems can nyam thag gnas nas 'don la
column18: dngos su ston cing dri ma bral la bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo
column20: </quote> zhes <abbr>gsungs so</abbr>
column22: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-2023-05-342,reviewed,5a5 - 5a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a5""/>de la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed pa'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-2023-05-342"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4182"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge bshes stod lung pa</rs>'i zhal nas
column4: nga la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed cig byas na
column5: khyed kyis rgas su khyod la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed na dang khyod dga' ste
column7: bskyed la bzhag gi sems pa srid de ma skyed na yang ma skyes <lb n=""5a6""/>su la gnod lta ba yin gsung skad de de mad pa yin gsung
column9: de bas na bla ma la sangs rgyas dngos kyi 'du shes gsha' ma gcig skyes na gnas skabs dang mthar <abbr>thug gis</abbr> yon tan gong ma kun 'byung ba'o
column11: de la sgrub pa'i bsnyen bkur ni
column12: nyon mongs pa <lb n=""5a7""/> dang nyes spyod spongs pa dang
column13: dge ba la brtson pa gnyis yin te
column15: de ltar ma byas na bla ma'i bka' bcag pa yin gsung ngo
column17: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-19072023-05-39,reviewed,5a7 - 5a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a7""/> dang nyes spyod spongs pa dang
column2: dge ba la brtson pa gnyis yin te
column4: de ltar ma byas na bla ma'i bka' bcag pa yin gsung ngo
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-19072023-05-39"" status=""reviewed"">de ltar yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3747"">mgon po byams pa</rs>'i zhal nas

column1: <quote><lg>
<l>bkur sti rnyed pa dag dang rim gro dang
<l> sgrub pa'i sgo nas bshes gnyen bsten par bya
</lg></quote>
<lb n=""5a8""/>zhes gsungs so
column3: </seg>

column1: de ltar bla ma la gus pa'i phan yon la gnyis te
column2: _grangs su chad pa dang
column3: _ma chad pa'o

column1: grangs su chad pa la bdun
column2: _bla ma la bsten cing gus na 'jig rten gyi kha na ma tho ba gzhan gyi skur ba 'debs pa mi 'byung ba dang*
column3: _sngar byas pa'i sdig pa</TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022024-08-3013-21-41,reviewed,5b2 - 5b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b2""/>gong du 'phel ba dang*
column2: _'jig rten phyi ma la byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i bla ma rnams dang mjal ba dang*
column3: _bla mas zin pa ni phyin chad ngan song gsum du nam yang mi skye ba dang*
column4: _<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022024-08-3013-21-41"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5639"">dpal nA ro pa</rs>s <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5641"">tI lo pa</rs>'i phyag phyir lo bcu gnyis 'brangs nas
column5: dka' ba bcu gnyis <lb n=""5b3""/>spyad pas dngos grub thob pa bzhin du
column7: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub rnams ma bsgrubs kyang thob bo
column9: <abbr>grangs su</abbr> ma chad pa ni
column10: <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> kyi <abbr>yon tan</abbr> mtha' med pa bla ma la brten te 'byung bas bgreng bar mi lang ba'o
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022024-08-3008,reviewed,6a2 - 6a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a2""/>byed pa dang ma bral ba la don 'dod pa'i thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022024-08-3008"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5639"">nA ro pa</rs>s <quote>ri rab gser gyi ngos <lb n=""6a3""/>la bya gnas pa
column5: rang gi rang bzhin dor nas gser du snang zhes so
column7: </quote></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-11252023-05-22,reviewed,9b5 - 9b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9b5""/> du 'chi ba yin bsam pa'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-11252023-05-22"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">rje sgam po pa</rs>'i zhal nas kyang
column4: <quote> 'chi ba sgom pa ni dang por gal che ste
column5: chos la 'jug pa'i <lb n=""9b6""/>  rgyu yin
column7: bar du gal che ste brtson 'grus kyi lcag yin
column8: tha mar gal che ste chos kyi sku gsal 'debs yin

column1: </quote> ces <abbr>gsungs so</abbr>
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1912-16-00,reviewed,23a5 - 23a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""23a5""/>la ni<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-16-00"" status=""reviewed"">khyad par la 'dod lugs mang yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i <lb n=""23a6""/>bzhed kyis smon pa ni 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba yin la 'jug pa ni rgyu la dam 'cha' ba'o
column3: de'i go ba ni / smon pa 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba ni
column4: 'bras bu gzhan don du <lb n=""23a7""/>byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rgyu bya chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la bslab par bya'o zhes dam 'cha' ba'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1912-20-07,reviewed,23a7 - 23b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""23a7""/>byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rgyu bya chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la bslab par bya'o zhes dam 'cha' ba'o
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-20-07"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">kho bo</rs>s ni gzhung bltas na 'di ltar go ste
column3: gzhan don du byang chub thob <lb n=""23a8""/> par 'dod pa ni smon pa yin la
column4: gzhan don du byang chub thob par 'dod pa 'i don du bslab pa la slom par 'dod pa 'jug pa yin
column5: de yang bslab pa la slob par 'dod pa rkyang pa ni ma yin te
column6: byang chub ni ched du bya ba'i dmigs pa yin la
column7: bslab pa ni dngos kyi dmigs pa yin pas
column8: <pb n=""23b""/><lb n=""23b1""/> gnyis ka thob pa dang slob par 'dod pa'o
column10: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3743"">slob dpon zhi ba lha</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i bzhed pa yang de ltar yin par go
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1912-29-59,reviewed,24b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-29-59"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""> rten gyi gang zag <lb n=""24b7""/> ni chos drug dang ldan te
column2: theg pa chen po'i chos la dad cing mos pa dang
column3: thob shing shes pa dang
column4: rigs dang ldan pa dang
column5: bla ma la gus pa dang
column6: smon pa brten pa dang
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i lugs kyi so so thar pa rigs bdun gang rung gcig dang ldan pa'o

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-12422023-05-22,reviewed,25a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""25a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-12422023-05-22"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s de'i steng du snying rje dang bsnan pas chos bzhi ldan 'dod de
column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3744"">lam sgron</rs> las

column1: <quote>  <lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve"">sdom pa'i cho ga la mkhas dang
column2: bdag nyid gang zhig sdom la gnas
column3: sdom pa 'bogs bzod snying rjer ldan
column4: bla ma bzang por shes par bya

column1: </lg></quote>
zhes gsungs so
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1913-00-24,reviewed,29b6 - 29b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""29b6""/> pa la ltos te
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1913-00-24"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> na re
column3: snum khur dang
column4: dbyugs pa'i rigs pas so so thar pa'i thun mong ba bzhi yang
column5: de bzhi don gyi go bar 'gyur te
column6: rnyed dang bkur sti la chags pas
column7: bdag la bstod cing <lb n=""29b7""/> gzhan la smod pa dang
column8: ser snas bdag gi nor gzhan la ma byin pa dang
column9: khros pas gzhan la tshogs pa dang
column10: rmongs pas chos ltar bcos par smra na yang ltung ba 'gyur na
column11: rim pa bzhin du chags pas mi tshangs par spyod pa dang
column12: gzhan gyi nor brkus <lb n=""29b8""/>pa dang
column13: gzhan gyi srog gcod pa dang
column14: brdzun du smra ba rnams lta smos su yang med do
column16: zhes gsungs pa de ni rigs so <choice><corr>gsungs so</corr><sic>gsungs ngo</sic></choice>
column18: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1913-04-36,reviewed,31a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""31a5""/>rab bo
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1913-04-36"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> kun rdzob shes pa'i shes rab dang
column4: don dam shes pa'i shes rab bo
column6: tha mi dad pa shes pa'i shes rab la yang 'dod do
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-2023-05-34,reviewed,31b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""31b1""/> zhes gsungs so
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-2023-05-34"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s ni

column1: <quote>   <lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve"">lnga po thabs yin la
column2: shes rab dang gnyis su 'dod do
column4: de yang shes rab pha rol phyin spangs pa'i
column6: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin la sogs
column8: dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad dag
column10: rgyal ba rnams kyi thabs su bshad

column1: </lg></quote>
zhes gsungs so
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1913-24-02,reviewed,33a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""33a2""/>snyan par smra ba dang don spyod pa chos kyi sbyin pa'i nang du 'dus
column2: _don mthun pas bsdu ba mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa'i nang du 'dus so
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1913-24-02"" status=""reviewed"">   <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
column4: sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims kyi dngos gzhi yin zhes zer ro
column6: </seg>

column1: nyams su ji ltar blang</TEI>"
1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-19072023-05-36,reviewed,35b3 - 35b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""35b3""/>ba bzhin
column3: stong pa nyid kyi don de dag_
column4: bshad pas ro ni myong mi 'gyur
column6: gang zhig dkyil 'khor btud bsgoms na
column8: rang _rig _de la skye bar 'gyur
column10: zhes _gsungs so
column12: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-19072023-05-36"" status=""reviewed"">  de yang thabs shes rab zung du 'grel dgos pa ni
column13: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s
column14: thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab dang
column15: shes rab dang <lb n=""35b4""/>bral thabs dag kyang
column16: gang phyir 'ching pa zhes gsungs pa
column17: de bas gnyis ka spang mi bya
column18: zhes pa ste
column19: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1912-45-04,reviewed,35b5 - 35b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""35b5""/>ba'i thabs ni 'ching ba'o
column3: shes rab dang bcas pa'i thabs ni thar pa'o
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-45-04"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5644""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5640"">grub chen sa ra ha</rs>s mdzad pa'i do ha</rs> las
<quote><lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve"">snying rje dang bral stong pa nyid zhugs gang
column3: des ni lam mchog rnyed pa ma yin no
column5: 'on te snying rje 'ba' zhig bsgoms na yang
column7: <lb n=""35b6""/>'khor ba 'di las thar pa thob mi 'gyur
column9: gang yang gnyis po sbyor bar nus pa des
column11: 'khor bar mi gnas mya ngan 'das mi gnas

column1: </lg></quote>
zhes pa'o
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-11552023-05-22,reviewed,40a3 - 40a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40a3""/>las ;; 'bras bu sku gsuM bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-11552023-05-22"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4474"">thub pa'i bstan la rims kyis 'jug pa'i tshul</rs>
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bla ma</rs>'i gsungs dang lung la bstan nas bris
column9: de las byung ba'i dge ba gang thob des
column11: 'gro rnams log pa'i lam du mi 'gro zhing
column13: yang dag laM zhugs sku <lb n=""40a4""/> gsum thob par shog
column15: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-1262023-05-22,reviewed,40a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40a4""/> gsum thob par shog
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-1262023-05-22"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">bdag</rs> kyang <rs type=""deity"">thub pa</rs>'i bstan pa rgyas byed cing
column5: yang dag lam zhugs sku gsum thob nas kyang
column7: lhun grub rgyun chad med pa'i 'phrin las kyis
column9: nam mkha' mnyam pa'i 'gro ba sgrol bar shog
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5004-12512023-05-23,reviewed,40a4 - 40a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40a4""/> gsum thob par shog
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5004-12512023-05-23"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4474"">sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rims kyis 'jug pa'i tshul</rs> <lb n=""40a5""/> lam <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4474"">blo sbyong</rs> 'am <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4474"">lam rim</rs> zhes bya ba ni<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">gro lung pa blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> <choice><corr>kyis</corr><sic>kyi</sic></choice><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4332"">gsang phu</rs>r sbyar ba'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml,2_045_02,,ex45022024-09-1110-23-42,unreviewed,3a5 - 3a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a5""/>yang tshad ma la dbye na : rang las nges kyi tshad ma dang
column2: gzhan las nges kyi tshad ma 2.<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45022024-09-1110-23-42"" status=""unreviewed"">yul de la rang las nges kyi tshad ma'i mtshan nyid : yul de la tshad ma yin par rang stobs kyi nges shes de ma thag tu 'dren pa'i tshad ma.mtshan gzhi ni : <quote source=""RT 8"" n="""">don rig 2 dang rang rig dang ; rjes su dpag pa rang las nges</quote> (RT VIII 64ab) zhes pa dang <quote source=""RT 8"" n="""">don byed pa dang goms pa can
column3: rjes su dpag pas nges par byed
column4: </quote> (RT VIII 65ab) zhes <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs <lb n=""3a6""/>gter</rs> las bshad pa dang
column5: rnal 'byor mngon sum yang yin no
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml,2_045_02,,ex45022024-09-1110-23-422,unreviewed,3a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a6""/>gter<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45022024-09-1110-23-422"" status=""unreviewed"">yul de la gzhan las nges kyi tshad ma'i mtshan nyid : yul de la tshad ma yin cing yul de la tshad ma yin par rang stobs kyi nges shes de ma thag tu 'dren pa ma yin pa :
mtshan gzhi ni : <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> las : <quote source=""RT 8"" n="""">dang po ba dang yid ma gtad
column3: 'khrul rgyu can rnams gzhan la nges
column4: </quote> (RT VIII.64cd) zhes so
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml,2_045_02,,ex45022023-09-19,unreviewed,9a5 - 9a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a5""/> dang de la yod pa'i dug dang zas de yun du bde ba'i rgyu min ltar<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45022023-09-19"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (9a5--9a6)]""/>

las dang po pa la nye bar mkho ba <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4773"">tshad ma'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa rigs pa'i sgo 'byed pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5911"">mdar btsun pa rin chen bzang po</rs>s yang dang yang du bskul ba'i ngor dang ¦ gzhan yang shes ldan 'ga' res bskul <abbr>ba'i phyir </abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5910"">shakya'i <lb n=""9a6""/>btsun pa sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan</rs> gis go bde <abbr>ba'i phyir</abbr> du lung dang <abbr>rigs</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> sgo nas dgag gzhag dang skyon gyi gcod tshul phra mo rnaMs re shig bzhag nas ding sang gi <abbr>rtog ge</abbr> pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyi brda cha‹d› dang mthun par <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5697"">dben gnas brag dkar</rs> du sbyar ba rdzogs s+ho
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_020_chu_mig_phar_phyin_tig.xml,X_020,,exX202024-09-1811-03-222,unreviewed,1a1 - 1a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX202024-09-1811-03-222"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">  <lb n=""1a1""/>Pa <!--volume-->
<lb n=""1a2""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5871"">phar phyin chu tik</rs> bzhugs
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6036"">thang bla brang pa</rs>'i dpe'
column4: <!--different hand-->

column1: <lb n=""1a3""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5871"">Tik chen lung don rnaM gzigs</rs> zhes pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">gtsang chu mig pa seng ge dpal</rs> gyis mdzad pa bzhugs so
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_020_chu_mig_phar_phyin_tig.xml,X_020,,exX202024-09-1811-03-223,unreviewed,N008,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX202024-09-1811-03-223"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">    rgya che zab pa'i mdo sde pha cher  dang
byams chos rigs pa'i tshogs dang sde lnga
sdom rnams 2 dang +brdjod dang+ yum mdo'i 'grel ¦
<lb n=""N008""/>logs par 'thong nas <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5870"">lung don rnam gzigs</rs> 'di
mi 'pham 'gon dang klu la dbang bsgyur dang
phyogs las rgyal dang rnams 'grel mdzad pa ste
kun gyi gzhung lugs 'dzin pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db.4018"">chu mig pa</rs>s
<rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">chen po'i pho brang dge pa'i gnas</rs> su sbyar
column3: </seg>

column2: legs bshad 'di la</TEI>"

column1: X_020_chu_mig_phar_phyin_tig.xml,X_020,,exX202024-09-1811-03-22,unreviewed,208a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX202024-09-1811-03-22"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
chen po rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi por blangs ste
column2: mang du thos pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol du phyin pa'i don dang
column3: mdo dang dgongs 'gro ba mdzad pa'i gzhung lugs sangs che ba 'thong pa'i don la yangs pa

column1: <lb n=""208a3""/>las byung pa'i shes rab kyis
column3: legs par bstan la phabs pa'i don zab pa pa dang rgya che ba bston par byed pa 'di
column5: lung dang rigs pa'i don la dbang phyug du rgyur pa
column8: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db.4018"">shakya'i dge slong rtsang chu mig pa sang ge <note type=""gloss"">dpal</note> bzang po</rs> <note type=""gloss"">gyis</note> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug khang</rs> du legs par sbyar pa'o
column10: </seg>
column16: </TEI>"

column1: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2411-54-04,reviewed,3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3""/>@@
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012023-07-2411-54-04"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4588""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos</rs> kyi nges don gsal bar byed pa rin po che'i sgron me</rs> bzhugs s+hO
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2411-54-05,reviewed,1 - 2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1""/> OM swasti sidhaM ×<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012023-07-2411-54-05"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4588""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa <abbr>chen po</abbr> rgyud <abbr>bla ma'i</abbr> bstan bcos</rs> kyi nges pa'i don gsal bar byed pa <abbr>rin po che'i</abbr> sgron me</rs> <lb n=""2""/> zhes bya ba
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column5: gang la srid dang mya ngan 'das 'phro ba
column7: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa yi
column9: yid bzhin nor 'dra'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo
column11: zhes pa dang 'gal lo
column13: </seg>

column1: yang</TEI>"

1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2412-29-35,unreviewed,2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2""/> zhes bya ba
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012023-07-2412-29-35"" status=""unreviewed"">        de la 'khor lo chen po bzhi ni
column3: _<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon</rs> gyi <rs type=""work"">springs yig</rs> las
column4: _mthun par gyur pa'i yul du gnas pa dang
column6: skyes bu dam pa la ni brten pa dang
column8: bdag gis legs smon sngon yang bsod nams bgyis
column10: 'khor lo chen po bzhi ni khyod la mnga'
column12: zhes gsungs pa'o
column14: </seg>

column1: gal te sems can thams cad rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal la skyo ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i don la 'dun pa la sogs pa dang 'gyur la des na mthar thams cad mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur te
column2: _theg pa gsum gyi gang zag bzhin no zhe na
column3: _ci sa bon myu gu bskyed pa'i nus pa yod na thams cad kyis de ltar 'gyur ram
column4: _des na sems can thams cad rigs dang ldan pas rnam par dag pa'i skal ba can yin yang thar pa thob pa rkyen la ltos pas phyir rkyen dang phrad na thar par 'gyur gyi ma 'phrad na mi 'gyur ro
column6: mdo las
column7: _thog med gyur kyang tha ma dang ldan pa
column9: rang bzhin gyis dag rtag pa'i chos can ni
column10: </TEI>"

column1: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2412-32-11,unreviewed,2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2""/> zhes bya ba
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012023-07-2412-32-11"" status=""unreviewed"">bzhi pa ni
column3: _mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las
column5: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can
column7: zhes gsungs pas de la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pa</rs> ni ngo bo nyid la sogs pa sngar gyi bzhi po dang bya ba thams cad thugs su chud cing sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i bya ba grub pa'i ye shes la ye shes kyi sku zhes bya ste lngar bzhed do
column9: </seg>

column1: gnyis pa nges pa'i don ngos gzung ba la
column2: _sku gnyis su rnam par bzhag pa ni
column3: _gzugs sku gcig tu bsdus par zad kyi don la 'phags pa ma pham pas gsum du mdzad pa dang mthun no
column5: gsum du bzhag pa ni ma yin te

column1: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2412-33-39,unreviewed,2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2""/> zhes bya ba

column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2412-33-38,unreviewed,2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2""/> zhes bya ba
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012023-07-2412-33-38"" status=""unreviewed"">  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen</rs> ni dka' ba spyod pa'i tshe rnam par smin pa'i sku de nyid du bzhag nas sprul pa'i skus 'og min du song ste der sangs rgyas nas slar yang sngar gyi sku la bzhugs te
column3: _byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la sogs pa mdzad pas dang po bdun byang chub sems dpa'i yin la phyi ma lnga sangs rgyas kyi yin par 'dod de
column4: _theg pa chen po ba phal cher gyis thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yin par bzhed do
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column2: skyes bu mkhas pa'i <abbr>tshogs</abbr> kyis brten pa'i bsti <lb n=""6""/> gnas dpal <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">gsang phu ne'u thog gi chos gra <abbr>chen po</abbr></rs>r sbyar ba'o

gur thang rtsug lag <lb n=""89a9""/>khang chen</rs> x 'di sbyar x rdzogs

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-10-0914-17-461,,2a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10012024-10-0914-17-461"">la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen</rs> ni
column2: <hi rendition=""#TibetanView"">yul gang la dgos pa gang gi don du
column3: tshul ji ltar phyag 'tshal ba ste
column4: chos gsuM gyis khyad par du byas nas phyag 'tshal ba ston pa ste
column5: tshig gcig dang
column6: phye dang gsuM dang
column7: phyed kyis rim pa bzhin ston pa yin no</hi> zhes bzhed do
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-03,unreviewed,2a1 - 2a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-03"">
yan lag gi rten la shes rab ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">jo bo 'buM</rs> <lb n=""2a2""/> pa ni <rs type=""school"">dbu ma sgyu ma lta bu</rs> dang
column2: <rs type=""school"">rab du mi gnas pa</rs> gnyis kyi don shes pa ste

column1: dang po ni bden pa'i chos kyis stong ba yin la
column2: gnyis pa ni snang ba tsaM du yang mi gnas pa yin no
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-04,unreviewed,2a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a3""/>ma blangs na skur 'debs kyi mthar ltung la
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-04"">des na shes rab ni don ma shes pa
column3: don dam pa'i <rs type=""school"">rab du mi gnas pa</rs> dang
column4: <rs type=""school"">sgyu ma lta bu</rs> ni 'o zhes 'chad pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i dgongs pa ma yin no
column6: <note type=""gloss"">°°° dbu ma nyid °°°</note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-55,unreviewed,N003,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N003""/>mkhas pa bzhi'i bstan chos las shes so zhes ston pa ni
column2: 'gro la chags pas zhes bya ba logs pa'o
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-55""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> ltar na khyod bshad par dam bcas nas bstan chos 'chad na
column5: bstan chos kyi brjod bya mngon par rtogs pa thaMd nyams su myong nas saM
column6: 'on te bla ma do pa'i bdang gag la brten nas 'chad
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-292,unreviewed,40b5 - N006,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40b5""/>do zer ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-292""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> dang <rs type=""person"">mda'</rs> na re sa bcu pa'i dkyil stodg la yod pa yin te
column4: de byang ghub se+Ms dpa'i mngon rtogs yin pas so
column6: des na sa bcu pa'i stong la rnaM kun
column7: dkyil la rtse mo
column9: smad la mthar gyis pa
column10: tha ma la skad cig ma zer ro

column1: de dag gis 'di snyaM du phyir rtse mo brtan par byed pa mthar gyis pa yin no zhes bshad pas
column2: dnes mhu gyun gyi tha mang pa byas na mthar gyis pa'i

column1: <lb n=""N006""/>brtan byar ma 'thad de
column2: de la rim pa med pa dang
column3: de'i gong na laM gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bsaMs pa yin no
column5: de rnaMs ni mi rigs ste
column6: </seg>rtso mo mthar gyis pas brtan par byed pa ni ma yin phyi
column7: bstan pa ni skad cig ma yin la
column8: de'i don du mthar gyis pa sgoM pa la brtan par bya ba'i phyir sgo zhes gsungs pa yin no
column10: des na 'di sa bcu gyun gyi tha ma la bzhag pa la nyes pa ci yang med la</TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-293,unreviewed,49a6 - 49a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""49a6""/>po zhes pa ni
column2: sbyin pa dang ldan pa ni mthong ba'i laM gyi spyod yul can yin la
column3: tshul khimsa dang ldan pa lasogs pa dbu ni skaM pa'i loM gyi rten can no
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-293"">°°°°° zhes pa la
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">mda'</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> na re
column8: sa bcu'i yin te
column9: sa dang po thab ma cag la sbyin pa dang ldan pa
column10: de shogs byung pa khyad par can la mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa lasogs pa yin <lb n=""49a7""/>no
column12: de bzhin du sa bcu pa'i bar du sbyar ro zhes zer ro
column14: de ni seng ge bzang po'i 'dod pa ma yin te
column15: des don gyi go rims su bshad pas de lta  go rims 'khrugs par 'gyur bas so
column17: </seg>

column1: des na lnga po ni sa bcu pa'i khyad par myi laM la bya'o skad do
column3: ses pas ces pa gsu ni sto ba dang so nga hi rang a mi o pas rtas kyis spas asa zhes pa ni
column4: 'phags pas khyad par gyi</TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-10-0915-20-12,unreviewed,69a2 - 69a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""69a2""/>lau sdu'i 'o
column3: gsuM pa ni bzod pa cung du'i rnaM pa'i khyad par ro
column5: don daM pa'i bden pa'i chos nyid rnaM par byed pa nes 'byed lhag ma dbu'o
column7: 'di la shes rab 'byung gnas kyisg snga ma snga ma'i rnaM pa byi ma khyi ma 'i dmigs pa'i khyad par du bshad pa ni khegs so
column9: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-10-0915-20-12"">gnyis pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> na re dmigs pa dang rnaM pa mi ldta' pa' di dag kyang rjes thob kyis bsdus pa yin par 'thad de
column10: mnyaM par bzhag pa'i tshe ni tshad du chos kyi dbyes kyi rnaM

column1: <lb n=""69a3""/>pa can nyid do
column3: 'on kyang rjes kyis mtshon nas 'di ltar bshad par mad do zhes zer ro
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">lha rje</rs> na re chos kyi °°° dbyes kyi che ba dang
column6: thabs la mkhas pa'i che ba gnyis kyi dbang du byas nas yin te
column7: dang po'i dbang du byas nas nges s byed thad kyang dmigs pa mi rtag pa lasogs pa la rnaM pa mngon par zhen pa lasogs pa bkag pa'i chos nyid kyis dmigs par byed pas yin pas dmigs rnaM la khyad med do

column1: <lb n=""69a4""/>gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas sen mongs pa sna tshogs pa rnaMs kyi mos pa dang btdun nas de 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pas dmigs rnaM du mar gsungs pa yin no zhes zer ro
column2: </seg>

column1: de gnyis ka mthi bzhag la dmogs rnai mi 'dra ba med par 'dod par 'thun mod kyi
column2: de ni mi rigs ste
column3: mtnhan gzhag la dmigs rnaM la hyad med na rtogs pa la khyad med par 'gyur ro
column5: 'dod na re btsun gyis
column6: de nas der ltar gyur pa'i
column8: </TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-10-0915-20-122,unreviewed,N004 - 74b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N004""/>de rtags pa'i dbang gis rang rang gi rtogs pa dang 'thun pa'i yon tan 'grub pas de nyid la rigs gsuM gyi tha snyad bya'o shes pa'o
column3: gnyis pa 'jig rten pa'i dpe' dang bstun ba'i lan ni
column4: zhes pa lasogs pa ste
column5: de la rang gi ngo bos dbye ba med kyang
column6: de la rten pa'i yon tan gyis dbye ba'i sgo nas de'i dbye ba byas zhes pa'o
column8: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-10-0915-20-122""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">'buM</rs> ltar na bye brag smra ba

column1: <lb n=""74b5""/>ra ltar na ma chags pa'i dge ba cig su la yang rigs gsuM du 'jog pa bzhin du
column2: de chos nyid rigs su 'dod pa la yang mtshungs so zhes pa dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">lha rje</rs> ltar na gnyis su med pa'i shes pa cig sdu la dmigs pa'i sgo nas rigs gsuM du seMs tsM pa khyad ras 'dod pa bzhin du
column4: de chos nyid rigs su 'dod pa la mtshungs so zhes grub mtha' la brten nas lan 'debs pa ni d°s chos kyi lan yin <lb n=""74b6""/>skad do
column6: </seg>

column1: gnyis pa bsgrub pa'i dmigs pa ni zhes bya ba lasogs pa'o
column3: 'di yang gsuM gyis shes par bya ste
column4: bstan pa dang
column5: bshad pa dang
column6: dbye ba ste
column7: gcig dang mig dang drug gis rim pa bzhin no
column8: de'i dbye ba ni dbye sno bzhi' dbye ste
column9: laM dang mi mthun pa dang gnyer po dang 'bras bu'i sgo nas ste
column10: de yang tshig gnyis dang cig dang cig dang gnyis kyis rim pa bzhin no  'di dag kyang grangs nges</TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-294,unreviewed,76a7 - 76a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""76a7""/>yin te
column2: bzhi po 'dis ni tshogs la nas sa bcu'i bar gyi sgrub pa yin te
column3: gnas skabs der ma 'dus pa'i sgrub pa ni med pa'i phyir ro
column5: gnyas pa so so bshad pa la gntis las
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-294"">dang po sa 'tshas ni de las zhes bya ba lasogs pa ste
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> na re go rim pa'si la ba bzin zhes pa'i don ni go cha ni sbyor la
column8: ab pa ni mthong la
column9: chos ni rnaM longs bdun pa man chad
column10: nges rarg 'dang pa ni khyad par gyig langs brgyad <lb n=""76a8""/>yan chad do zhes sbyas nas
column11: brgyad stong bar ni gzhan lugs bshad pa yin pas mi 'gal lo zhes zer ro
column13: do ni ma yin te
column14: </seg> brgyad stong 'brel las
column15: dngos kyi sbyor ba dang bsnyad ba'i sbyos tsigs gnyis su bshad pas dri dang 'di sbyar ba nus pa'i phyir ro
column17: des na dang po skye ba'i sa tshaMs ni
column18: e ni mdhud pa'i sbyor batshogs la nas so
column20: rta pa ni yngon du ba'i sbyor bsrjod nas so
column22: sis cho lnga ni mngon du pa'i sbyor ba</TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-295,unreviewed,84b9 - 85a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""84b9""/>r du ngog shig par 'dod do zhes gsungso
column2: gnyen po ni °°°°zhes bya ba lasogs pa'o
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-295"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> na re
column5: rnaM thar sgoM gsuM shes ba ni gnyen po cig yin la
column6: 'dis spang bya gsuM spong ngo
column8: °° shes lssogs pa spong ba ni gnyen po gsuM yin la de gsum gyis spang bya cig spong zhing
column9: lhag ma rnMs gnyen po re res spang bya re re song zhes ze ro
column10: de ltar ni ma yin gyi
column11: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"">dags po</rs> dang <rs type=""person"">'buM pa</rs> na re</note> gnyen po re res  <pb n=""85a""/><lb n=""85a1""/>
column12: de kho na bzhin du rgyud la skyed par myed pa yin la
column13: don doM pa'i bden pa la brten nas de dag mi dmogs por byed do
column15: </seg> de ltar na kun rdzob siM du yang med zhes skur pa yins 'debs pa don daM par yod zhes spro mi 'dogs pas bden pa gnyas khas ma 'das pa yin no
column17: snga pa so so'i rang bzhin la go cha'i sgras bstan pa dang
column18: theg pa chen po'i sgras bstan pa gnyis so
column20: da pe ni tshi dan 'das byang chub seMs</TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-297,unreviewed,114a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""114a6""/>thad mkhyen pa nid gsuM gyis bsdus ba'i la yin ces pa ni m'i slob pa'i laM yin ces pa ste rtsa ba'i gnyis sres pas ma legs so
column3: de'i rgyu mtshan ni raM pa thaMd mkhyen pa ni kyis zhes pa lasogs pa'o
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-297"">  gnyis pa ni de la zhes bya ba lasogs pa ste
column6: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">mda'</rs> na re mkhyen pa gong ma gnyis kyi rnaM pa yangrnaM pa thaMd mkhyen pa'i rnaM bar bsdus nas sgoM pa yin pas de'i rnang pa sgoM pa rgyas par ston no zhes zer ro
column8: </seg> 'di la gsuM</TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-10-0915-45-21,unreviewed,119a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""119a4""/>no
column3: dang po la yang gnyis ste
column4: de gnyis kyi rang bzhin spyir tshogs rnas sa bcu'i bar gyi rang bzhin bstan pa dang
column5: yans dang po pas ji ltar nyaMs su len pa'i tshul lo
column7: dang po la<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-10-0915-45-21""> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs> ni de gnyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa bkag pa yin zhes gsung ste
column8: rnal 'byor ba'i blos dmigs par bya ba ni gzung ba lta bu yin la rnal 'byor bas gos par byed pa ni 'dzin pa lta bu yin pas
column9: dang po spros pa gcod par byed pa'i rigs pas shes bya dang shes pa thaMd ma grub par gtan la sab nas
column10: di ltar gos par byed pa'i dus su shes bya ma grub par sgo ba ni gnas pa bkag pa yin la
column11: shes pa ma grub par rgoM pa ni rnal 'byor bkag pa yin no
column13: </seg> de la shes bya la gzung 'dzin gnyis su bcad nas de gnyis mi dmigs par sgoMg pa la de gnyis su 'ag pa ni ma yin no
column15: rgyas par ni sngar bshad do
column17: de nyid las dang po pas ji ltar nyaMs su len pa'i tshul ni
column18: dran pa nye par bzhag pa la gnas pa dang rnal 'byor bkag nas sgong pa lasogs pa ste lus rnaM gzhag du bshad zin to
column20: rtogs pa'i khyad par gyi sbyor ba gsuM ni dper na rjes su dpag pa'i tshad mas spyi nang gi shes bya stong pa nyid du rtags pa na
column21: bla de nyid la me stong ba'i sgro 'dogs chod pas de yang stang par rtogs shing
column22: de gnyis kyi chos kyi khyad par thaMd la yang sgra 'dogs chod pa'i sgo nas stong par rtogs pa bzhin du
column23: lus dang tshor ba dang seMs dang chos la gnas pa dang rnal 'byor bdag nas snaM pa na
column24: gnas pa ma dmigs pa'i don gyasg zhes gsung pas
column25: gzhi phung po dang khaMs dang skye bched kyi de bzhin nyid zab par rtogs pa'i ldog pa nas de nyid la zab pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o
column27: rang bzhin gyis rtog pa med pa'i don gyis zhes gsungs pas
column28: zas pa sgo pa'i la bnyid kyi de bzhin nyid gsteng dpag dka' par rtogs pa'i ldog pa nas gting dpag dka' ba'i sbyor a zhes bya'o
column30: mtha' me dmigs pa'o don gyis zhes gsungs pas de gnyis kyi rnaM pa'i chos tshad med pa'i de bzhin nyid tshad med par rtogs pa'i ldog pa nas de la tshad med pa'i sbyor ba zhes bya'o
column32: ldog pa de gsuM nyid la rim pa bzhin gzhi dang la dang rnaM pa tshaMd mkhyen pa'i gsuM gyi sbyor ba zhes kyang bya'o
column34: de nyed la gnas pa dang rnal byor bkag nas sgo la smraes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i sbyor ba zhes byang bya'o
column36: lus lasogs pa bzhi'i de bzhin nyid snaM pas dran pa sye btar bzhag kang shi tshul zhes rgya rgya'
column38: de bzhin du sa bcu pa chos kyi srin hyi bar du sbyar ro
column40: des na rtogs pa'i khyad par ro thab pa de la gnas pa dang rnal 'byor bkag pa'i
column41: dang po snoM pa'i rnaM pa khun mngon par rogs pa yang de snyid yod do
column43: </TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-296,unreviewed,120b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""120b6""/>rnaMs thaMd mthong
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-296"">des na 'di kun rnaM par 'khor zhes lugs las 'byung pa lta bu'o
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs>s sbyor ba 'di thaMd sa brgyad par bshad pa dang
column6: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs>s ldog pa tsaM kyasg tha dad par bshad pa ni gzhung dang mi mthun pas mi legs so
column8: </seg> 'brel par mi gnas pa lasogs pa'i tshig lnga la de ltar rtogs pa zhes pa tshig gsuM gyi thabs pa sbyar ba rnaMs ni mtshan nyid yin la
column9: gzugs lasogs pa zhes pa yang tha ma gnyis kyi 'gor sbyar ste lnga 'i rnabs su sbyor ba dang zhes pa dang 'brel pa'i tshig lngas mtshon bya brjod do
column11: mi srag pa lasogs pa tshig cho lnga'i zhabs su de lta bu lasogs pa'i sgrub pa dang ldan pa zhes pas ni mtshan nyid brjod la
column12: 'og gi tshig bcho lnga'i zhabs su sbyor ba btags pa ni mtshon bya brjod pa yin no
column14: sngon du 'gro ba'i chos la bzhi las
column15: dang po yon tan ni yon tan mthong ba zhes bya ba lasogs pa'o
column17: yon tan bcu bzhi po 'di dag tshogs la kyi sbyor ba la ni phal cher rjes 'thun du 'byung la tha cig dngos su 'byung no
column19: hal cher ni srod nas 'thob la
column20: sa dang por ni khyad par can 'byung ngo
column22: nges 'byed cha bzhi dang sa bcu la sbyor ba ni 'khrul par shes par bya'o
column24: 'brel pa'i dang po bcu bzhi nti 'bras bur gyur pa'i yon tan yin la
column25: phyi ma bcu bzhi ni rgyur gyur pa'i yon tan yin no
column27: de yang sbyor ba bsgoMs pa las 'bras bu de dag gi rgyu nus pa mthu' can du song ba ni rgyu'i yon tan yin la
column28: de las 'bras bu mngon gyur skyes pa ni 'bras bu'i yon tan yin no
column30: de rnaMs rin pa bzhin rgyu 'bras yin pas dang po suM kyi sbyor ba la gus par bsgoMs pa na sangs rgyab kyi sbyor ba de byin gyis blabs pa'i rgyu'i yon tan las
column31: glud kyi mthu chong pa'i 'bras bu'i yon tan 'byung la
column32: de las mar chad byed pa med pas de rgyun du 'byung ba yin no
column34: yang de la sangs rgyas kyis thugs kyis dgongs pa'i rgyu</TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-29,unreviewed,130a4 - 130a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""130a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-29""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> na re <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">seng ge bzang po</rs>s nges 'byed zag med chung ngur bshad pa'i rjes su <lb n=""130a5""/>'brangs nas
column2: de'i rigs thar pa'i ma 'thun yang zag med du yar sman nas 'chad do
column4: de ni mi rigs te
column5: </seg> spyir drod yan chad du dbang po'i ngo bo yin pa la 'di nas dbang po'i ngo bor ma gyur zhes zag med kyi khyab byed bkag pa dang
column6: yang brgyad stong ba las thos pa dang btsa pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa la 'jug pa'i rgyur gyur zhes bshad pas na hag med yin na bsko srung du rigs pa dang
column7: bstan pa la 'jug pa la spang las dang po pa yin pa dang
column8: mang pas dang po las pshegs chen pos phun ring pos rtogs pa'i sbyor ba snonM par bshad pa dang
column9: sbyor ba sgoM pa'i sngon du mtshan nyid shes pa 'gro la de'i yang sngon du 'di 'gro bar bshad pa gsuM gyis gnod pas so
column11: </TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-14,unreviewed,130a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""130a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-14""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'brom</rs> na re thar pa'i cha 'thun zag bcas yin pas de'i rjes su 'brangs nas nges 'byed kyang zag bcas su bshad pa yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">seng ge bzang po</rs>'i 'dod pa ma yin te skyon 'og du ston no
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-2466,unreviewed,131b9 - 132a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""131b9""/>ma yin pas laM gyi rnaM dbye ma bshad do
column3: yang na de dag ni skabs dang por bshad pa yin te
column4: de ltar yang slob dpon gyis la shes pa'i nges byed ni skabs dang po'i de nyid yin no zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-2466"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6944"">jo bo a bya/sya</rs> na re se pams pa lugs a nyis yod pa las
column7: dang po ltar na las dang po pa'i sa nas sa dpu pa'i par du mkhyen pa gsuM p sgos nas
column8: sa bcu pa la sbyor ba bzhi sgoM pa yin te
column9: de ni rgyun <pb n=""132a""/><lb n=""132a1""/>
column10: ring por 'jug pas so
column12: zlos pa'i skyon songs 'di ni bshad pa sde dang bstun pa yin pas
column13: rnaM pa thaMd du khyad par gyi la zhes pa ni sa bchun pa la bya'o
column15: de ni se ba rang gis rlos nas bshad pa yin no
column17: gnyis pa ltar na mkhyen pa gsuM thos pas gyis yul du byas te rnaM kun mngon rdzogs las dang po pa'i yarang nas rgoM pa lasogs pa'i rim pa sngar bstan pa de nyid yin no zhes zer ro
column19: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-24,unreviewed,132a1 - 132a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""132a1""/>
column2: ring por 'jug pas so
column4: zlos pa'i skyon songs 'di ni bshad pa sde dang bstun pa yin pas
column5: rnaM pa thaMd du khyad par gyi la zhes pa ni sa bchun pa la bya'o
column7: de ni se ba rang gis rlos nas bshad pa yin no
column9: gnyis pa ltar na mkhyen pa gsuM thos pas gyis yul du byas te rnaM kun mngon rdzogs las dang po pa'i yarang nas rgoM pa lasogs pa'i rim pa sngar bstan pa de nyid yin no zhes zer ro
column11: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-24"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">mda'</rs> na re
column12: yang seng bsang la <lb n=""132a2""/>lugs gnyis pas
column13: dang po ltar na chos mchog man chad du mkhyen pa gsuM bsgoMs nas sa dang po nas dbu ba'i bar du rnaM kun sgoM yangs bcu pa la rtse mo sgo de'i smad la mthar gyis pa lasogs pa sgo pa yin no
column15: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-01,unreviewed,132a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""132a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-01"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3827"">'broM</rs> ni sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa gsuM gyi ye shes dang rnal 'byor ba bdag nyid kyi shes pa tha mi dad par bloMs nas snoM pa yin pas de'i bsaM pa dang sbyar nas nges 'byed la zag med chung rung bshad do
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-54,unreviewed,153b6 - 153b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""153b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-54"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3944"">zangs kar</rs> na re pha rol du phyen pa drug dang
column2: rjes su dran pa drug ni so so ba <lb n=""153b7""/>dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ni bsdus pa'o zhes zer ro
column4: </seg>

column1: rha mkha' ni sbyor ba dang
column2: mthong pa dang
column3: sgoM la tso mo ni songso ba
column4: bar chad med pa'i the so ni bsdus pa'o zhes bchad do
column6: dgags po ni mngon par rtogs pa ni sog so ba
column7: snying po'i don ni bsdus pa'o zhes gsung te
column8: de rnas ya 'brel lo
column10: 'dir 'thul ni so so ba ni mkhyen pa gsuM yin la
column11: bsdus pa ni rnaM kun mon rogs la bya'o
column13: des na rtso ma yang bsdus par 'ong ste de ni mkhyar pa gasM myung la khyad pa med pas so
column15: de skad du yang zlos pa'i skyon spong nas
column16: mkhyen pa gsuM ni rnaM pa so sor nges pa'i yul can yin la
column17: rnaM kun mngon rzogs ni rnaM pa ma lus pa'i yul can yin no zhes bshad pa dang
column18: yang rna thun mngon rdzogs kyi dang por gzhi dang la dang rnaM pa ma lus pa'i yul can yin no zhes gsung ngo
column20: go rims bslags pa ni de ltar bshad pa'i don to
column22: kyes ces pa ni byed tshig yin pas
column23: de ltar yul bcu gsuM yod pas
column24: de ma sbyor ba la slob pa ni mthar gyis pa'i bya bar mdo las bzhed la des mthong la dang sgoM laM na de dag la stob pa ni bslab pa dang
column25: bsgrub par bzhed ces pa yang mtshon pa yin no
column27: de la sbyen pa'i mthar gyis pa ni
column28: bdag nyid sbyir pa la gnas shing gzhan de la 'god pa dang
column29: gzhan sbyin pa gtong ma de dag gi bsngags pa brjod ming mthun pas dga' bar spyod do
column31: sbyin pa des longs spyod kyi phung po thob nas
column32: ser snang med pa'i seMs kyis gang dang gang 'dod pa la de dang de gto zhing sbyen pa de nyid kyis phung po lnga thob par</TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-01-2916-35-26,unreviewed,161a4 - 161a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""161a4""/> spangs te
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex10012024-01-2916-35-26"">

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (161a4–161a5)]""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4514""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">shes rab gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan chos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> ces <lb n=""161a5""/> bya ba'i 'grel pa</rs>'i tshig dang don gsal bar bshad pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3823"">shag kya'i dge slong shes rab brtson 'grus</rs> kyis <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rnams</rs> kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brangs nas sbyar ba'o
column7: dge bar gyur cig
column13: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-12-55,unreviewed,3a1 - 3a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a1""/>
column2: rgyan yin pa la gang zag gzhan dag kyis de skang min par yashes pas la lole ma sa kho na'i tshin sogo s ba le bsgyad a kho na'i yin pa go ngas logs rtogs thas pagsuM ga'i rngo pa la yingl la yin pas rtgs nas de lta rtogs pa bya ba'i ched du gs la ma byed po
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-12-55"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: gnyis la bla ma brgyud pa'i 'brel pa bsaM pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">buM pa</rs> na re de ltar seng bzang? <lb n=""3a2""/>khyos rgyas 'bring gsum po kun kyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o 'grel pa gcig rtsom zer na de mkhyed kyis ji ltar du shes zhe na de ni mkhas pa zha'i? gdam ngag la ten nas shes zhes 'brel de lta du byed la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-05,unreviewed,3a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a2""/>khyos rgyas 'bring gsum po kun kyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o 'grel pa gcig rtsom zer na de mkhyed kyis ji ltar du shes zhe na de ni mkhas pa zha'i? gdam ngag la ten nas shes zhes 'brel de lta du byed la
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-05"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">rngog</rs> ni seng? bzang khyod kyis kun kyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'i 'grel pa gcig rtsom zhes daM ta bcas nas 'grel pa rtsom pa des rtsa ba mngon rtogs gyi don mngon suM du gyur ba'i sgo nas rtsom mam
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-19,unreviewed,4b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b2""/>ma bde bas med pa yin kyang don gyis khong na nas pa yin la de ngos nas bton pa rtogs pa'i cha bstan pa'o
column3: 'phag la zhes pa s lo ga las 'das pa'i ye shes ma nyes pa dang pang bya ci rigs pa spangs pas phags pa'i khosb sam grangs su chud pa'o
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-19"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3807"">'bre</rs> na re khongs su rtogs zhes zer ba 'di ltar byas na nyan thos 'phags pas tshig yin pa srid dam zer ba la
column2: </seg> slob dpon sha re nyan thos ni theg pa chen</TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-22,unreviewed,4b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b7""/>pa'i blo zhes bya'o zer ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-22"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3816"">ar</rs> na de ngo bo nyid med pa ltogs pa'i blongs dbu mang gnas pa'i blo yin pa srid daM zer ro
column3: </seg>

column1: slol dpon pa ni mthal thams cad dang bral bar rtogs pa'i blo yul can dbu ma yin no gsungs
column3: 'o na dbyig gnyen gyis byas pa des chog mod de dang hyad med par yang rnaM par 'byed pa'i rgyu mtshan yagng yin zhe na
column4: de ni mdo 'i don la sngar ma rtogs pa</TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-29,unreviewed,6a4 - 6a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a4""/>sbyon bam par byed pas na lo ga'i sgo zung med pa mi 'kgrul la
column2: lo ga las 'das pa'i med pas zer na go gi rang dang byad lan ched pas yogsu se
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-29"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">'byung she</rs> na re 'di khyes brgyud ma yin te *gap* bo de la rgyal med pa yin pas byes bskus mi srid de zer ro <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">slob dpon</rs> na re phyogs 1 nas de ltar yin pa srid kyang rtso ba'i rgyu'i skabs 'dir 'grel pa rtsoms pa'i rgyu cig don gyi rdogs ma lus pa yod zhes zhal kyis bzhes <lb n=""6a5""/>pas na kyes rgyung du spog pa ti ka thaMd las byas byes ba rgyu du byaso gsung ngo
column3: </seg>

column1: don me non du gyur pa med par 'di nyid kyis kyang gsal ba yin la de la blo nyams bdag dras sngon med ci yang brjod par lus min gang gi phying shes pa lasogs pa gsungs so
column3: zhes rab byung gnas blo grog hes spyirgo lo gna' pchags pa yon tan gyis dbul ba dang shug pa ldugs ba
column4: de'i rgyu ni yul la smongs pa dang dogs pa tshibs</TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-39,unreviewed,6b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b9""/>smyos sa nog bzang po zhes bya bdag zhes pa lasogs pa gsungs pa dang gal bas ma yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-39"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">ku la rta</rs>na re don yin te mchod pa brjod ces bshad par dam bca' ba zhes pa ni shes rab zhes pa lasogs pa'o
column3: </seg>

column1: 'grel pa byed pa'i rnam grangs bstan pa ni
column2: 'di snag du nes bzang byed mchod bred byas nas 'bre pa tang thom rtsom na de ma yin pa gzhan gyis 'grel pa byas pa yod dam med</TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-58,unreviewed,16a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16a1""/>
column2: ldag palsogs pa thaM kyang mi kgrub pas ma yin gsan so
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-58"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">slob dpon sa</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">kyi ston</rs> gnyis ni nyan thos lhag ched du 'jug shes pa de gcad pa bya ba'i nyer sred pa? kyi shes pa tsam yin pa'i phyir zhes sred bcas dgos po gzungs la
column2: </seg>

column1: ya don nar stan tos brtan pa e pa nge mi gos pa hyi
column2: gsas reg te de sta re shun gyi rod da ang ru lo brodba nas myed</TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-14-15,unreviewed,16a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16a4""/>zer ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-14-15"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">khu</rs> na re mchod par brjod pa'i shugs la bshad par daM ba bstan pa dang
column2: </seg>

column1: ce na de ltar du btan na bstan bcas de rang gi brjed byang po sten pa1 byed na snyam du dtegs pa se
column2: 1 stes de yin zhes brjod 1 bstan pa yin la 'ena gzni bses po byed na m son pa nas bshad pa 1e phyed daM ma bshad pa 1 pyed des ma s 'debs pa yin no zer de d
column3: mched brjons pyi tshig den gyis 'gral par dan rslons kyi phyags su</TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-14-24,unreviewed,18b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18b3""/>yins po gig pa dang bad gs yan ph pa med do
column3: gsum pa ta na mhe na gs m o th d a an rnam es pag o po a o na an gu h dad cirang thd d a ag shs de gang zag gi bdag med pa dang bhung pas bzhin yed pa l thad pa'i hyir bag yod gu pa ba la de a<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-14-24"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">zhang pad</rs> na re mkhyen gsuM tha dad laM yang tha dad du thal
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-14-33,unreviewed,27b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""27b6""/>pas rgrul yan chad kyi rtse mo yang khyad par can yin no zer ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-14-33"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">sregs</rs> na re brgyad pa rang nas rtse mo khyad par can yin te dgu rnam kun khyad par can min paso zer ba la slob dpon na re brgyad pa de dus thung ngu zhig ni ma yin pas de legs cha 'bres ldog pa mying bzung na brgyad pa'i rnam kun rgyu yin la rgul yan chad kyi rtse mo 'brus yin la blo rtse nyad pa'i nang la
column2: </seg>

column1: snges bang ltar na mthar byis pa bsgaM paln</TEI>"

3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-14-43,unreviewed,39b3 - 39b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""39b3""/>gang am pa mchod shes pa du bu 'gro ba ni skyes ba 'did pa hin gshegs pa skyed byed yin te myed par byed pa'i nus pa sbyong pa dang la yed pa'i shos nge hes ye ba don gshegs la skyed byed du mtshan pang byed pa'si mchad yin ne 'dre ba'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-14-43"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">khu ston brtson 'grus</rs> na re ner ma nor mtshon pa yin zer pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">rnog</rs> legs pa'i shes rab na re sbyor lam yod pa'i chos dang mtshon pa yon no zer te des? nus pa <lb n=""39b4""/>las gro bas phras? gsung ngo
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">sna chung ston pa</rs> na re 'gros mtshon pa yin te rab ka mtho lta bu yin lo de'i go ba ni 'bras bus sher phyin gyi rtogs pa de sbyor bas skyed pa yin pas de la slo rtse yin gsung ngo
column5: </seg>

column1: di yang kang na nge slong bas dis byud ya snyed byed du mlhen pa yin gsung ste mi ng 'degs lugs la den thaMd la lhyad med dogang e
column2: de'i sngun du yang thang pa'i mthun gyis dege ba skyes</TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-14-59,unreviewed,40b6 - 40b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40b6""/>rtags na ste
column2: btcu 2 yin na zeMr ro
column4: seb dpon na de rtags 'di rnams tha snyad sgrub du byed pa dang 'bras rtags la tha snyad sgrub gzhag par sha bas na 'bres 'bras rtags dang nga bzhin lasogs pa'i rnyad ma byas pa yin te des phugs su mi skol gsung so
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-14-59"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">slob dpon zhang</rs> ni lo tsa bas rtags gyi mtshid gyi phyogs nas byas pa yin la 'bres rtags kyi ngo bo'i phyogs nas byas pa <lb n=""40b7""/>yin te lo tsha ba ltar legs la
column2: </seg>

column1: 'di rnams tha nyad sgrub yin pas ngang bzhin gyi rtags su byas na legs te ka ma la shi las kyang rtags thams cad ran b zhin gyi rtag pa du byas nas 'bras rtags lasogs pa de'i dbye bar bshad pas 'bras rtags la yang tha snyad sgrub bshad pa lta su yang yod de yod kyang phyegs chos 'dzin pa'i tshad mas sgrub bya'i don grub ma grub kyis 'jog pa yin pas ska la
column2: </TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-16-06,unreviewed,70a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""70a9""/>ma yin dgag pa sgrub phyir ro
column3: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zer ro
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-16-06"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3834"">rgya dmar</rs> na re 'bras'i de thos pas mngon sum gyi rigs yin na rigs zhes ba spyi yin pas na spyi gsal ba'i mthar ma thug pa mi srid pas rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum du 'gyur la
column2: </seg>

column1: rjes dpag gi rgyun yin na bsam byung rjes dpag du tha lo la
column3: 'dod par kyang mi nus de lo gang</TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-15-08,unreviewed,119b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""119b2""/>nas rsgo pa yin no zer ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-15-08"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">jo bo mad</rs> na re seng bzang gi lcoms te bshad pa ni chos mchog man cad du mkhyen pa gsuM ci rigs par bsgoms nas
column2: </seg>

column1: dang po nas dga pa'i bang du ci rigs par rnaM kun sgo la
column2: bcu pa'i stod pa rtsa mo de'i rgyung la mthar gyis pa par chad med pa'i lam du rgya cig ma sgom par 'ded la zlos paso skyen ces de di yang de dang</TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-15-11,unreviewed,119b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""119b5""/>ste la sgres tsam las 'tod pa mad pa'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-15-11"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">nam ka</rs> na b+hu tasi mkhyen pa gsum gyi ye shes dang rnal 'byor pa rang gi shes pa gnyis tha mi dad pa rloms nas sgoM pa yin pas de'i bsaM pa dang sbyor nas nges 'byed la zag med chu rung bshad pa yin lo
column3: </seg>

column1: se na leg shas sgom par mi 'gre'i dngos po la ma yin pa rloms nas sgm pas so zhes 'bras dres pa la</TEI>"
