column1: 2_031_03_ Dar ma od zer _ dul ba mdo rtsai grel pa.xml,2_031_03,,ex31032024-10-2116-16-44,unreviewed,25b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""25b8""/> du gnas pa la yod do zhes dang brangs na dge tshul
gyi ba dam ba la po dad du gnas pa la d dang der 'brel las dge tshul kyi ba don ba ni
rab du lta ba la gnas yang phyiro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex31032024-10-2116-16-44"" status=""unreviewed"">de'i don yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rgya</rs> na re dge tshul kyi sdom ces myed la rab du srung ba'i chog sun run gro dgos pas rab tu byung 'dang zhes pas dge tshul kyi bsdom pa 'dus pa'i phyir ro
column4: zer ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_031_03_ Dar ma od zer _ dul ba mdo rtsai grel pa.xml,2_031_03,,ex31032024-10-2116-16-442,unreviewed,19b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""19b2""/> kya sngar can ma btags la da ltar can 'dugs pa la
zhugs nas lag pa gal dang na dung po rten bslab dpon du 'gyur bas rgyu mtshad la ma pa'i
yir
column2: ci ltar ma nges zhe na<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex31032024-10-2116-16-442"" status=""unreviewed""> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rgya</rs> na re ngag dgod kyis can bdogs pa la dug pa log dgos pa yin ba'ang dag dan de byed pa'i phyir des na der mi 'gyur ro
column4: </seg>

column1: de la stan pa ni gnas
yan ma btag pa 'am rgyu mtshan du gdang na gnas kyang bar bu yod</TEI>"

2_047_01_gTsang drug rdo rje_gsal byed sgron ma_20210607.xml,2_047_01,,ex47012024-12-1011-45-01,unreviewed,78a7 - 78a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex47012024-12-1011-45-01"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone n=""colophon"" unit=""section""/>
<lb n=""78a7""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4791"">yang dag rigs pa'i gsal byed sgron ma</rs> shes bya ba
column2: bde bar gshes pa'i bka' rab 'byams la chos kyi snang ba rgyas pa lung rigs kyi dbang phyug

column1: thugs dgongs nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa dpal ldan <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3872"">rtsang pa 'bre</rs> dang
sde snod 'dzin pa'i mnga' bdag rnam par dpyod pa'i blo gros 'gran zla dang bral ba

rjes btsun 'jam dbyang dang tha mi dad pa bla ma <lb n=""78a8""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen gnyal pa zhang tshes</rs> kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos len pa
rnam dpyod kyi rtsal gyis phyir rgol log lta'i dpung 'joms shing
legs bshad [rig]s pa'i thur mas blo gros gyi myig 'byed pa
btul zhugs la legs par gnas pa'i
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4025"">shag kya'i dge' slong rdo rje 'od zer</rs> gyis <lb n=""78a9""/> sbyar ba
column4: rdzogs s+hyo
column6: dge bar gyur cig
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-43-41,reviewed,1b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-43-41"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5292"">tshad ma shes rab sgron ma</rs> zhes bya ba
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-2810-35-31,reviewed,5b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-2810-35-31"" status=""reviewed"">de dag ni gzhan bsal nas nges pa'i blo gzhan sel zhes bya ba yin la
column2: de bzhin du don gzhan bsal nas gnas pa don <lb n=""5b1""/> gyi gzhan sel dang
column3: gzhan bsal nas brjod pa sgra'i gzhan sel zhes bya ba yang gnas so zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5590"">bdag gi bla ma blo gros kyi spyan dang ldan pa dag</rs> gsung ngo
column7: </TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-06-2912-18-04,reviewed,5b3 - 5b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b3""/>de dag gi rang bzhin nges par bya ba la gnyis ste
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-06-2912-18-04"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4265"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4265"">rtag pa</rs></note> <lb n=""5b4""/><note type=""editorial"">We take ""rtag pa"" to be an alternative way of referring to ""sTag/rTag""</note> na re snang pa'i don la nges shes 'dren mi nus pa yin no zhes zer ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-014-22-28,reviewed,5b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-014-22-28"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:snang_la_ma_nges_pa"">

yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3834""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">kha cig</rs></rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs></note> sgro 'dogs dang mi 'gal ba'i snang pa yin no zhes zer ba</seg></TEI>"

3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1613-14-21,reviewed,7b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7b5""/> par 'dod pa'i lugs<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-14-21"" status=""reviewed"">sbyor ba gsuM pa'i tshe thug par 'dod pa yin te
column2: 'di ltar tshul gsuM chos can gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad byar rung ste tshul gsuM tshang pa'i phyir ro zhes bkod na gzhi' rtags tha dad med pa'i phyir sgra mi rtag ste sgra yin pa'i phyir zhes bkod pa lta bu'i ma grub pa yin no zhes zer ba <note type=""editorial"">The author of this view is identified as Phya pa (id:3831) by Glo bo mkhan chen. See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 32, n. 49.</note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-07-2417-03-49,reviewed,8a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-07-2417-03-49"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> na re mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni de ma yin las tha dad du 'byed pa'i rgyu mtshan nam mtshon bya rnam 'jog gi rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba yin no zhes zer ro
column3: <note type=""editorial"">This view is also mentioned in RTRG VIII 186,14 (mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam 'jog gi rgyu mtshan yin na…). RTGKh 163,8, RTŚ19 Dza 70b1 (=586) and RTŚ10 Tha 128a5 (=255) identify it as rNgog Lo tsa ba chen po (ID: 3786)'s view.       </note> </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-09-36,unreviewed,11a6 - 11a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-09-36"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<mentioned>gal te mtshon bya sgra blos khyad par du byas na byed chos kyi sgra blo 'phel bas des khyad par du byas pa'i mtshon bya 'ang du mar gyur pa'i phyir mtshan nyid cig gis mtshon bya du ma mtshon par 'gyur ro zhe na
column2: </mentioned>

column1: sgra blo 'phel bas sgra blos zhen rung tsam 'phel bar 'gyur yang
column2: mtshon bya du mar mi 'gyur te <abbr>thams cad</abbr> don ldog de la sgra blos zhen rung nyid las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro
column4: des na zhen yul gyi don ldog cig las med <lb n=""11a7""/> na de la sgra blo mi 'dra ba brgya phrag du mas zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya cig du 'gyur la
column5: zhen yul gyi don ldog du ma yod na de <abbr>thams cad</abbr> la sgra blos gcig nyid kyis zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya du mar 'gyur ba yin te ngag lasogs pa don dgu la go zhes bya ba'i sgra blo cig gis zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya dgur 'gyur ba bzhin no
column7: <note type=""gloss"">mtshan gzhi'i <choice><orig>{°}nyid</orig><reg>nyid</reg></choice> la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">gangs pa</rs> na re dngos po gnas skabs dang skyon yon brtsi ba 2 yod <choice><reg>ces pa 'ang</reg><orig>(ces pa'ang)?</orig></choice> de mi 'thad de spyi'i mtshan nyid dri ba la bye brag gi dbye ba skabs su ma bab pa'i phyir ro
column9: </note>
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-47-21,unreviewed,17a7 - 17b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""17a7""/> mas sgro 'dogs bsal ba'i rgyal ka tshad mas thob pa yin te
column2: rgyal po'i 'khor gyis grong khyer bcom pa la rgyal pos grong khyer bcom zhes brjod pa bzhin no
column4: snang pas mun pa sel pa dang gnyen pos spang bya sel pa lasogs pa'i tshul yang 'di nyid kyis shes par bya'o
column8: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-47-21"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi bdag nyid chen po dag</rs> sgrub dang dgag pa'i mtshan nyid rim pa bzhin dgag bya rnam par bcad nas shul du chos gzhan 'phen pa dang mi 'phen pa yin te
column2: dper na bden pas stong pa dang <lb n=""17b1""/> bden pas stong pa'i snang pa lta bu'am bum pa stong pa dang bum pa med pa'i sa phyogs lta bu'o zhes gsung go
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-14-17,reviewed,23a2 - 23a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""23a2""/> 'khrul par rang gis ma nges pa'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-14-17"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

column1: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">gangs pa</rs> na re</note> gal te tshad ma ni ¦ <quote source=""PV 1.200ab"">yod med nges pa'i 'bras can min
column3: phyir na tshad ma nyid ma yin ¦</quote> <note type=""editorial""> PV I.200ab sadasanniścayaphalāneti syād vā 'pramāṇatā. Also cited in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 26b6. ma yin: PV <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> mi 'gyur </note> zhes 'byung pa'i tshul gyis yod pa dang med par nges pa'i 'bras bu can yin na 'dis ni de lta <lb n=""23a3""/> bu'i nges pa mi skyed pas tshad ma ma yin no zhe na
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0313-55-44,reviewed,26b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""26b1""/> bdag rkyen dbang po gzugs can la brten nas skyes shing gzung don la ma 'khrul pa yin te spyi dang bye brag gi rigs mi mthun bcad pa'i phyir ro
column3: dbang po'i mngon sum tshad ma'i mtshan nyid ni bdag rkyen dbang po gzugs can la brten nas sngar ma rtogs pa'i don la myong stobs kyis sgro 'dogs gcod byed ces bya ba yin no
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0313-55-44"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

column1: dbang po gzugs can la brten pa nyid ji ltar grub ce na

'dir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4270"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4270"">rgya grags sod</rs></note> na re de ni bum snang gi shes pa chos can rkyen gsuM las gzhan pa'i rkyen gzhan bzhi pa cig la ltos pa yin te rkyen gsuM tshang yang res 'ga' bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'bras bu ldog pa'i rtags la rten pa'i rjes dpag gis sgrub po zhes zer ro
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1611-09-25,unreviewed,28b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28b5""/> zin la 'jug pa bcad shes yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1611-09-25"" status=""unreviewed"">'o na bcad pa'i yul can yod dam med ce na

column1: 'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi dgan po dag</rs> na re <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bcad pa'i yul can med de
column2: don gyi skad cig re re blo'i skad cig re res rtogs pas don dang blo rnying pa phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-12-1214-24-38,reviewed,28b5 - 28b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28b5""/> zin la 'jug pa bcad shes yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-12-1214-24-38"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">rtsang</rs><note type=""editorial"">Cf. <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 61b8-62a2 'di snyam du skad cig snga phyi'i rdzas de lta na yang de dag la ye shes kyis 'gro ba rtogs pa 'am sngon po nyid rtogs pa zhes bya ba yod dam myed
column4: myed na spyi ma rtogs pa'i bye brag rtogs par 'gal la
column5: yod na yang de nyid la ye shes phyi ma bcad pa'i shes pa ji ltar ma yin
column6: gzhan yang rtog pa myed mod sngon ji ltar mkhyen pa'i chos rnams da ltar ma mkhyen na thams cad mkhyen par mi 'gyur la
column7: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang dran pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin
column8: des na 'jig rten mkhyen pa ni thams cad du rdzas la tshad ma nyid la ldog pa la bcad pa'i yul can nyid kho na ste
column9: </note></note>  <lb n=""28b6""/> na re rdzas la ltos nas bcad shes ma yin kyang rigs la ltos nas sngar rtogs zin la 'jug pa'i phyir bcad pa'i yul can ji ltar ma yin
column10: gzhan yang rtog pa med mod sngon ji ltar mkhyen pa'i chos rnams da ltar ma mkhyen na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa ma yin par 'gyur la
column11: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsnyel pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin
column12: des na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa ni <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du rdzas la tshad ma dang rigs la bcad pa'i yul can yin no zhes zer ro

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-08-0414-24-38,reviewed,28b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-08-0414-24-38"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusm:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5600"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusm:named_reference"" ref=""db:5600"">byang</rs></note> na re rdzas la ltos nas kyang bcad pa'i yul can du 'gyur te
column2: rdzas sngar ma rtogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro

column1: </seg></TEI>"

3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-24-38,unreviewed,28b7 - 28b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-24-38"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<mentioned>yang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis dus gsum ma mkhyen pa mi 'thad la
column2: mkhyen na yang 'das ma 'ongs gnyis snang nas mkhyen nam mi snang par mkhyen
column3: </mentioned> snga ma ltar mi 'thad de 'gags pa dang ma skyes pa snang par mi rung pa'i phyir ro
column5: phyi ma ltar yang mi 'thad de sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum spyan du mi rung pa'i phyir ro zhe na
column6: <lb n=""28b8""/>'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs></note> 'das ma 'ongs gnyis ye shes da ltar ba la mi snang yang da ltar ba'i dngos po snang pa'i shugs la de'i rgyu' dpal dang 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa yin no zhes zer ro
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-26-50,unreviewed,28b8 - 28b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28b8""/>'di la<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-26-50"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">rtsang</rs><note type=""editorial""/>Glo bo mkhan chen also ascribes this position to ""slob dpon gTsang nag pa."" See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 131, n. 219</note> 'das ma 'ongs kyi rnam pa snang pa'i stobs kyis de dag gi rang mtshan ma byung pa dang mi 'byung pa'i sgro 'dogs chod pa yin no zhes gsung mod kyi rnam pa de ci rang mtshan gyi rnam pa 'am
column2: sgra don nam med pa'i don gsal bar snang pa yin zhes brtags na 'thad pa ma yin no
column4: 'on kyang dus gsum mkhyen pa <lb n=""28b9""/> lasogs pa'i ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni gdul bya gzhan gyi blo ngor snang pa tsam du zad kyi sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyud kyis bsdus pa yod pa ma yin pas dpyad par bya ba ma yin no
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1610-18-48,unreviewed,30b9 - 31a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""30b9""/> 'bebs pa'i skabs su tshogs don kho na la 'jug pa'i phyir rtogs pa po 'jug pa 'chol par mi 'gyur te<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1610-18-48"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> na re <quote source=""db:4445"" n=""216,4-7""><!--TODO ref to the typeset edition-->rtags kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid tshul gsum dang mtshon bya gtan tshigs kyi 'brel pa nges par byed pa la</quote> zer ba yin gyi<!--The first part of the citation, up to ""zer"" corresponds to <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 216,4-7 de la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid tshul gsum dang
column2: de'i mtshon bya'i 'brel pa nges par byed pa ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid la
column3: .--> <note type=""gloss""><choice><orig>° gnyegs </orig><reg><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4267"">gnyags ye shes 'bar</rs> </reg> </choice> ltar<!-- identification upon assumption that ""gnyegs"" stands for ""gnyags ye shes 'bar"" (id:4267)--></note> tshul dang po'i mtshan mtshon gyi 'brel pa gtan la 'bebs pa ni ma yin te rtags kyi sgra tshul dang po <lb n=""31a1""/> kho na la nye ba'i rgyu <choice><orig>‹mtshan›</orig><reg>mtshan</reg></choice> med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro

column1: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung </rs>na re</note>'di ni mi rigs te
column2: de ltar na khyab pa'i mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa yang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs par 'gyur la 'dod na rtags kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i skabs su rjes su dpag bya'i sgra rtsod gzhi' kho na la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur te de'i tshe chos la'ang 'jug pa'i phyir ro
column4: des na 'dir gtan tshigs ni tshul dang po la bya ste tshul dang po'i mtshan nyid <lb n=""31a2""/> dang mtshon bya'i 'brel pa gtan la 'bebs pa la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i skabs zhes brjod par bya'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-2810-42-14,unreviewed,32a6 - 32a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""32a6""/> gsungs so
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-2810-42-14"" status=""unreviewed"">rgol ba ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4266"">su rya</rs> <note type=""editorial"">A similar objection is cited in the <rs type=""work"">Tshad ma rigs gter</rs>. Glo bo mkhan chen dentifies the opponent as ""paṇḍita Surya thong po."" See <rs type=""work"">Hugon (ed.) 2004</rs>: 151, n. 269.</note> rtsod gzhi' chos can la rjes su dpag bya'i ming gis btags nas bstan pas mi phan te
column6: 'di ltar rjes su dpag bya'i ming de rtsod gzhi' chos can kho na la 'jug na rtags rjes su dpag bya la yod pa tshul dang po zhes brjod pas mthun pa dpe'i chos can dang mi mthun dpe'i chos can gnyis la rtags yod pa la mi go bar 'gyur ba zhig na
column7: rjes su dpag bya ni <lb n=""32a7""/> rtsod gzhi' dang bsgrub bya'i chos dang tshogs don gsuM ka la 'jug pas chos rjes su dpag bya la rtags yod pa dang tshogs don rjes su dpag bya la rtags yod pa yang tshul dang po yin nam snyam pa'i log rtogs skye zhing
column8: de skyes na ma 'khrul pa'i mig gi gzung byas sgra mi rtag par sgrub pa lta bu'i rjes 'gro can la yang rtags chos rjes su dpag bya la yod pa'i tshul dang po dang rjes su 'gro ldog gnyi' ka tshang pas yang dag pa'i rtan tshigs yin nam snyam pa'i log rtogs snga ma ci lta ba bzhin du <lb n=""32a8""/> skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na
column10: </seg>
column12: </TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1612-55-52,unreviewed,32a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""32a8""/> skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1612-55-52"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag nyid chen po kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> btags pas mi phan pa'i rtsod pa spang pa dang
column2: gdags mi dgos pa'i rtsod pa spang pa dang
column3: de'i lan mtshungs pa'i rtsod pa spang pa gsuM gyis lan 'debs par mdzad de
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1612-55-525,unreviewed,33a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1612-55-525"" status=""unreviewed"">
tshul dang po'i tshig gis mthun pa dpe'i chos can la yod par rnon pa la yang yod tsam du rnon na don med cing
column2: mthun dpe' kho na la yod par rnon na rjes 'gro'i tshig gis mthun <lb n=""33a2""/> phyogs tsam gyi rigs kyi spyi la yod par bstan pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur bas mtshungs so zhe na

column1: mi mtshungs ste <rs type=""person"" ana="""">kho bo cag</rs> ni tshul dang po'i tshig gis mthun dpe' kho na la yod par rnon par go dgos yod ces zer ba yin la de dang rjes 'gro' tshig gis mthun phyogs tsam gyi rigs kyi spyi la yod par bstan pa la 'gal ba ci zhig yod de
column2: blo rno ba spyir mi tsam la yod cing bye brag lha sbyin kho na la yod pa mi 'gal ba bzhin no zhes zer ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1613-00-02,unreviewed,34a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""34a9""/> te
column2: de ni bsgrub bya'i chos ldan du tshad mas grub zin pa la yang yod pas khyab ches pa'i phyir ro
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-00-02"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> the tsom dang ldan pa yin no zhes zer ba <!--Cf. rNam bshad 217 des na the tshom dang ldan pa'i don ni chos can yin no //--> yang ma yin te
column5: the tsom dngos dang ldan pas ma khyab cing 'jug rung tsam ni de ltar grub zin pa la yang yod pas ha cang khyab ches pa'i phyir ro
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1613-03-19,unreviewed,34b7 - 34b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""34b7""/> ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-03-19"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">gzhan dag</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note>  mthun yul phyogs mtshan nyid pa'i rnam pa tsam la byas nas de dang bsgrub bya'i chos yod du mthun mi mthun la brjod pa'ang mi rigs te
column4: rigs pas mi 'thad pa dang
column5: gzhung gi dgongs pa <lb n=""34b8""/> ma yin pa'i phyir ro
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1613-05-07,unreviewed,36a2 - 36a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""36a2""/> phyogs su 'du ba ni byas pa'i ldog pa sgra mi rtag par sgrub pa la ltos pa'i tshul gsuM tshang pas sgra mi rtag par bsgrub pa'i gtan tshigs su bsgrub pa lta bu'o
column3: bsgrub bya mthun phyogs la rtags mi mthun phyogs su 'du ba shes bya'i ldog pa med dgag gi tha snyad kyis stong pas ma yin dgag du bsgrub pa lta bu'o
column5: rtags mthun phyogs la bsgrub bya mi mthun phyogs su 'du ba stong nyid sgrub chos dor bas med dgag du bsgrub pa lta bu'o
column7: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-05-07"" status=""unreviewed"">'dir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> na re <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> du <lb n=""36a3""/> bas la la{} me sgrub pa'i tshe gtan tshigs du ba ni mi mthun phyogs yin te me steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zer ro
column9: <!--Also cited in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 89b6 kha cig me bsgrub pa'i rtags du ba ni mi mthun phyogs yin te me steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro

column1: de ni mi rigs te
column2: </seg>

column1: me steng du mi ldan yang du ba mthun phyogs yin pa ci 'gal te la la me bsgrub pa ni tshogs pa gcig par bsgrub pa yin la du ba la yang me tshogs pa gcig par ldan pa'i phyir ro
column3: de lta ma yin na ni ha cang thal bar 'gyur ro
column5: gzhan yang du ba'i mi mthun phyogs me med yin na me med pa'i phyir du</TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0313-59-01,unreviewed,36a5 - 36a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""36a5""/> dang 'bras rtags kyi bzlog khyab mi gcig cing
column2: 'bras rtags kyi rnal khyab du yod la me yod kyis khyab pa dang rgyu mi dmigs pa'i bzlog khyab du yod la me rgyur yod kyis khyab pa grub bde' mi gcig pas phan tshun 'phang 'phen ma yin par 'gyur ro
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0313-59-01"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4264"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4264"">gnyags <abbr>ye shes</abbr> 'bar</rs></note> bsgrub bya'i chos me nyid kyang mi mthun phyogs yin te me gzhan gnyis pa zhig steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro
column3: 'on kyang de la rtags zhugs pas ldog pa ma grub par mi 'gyur te
column4: <lb n=""36a6""/> me ma yin gyi gzhi' la du ba yod pa'i phyir zhes rtags khyad par can bkod pas de la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-48-37,unreviewed,42b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""42b1""/> ba'i bya ba 'di dpyod pa yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-48-37"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">che ba'i che ba dag</rs> rtags kyi tha snyad gnas pa'i rten du mtshan nyid tshul gsuM blos nges par byas pa mi dgos ste
column2: <hi rendition=""#petittitrechapitre"">rnam gcod med pa dang
column3: don gyi chos su mi 'thad pa dang
column4: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro</hi>
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-50-04,unreviewed,43a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""43a2""/>yin no zhes zer ro
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-50-04"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed""><!--presumably Tibetan opponent-->

column1: yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">blo gros rnam par dkar ba dag</rs> na re rtags kyi mtshan nyid du tshul gsuM blos nges par byas pa zhig dgos pa yin te
column2: <hi rendition=""#petittitrechapitre"">nges rung la ni bsgrub bya'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa dang
column3: tshul gsuM dngos po la ma grub pa dang ma mtshungs pa dang
column4: ha cang thal ba</hi>'i skyon gsum yod pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-17-13,unreviewed,45a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-17-13"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
tshogs pa'i spyi dang
column2: dpe' <lb n=""45a9""/> la yod pa'i khyad par rtags kyi mtshan gzhi' 'dod pa ni med mod kyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">kha cig <!--This view in presented in RT X 291,2, and attributed to ""sTod lung rgya dmar ba la sogs pa dag"" in RTGKh 223,17.--></rs> la'i du ba lasogs pa rtsod gzhis khyad par du byas pa rtags kyi mtshan gzhir 'dod do
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-18-48,unreviewed,51b2 - 51b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""51b2""/> gyi khyad par du byed chos la 'brel pas mi phan te khyad par du byed chos yod pa na byas chos yod par ma nges pa'i phyir ro
column3: de ltar na 'brel yul gyi ngo bo 'am khyad par du byas chos gnyis la 'brel chos kyi ngo bo 'am khyad par du byed chos gnyis 'brel pa'i 'brel pa bzhis phan la
column4: lhag ma lngas mi phan pas sngar gyi skyon de dag las grol bar rig par bya'o
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-18-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs></note> na re nam mkhar snang tsam chos can rtag ste ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu ste
column2: rtags de chos can <lb n=""51b5""/> du bkod tshod kyi nam mkhar snang tsam dang mi 'gal bas phyogs chos grub cing bsgrub bya rtag pa'i dngos po rten pa'i gzhi' dngos por gyur pa'i nam mkhar don gyis 'phangs pa de 'gog pas chos can 'gog pa'i 'gal ba yin no zhes smra'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1610-25-32,,52b2 - 52b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""52b2""/> srid pa'i phyir ro
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1610-25-32"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog</rs></note> na re rgyu 'bras nges par byed pa'i tshad ma ni <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du ma dmigs pa dang dmigs pa'i mngon suM lnga kho nas yin te
column2: 'di ltar dang <lb n=""52b3""/> po rgyu 'bras gnyis ka ma dmigs pa dang
column3: de nas rgyu dmigs pa dang
column4: de nas 'bras bu dmigs pa dang
column5: de nas rgyu log pas rgyu ma dmigs pa dang
column6: de nas 'bras bu log pas 'bras bu ma dmigs pa'i mngon sum mo zhes zer ro
column8: <!--This view is already mentioned in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 142a8-142b1 (kha cig gzhung las gsungs pa'i mi dmigs pa dang dmyigs pa'i mngon sum lngas de'i mtshan nyid rjes 'gro dang ldog pa nges pa yin no zhes zer ro
column10: ). It is also the view supported in <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 333,3-4 (mngon sum dang myi dmyigs pa rnam pa lngas rgyu 'bras kyi mtshan nyid nges pas de kho na tshad ma yin no

column1: de ni mi 'thad de
column2: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung</rs></note> gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma lngas nges pa yin nam 'on te rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma lngas nges pa yin
column3: dang po ltar na rnga'i sgra dang nyi ma'i 'od zer yang rgyu <lb n=""52b4""/> 'bras su thal te gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'gro ldog lan brgyar mthong pa'i phyir ro
column5: gnyis pa ltar na tshad ma lnga yis ci zhig bya ste rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma gsuM gyis rjes 'gro dngos su nges pas ldog pa shugs la 'phen pa'i phyir ro
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1613-09-57,unreviewed,55a1 - 55a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""55a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-09-57"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> na re lhan cig mi gnas pa <lb n=""55a2""/> 'i 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po gnyis la gnas pa'i chos gnod bya gnod byed ces pa'am
column2: rdzas kyi rgyun gcad bya dang gcod byed ces bya ba yin no zhes zer ro
column4: <!--The first part of this definition is also cited in RTRG VII 168,21. It is attributed to Lo <hi rendition=""#sanskritpasitalique"">tså </hi>ba chen po in RTGKh 153,10. Cf. <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 277,7-8 de la 'di'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po gnyis la brten pa'i chos gnod bya gnod byed kyi rang bzhin no

column1: de ni ma yin te </seg>
gnod bya gnod byed tshogs pa 'god na mi srid cing
column2: ya khyal 'god na ma khyab ste rgyu 'bras kyi mtshan nyid bzhin no
column4: </TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1610-30-05,unreviewed,62b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""62b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1610-30-05"" status=""unreviewed""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3809""><abbr>kha cig</abbr> </rs>na re <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung</rs></note> thal ba [la sgrub byed] 'phen pa'i thal ba dang sun 'byin pa'i thal ba gnyis su yod pas
column2: de gnyis la khyab pa'i mtshon bya thun mong ba cig med pas mtshan nyid kyang thun mong pa <abbr>med</abbr> ces pa rigs pa ma yin te
column3: de ltar na spyi'i mtshan nyid thams cad mi rung par 'gyuro
column5: </note> </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1611-01-15,,62b7 - 62b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""62b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1611-01-15""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4953"">kha cig</rs> na re rtags <lb n=""62b8""/> kyi ngo bo rgol ba'i zhe bas mi 'dod cing tshul gsuM gzhan gyis ci rigs par khas blangs pas dam bca' mi 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i ngag yin no zhes zer ro
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-47-58,unreviewed,64a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""64a1""/> gsuM gyis shes par bya ba las

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi blo gros{} chen po dag</rs> thal ba'i chos gsuM dang bzlog pa'i chos gsuM <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du gnad cig par 'chad de
column2: 'di ltar thal ba'i gtan tshigs khas blangs dang bzlog pa'i bsgrub bya shes 'dod gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang pa dang tshang par gnad gcig<hi rendition=""#FootnoteCharacters""><anchor xml:id=""a457""/></hi> ste
column3: pha rol po la la me med par khas len na gnyi' ka tshang la
column4: mi len na gnyis ka ma tshang pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-50-52,unreviewed,64a9 - 64b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""64a9""/> cing ma byas pa'i sgra tsam khegs pas ma byas pa'i nam mkha'i yon tan gyi sgra yang khegs pa'i phyir te
column2: spyi 'am spyi dang tshogs pa khegs pas bye brag dang tshogs pa khegs pa ni tshad ma rnams kyi byed pa yin te sa phyogs su bum pa tsam khegs pas gser gyi bum pa yang khegs pa bzhin no
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-50-52"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed""><!--presumably ref. to Tibetan-->

column1: yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">shing rta chen po'i srol dag</rs> ni 'dod tog gyis lan 'debs par byed te
column2: thal ba de dag gi 'dod pa la tshad mas bsal pa yod pas bzlog pa'i thal ba'i gtan tshigs grub par thal ba ni 'dod pa yin te
column3: <lb n=""64b1""/> mi rtag pa dang tshogs pa khegs pa nyid mi rtag pas stong pa'i phyogs chos yin pa'i phyir ro
column5: de bzhin du dgag bya yod pa dang tshogs pa khegs pa nyid yod pas stong pa'i bsgrub bya yin pas gzhi' sha za'i bum pa rtag pas stong pas stong zhes pa'i dgag pa'i rtags 'phen pa yin no zhes gsung ngo
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-55-26,reviewed,67a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-55-26"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

column9: gsung la brten nas gzhan phan yid kyis sbyar
column11: 'di las byung pa'i dge tshogs mthu' ldan des
column13: skye bo <abbr>thams cad</abbr> rigs lam 'dir zhugs te
column15: lta ngan g.yang sa'i ri bo rab bsnyil nas

column1: 1_002_01_rNgog Bre_yum brgyad stong don bsdus.xml,1_002_01,,ex2012023-07-1008-32-58,reviewed,22a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex2012023-07-1008-32-58"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""22a3""/> yul <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5645""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5546"">chos skor bsaM yas</rs> kyi lung phran mchims phu'i gtsug lag khang</rs> du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6037"">mang du thos pa'i <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6037"">khu lha sdings pa</rs> la</note> dge slong ¦ bshes gnyen lha sdings pa</rs>'i gsung gi bdud rtsi <note type=""gloss"">(lhung pos)?</note> la ngoms ngoms su 'thungs pa <rs type=""deity"">bde bar gshegs pa</rs>'i bka' rab 'byaMs pa <note type=""gloss"">rtsod pa myed pa rnaMs la</note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5828"">blo gros kyi snang pa rab tu rgyas pa khyung po 'dul ba 'dzin pa</rs>'i spyan sngar bdag mchod nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4451""><note type=""gloss"">lho brag rong pa</note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4451""/>bla ma 'od</rs> kyis yig mkhan byas nas bris so
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_029_04 bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi lus mdzes par byed pa.xml,1_029_04,,ex29042023-09-112,unreviewed,47b7 - 48a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex29042023-09-112""><lb n=""47b7""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4676""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> gyi lus mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan legs par bshad pa rin po che'i tshoms </rs>bsgrigs pa <lb n=""48a1""/> 'di ni
column2: lung gi sbyor ba mang po dang
column3: 'dod lugs sna tshogs dang
column4: dgag sgrub kyi rtsod lan mang po bris na sde snod la ma sbyangs pa'i gang zag gi ngo bar <lb n=""48a2""/> dka' bas
column5: theg pa chen po'i sa lam gyi rim pa shin tu gsal zhing rtogs sla ba
column6: tshig gis ma sgrib pa
column7: gsar bu thos pa chung bas bltas kyang blo la 'char bde ba cig <lb n=""48a3""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rtsa ba</rs> dang sbyar nas gzhung gi go ba longs pa la'ang phan par 'gyur zhing
column8: 'jug pa bde bar bris shig zhes
column9: bsnyen bkur
column10: me tog bzang po dang bcas <lb n=""48a4""/> te
column11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'tsho ba'i rig byed la mkhas pa'i go 'phang thob pa
column12: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""><!--who is kun dga' rgyal mtshan-->kun dga' rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis snga mo nas yang yang bskul ba las
column13: btang snyoms la re shig <lb n=""48a5""/> 'gyangs par gyur na'ang
column14: <hi rendition=""#Time"">shing pho rta'i lo</hi>  ljon shing dang  sa gzhi rnaMs lo 'dab dang
column15: <hi rendition=""#Time"">rtswa ljang gi myu gu skyed pa'i dus</hi> su  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5781"">bsod snyoms pa rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal <lb n=""48a6""/> bzang po</rs>s yi ger bkod pa 'dis kyang  thub pa'i bstan pa dang
column16: sems can la phan bde 'byung par gyur cig
column17: <rs type=""work"">mngon rtogs rgyan gyi rtsa ba</rs> <abbr>thaMs cad</abbr> la sbyar ba'i bshad pa byas na'ang <lb n=""48a7""/> ha cang rgyas pas go dka' ba'i char gyur dgos nas  lus rnam bzhag dang sbyar ba yin cing
column18: 'di tsam zhig legs par go na  <rs type=""work"">'grel pa TI ka</rs> dang bcas pa bltas pas <lb n=""48b1""/> shes par 'gyur ba lags so
column22: × maNG ga laM sid d+hi × shu b+haM
column24: × dge'o
column28: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex19082023-03-0908-24-527,unreviewed,3a4 - 3a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-24-527"" status=""unreviewed"">bsdus don gyis <lb n=""3a4""/><abbr>'bras bu</abbr> bshad yin ¦ nas ni ces pa mtshams sbyor gyi tshig ste bya ba gzhan 'dren par byed pa yin la / de yang phyag gi yul klu sgrub de yis mdzad pa'i dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa bya ces sbyor ro
column3: ci 'dra cig byed ce na ¦ khyad par bzhi ldan ste ¦ tshig mtshams 'byor zhing don gsal bas slu ba dang ¦ sdeb sbyor gyi gtsug lag dang mthun zhing khyad par<lb n=""3a5""/> gyi gzhi ngag don khags pa dang ¦ dbu ma'i don ¦ chos rnaMs la bden par rtog pa'i rlung gis ma dkrugs pa dang / tshig gi <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> gnyer ba dang don gyi mtshams sbyor lasogs bshad dgos pa mi 'chad pa ma yin te legs par 'chad pa dang ¦ gzhung mthong pa tsam gyis don go bas bshad mi dgos pa mi 'chad pa dang ¦ rtsa ba mkhan po'i dgongs pa mi 'chad pa ma <lb n=""3a6""/> yin te legs par 'chad pa dang ¦ de las gzhan skabs su ma bab pa 'chad pa ma yin te skabs su bab pa nyid 'chad pa dang / brjod bya'i gtso bo la mi sbyor ba ma yin skabs kyi brjod bya ngos bzung nas ston pas ¦ rab tu gsal ba cig bya'o ces pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> gi'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex19082023-03-0908-24-528,unreviewed,3a6 - 3a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a6""/> yin te legs par 'chad pa dang ¦ de las gzhan skabs su ma bab pa 'chad pa ma yin te skabs su bab pa nyid 'chad pa dang / brjod bya'i gtso bo la mi sbyor ba ma yin skabs kyi brjod bya ngos bzung nas ston pas ¦ rab tu gsal ba cig bya'o ces pa ni<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-24-528"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> 'them sbyor sngar bzhin la khyad par gyi chos ni ¦ ci 'dra cig byed ce na gsal ba <lb n=""3a7""/> cig bya'o ces sbyar ste de yang tshig gsal ba slu zhing bsdeb legs ngag gis sbyar ba don gsal ba rtog ges rlang gis ma dkrugs pa'o ces pa ni legs bshad do
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex19082023-03-0908-48-24,unreviewed,4b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b3""/>dngos su mchod pa brjod pa'i shugs la dgos 'brel bzhi bstan pa'i phyir ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-48-24"" status=""unreviewed"">bstan bya bzhir grangs nges pa'i rgyu mtshan ni ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">'ga' zhig</rs> na re bstan bcos la mdzad pa po'i khyad par lasogs yon tan mang po yod pa'i phyir dgos 'brel bzhir grangs nges pa med do zhe na
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex19082023-03-0908-37-39,unreviewed,5b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b1""/>pa'i e na'i i sgyur tshul sngar dang 'dra la
column2: de bsgyur ba'i the na ces pa ni tu ga ces par 'gyur
column3: des khyab kyi la dang ba mi mngon par yang ha rkyang par 'gyur ro
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-37-39"" status=""unreviewed"">de ltar 'gyur ba des gong gi tu ga'i ga dang zhabs kyu mi mngon par ta rkyang par 'gyur la de 'og gi ya sta dang sbrel bas rgya ces par 'gyur te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> gi'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex19082023-03-0909-02-13,unreviewed,25b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0909-02-13"" status=""unreviewed"">gal te 'jig rten grags pa'i tshad ma de nyid dbu ma thal 'gyur ba khyod kyis kyang gtan la dbab dgos te / rang rgyud pa kho bo cag gis kyang tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i tha snyad 'jig rten la grags pa 'di' <lb n=""25b3""/>bstan bcos su brjod pa yin no snyam na ¦</seg>
de ltar yin na ¦ de bstan bcos su brjod pa'i dgos pa bsnyad dgos so
column3: de'i dgos pa ni rgyang 'phan pa'i rtog ge ba dag gis tshad ma'i mtshan nyid phyin ci log bzung don la mi 'khrul ba la brjod pas
column5: de'i rjes su 'jug pa po'i gang zag gi phan bde blag par byas pas kho bo cag gis de rjes su gzung pa'i phyir tshad</TEI>"

column1: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex1908202302281313,unreviewed,32b3 - 32b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""32b3""/> pa ni ma yin pa de'i phyir * gnen na yong zhing grags pa'i blta ba bzhin min pa ngag ces pa ni 'jig rten grags pa tsam yin gyi gnod med kyi tshad ma ni ma yin snyaM du bsaMs pa'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1908202302281313"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

column1: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4610""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3724""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3715"">dbu ma rtsa ba</rs>'i 'grel pa tshig gsal ba</rs>'i bshad pa nges don rnaM par gzigs pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di la tshig gi <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> bshad pa dang ¦ gzhung ngag don du 'chad pa dang ¦ khyad par gyi <lb n=""32b4""/> gzhi bsdus te 'them sbyor du bshad pa dang ¦ ngag don gyis mtshams sbyar te gzhung rtags sbyor gyi khongs su bsdus te bshad pa dang
column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3715"">rtsa ba mdo</rs> dang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5826"">dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5530"">de 'chad byed kyi Ti ka</rs> rnams dgongs pa cig tu ston pas thub pa'i bstan pa'i yan lag tu 'brel par 'chad pas
column4: 'chad pa po gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa 'di ni thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor <lb n=""32b5""/> lo rim gsuM bskor nas lnga brgya phrag bdun pas lhag pa na
column5: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4326"">ma ga da rdo rje'i gdan pa</rs>s byang phyogs su dpag tshad brgya bsgrod pa'i gnas su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang phyogs su dar par 'gyur ro  zhes lung bstan pa ltar grub pa na lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid khong du chud nas smra ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4608"">shag kya'i dge slong shes rab 'buM</rs> gyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5572"">brag raM gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar <lb n=""32b6""/> ba'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_02_chos_mngon_W1PD89084-I1KG13413-95-202-any.xml,2_044_02,,ex44022024-11-2014-54-51,unreviewed,8a4 - 8a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a4""/>ma na zhes bzhung ba dang
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44022024-11-2014-54-51"" status=""unreviewed""> nga rgyal la mA na ba zhes ring par yod pa lo tsha bas ma phyed par sgra nor ba ste
column3: don la nga rgyal yin no zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4261"">mkhas pa chen po mchims brtson <lb n=""8a5""/>'grus seng ge</rs> gsung ngo
column5: </seg>

column1: de ltar na sems byung bzhi bcu rtsa drug po dang
column2: gzhi phan tshogs la 'byung ba'i mi dga' ba dang gal byed pa dang
column3: sems zhum pa nyid dang</TEI>"

column1: 2_044_02_chos_mngon_W1PD89084-I1KG13413-95-202-any.xml,2_044_02,,ex44022024-11-2014-51-17,unreviewed,108b3 - 108b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""108b3""/>dang nying nge 'dzin gyi dbye ba lasogs pa bshad zin to
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44022024-11-2014-51-17"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone n=""colophon"" unit=""section""/>

column1: de ltar <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bdag</rs> gis <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4763""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3761"">chos mngon rin chen mdzod</rs>
gsal ba'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba 'di bshad de
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6978"">  dam chos <lb n=""108b4""/>snang ldan 'jam dpal grags pa</rs> yis
yang yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bdag</rs> la bskul ba'i slad du'o
gal te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bdag</rs> gis 'dir bshad gang yin la
nongs par gyur pa cung zad <lb n=""108b5""/>mchis na de
gang la blo gros spangs pa'i spyan mnga' ba
mkhas rnams dag gis bzod pa mdzad pa'i rigs
'di brtsams dge ba kun da'i phyed ba                <lb n=""108b6""/>ltar
rnam par dkar ba'i bsod nam <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bdag</rs> gis ni
legs par skrun pa'i dge ba ci mchis pa
mtshungs med rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob phyir bsngo
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-13-51,unreviewed,11.1 - 11.3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-13-51"" status=""unreviewed"">
<lb n=""11.1""/>lan gnyis pa ni 'di<lb n=""11.2""/> la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3834"">rgya</rs>na re <note type=""gloss"">'di dag thams cad ma rungs pa
column3: rigs pa'i rnam dbye med pa'i skyon
column5: de phyir rnam<lb n=""11.3""/> dbye shes par bya
column7: </note> don dam dpyod pa'i rigs shes dang
column8: tha snyad kun rdzob pa<lb n=""11.4""/> 'jal ba'i tshad ma gnyis las snga ma ni dgag bya la brtag bzod dpyad<lb n=""11.5""/> bzod 'gegs la gzhal bya'ang brtag bzod dpyad bzod 'jal ba'o
column10: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-13-46,unreviewed,11.13 - 11.19,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11.13""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-13-46"" status=""unreviewed"">
de la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3831"">phya pa</rs><lb n=""11.14""/> na re gzhal bya'i ngos nas khyad 'byed pa ni bden yang
column2: dgag bya'i ngos nas<lb n=""11.15""/> don dam du dpyod pa'i rigs shes dang tha snyad kun rdzob pa'i bye brag 'byed<lb n=""11.16""/> pa ni ma yin te
column3: de lta na don dam pa stong pa nyid spros bral chos can dngos<lb n=""11.17""/> por med de rim dang cig car gyis don byed pas stong pa'i phyir zhes pa'i<lb n=""11.18""/> rtags la rten pa'i rjes dpag 'di dgag bya brtag mi bzod<lb n=""11.19""/> dpyad mi bzod 'gogs pas tha snyad pa'i tshad mar thal lo
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-13-59,unreviewed,12.15 - 12.19,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-13-59"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""12.15""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">byang skyabs</rs> ni dgag bya bden pa'i dngos po 'gegs pa'i cha nas don dam<lb n=""12.16""/> dpyod pa'i rigs shes kyang yin la
column2: gzhal cha sgyu ma lta bu 'jam ba'i cha nas<lb n=""12.17""/> tha snyad pa'i tshad ma yin no zhes 'dod par byed na nyes pa snga ma'ang dpyad<lb n=""12.18""/> par bya ba yin la
column3: spyir cha med kyi gcig dang du ma bkag pa na de'i shul<lb n=""12.19""/> du cha bcas gcig lus sam mi lus pa'ang dpyad so yin no zhes gsung so
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-14-51,unreviewed,59.21 - 60.1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-14-51"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""59.21""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3805"">zhang tshes</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""383831"">phya pa</rs> ni mtha' gzhan du srid pa'i <pb n=""60""/><lb n=""60.1""/>dogs pa dang bcas pa'o zhes zer ro
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-14-11,unreviewed,63.5 - 63.10,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-14-11"" status=""unreviewed"">
<lb n=""63.5""/>'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">jo btsun</rs> na re<lb n=""63.6""/>mtshon bya ba lang zhes bya ba ni dngos med kun brtags yin la
column2: mtshan nyid ni<lb n=""63.7""/> nog dang lkog shal ni dngos po ba yin pas mtshon bya dang mtshan nyid gnyis<lb n=""63.8""/> gcig pa bkag pa'i tha dad yin no zhes zer ba la
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3810"">gangs pa</rs>s mtshon bya ba<lb n=""63.9""/> lang dngos med kun brtags de la mtshan nyid nog dang lkog shal dngos po<lb n=""63.10""/> ba de mi srid do zhes brjod do
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-14-22,unreviewed,89.12 - 89.15,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-14-22"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""89.12""/>gnyis pa grangs nyung pa dgag pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""4207"">me dig pa</rs> na re mtshan nyid kyi skyon<lb n=""89.13""/> thams cad gsum du 'du ste
column2: mtshan nyid rnal mar 'gro ba la skyon gsum dang<lb n=""89.14""/> bral dgos pa'i phyir dang
column3: skyon gsum gang dang ma bral yang mtshan nyid rnal<lb n=""89.15""/> mar mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro
column5: </seg>

column1: skyon gsum dang bral ba tsam gyis mtshan nyid rnal mar 'gro ba'i brda' ba ni ma mchis so zhes zer ro
column3: </TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-14-34,unreviewed,113.14 - 113.18,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-14-34"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""113.14""/>de la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""4206"">stag pa</rs> na re 'jug yul bstan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis skyes bu<lb n=""113.15""/> don grub la nus pa gnas pa zhes pa la 'dod la
column2: des na gcig dang du bral<lb n=""113.16""/> gyi rtags la brten pa'i rjes dpag la ma khyab pa med de
column3: 'jug yul stong nyid<lb n=""113.17""/> bstan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis lan gcig rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum thob pas skyes<lb n=""113.18""/> bu'i don grub pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-15-42,unreviewed,122.18 - 122.20,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-15-42"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""122.18""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">kha cig</rs> na re 'o na la chos can rtag pa'i me yod de du ba yod pa'i phyir ces<lb n=""122.19""/> pa'ang yang dag gi rtags su thal te brten pa rtag mi rtag la 'khrul yang rten<lb n=""122.20""/> me tsam la ma 'khrul bas so zhes zer ba la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">lo tsa ba</rs>s 'dod thog du byas so
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-15-13,unreviewed,155.7 - 155.8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-15-13"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""155.7""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">slob dpon klu sgrub</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">jo bo rje</rs> la sogs pa yang lung<lb n=""155.8""/> tshad ma dang nyer 'jal gyi tshad ma ste bzhir bzhed do
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-15-33,unreviewed,166.14 - 166.16,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-15-33"" status=""unreviewed"">
<lb n=""166.14""/>'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""4270"">rgya grags bsod</rs> na re rang rig la gzung ba yod dam med
column2: med na<lb n=""166.15""/> gzung don la ma 'khrul ba mi 'thad la
column3: yod na sems cam pas gzung 'dzin gnyis<lb n=""166.16""/> med ma rtogs par thal lo
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-15-28,unreviewed,169.4 - 169.6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-15-28"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""169.4""/>'di la rnal<lb n=""169.5""/> 'byor gyi mngon sum skye ba'i rten gyi gang zag la sogs pa lngas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">lo tsa ba</rs> 'chad<lb n=""169.6""/> mod kyi 'dir mi spro'o
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,$,,exx222024-11-01-14-39,unreviewed,263.6 - 263.13,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exx222024-11-01-14-39"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""263.6""/>'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3837"">g.yor rnyan</rs> na re yod la skad cig<lb n=""263.7""/> gi mi rtag pas khyab pa mngon sum gyis dngos su nges pa'i phyir 'phags par<lb n=""263.8""/> thal lo zhe na rtags ma grub la
column2: yod pa la skad cig gi mi rtag pa shugs las<lb n=""263.9""/> nges pa'i phyir 'phags par thal lo zhe na khyab pa ma grub bo zhes zer ba ni<lb n=""263.10""/> 'khrul ba kho na ste byas yod la skad cig gi mi rtag pas khyab pa dngos su nges<lb n=""263.11""/> kyang rung shugs las nges kyang rung ste rtag par 'dzin pa dang gcig pur<lb n=""263.12""/> 'dzin pa'i bdag mngon sum gyis mi khegs pas 'phags par thal ba'i nyes<lb n=""263.13""/> pa gnas so zhes gsung ngo
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_037_01 Blo gros rgyal mtshan_'dul ba mdo'i rnam bshad nyi ma'i rgyan.xml,2_037_01,,ex37012023-09-11-145230,unreviewed,225a2 - 225a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex37012023-09-11-145230""><lb n=""225a2""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4728"">'dul ba mdo'i rnam bshad mdo'i nyi ma'i rgyan </rs>zhes <lb n=""225a3""/> bya ba di ni
column2: 'dul ba 'dzin pa stan 1 pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4311"">nam_mkha' rin chen</rs> dang

column1: lung riGS smra ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""> <!--grub pa seng ge ???-->grub pa seng ge</rs>
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""><!--dpal ldan seng ge ???-->dka' bcu 'dzin pa <abbr>dpal ldan</abbr> seng ge</rs>

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:""><!--byang chub dpal ???-->'dul ba 'dzin pa byang chub dpal</rs> la <abbr>sogs pa</abbr> don du gnyer <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob ma rnams</rs> kyi bskul <abbr>ba'i</abbr> ngor: mkhyen rabs <lb n=""225a4""/> dang <abbr>thugs rje</abbr>'i mnga' bdag lhar bcas 'gro ba kun gyi <abbr>gtsug gi</abbr> <abbr>nor bu</abbr> <abbr>mkhan chen</abbr> <abbr>rin po che'i</abbr> <abbr>byin gyis</abbr> brlabs shing 'dul ba 'buM sde'i mnga' bdag 'dul ba 'dzin pa<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4003""> dmar ston dpal_ldan rin chen <?oxy_comment_start comment=""P10033?""?><?oxy_comment_end?></rs> dang :  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4004"">'dul ba 'dzin pa nam_mkha' rgyal mtshan<?oxy_comment_start comment=""P71?""?><?oxy_comment_end?>gyi</rs> sku drin la [b]rten_nas: <rs type=""work"">'dul <lb n=""225a5""/> ba mdo rtsa ba</rs>'i tshig don la <abbr>blo gros kyi</abbr> snang ba <abbr>cung zad</abbr> 'chod pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4002""><abbr>dge slong blo gros rgyal mtshan</abbr></rs> gyis
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dpal_ldan bla ma</rs>s <abbr>byin gyis</abbr> brlabs <abbr>pa'i</abbr> gdan sa: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5748"">yol rin chen <abbr>gling gi</abbr> gtsug lag khang<anchor xml:id=""a1""/> </rs>du <hi rendition=""#Time"">lnga brgya phrag brgyad pa'i drug bcu re 3 pa: sa mo bya: zhi ba<anchor xml:id=""a2""/>'i lo <lb n=""225a6""/> dbyar zla ra ba<anchor xml:id=""a3""/>'i yar ngo'i tshes 3<anchor xml:id=""a4""/> </hi>la zin bris_su bkod pa'o
column3: <abbr>mkhan chen rin po che nas</abbr> 'dis pha mas gtso byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>sems can</abbr> <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyis <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen <abbr>pa'i</abbr> go 'phang myur du thob par gyur cig
column4: yige pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4729"">shAkya'i dge slong blo gros seng ge</rs>'o

column1: phyoGS dus gnas <lb n=""225a7""/> skabs <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du bkrashis par gyu[r] cig

column1: 4_105_02_I_R_M_bang chub lam gyi sgron ma las dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro.xml,4_105_02,,ex105022023-10-06-102531,unreviewed,29a2-29a5 - 29a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex105022023-10-06-102531"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""29a2-29a5""/>bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug pa'i sgo [29a3] thog ma ; gang dang ldan pas nang pa sangs rgyas par 'jog pa’i khyad chos bla na med ; ci bsam pa’i don rnams myur du 'grub par byed pa’i thabs kyi <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5409""> mchog dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas de'i bslabs bya la rnams la</rs> <lb n=""29a4""/> <rs type=""work"">slob pa'i tshul</rs> phyin ci ma log par dam pa rnams kyi gsung la brten ste legs par bshad pa 'di ni mang du thos pa'i dge slong song ba pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4113"">dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bang</rs> zhes bya bas : <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5722"">dpal byams chen</rs> gyi gnas su legs <lb n=""29a5""/> par sbyar ro
'dis bstan pa dang sems can la phan pa rgya che po 'byung bar gyur cig
column4: dge'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40012024-10-25-12-39,unreviewed,7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7""/> rgyu mtshan ni the de
de nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 2 gang zag gyi bdag pa pa rtogs par shes pa'i la 'dra
bas laM gyi dmigs pa 'ang 1 pa'i phyir ste snod 1 du gzhag pa yin zhes nzer ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40012024-10-25-12-39"" status=""unreviewed"">

column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""4243"">

column1: b+han</rs> na re rang sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas myi bzhugs pa'i zhing khaMs su skye ba'i phyir bcoM
ldan 'das kyi 'khor du chos nyan du mi 'ong bas de'i don du bstan pa'i chos Na pa'i yin
pas nyan thos gyi sde snod las gud pa Na pa yin zhes sero
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40012024-10-25-14-01,unreviewed,N007,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N007""/> yang mdzod kyi
'brel pa las sngon gyi slob dpon des na re lo na ba'i shis pa'i yul du gyur ba ni kun
rdzob kyi bden pa yin la
column3: log pas 'das pa'i yes dang de'i rjes las thob pa'i sel gyi

column1: yul ni don daM pa'i bden pa yin zhes bshad snga ma dang don mthun par 'dod do

column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40012024-10-25-13-07,unreviewed,5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5""/> de la yang snang ba mi sel ba'i lugs dang sel ba'i lugs so

column1: mi sel ba ni rigs pa'i shes pa la chos can gzugs lasol snang bar 'dod pa ste
column2: gal te rig pa nges

column1: la chos can mi snang na rigs shes kyis chos can snang ba 'di la sgro 'dogs mi chod par
'gyur te
column2: myig ra shes la sgra myi snang bas sgra la sgro 'dogs mi chod pa bzhino

column1: zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3809"">jo btsun</rs> rjes 'bra ba dod do
column2: </seg>
sem ba la yang 2 las chos can snang</TEI>"

column12: gzhan dan de mi 'ong ste 'di ma skyes pa skyed rgyu la 'bras bu gnas par 'dod pa la 'ong pa yin gyi 'di ma rtogs pa rtogs pa'i rgyu yin pas so zhes zer ro

column1: 3_087_04_Blo gros mtshungs med_tshad ma don bsdus.xml,3_087_04,,ex87042024-09-1215-46-3123,unreviewed,13a1 - 13a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""13a1""/> yang mtshan mtshon gyi rnam gzhag med dus kyi bum pa chos can
column2: mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi la mi gnas pa yin par thal
column3: mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi la ji ltar dgod bya ltar ma grub pa'i phyir
column4: rtags ma grub na der thal mtshan nyid gtam tshigs mtshan gzhi la ma grub pa'o
column6: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87042024-09-1215-46-3123"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">chu mig pa</rs>s bum pa rgyus bskyed du mtshon pa la <lb n=""13a2""/> skad cig ma mtshan nyid du bkod pa mtshan nyid skyon med du 'dod pa mi 'thad de
column7: mtshon bya yang skyon med du 'gyur na rang ldog tha snyad du ma grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro
column9: khyab pa khas kyang blangs de gang rung skyon can yin na gsum ga skyon can du 'gyur bas khyab pa'i phyir ro
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_04_Blo gros mtshungs med_tshad ma don bsdus.xml,3_087_04,,ex87042023-10-04-133,unreviewed,[15a4],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[15a4]""/> de phyir rmongs pa'i nga rgyal bcom pa dang
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87042023-10-04-133"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5294"">tshad ma'i don bsdus pa</rs> las mtshan nyid kyi le'u ste dang po'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_04_Blo gros mtshungs med_tshad ma don bsdus.xml,3_087_04,,ex87042023-10-04-135,unreviewed,61b3 - 61b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""61b3""/> bgyang ji bzhin rtogs pa'i blo la stod
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87042023-10-04-135"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5294"">tshad ma'i don bsdus pa</rs> zhes bya ba'i bstan bc[o]s 'di ni <lb n=""61b4""/> lung dang [r]igs pa man ngag gyi tshul la dbang 'byor pa
column4: mkhas pa'i <abbr>gtsug gi</abbr> rgyan du gyur pa
column5: <anchor xml:id=""a3""/> phyogs ma lus par snyan pa rab tu <abbr>grags</abbr> pa <?oxy_comment_start comment=""*""?><?oxy_comment_end?>can
column6: 'gran zla dang bral ba'i mkhas pa chen po <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4095"">dbang phyug dpal<anchor xml:id=""a4""/></rs> gyi bka' drin pas rab tu byed pa <rs type=""work"">sde bdun mdo</rs> dang bcas [pa? legs???]par sbyor bas rnams (read: rnam) spyod <lb n=""61b5 *""/>rtog rig pa'i tshul khon du chud pa gzhung luGS{} la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4094"">chen po_blo gros mtshungs med</rs> la (BDRC falsly notes, or corrects?: pas) don du gnyer ba'i slob ma blo gsal zhing yid gzhungs pa du mas yang dang yang du bskul zhing <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5957""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5949"">mnga' ris</rs> pa dge'i ba'i bshes
column7: <?oxy_comment_start comment=""*""?><?oxy_comment_end?> gnyen 'od zer seng ge</rs>s shog gu yang phul nas snar ********** <lb n=""61b6""/> kyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5733"">dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang</rs> du legs par sbyar ba rdzogs s+ho
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_041_01_bzad_rin_mo_AS_W1PD89084.xml,2_041_01,,ex41012024-09-1014-28-24,unreviewed,3b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b8""/>yin par 'gyuro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex41012024-09-1014-28-24"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> na re rtso pa'i skabs mngon du byas nas gzhung mdzes par 'gyur ba tsaM ngag de'i <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> yin la
column4: de yang rang <abbr>bzhin</abbr> kyi mdezs pa ngag 'di'i <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> mi 'dod kyi bcos mas ba shes pa ngag gis <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> 'dod pas gzhung 'buM pa laswo pa rang <abbr>bzhin</abbr> gyi mdzes  pa yod kyang dgos 'brel gyi ngag <abbr>med</abbr> pas bcos mas ma shes pa <abbr>med</abbr> do zhes zer pa yang </seg>

column1: ma yin te
column2: gzhung mdzes pa nyid</TEI>"

column1: 2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-01-3114-45-40,reviewed,2b6 - 2b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b6""/>]med mngon sum gyi snang yul rang mtshan chos can
column2: _rtog pa'i snang yul dang gcig min par thal
column3: _khyod yin na thun mong ma yin par snang ba'i dngos po yin
column4: _rtog pa'i snang yul yin na thun mong bar snang ba'i phyir
column5: _<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-45-40"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><abbr>thun mong</abbr> dang de <abbr>min par</abbr> snang yang <abbr>gcig</abbr> du zhen pas <abbr>gcig</abbr> yin zhe na ¦

column1: <abbr>thun mong</abbr> min bar snang <abbr>ba'i</abbr> se gol gyi sgra <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang 'dzin rtog <abbr>pa'i</abbr> snang yul dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> min <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦<lb n=""2b7""/> <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ don daM par don byed nus <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ tshad ma <abbr>gnyis</abbr> gang rung min <abbr>ba'i</abbr> rtog tshad kyi <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""><abbr>chos mchog</abbr> </rs>dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA ba</rs>'o ¦</seg></TEI>"

2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-02-0310-54-47,reviewed,2b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-02-0310-54-47"" status=""reviewed""><!--unclear whether ""sgros"" is Indian or Tibetan -->

lkog gyur <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang 'dzin <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> gyis bzung don du byas nas <abbr>rtogs</abbr> par mi 'thad <choice><orig>{°}par</orig><reg>par</reg></choice> thal ¦ rang 'dzin <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> la rang 'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod <abbr>pa'i</abbr> nus pas stong ba <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5565"">sgros</rs> dang <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">chos mchog</rs> go</abbr>
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-01-3114-46-20,reviewed,2b7 - 2b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-46-20"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

tshad ma <abbr>gnyis</abbr> gang rung min <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <lb n=""2b8""/> rtog tshad kyis rtogs par mi 'thad  <choice><orig>{°}par</orig><reg>par</reg></choice> thal ¦ rang 'dzin gyi blo la rang 'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod <abbr>pa'i</abbr> nus pas stong <abbr>pa'i</abbr> spyi mtshan <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">lo tsA ba</rs>'o
</seg></TEI>"

column2: _rang gi [\[]bzung [;]gzung [\]]don dang bar chod pa rgyang ring por gnas pa dang nye bar gnas tshe khyod dngos su skye bar thal
column3: _rang gzung don la mi ltos par skye ba'i dbang mngon yin pa'i phyir
column4: _<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-27-10"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

column1: rang gzung don gyi dngos 'bras min <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <lb n=""4b2""/>de'i nus pa nye ba la mi ltos <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""4018"">chu <abbr>mig</abbr></rs><abbr> go</abbr> ¦</seg></TEI>"

2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-02-0110-17-09,reviewed,4b3 - 4b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b3""/>[\[p.258-3\]]sogs 'jig rten gyi tha snyad 'jug par byed do zhe na
