column1: tshe snga phyi la <abbr>dmigs</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> mngon <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ khyod tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>rtogs</abbr> byed <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ khyod <abbr>med</abbr> dgag <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ ma khyab na ¦<lb n=""4b4""/><abbr>med</abbr> dgag yin na tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>med</abbr> dgag yin tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>byed du</abbr> 'gal <abbr>ba'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">chos mchog </rs> gi</abbr> don du mngon ces <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5565"">sgros</rs> so</abbr></seg></TEI>"
2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-01-3114-30-48,reviewed,6a5 - 6a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a5""/>zhe na
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-30-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas pa'i <abbr>gzugs</abbr> zhes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>bag chags</abbr> sad pa <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod par mi <abbr>rigs</abbr> te ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> bag <abbr>chags</abbr> sad pa des <choice><orig>khyod {°} byas</orig><reg>khyod byas</reg></choice> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr> na ¦ brda la byang <lb n=""6a6""/> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> skyes bu <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> zhes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming las <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi don mi 'dzin <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa de <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> bag chags sad pa des ma byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba las byung <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba de <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod par mi <abbr>rigs</abbr> te ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba des khyod byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr> na ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> <lb n=""6a7""/> mthong ba las byung <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa min <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba des khyod ma byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr>
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5566"">yongs 'dzin</rs> gsung ¦</seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-03-17-8-49,reviewed,7a9 - 7b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7a9""/>pa'i phyir
column2: _<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-03-17-8-49"" status=""reviewed""><abbr>gal te</abbr> <abbr>med</abbr> pa dang <choice><sic>khyad</sic><corr>khyod</corr></choice> yod kha dog <abbr>med</abbr> na khyod reg bya <abbr>med</abbr> de <abbr>med</abbr> na kha dog 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ kha dog 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> du gyur <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'dir rtog bskyed pas de'i gzung <abbr>don no</abbr> zhe na ¦

column1: da lta'i buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang mngon gyi rgyud rgyur song <abbr>ba'i</abbr> yul dang blo °°° <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ da lta'i buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang mngon gyi gzung don du thal ¦ de brgyud nas bskyed <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <pb n=""7b""/><lb n=""7b1""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""><abbr>chos mchog</abbr></rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5565"">sgros</rs> so
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-01-3114-47-20,reviewed,7b1 - 7b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-47-20"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">yang na nyin par buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong mtshan mo buM pa la reg tshe 'di buM dmar po'i snyaM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'di rtog <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang gi gzung don nye ba la <choice><orig>ltos ××pa</orig><reg>ltos pa</reg></choice> ma yin par thal ¦ rang <abbr>gi gzung</abbr> don nye ba <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr>  te ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de gzung don no zhe na ¦

buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi gzung don du <abbr>med par thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod la rang <lb n=""7b2""/>'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod byed min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi dngos kyi spyod yul min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦
dbang po'i <abbr>sogs</abbr> phyi ma <abbr>gnyis</abbr> dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog khyod kyi gzung don yin te ¦ des khyod rgyud nas bskyed pa'i phyir zhe na ¦
'das pa yang <abbr>sogs</abbr> sngar dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> ¦
column2: nyin par buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong mtshan mo buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> reg bya la reg tshe 'di buM pa dmar po'o snyaM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'di rtog <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦<lb n=""7b3""/>buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang po'i <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi gzung don du <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi <choice><orig>{°°°}dngos</orig><reg>dngos</reg></choice> kyi spyod yul min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5551"">dz+nya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""><abbr>chos mchog</abbr> </rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">lo tswa ba</rs>'o
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 4_107_01_I_kun dga rgyal mtshan_BPP.xml,4_107_01,,ex107012023-10-06-110204,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex107012023-10-06-110204"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"" status=""unreviewed"">shing rta chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi thugs kyi bcud phyung ba <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5421"">byang chub lam gyi sgron ma'i rnam par bshad pa phul byung dgongs pa'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">jo bo chen po</rs> <rs type=""place"">bod yul</rs> du phyags phab nas <hi rendition=""#Time"">lo bzhi brgya dang nga brgyad</hi> 'das pa na
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">bla ma dam pa rnams</rs> kyi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba <rs type=""person"" ana="""">dge slong kun mtshan</rs> gyis <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen</rs> gong ma dag gi gsung la gces spras su dang nan tan du byas te rang bzo dang bral bar
column4: dpal <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5765"">rtses thang gi chos gra chen po</rs>r legs par bsdebs pa'o

column1: 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig
column2: drag po zhes bya lcags spre'u  dbyar 'bring gi
column4: rgyal bas chos 'khor skor ba'i dus chen la
column6: shing  rta'i lam <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5421"">chen byang chub lam sgron gyi
column8: rnam bshad phul byung dgongs pa'i rgyan</rs> 'di grub
column12: </seg></TEI>"

yang <rs type=""person"" ana="""">bla ma rin po che 'gos lo tsA ba{</rs>P318<rs type=""person"" ana="""">}</rs>

column1: 2_031_02_brTson grus pa _dul ba od ldan gyi TIk+ka.xml,2_031_02,,ex31022024-10-2116-00-36,unreviewed,1b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex31022024-10-2116-00-36"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana="""">mang du thos pa'i slob dpon chen po <lb n=""1b2""/> shag kya 'od</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""Śākyaprabha, P4CZ16819""?><?oxy_comment_end?> kyis mdzad pa'i
column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">'dul ba 'od ldan</rs> la don gsum ste
column4: rtsom pa dang 'brel pa dang
column5: rtse ba'i don dang
column6: 'jug bsngo' ba lasogs pa'i don to
column8: </seg>

column1: dang po bzhi'[‘i?] las
column2: de'i dang po mchod par nrjod zing bshad par dam bca' ba la gnyis ste

column1: mchod par bslad pa dang
column2: bshad par dam bca' ba'o
column4: </TEI>"

column1: 2_031_02_brTson grus pa _dul ba od ldan gyi TIk+ka.xml,2_031_02,,ex31022024-10-2115-39-58,unreviewed,7b2 - 7b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7b2""/>
phyir ro
column3: de lta bas na 'dir sam pa bzhis ni dge' slong 'dra' bar shes par bya'o
column5: brnyen par rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i khyad par lasogs pas ming nyes byas su rnam par bstag pa tsam du zad do
column7: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex31022024-10-2115-39-58"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">rgya</rs></note> na re 'debs spyod gnyis ni dge' tshul la bstan bya yin te ma ltos pa'i bsam pas zhugs pas phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyir nags mes gtong pa bzhin <lb n=""7b3""/> no snyam na

column1: de la yang 'di ltar brtag par bya ste mo ltos pa'i bsams pas zhugs pa'i zhes yod de go la ma ltos pa'i bsam pas zer na de nyid kyis gsad sems yod par yang grub pas phyogs mthun du mi 'thad la
column2: nags mes gtong zhes pa'i dper yang ma grub po
column4: </seg>

column1: de ltar yang nags ces gtong pa ni gnod pa la la ltos par gzung 'di nyid dang rnam</TEI>"

column1: tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i ṭi ka legs bshad bsdus pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> gtsang nag pa</rs>s mdzad pa <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr>

i <unclear>dra sa</unclear> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4551"">SHakya b+hikSHu ku ma ra SHrI</rs> pustaM <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">pra ma Na bi ni <choice><reg>SH+ca</reg><orig>(SH+ca/s+tsa)</orig></choice> ya sya</rs> TI ka</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">A tsarya virya sing ha sya</rs> kA ra:
column3: <note type=""editorial"">Skt: idam? śākyabhikṣu-kumāra-śrī pustaṃ pramāṇaviniścayasya ṭīkā ācārya-vīryasiṃhasya kārāḥ. Kumāraśrī (=Tib. gzhon nu dpal) could possibly be 'Gos lo tsA ba bZhon nu dpal.</note></seg></TEI>"

column3: rnam 'jig sdud dang gzhung don gsal byed pas

column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_10252023-06-286,reviewed,2a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a2""/> don rjes dpag dgod pa'i yul phyir rgol bsgrub pa dang rgol ba phyir rgol gyi ngag brtag pa gnyis ste lus kyi cha shas la 'khrul pa spong pa yan lag gi bstan bcod bzhi 'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_10252023-06-286"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rnam par nges <choice><reg>pa</reg><orig>pa'</orig></choice></rs> ni lus lta bu'i bstan bcos bar ma ste
column4: gzhung cung zad bsdus pas tshad ma nyid kyi lus tshang par gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_10292023-06-287,reviewed,2a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a3""/> mod kyi 'di yang gdul bya 'ga' zhig la tshad ma rnam par nges pa nyid du ma gyur pas 'di tshad ma rnam par nges byed nyid du skye bo kun la bde blag du bstan par bya'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_10292023-06-287"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">gzhung 'di </rs> ni rtsom pa la 'jug pa klad kyi don dang
column4: brtsam par bya ba skabs kyi don dang
column5: mthar phyin pa 'jug gi don gsum gyis nges par bya ba las
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-288,reviewed,11a1 - 11a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-288"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:mtshan_nyid"">de la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa dag </rs>mtshan nyid kyi skyon mtshon bya la ltos te mi srid pa dang ma khyab khyab ches gsum las myed par sems pa de dag ni khyab mnyam pa'i don ldog gzhan pa dang rang ldog rdzas su ma grub pa skyon du bsgrub pas <lb n=""11a2""/> gnod par lta'o
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex87032023-06-2912-23-02,reviewed,22b7 - 22b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""22b7""/> dang
column2: bcad pa'i yul can dang
column3: yid dpyod dang
column4: log shes dang
column5: the tsom mo
column7: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-06-2912-23-02"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:snang_la_ma_nges_pa"">de la snang la ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid ni

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4265"">kha cig</rs><note type=""editorial"">An annotation in the manuscript of mTshur ston's Tshad ma shes rab sgron ma identifies the proponent as ""rtag pa,"" which we understand to refer to sTag. See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 21, n. 30</note> snang yang nges pa 'dren mi nus pa zhes zer ba ni 'dir blo rnams yul cig la ltos nas <lb n=""22b8""/> tha dad par 'jog pa yin no
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex13012024-10-215-13-39,unreviewed,24a6 - 24a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13012024-10-215-13-39"" status=""unreviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""2.1 mngon sum la log rtogs dgag pa""/>

<lb n=""24a6""/> dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kha cig</rs> tshu rol mthong ba rnams ni yul dang dus dang skye mched ma phye bar gang la zhen pa drangs pa'i don la mi slu bas tshad mar 'gyur ba yin ste
column2: zhen pa ni tshad ma'i byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro
column4: de lta ma yin na 'gro ba na spyad pa'i don thob pa'i mi slu ba nyid mi srid par 'gyur te mthong pa'i dngos po rnams  <lb n=""24a7""/> 'jug par gzo' tsa na 'gag pa'i phyir ro
column6: de lta yin dang me dang chu'i kha dog 'dzin pa ni tsha ba dang gsher ba'i zhen pa 'dren pa nyid kyis reg pa la tshad ma yin no zhes zer ro
column8: <note type=""editorial"">This corresponds to the position of <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rNgog lo tsa ba</rs> </note>

column1: de ni mi rung ste don myong pa'i stobs kyis rtogs pa myed pa'i phyir ro
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-06,reviewed,66b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""66b5""/> mdzad pa yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-06"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5570"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rab pa pa</rs>'i 'dod pa rjes su brjod pa dang
column4: sgrub bya sgrub byed kyi don nyid ngos gzung pa dang
column5: de rang gi gzhung lugs smra ba rnams la sbyar ba'o

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1223023-06-289,reviewed,109b8 - 110a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""109b8""/> dgag pa 'ang gnyis ste bzhi sam dgag pa ltar bsgrub pa 'ang gcig pas gnyis su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1223023-06-289"" status=""reviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">chen po dag </rs>ni sgrub pa 'brel pa gnyis la rten pas dbye ba'i tshul ci 'dra ba myed pas sam
column3: mi dmigs pa'i sgrub bya med dgag la dbye' ba myed pa sam
column4: dbye bsdu' byas kyang gsum gyi grangs <pb n=""110a""/><lb n=""110a1""/> nges la gnod pa myed te mngon sum bzhir phye bas tshad ma'i grangs nges la mi gnod pa bzhin no zhes zer ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_12292023-06-2810,reviewed,111a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""111a1""/> pa'i don du 'brel pa rtog cing
column2: rtags kyi rjes su 'gro ldog de dag de ma yin la mthong pa dang ma mthong pa tsam du 'ang 'gyur la
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_12292023-06-2810"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3839"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kho bo cag</rs> rtags mi 'khrul pa'i spyi khyab de nyid la 'brel par brjod pa'i yang phyir ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-2822,unreviewed,160b2 - 160b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""160b2""/>gnad gcig par dgod pa'i tshul dgod pa dang / mi gcig pa la skyon yang pa gsum gyis nges par bya ba'o / /<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-2822"" status=""unreviewed"">
dang po ni thal 'gyur dang bzlog pa'i rang rgyud la rtogs pa cig pa'i tshul drug las
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""1""/>re shig thal ba'i phyogs chos khas blangs dang bzlog pa'i bsgrub bya shes 'dod gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste
column2: <choice><corr>du ba</corr><sic>du ma</sic></choice> 'gog pa'i rgyu <lb n=""160b3""/> mi dmyigs pa'i thal ba dang me bsgrub pa'i 'bras rtags kyi rang rgyud kyi dbang du byas te la la me myed du log pas smra na gnyis ka tshang la me tshad mas grub na gnyis ka ma tshang ba'i phyir ro

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""2""/> thal ba'i bsal pa dang bzlog pa'i rtags gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste
column2: la la du ba mthong na gnyis ka la tshang la ma mthong <lb n=""160b4""/> na gnyis ka ma tshang ba'i phyir ro

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""3""/>
thal ba dang bzlog pa'i khyab pa gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste
column2: thal ba'i khyab pa me myed du <choice><corr>med</corr><sic>me</sic> </choice>kho na la yod par bsgrub na du yod la me myed <choice><corr>med</corr><sic>me myed</sic></choice> pas du yod la mye <choice><corr>yod</corr><sic>myed</sic></choice> pa rang rgyud kyi khyab pa grub cing<anchor xml:id=""a36""/>
column3: rang rgyud kyi khyab pa {<hi rendition=""#i #u"">du yod</hi> (Ms om.)} <mentioned>me yod kho na la yod pa</mentioned> grub na yang <mentioned>me myed la myed pa</mentioned>s 160b5 <mentioned>me myed la du ba myed pa</mentioned> thal ba'i khyab pa grub pas<anchor xml:id=""a37""/> tshang par gcig pa'i phyir dang
column4: <mentioned>la la tsan dan gyi me myed pas du med du thal ba</mentioned>r brjod na thal ba dang bzlog pa gnyis ka'i khyab pa sha pa'i mer zhig pas ma tshang par gcig pa'i phyir ro

column1: de la phyogs chos dang shes 'dod ma tshang pa ni me mthong pa'i tshang bang du bkod na 'byung zhing <lb n=""160b6""/> bsal ba dang gtan tshigs ma tshang pa ni du ba ma mthong pa'i rgya mtshor bkod na 'byung la
khyab pa gnyis ma tshang pa ni me mthong yang tsan dan gyi me myed par rtogs pa'i la la bkod 'byung pas ma tshang pa'i skyon drug ni gzhi gsum la 'byung pa yin no

la la du ba mthong yang me myed du rtog pas me myed la du med du thal ba<lb n=""160b7""/> brjod na tshang pa'i yon tan drug gzhi cig la 'du bas thal ba yon tan drug ldan gyis rang rgyud chos drug ldan 'phel ba nyid do zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa</rs>'i rnam pa gzhag pa'o
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-2823,reviewed,182b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-2823"" status=""reviewed"">de la yang khas blangs <lb n=""182b3""/> dang rang tshig gis bsal pa gnyis kyi khyad par ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa dag</rs> yid ches pa'i gang zag gzhan gyi tshig dang rgol ba rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba la 'jog go
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-0633,unreviewed,183b5 - 183b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""183b5""/> 'jog byed rjes dpag yin pas de'i bsal par brjod pa bzhin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-0633"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference""><!--These are predecessors of dharmakirti-->snga rabs pa'i lugs</rs> 'chad pa na yid ches pa'i gang zag dang de'i tshig don gyi 'bras bu dang 'bras bu'i rtags kyis bzlog pa sel pa gsum <lb n=""183b6""/> <quote xml:id=""d2e14307"">bdag gam</quote> zhes dang <quote xml:id=""d2e14310"">de'i</quote> zhes dang <quote xml:id=""d2e14313"">rang gi</quote> (P294b43) zhes pa ste
column4: bdag dang gzhan ni rang tshig dang khas blangs kyi gang zag yin pas nus pa yang <quote xml:id=""d2e14316"">gegs sam gnod par byed do</quote> zhes sbyar ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-28245,unreviewed,184b2 - 184b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""184b2""/> ba'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-28245"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">lung <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du tshad ma yid ma yin nam ces pa'i lan du lung tshad ma bsam par bshad zin to ces bya ste
column4: bshad pa <abbr>slob dpon</abbr> <lb n=""184b3""/> gyis yin kyang snga rabs pa pa</rs>s<!--These are predecessors of Dharmakirti--> de ltar 'dod par dgongs pa'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-2825,unreviewed,185a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""185a2""/> yin te dam bca' ba'i bsam pa mi srid pa ston pa'i phyir gno byed kyi tshig bzhin no zhes bya'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-2825"" status=""unreviewed"">gzhi' lung gis grub pa la ltos pa dang
column4: mi ltos pa'i dbye' ba <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa'</rs>i lugs brjod pa dang khyad par myed pa rang gi lugs gnyis <quote xml:id=""d2e14495"">gzhung lugs</quote> ces dang <quote xml:id=""d2e14498"">'di la yang</quote> (<?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>P296b1<?oxy_comment_end?>) ces pa'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1232023-06-282,reviewed,210a3 - 210a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""210a3""/> brtson ldan blo gros dman pa'i skye bos kyang
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1232023-06-282"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774"">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i ti ka legs par bshad pa bsdus <lb n=""210a4""/>pa</rs> zhes bya ba
column5: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3839"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rigs par smra ba'i dge slong brtson 'grus seng ge</rs>s sbyar pa'o
column7: rdzogs s+ho
column9: i thi
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_02_Blo gros mtshungs med_spyod 'jug rnam bshad rin chen snang ba.xml,$,,ex15022024-09-0915-48-35,reviewed,1a1 - 1a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15022024-09-0915-48-35"" status=""reviewed""><pb n=""1a""/><lb n=""1a1""/>phyi <lb n=""1a1""/>tsa <lb n=""1a1""/>73<lb n=""1a4""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4582""><abbr>byang chub sems dpa'i</abbr> spyod pa la 'jug pa'i de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa rin po che'i snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba <abbr>bzhugs s+hO</abbr>
<lb n=""1a5""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3896"">gsang phu ba blo gros mtshungs med</rs> kyis mdzad<!--written in dbu med--></seg></TEI>"

1_015_02_Blo gros mtshungs med_spyod 'jug rnam bshad rin chen snang ba.xml,$,,ex15022023-09-15-114936,reviewed,156a5 - 56a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""156a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15022023-09-15-114936"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4582"">byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i de kho na nyid gsal bar byed pa <lb n=""56a6""/> rin po che'i snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3896""><rs type=""place"">yul dbus</rs> kyi char byung ba rigs par smra ba blo gros mtshungs med</rs> kyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">dpal gsang phu ne'u thog gi chos gra</rs>r sbyar ba'o
column7: </seg>

column3: bkra shis zhal gro [dro] lhag phya* med pa
column5: legs pa gcig byon long lags s+ho
column7: dge'o</TEI>"

column1: 1_007_01_F_C_NO_Phya pa_dbu ma snying po.xml,1_007_01,,ex7012024-08-2814-21-46,unreviewed,57a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""57a4""/> lta ngan gzhung lugs ma lus 'jig par shog
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"" xml:id=""ex7012024-08-2814-21-46"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4486"">dbu ma de kho na nyid kyi snying po</rs> zhes bya ba
column4: blo gsal zhing rigs par smra bas rtog ge ngan pa'i tshogs 'jig par byed pa
column5: brtul zhugs mchog la gnas pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s sbyar ba
column7: rdzogs s+ho
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_08_rNgog_mngon rtogs rgyan don bsdus.xml,1_001_08,,ex1082023-02-0311-27-53,reviewed,1a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1082023-02-0311-27-53"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

<pb edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""1a""/><lb edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""1a1""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4435""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711"">'grel pa</rs> <choice><orig>(dang bcas pa'i)</orig><reg>dang bcas pa'i </reg> </choice>dka' 'grel rin po che'i sgron ma</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">lots+tsha ba blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis mdzad pa bzhugs so
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_08_rNgog_mngon rtogs rgyan don bsdus.xml,1_001_08,,ex1082023-03-0714-04-20,unreviewed,1a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1082023-03-0714-04-20"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed""><pb edRef=""inst:5591"" n=""1a""/><lb edRef=""inst:5591"" n=""1a1""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">lo tsa ba chen po</rs>'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4435"">bsdus don</rs> bzhugs so
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_08_rNgog_mngon rtogs rgyan don bsdus.xml,1_001_08,,ex1082023-02-0311-31-41,reviewed,1b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1082023-02-0311-31-41"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">
<pb edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""1b""/><lb edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""1b1""/> bsam dang sbyor ba las 'khrungs <abbr>pa'i</abbr>
column3: dpa' bo de dang de'i bka'
column5: nyes 'joMs de sgrub tshogs bcas la
column7: sgo <abbr>gsum</abbr> dang bas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""4953"">bdag</rs> nyid 'dud
column9: <!--TODO check if this way of tagging works. This verse is found only in instance id:4434. It is lacking in the blockprint version id:5591 and in the gSung thor bu, id:5592. It may have been authored by the scribe.-->

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_001_08_rNgog_mngon rtogs rgyan don bsdus.xml,1_001_08,,ex1082023-02-0311-33-11,reviewed,1b2 - 1b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:5591"" n=""1b2""/>chen pos yang dag laM ston pa
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1082023-02-0311-33-11"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><!--TODO Q check the alternative readings from blockprint; why does it not recognize the end of segment?-->

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""3786"">bdag</rs> gis 'bad pas dka' ba nyams blangs nas<app><rdg wit=""inst:4434"">nas</rdg> <rdg wit=""inst:5591"">te <!--blockprint--></rdg> </app>

chos smra<app><rdg wit=""inst:4434"">rten</rdg> <rdg wit=""inst:5591"">bsten <!--blockprint--> </rdg></app> dang rigs pa'i rjes <lb edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""1b3""/><app><rdg>'brangs</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:5591"">'bren <!--blockprint--> </rdg></app> pas

cung zad <lb edRef=""inst:5591"" n=""1b3""/><lb edRef=""inst:5591"" n=""1b1""/>rtogs las rang nyid dang rigs pa'i rjes <lb edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""1b3""/><app><rdg wit=""inst:5591"">dran<!--blockprint--></rdg> <rdg wit=""inst:4434"">drang </rdg> </app> phyir dang
gzhan rtogs don du <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3711""> 'grel</rs> 'di'i don dbye bya
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_08_rNgog_mngon rtogs rgyan don bsdus.xml,1_001_08,,ex1082023-03-0713-55-36,unreviewed,1b3 - 1b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""1b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1082023-03-0713-55-36"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3711"">man ngag gi <abbr>bstan bcos</abbr> kyi bshad pa</rs> 'dir
bshad pa la 'jug pa dang
bshad pa nye bar dgod pa dang
<lb edRef=""inst:5591"" n=""1b4""/><lb edRef=""inst:5591"" n=""1b1""/>bshad pa mthar phyin pa'i bya ba
<app>
<rdg wit=""inst:4434""><abbr>gsum mo</abbr></rdg>
<rdg wit=""inst:5591"">dang gsum mo<!--blockprint--></rdg>
</app>
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_08_rNgog_mngon rtogs rgyan don bsdus.xml,1_001_08,,ex1082023-02-0311-58-54,reviewed,13a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""13a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1082023-02-0311-58-54"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">slob dpon seng ge bzang po</rs>s 'dir ji skad bshad pa ni <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">mdo</rs> dang shin tu<abbr>mi mthun</abbr> pas 'khrul pa yin par <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""3786"">bdag</rs> gis<abbr>rtogs so</abbr>
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_08_rNgog_mngon rtogs rgyan don bsdus.xml,1_001_08,,ex1082023-02-0312-07-47,reviewed,13a8 - 13a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""13a8""/> lan dang*
column2: _gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ste
column3: _<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1082023-02-0312-07-47"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

column1: 'di ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> seng ge bzang po</rs>'i bshad pa ste
column2: _<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">mdo</rs> dang<abbr>rjes su</abbr> <lb edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""13a9""/> 'thun pas legs par bshad par <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kho bo</rs>s <abbr>rtogs so</abbr>

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_001_08_rNgog_mngon rtogs rgyan don bsdus.xml,1_001_08,,ex1082023-02-0311-51-37,reviewed,15a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""15a9""/> gnyis dang*
column2: _gnyen po bzhi'i yul yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro (blockprint: te)
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1082023-02-0311-51-37"" status=""reviewed""><!--unclear whether the ""kha cig"" is Indian or Tibetan-->

column1: dmigs pa la log par rtogs pa spang ba ni
column2: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang <abbr>bzhin</abbr><abbr>gnyis</abbr> med pa'i shes pa'i chos nyid ni dmigs pa <abbr>yin te</abbr> ¦ yul du bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> gis <abbr>rtogs so</abbr>
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_08_rNgog_mngon rtogs rgyan don bsdus.xml,1_001_08,,ex1082023-02-0311-52-53,reviewed,21a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""21a9""/> bral ba'i nyes dmigs yid la byed pa dang*
column2: _pha rol tu phyin pa ma bsgrubs na ched du bya ba mi thob pa nyid du dran pas so sor rtog pa nyid du dran pa gsungs pa yin no
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1082023-02-0311-52-53"" status=""reviewed""><!--unclear whether ""kha cig"" is Indian or Tibetan-->

column1: yang na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><abbr>kha cig</abbr></rs> na re
column2: 'dir ni mthong laM <abbr>skad cig</abbr> ma <abbr>bcu drug</abbr> du nye bar mtshon par byed pa'i <abbr>phan yon</abbr> <abbr>bcu drug</abbr> bstan pa <abbr>yin te</abbr> laM gyi <abbr>ngo bo</abbr> bstan pa ma <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>
column4: </seg></TEI>"

1_001_08_rNgog_mngon rtogs rgyan don bsdus.xml,1_001_08,,ex1082023-02-0311-59-51,reviewed,33a8 - 33a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""33a8""/>bya ba'i 'bras bu'i dper go bar bya'o
column3: _don dam par dpyad na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bkag pa'i don yang dag par rtog pa'am
column4: _shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 'dzin kyang blang ste rnam par rtog pa kho na yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir de ltar bshad do
column6: _<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1082023-02-0311-59-51"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

column1: sngar gyi bshad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">gzhung</rs> gi don ji lta bar <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3708"">'phags pa rnaM grol</rs> gyis bshad pa dang 'thun par <lb edRef=""inst:4434"" n=""33a9""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""3786"">bdag</rs> gis brjod pa <abbr>yin no</abbr>

column1: 2_046_05_rnam nges grel.xml,2_046_05,,ex46052024-09-1216-47-23,unreviewed,21b8 - 22a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""21b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex46052024-09-1216-47-23"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba chen po</rs>  ni rtags kyi 'brel pa'i rtsa ba ** gshis la rten pa dang khas blangs la rten pa ** stobs don sgrub du myur pa dang tha snyad du bsgrub pa <lb n=""22a1""/> 2 phyi ma * rtags yin la khas blangs la rten pa ni yid ches su bzhed do gzhung gi thig 'chad pa la gnyis thun mong gi mtshan nyid dang po'i lugs rnam par bzhag pa'i dnag po ni bdag gaM nas yin te bar ma rang tshig smra ba'i rgol ba bdag dang gzhan bstan bcos <lb n=""22a2""/> mkhan chen na_s tshad mar khas len pas te yid ches su bzung bya yin te khyod bstan bya'i don gyi dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i sgo nas ngag 'jug par 'dod</seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_13_C_NI_rNgog_PVin dka' gnas.xml,1_001_13,,ex1132023-07-2114-50-15,reviewed,1a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1a4""/>
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1132023-07-2114-50-15"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo chen</rs> gyi mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4445""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774"">rnaM nges</rs> kyi Ti ka</rs> <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr>
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_13_C_NI_rNgog_PVin dka' gnas.xml,1_001_13,,ex11320240828_1,unreviewed,X46b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""X46b1""/> bca' nyid gtan tshigs su brjod pa yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex11320240828_1"" status=""unreviewed"">don gyi de nyid dpyad pa ni
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5557"">slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas</rs> dang
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5629"">zhi ba bzang po</rs> la sogs pa na re
column6: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa ni
column7: shes pa las gzhan ma yin te
column8: rang rig rig par bya ba'i phyir ro
column10: de la phyogs chos ni nyams su myong bas nges so
column12: khyab pa yang rig par bya ba 'gal ba la ni rig par byed pa yang 'gal bas khyab ste
column13: des na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba yin no
column15: 'di ltar sngon po rang gi rang bzhin rig pa nyid kyis rig na de rang gi rang bzhin kho na'o
column17: byed pa gzhan gyis rig na ni rig pa yang gzhan kho na'o
column19: des na rig par bya pa tha dad pa la rig par byed pa tha dad pas khyab pas khyad par nges so zhe'o
column21: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_13_C_NI_rNgog_PVin dka' gnas.xml,1_001_13,,ex1132023-07-2114-52-30,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1132023-07-2114-52-30"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4445"">tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i dka' ba'i gnas rnam par bshad pa</rs>
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba shag kya'i dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_13_C_NI_rNgog_PVin dka' gnas.xml,1_001_13,,ex1132023-10-181,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1132023-10-181"" status=""unreviewed""><lb n=""""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6035"">shag kya'i dge slong 'dar rin chen 'bar</rs> gyis sbyin par bya ba'i chos so
column10: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_056_15_I_R_M_mchod pa'i cho ga rgyan gyi me tog 201210927.xml,$,,ex56152023-09-251,unreviewed,N001 - 7a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N001""/>cig
column3: dge'o
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex56152023-09-251"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (7a1–7a4)]""/>

column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5005"">phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi 'phags pa'i gang <lb n=""7a2""/> zag thams cad mchod pa'i cho ga rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5948""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5949"">stod mnga' ris</rs> kyi 'dul ba 'dzin pa dge slongs mgon ldan 'od</rs> ces bya bas bskul nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">mang du thos pa'i dge <lb n=""7a3""/> slong bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dpal ldan snar thang gi dgon pa</rs>r bkod pa rdzogs so

column1: 'dis sems can tshad med pa'i don byed cing 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad mnyes par byed par gyur <lb n=""7a4""/> cig
column2: dge'o
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_073_02.xml,3_073_02,,ex730222024-11-08-13-13,unreviewed,8b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b3""/>pas ma spyi bo
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex730222024-11-08-13-13"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">kha 1</rs> na re dig yang ston pa 'dis sargyas kyi ba' yin gyi gsung ba ma yino zhe na
column2: </seg>

column1: de yang drang swog gsung yin zlog pa gzhan zhes pa'i bka'i mtshid la seMs zhig de na kum dga' bo las pa'i dgros pa chos kyi sargyan ldan rnams dang
column2: di yang ni bar du dge ba'i ku+en rnams kyis ston pa'i mod la sargyas kyi bka' mi na zhes chos song khas</TEI>"

column1: 3_073_02.xml,3_073_02,,ex730222024-11-08-12-55,unreviewed,12a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12a8""/>cher 'dra'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex730222024-11-08-12-55"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo ts+tsha ba chen po</rs> na re
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">slo+on se+eng bzang po</rs>s 'dir
column3: ji skad bshad pa ni
column4: med dang shin tu mi mthun pas 'khrul pa yin par bdagis skyoso
column6: zhes gsungo
column8: </seg>

column1: dmigs pa mi nag pal swo pa'i na yi rten can zhes bya ba la rtos pa
column2: don rngs kyi chod pa du ser 'byung laMs kyis
column3: bzhug zin pa'i khyar gyi rab tu khye ba</TEI>"

column1: 3_073_02.xml,3_073_02,,ex730222024-11-08-13-02,unreviewed,12b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12b6""/>shes nas mog du bya ba yin pa'i phyir mi skyono zhes pa'i lam 'de bas par mdzo
column2: 'dir ri kar thug ba de
column3: gse snying pa'i dogngs pa yino
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex730222024-11-08-13-02"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">dpang lo</rs> na re
column2: 'di dag lyes sbyar gyi skad la thaMd chos brjod du mod kyang
column3: </seg>

column1: mod snang skur ba na
column2: de rnams de'i ngos stong zhes pa ltu chen brjod par lung skad gsungso
column3: ma gi 'di ltar yang</TEI>"

column1: 3_073_02.xml,3_073_02,,ex730222024-11-08-13-08,unreviewed,N29a3 - 29a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N29a3""/>nyid kyes par mngon
column3: brgyas yis zhab ni sbyor ba bcu su 'chad
column5: sbyor ba'i yo na la
column7: rgu'i ston bcu 4
column8: 'buMs ston bcu ba zhes bzhed la
column9: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex730222024-11-08-13-08"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">bc+doMn rigs ral</rs> na re
column2: de ltar na
column3: y+ton nyi+u rtsa brgyad du thal gsungs pa shig tu mdo
column4: des na myi ma la bcu ba dang
column5: snga ma la bcu ba ni
column6: rgyun dang rgyun can du sbyar ba yin <lb n=""29a4""/>gyi rgyu 'bras la yino
column8: </seg>

column1: sa 'tshams ni
column3: chos shes stona zhes bya ba la
column4: ston 'di dan ni las dang po pa'i pa nas gtsams te ldan mod kyi legs par 'byor pa ni rjod thob ba yan tshad la sbyar bar bya ste
column6: cheb pa ltar lkyes kyi
column7: kha che gnonus pal gyis
column8: ston bcu ba po dang sbyar na
column9: 4 ni nges par 'byed pas</TEI>"

column1: 3_073_02.xml,3_073_02,,ex730222024-11-08-13-28,unreviewed,48b7 - 48b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""48b7""/>ba byed par 'dod nas 'di ma bkod de snying dus kyi thaMd mkhyen pa 2 pa la byur gyur pa
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex730222024-11-08-13-28"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">bu ston rin po che</rs>'i zhal nas mdzad pi rnaM bshad lung gi skye la dang
column2: de nyid chan nyid kyis mdzad pa dang gsung spros sku'i mtshan can gyis phyags 1 tu bkod pi zin ris na snangs rnaMs ni di nyid las khong du chus par bya bas 'dir ma nis <lb n=""48b8""/>shing spyi don gyi gnas rnaMs na snal zhing rtag pa bya ba mang du snang na yang blo gsal 'jug pa bde ni don du re zhig 'dir bskus pa'o
column4: </seg>

column1: chos kyi rgyal po'i bzhed la ji 4n du rgyal sras pa la'i sngar 'chang dkyig zhen 'phang mchog seng ge chos kyi gnyen dang sheb los brgyas ye+es nas gsed gis pa dang grang pa 'grel pa</TEI>"

3_073_02.xml,3_073_02,,ex73022023-09-261,unreviewed,N005 - 49a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N005""/>ni mnyaM med rngal pi go 'tshang mchog thob thog
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex73022023-09-261"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5152""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man <abbr>ngag gi</abbr> bstan bcos mngon par rtogs <!--em.: ms stong
column4: stoGS--> pa rgyan</rs> gyi <abbr>dka' 'grel</abbr> lung gi dpag bsam rgyas 'gyur gyi tshal</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
column5: yongs 'dzin du mas nye bar bskyangs shing khyad par du rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho'i <abbr>pha rol</abbr> du phyin <lb n=""49a6""/> pa riGS pa dang grol bar smra ba'i yongs ba bsaM gyis mi khyab pa la mnga' rnyes pa
column6: 'chad (em. : ms. 'tshad) pa dang rtsod pa dang
column7: rtsom pa'i tshul la zla dang bral ba <rs type=""place"">gangs can</rs> gyi bka' <abbr>bzhi</abbr> 'dzin pa <abbr>gcig</abbr> po nyid_du nges pa
column8: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4074"">brtson 'grus dpal</rs> gyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing
column9: de nyid las chos 'di'i tshul la <abbr>blo'i</abbr> (em. blo'i; Ms. slo'I) snang ba cung zad skyes pa
column10: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5193"">shAkya' btsun pa <lb n=""49a7""/> pa dkon mchog gra[GS]</rs> kyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5733""><rs type=""deity"">ston pa</rs>'i rgyal tshab daM pa rnams kyi bzhuGS gnas dpal <abbr>sa skya</abbr>'i chos gra dang nye ba'i sa</rs>r sbyar ba re shig <abbr>rdzogs so</abbr>
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-51-15,unreviewed,1a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-51-15"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<pb n=""1a""/><lb n=""1a1""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5517""> tshad ma rnam nges kyi 'grel bshad</rs><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5518""> bo dong 'jam dbyangs</rs> kyis mdzad pa bzhugs
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-49-04,unreviewed,4b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b2""/>dang 'brel pa'i nus pa yin no zhes gsung ngo
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-49-04"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5552"">bram ze chen po</rs>'i rjes su 'brang ba [\[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> na re
column4: don bden pa rtogs pa chos gsum tshang ba yin la
column5: de yang don ni shes bya'i gnas lugs yin la
column6: bden pa ni ji ltar yin pa'am yod ltar gnas pa'o
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-34-10,unreviewed,5a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a4""/>ni ma dmigs so
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-34-10"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: []gsum pa yid dpyod ni rtags la ma brten par sngar ma rtogs pa'i lkog gyur dngos su rtogs pa yin no ce na
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column3: blo 'dod rgyal ba yin pas gnas skabs don dang mthun yang log pa'i shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te
column4: don med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir te
column5: dper na du ba dang dus mnyam du skyes pa'i rlangs pa ni me dang lhan cig yod kyang me'i 'bras bu ma yin te
column6: me dang ldog pa ma grub pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs so zhes zer ro
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-21-55,unreviewed,5a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-21-55"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<lb n=""5a5""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3892""> chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta'i [\]]</rs>zhal nas
column2: yid dpyod tshad mar thal te
column3: don bden pa gsar du nges pa'i phyir ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-35-00,unreviewed,5a6 - 5a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a6""/>yid dpyod skye ba'i go skabs med do zhes gsung ngo
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-35-00"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gi bzhed pas the tshom ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis kar 'dzin pa yin pas log pa'i shes pa yin la
column2: rgyu mtshan med pa dang log pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang bden pa'i rgyu mtshan gtan la ma phebs pa can yang the tshom gyi rang bzhin yin pas log pa'i shes pa yin no zhes grag go

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: de mi rigs te
column3: the tshom gyis gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yongs su ma bcad pa'i phyir dang
column4: log pa'i shes pa ni don de ma yin du yongs su <lb n=""5a7""/>gcod byed yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-23-13,unreviewed,5a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a7""/>gcod byed yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-23-13"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta'i [\]]/</rs>zhal nas
column2: the tshom de dang log pa'i shes pa gcig pa mi srid de
column3: the tshom ni [\[]bsgrub [;]sgrub [\]]byed gnod byed gang gi yang mthar ma thug pa yin la
column4: log pa'i shes pa la ni gnod byed nges pa min pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-35-21,unreviewed,6b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b2""/>dgos pa cung zad kyang ma mthong ba'i phyir ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-35-21"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: rnam pa gnyis zhes brjod pa ni
column3: gnyis su grangs nges par gzung ba'i don du ste
column4: de lta ma yin na
column5: re shig 'dir 'di tsam zhig brjod par zad kyi
column6: dbye ba gzhan yang srid do zhes dogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ba ni mi bden te
column7: 'o zhes yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig gis mtha' gzhan du srid pa'i dgos pa bkag pa'i phyir ro
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-23-13,unreviewed,7a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-23-13"">gzhan yang gzhal bya yul dus kyi mthar thug pa rang gi mtshan nyid de ma yin rnam par bcad pa spyi'i mtshan nyid gnyis kho <lb n=""7a4""/>na rtogs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
column3: []zhes <rs type=""work"">[\[]ti ka [;]ṭikka</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">[\]]mkhan po [\[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> [\[]gsung [;]gsungs [\]]pa'ang legs so
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-35-45,unreviewed,9a8 - 9a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a8""/>tha dad ci yang med par 'dod pa yang nyams so
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-35-45"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: tha snyad pa'i rtags kyi bsgrub bya 'di ni tshad ma'i gzhal bya yin pas dngos po'i chos gcig yin la
column3: de'ang tshad mas grub zin pa de nyid ma yin gyi rang bzhin sems dpa'i blos dpyad na don de la sngar bkod pa'i brda'i rgyu mtshan gyis chos mi 'dra ba bkag pa mi slu ba'i yul gyi bsgrub bya'o
column5: rjes dpag gi zhen stangs dang sbyar na tha snyad du brda'i rgyu mtshan gyi chos su grub pa'i ma <lb n=""9a9""/>yin dgag go zhes gsung ngo
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-36-26,unreviewed,12b4 - 12b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12b4""/>re
column2: 'di ni ming don gyi 'brel pa gtan la 'bebs pa yin no zhes zer ba ni ma yin te
column3: 'dir ngo bo la log rtog sel ba'i skabs su ming don gyi 'brel pa gtan la phab pa la nyer mkho med pa'i phyir ro
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-36-26"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: 'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3735""> ka ma la shi la</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""> chos mchog</rs> ltar na
column3: mngon sum dang rtog bral ma 'khrul ba gnyis grub bde gcig gam mi gcig grang
column4: gcig na sgrub pa dang rjes su brjod pa'i don mi 'thad la
column5: mi gcig na mtshan nyid dang mtshon byar mi <lb n=""12b5""/>'thad do zhes thun mong du rtsod pa'i skyon med de
column6: mtshan mtshon don chos dag pa ma yin la
column7: blo ngor grub ma grub gnyis mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-24-19,unreviewed,13a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""13a1""/>na re
column2: 'dres pa 'dzin pa zhes brjod na brda' la ma byang ba'i rtog pa la ma khyab pas de bsdu ba'i phyir yin no zhes gsung ngo
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-24-19"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje pa</rs>'i zhal nas
column2: de lta na 'drer rung 'dzin pa zhes brjod na'ang dngos su 'dres pa 'dzin pa la ma khyab pas des na sgra dang don gnyis shes pa gcig gis 'dzin pa ni 'dres rung 'dzin pa'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-24-48,unreviewed,13b9b,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""13b9b""/>ral ma 'khrul ba sogs so
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-24-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje paN Di ta</rs>'i zhal nas kyang
column2: mngon sum tshad ma'i mtshan nyid rtog bral ma 'khrul ba nyid yin gyi gzhan mi dgos so zhes gsung ba'i don ni
column3: mtshon bya mngon sum dang tshad ma gnyis yod pa bzhin du der 'jog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rigs gnyis te
column4: ma 'khrul ba dang tshogs pa'i rtog bral gyis mngon sum du 'jog la
column5: rtog bral dang tshogs pa'i ma 'khrul bas tshad mar 'jog pa la dgongs so
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-38-34,unreviewed,14b2b - 14b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""14b2b""/>zung don la dngos su skyes pa chos can du byas te rang gi mtshan nyid kyi sgra mi snang [\[]te[;]ste[\]]
column2: sgra rang gi mtshan nyid las ma skyes pa'i phyir zhes khyab pa sgrub byed du chos mchog 'god de
column3: de yang khyab byed ma dmigs pa'o
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-38-34"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: de la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: khyab pa med de
column3: gal te yod na rjes dpag la gzhal bya'i rnam pa mi snang bar thal
column4: gzhal bya las dngos su ma skyes pa'i phyir gsung ba'i skyon med de
column5: gal te snang na rjes dpag snang bas 'jug pa'i tshad mar <lb n=""14b3""/>thal ba dang
column6: rjes dpag snang yul la ma 'khrul ba'i tshad mar yang 'gyur ro
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-39-18,unreviewed,14b7 - 14b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""14b7""/>don la yin pa dang ma yin pa'i sgrub byed med par ha cang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-39-18"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: 'di la'ang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> gzugs 'dzin gyi yul de la sgra yod pa'ang ma yin
column2: sgra de'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin yang des gzugs 'dzin ma bskyed du chug na'ang sgra tha dad ldan par yod pa gang gis 'gog
column3: de ma bkag par gzugs 'dzin sgra las ma skyes par mi 'grub po zer na
column4: skyon med de
column5: spyir de la sgra yod pa <lb n=""14b8""/>tsam 'gog pa ma yin gyi gzugs 'dzin gyi yul de la sgra tha dad ldan pa ltar rung ma rang ldog sgra yin pa 'gog pa yin la
column6: de ltar na ma dmigs pa khegs so
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-51-11,unreviewed,15b4 - 15b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b4""/>ces pa'am
column2: yang na dbang yid las gzhan pa [\[]sngun [;]sngon [\]]brda' sbyar ba dran pa la ltos par thal
column3: ming don gcig tu sbyar nas 'dzin pa'i shes pa bskyed byed yin pa'i phyir
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-51-11"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re
column5: gzhan <lb n=""15b5""/>yang don ni nyer sbyor la sogs thal 'gyur gyi dbang shes rtog bral du bsgrub par thal ste
column6: rtsa ba'i sbyor ba thal sbyor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa'i skyon med de dngos su thal ba brjod kyang
column7: dbang shes sgra don 'dre rung 'dzin pa 'gog pa la brda' dran sngon du ma song ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i rgyu'am khyab byed mi dmigs pa'i don 'phen byed yin pa'i phyir ro
column9: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-52-49,unreviewed,16b1 - 16b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16b1""/>la yod cing dbang shes kyis kyang 'dzin par 'dod do
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-52-49""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> de ni ma nges te
column4: a (rya?) gar bar <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">bod</rs> du 'ongs ma thag la chos bzhi so sor 'dzin pa med kyang don <lb n=""16b2""/>sbyor gyi rtog pa yod pa yin te
column5: bya ba gzhan btang nas gzhan len pa'i phyir zer na
column6: <rs type=""person"" ana="""" ref=""db:"">gnyal pa yab sras</rs><!--probably gNyal zhig db 3887-->  na re
column7: chos bzhi so sor 'dzin nus kyi stong ba rtags su 'god pas skyon med zer yang
column8: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re
column9: ar gsar <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">bod</rs> du 'ongs ma thag la ji srid chos bzhi so sor 'dzin par med pa de srid du de sdom nas 'dzin pa'i don sbyor gyi rtog pa'ang med par thal
column10: ji srid chos bzhi sdom nas 'dzin pa'i don sbyor gyi rtog pa yod pa de srid du chos bzhi so sor 'dzin <lb n=""16b3""/>pa yang yod ces gsung ba ni 'thad par mthong ngo
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-55-16,unreviewed,18b6 - 18b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-55-16"">tshad mas ma mthong ba'i don lkog shal 'dus pa nye ba nyid kyis nang gi 'du byed brda' dran pa'i bag chags yin la
column2: de sad <lb n=""18b6""/>par byas pa des dran par 'gyur ba'i phyir zhe na
column3: []de'i lan la
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re
column5: ba lang gi sgra chos can
column6: ma mthong ba'i don nye ba las dran par 'gyur ba ma yin te ma mthong [\[]pa'i [;]ba'i [\]]don dang brda'i 'brel med par thal
column7: rang bzhin 'brel pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro gsung ba ltar na
column8: ba lang gtan nas ma mthong zhing ba men gyi steng du srog chags 'di 'dra ba'i ba lang zhes pa'i dud 'gro yod do ces brda' goms pa la brten nas phyis ba men mthong ba <lb n=""18b7""/>na ba lang gi sgra dran pa mi srid par thal lo
column10: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-25-19,unreviewed,22b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""22b2""/>drug po 'gags ma thag pa yi
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-25-19"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje paṇ ṭi ta</rs> ni mngon sum 'gros gsum pa yin te
column2: don gang zhig [\[23a2\]]'dzin pa na kha phyir bltas la dbang shes dang yid shes dus mnyam pa gnyis dang
column3: nang du de dag myong ba'i rang rig dang gsum mo
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-39-43,unreviewed,22b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""22b2""/>drug po 'gags ma thag pa yi
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-39-43"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> ltar na
column2: tshad ma snga ma dbang shes chos can
column3: gzhan la nges kyi tshad ma kho nar thal
column4: rang yul la tshad ma'i bya ba rdzogs pa tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-56-24,unreviewed,30a3 - 30a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""30a3""/>gyur pa'i phyir ro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-56-24"">mdor na gzhal bya mngon gyur lkog gyur yin pa'i phyir sngon po dang skad cig ma bzhin no ce na
column4: []de dgag pa la
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column6: dpyad bya mngon gyur ma yin par thal ba dang
column7: dpyod byed shes pa'i khyad par tshad mas ma grub par thal ba gnyis las
column8: []dang po la
column9: thal ba chos gsum las
column10: dang po ni
column11: longs spyod byed kyi shes pa chos can
column12: longs spyad bya thams cad mngon gyur ma yin par thal

column18: shes rig yul la longs spyod pa mi srid par thal ces pa yang gi sgras bstan no

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-26-48,unreviewed,32b7 - 32b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-26-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
[]gnyis pa ma 'ongs pa bsgrub pa ni
column2: chos nyid yang dag pa'i don la rtse gcig tu gnas te bsgom pa chos can
column3: chos nyid yang dag pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du gsal bar snang ba gcig byung ste
column4: chos nyid yang <lb n=""32b7""/>dag pa'i don la goms par byed pa'i rten brtan zhing
column5: goms pa ngang gis khyad par du 'gyur ba bsgom pa'i phyir
column6: dper na chags yul goms pa bzhin
column7: de'i chos can ni rang rig gis grub la
column8: bsgrub bya'i chos ni 'byung rung mi bsgom pa la yang yod cing 'byung nges bsgom pa la yang med pas [\[]gags [;]gegs [\]]med cing bsgom pa'i yan lag dang ma bral na 'byung nges yin te
column9: rgyu tshogs pa grangs tshang gis [\[]gags [;]gegs [\]]med na 'bras bu 'byung nges dpag nus pa <lb n=""32b8""/>bzhin no
column11: zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>s gsung ngo
column13: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-15-09,unreviewed,33b2 - 33b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""33b2""/>nyan thos rnams ni 'khor ba la yid 'byung [\[]pa [;]ba [\]]gtso bor byas pas skye ba rgyud la ji tsam zhig gis goms pa mthar thug par 'gro ba'i tshul ni
column2: ji ltar kho bos tshad ma rnam 'grel du bden pa bzhi la [\[]rten [;]brten [\]]pa dang
column3: bde dang nga dang nga yi sogs
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-15-09"">gsum pa [\[]bsgrub [;]sgrub [\]]byed kyi tshad ma ni
column6: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras </rs> rtog bral dang ma 'khrul ba <lb n=""33b3""/>so sor 'chad mod
column7: 'on kyang 'dir yang dag pa'i don mthong ste goms pa mthar thug pa la brten nas yang dag pa'i don gsal bar snang bar grub pa na rtog bral dang ma 'khrul ba grub sde gcig pas
column8: 'dir dngos su rtog bral du bsgrub pa ni gzhung gi dgongs pa yin par mngon no
column10: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-56-59,unreviewed,35a - 35a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""35a""/>6\]]mi gsal bar snang ba de'i phyir gnyid kyis bslad pa'i rkyen gzhan gyis kyang rnam par rtog pa ni gsal bar 'dzin par byed pa ma yin no

column5: brtsod pa'i lan du
column6: yang dag gnyis su bstan
column7: yang dag gnyis yod pa'i phyir ltar snang gnyis su <lb n=""35a7""/>bstan
column8: ltar snang gnyis yod pa'i phyir 'khrul pa ltar snang gi rigs logs su dbye ba dang gsum zhes gsung ngo
column10: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-58-08,unreviewed,36b,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""36b""/>5\]]par sgro btags nas tha snyad byed du zad mod
column2: de dag gi ni rnam par bzhag 'jog la tshad ma dang 'bras bur byas pa'i bsgrub bya sgrub byed ma yin pa'i phyir
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-58-08"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column4: gzhal bya ni phyi rol gyi don bden pa yin la
column5: tshad ma ni 'dra ba chos gsum ste
column6: ngo bo myong rtogs kyi bdag nyid rnam pa'i khyad par myong bya'i rnam pa shar ba nus pa'i khyad par myong bya la <lb n=""36b""/> nges pa'i shes pa 'dren nus so
column8: []'bras bu ni gzhal bya phyi rol gyi don rtogs pa'o
column10: []zhes gsung ba ni
column11: mi 'thad de
column12: </seg> 'o na shes pa don dang 'dra ba chos can
column13: don rtogs kyi [\[]bsgrub [;]sgrub [\]]byed ma yin par thal
column14: des don rtogs su 'jog par mi nus pa'i phyir
column15: </TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-59-40,unreviewed,40b1 - 40b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40b1""/>pa'o

column6: mi bden te
column7: rigs pas de kho na'i don yongs su tshol ba'i skabs su rigs pa dor nas grub mtha'i rjes su 'brang ba ni
column8: bya ba phal pa la chags pa zhes bya ba smad pa'i gnas su <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">slob dpon</rs> gyis kyang gsungs shing
column9: gzhung na'ang

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-00-38,unreviewed,42b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-00-38"">gsum pa don snang gzhal byar bstan pa ni

column4: shes pa de mdo sde pa ltar du phyi rol gyi don de dang 'dra'am

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-01-36,unreviewed,43b2 - 43b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""43b2""/>bden pa'i gcig ste cha shas med pa'i zla med dang du ma'i rang bzhin te cha shas med pa'i zla bcas rigs pa'i ngo bor med [\[]te [;]de [\]]ma dmigs pa'i phyir
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-01-36"">'di ni bzung ba tsam bden pa bkag nas 'dzin pa'ang bden par grub pa 'gog pa'i gzhung yin pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column3: shu lo ka gcig po 'dis dbu ma'i lta ba bsgrubs pa yin no zhes gsungs pa ni
column4: dbu ma'i lta ba la sbyar du <lb n=""43b3""/>mi rung [\[]pa [;]ba [\]]ma yin mod

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-02-13,unreviewed,44b2 - 44b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""44b2""/>tshad ma gcig gi bya ba yin pa'i phyir

column4: rtags kyi mtshan gzhi lhan cig dmigs nges ni tshad mas grub
column5: don dam par rang bzhin tha dad yod med dngos 'gal du nges
column6: don dam par rang bzhin tha dad la
column7: snga phyi ba dang dus mnyam pa gnyis las
column8: snga phyi ba la
column9: lhan cig tsam khegs pa na lhan cig dmigs nges khegs la
column10: <lb n=""44b3""/>dus mnyam pa la ni
column11: lhan cig dmigs nges 'gog pa la 'brel pa med pa rtags su 'god la
column12: [ \[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig ni dngos su 'brel pa med pa'i phyir zhes 'god to

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-31-25,unreviewed,5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-31-25"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
gnyis pa ni
column2: dgag rtags gang yin <lb n=""5""/>6a8\]]pa thams cad ltar rung mi dmigs par sdud de
column3: dpe la ltar rung du grub pa gcig 'gog pa'i phyir
column4: dgag rtags thams cad dpe gcig gi steng du gtan la dbab tu rung ba'i phyir ro zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">sa skya pa </rs>gsung ngo
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-28-14,unreviewed,71b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""71b4""/>pa'i rigs pa'i tshul tha dad rnam grangs pa yin no zhes gsung ba ni
column2: ma yin te
column3: de lta na gtam rgyud rgyas pa'i lugs su 'gyur ba las de ni ma yin te
column4: phyi ma la zlos tshig med pa'i phyir ro

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje sa skya pa</rs>'i gsung las

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-16-57,unreviewed,93a3 - 93a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""93a3""/>rol sangs rgyas pa la yang bsgrub bya rtogs par mi 'thad do zhes lha dbang blos bshad do
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-16-57"">gnyis pa rang gi thal ba'i ngag la mtshungs pa spang ba la
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs>  gzhan gyis khas blangs pa gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur na
column5: <rs type=""person"">phyogs kyi glang po yab sras</rs> kyis gzhan [\[]gyi [;]gyis [\]]khas blangs pa'i rtags kyis chos gzhan mi 'dod pa thal bar 'phen pa mi 'thad par 'gyur ro zhe na
column6: skyon med de
column7: de ni khyab bya'i chos gzhan gyi rtog pas kun nas brtags nas khas blangs <lb n=""93a4""/>pas khyab byed kyi chos mi 'dod pa thal bar sgrub pa ste 'phen pa yin te
column8: khyab bya ni khyab byed med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes ston pa
column9: dper na phyogs gcig la mtshon na
column10: bye brag pas ba glang gi spyi rdzas gcig yul dus rang bzhin tha dad kyi gsal ba ba lang du ma la dus cig char du 'brel bar don la yod ces dam bcas so
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-215-29-09,unreviewed,93b5 - 93b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""93b5""/>myong bzhin
column2: ba lang gi spyi yang yul dus rang bzhin du ma la 'brel bas stong pa yin no zhes pa [\[]'thun [;]mthun [\]]pa nyid can no

column1: []thal sbyor la [\[]'thun [;]mthun [\]]pa nyid ni

column3: ba lang gi spyi du mar thal
column4: zhes bkod nas ci'i phyir zhe <lb n=""93b6""/>na
column5: gang yul dus rang bzhin du ma la 'brel pa de du ma yin te
column6: dper na sor mo du ma la 'brel pa'i sen mo bzhin no

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-29-45,unreviewed,142a8 - 142a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""142a8""/>par ni sbyor ba'i 'god tshul gyi bye brag las tha dad du bshad pa yin te

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-43-12,unreviewed,153a1 - 153a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""153a1""/>
column2: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-43-12"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4576"">bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa shes rab 'bum</rs>  gyis sbyar ba las
column2: de nyid brjod bya'i don zab cing rgya che ba rnams ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas de las khyad par du byar med kyang rjod byed kyi tshig brling zhing 'ga' zhig ngag don du mdzad de
column3: gzhung la ma sbyar ba dang phal cher rgya 'grel ltar sbyar ba mang bas las dang po ba rnams [\[]kyis [;]kyi [\]]blos <lb n=""153a2b""/>lang dka' bar gyur pa dang
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4576"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> de nyid kyang 'di la snon 'brid cung zad 'dra dang
column5: zhu dag cig dgos par 'dug ste
column6: zhes yang yang gsung ba rjes su dran pa dang
column7: gzhan yang sde snod 'dzin pa mang zhig gis bskul ba'i ngor 'jug pa bde zhing brjod bya'i don rnams ma tshang ba med par ston la
column8: [ \[]brjod [;]rjod [\]]byed kyi tshig zin pa tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i sde snod 'dzin <lb n=""153a3""/>pa ltar 'gyur ba 'di ni
column9: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4576"">bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa yab sras</rs> kyi bka' drin la brten nas lung rigs man ngag gi gnad rnams phyin ci ma log par khong du chud cing
column10: 'chad pa dang
column11: rtsod pa dang
column12: rtsom pa'i tshul la blo gros kyi snang ba yongs su rgyas pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5518"">bo dong ba 'jam pa'i dbyangs sho re pa</rs>s
column13: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4369""> dpal ldan brag ram gyi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs><!--assumed to be the same as brag ram  mgon khang-->r <lb n=""153a4""/>nye bar sbyar ba 'di re shig rdzogs sho
column15: </seg></TEI>"

column3: lam 2 mi dmigs par shes pa nyid la la shes su brda' byas pa yin la chos bcu drug mi dmigs par rtogs pa la gnyen po gzhi shes su brda' byas pa mi mtshungs par</TEI>"

column3: 'jig rten pa dang sgo bstun pa'i yang log dang

column6: <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>tsan kra<?oxy_comment_end?>'i de 'jig rten pa'i blo dang bstun pa'i yang log yin zhing
