zhes smra'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1311-2024-09-26-16-212"" status=""unreviewed"">  [⁽1763⁾]'dir dgos kyang mi dgos byed na'ang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i skabs yin la de kho na nyid du 'di zhes gdab skabs su la bab la
column4: _kun rdzob kyang snang ba dang rang bzhin med pa tshogs pa nyid yin pas so sor 'phral ba'ang mi rigs pas 'di ni skabs don la nyams par mngon pas
column5: _mtha' gcig tu ma yin dgag yin byas pas chog_'di la [⁽1763⁾]<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">byang ye</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference""> kha cig dag </rs>rang bzhin med pa'i snang ba zhes ma yin dgag tu bya ba'am yang na ci yang ma yin pa'i snang ba zhes med dgag tu bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni myi 'grig par mthong ste
column6: _phan tshun 'gal ba gang rung cig 'thad na cig shos mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro
column8: </seg>

column1: snang ba dang tshogs pa myed dgag tu byed pa'i phyogs ni shin tu yang mi rigs te
column2: _snang ba sgrub chos yin pas de dang tshogs na sgrub chos ma dor bas ma yin dgag tu 'gyur zhing*
column3: _snang ba tsam yang myed na kun rdzob nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro
column5: snang ba sgrub chos yin par ma zad kyi tha snyad du rang bzhin med pa yang yongs gcod du ma grub par mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro
column7: tha snyad du rang bzhin med pa yongs gcod du grub pa'i tshul dang yang dag par ma grub pa'i tshul gyi 'thad pa ni phyis rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ro
column9: mtshan nyid gcig pa'i rang bzhin nges par bya ba la
column10: _don dam pa'i mtshan gzhi spros pa thams cad las 'das pa nas gzhi med pa'i mtshan nyid kyang med pas de kho na nyid du</TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1311-2024-09-26-16-213,unreviewed,4a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4a2""/> shes bya brjod bya gzhal bya thams cad las 'das pa yin no
zhes smra'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1311-2024-09-26-16-213"" status=""unreviewed"">[⁽1763⁾]'dir <rs type=""school"">rang rgyud kyi gzhung </rs>las gsal rgyu ni med gang zag dang chos kyi bdag thams cad bkag pa'i stong nyid rigs shes kyi yul na yod pa yin te
column4: _de ltar ma yin na shes bya dang gzhal bya med pas rigs shes shes pa dang tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur zhing dgag bya bden dngos grub par yang 'gyur ro <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs> zhes smra'o
column6: </seg>

column1: 'di dngos por ni mi 'dod gsung de ltar stong nyid yang dag par 'dod pa 'di yang dgag bya yin te
column2: _de la zhen pas kyang thar pa mi thob pas dgag dgos pa'i phyir dang*
column3: _yul rigs pas dpyad na mi rnyed pas dgag nus pa'i phyir ro
column5: yod pa sgro 'dogs kyi lta ba ni 'di dag kho nar mtha' gzhan bkag pas nges pa yin te shes bya la dngos po yod med dngos 'gal yin pas phung po gzhan mi srid la
column6: _dngos po la 'jig mi 'jig dngos 'gal yin pas phung po gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir ro
column8: gal te 'di dag don dam par yod pa dgag bya yin nam kun rdzob tu yod pa dgag bya yin zhe na

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1311-2024-09-26-16-21,unreviewed,8a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1311-2024-09-26-16-21"" status=""unreviewed"">
kha cig <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3839"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rtsang nag</rs></note>rtag pa'i dngos po ni kun rdzob du yang dgag bya yin te
column2: rtag pa [⁽1763⁾]la skye 'gag mi rung bas 'gyur med rgyu 'bras su mi rung bas shes bya'i gnas rten 'brel dang 'gal ba'i phyir dang
column3: _skyon rnying pa spang du med cing yon tan gsar pa bskyed du med pas 'bras bu <lb n=""8a8""/> bde legs dang 'gal ba'i phyir dang
column4: phan tshun 'gal bas de lta bu'i dngos po mi srid pa'i phyir ro
column6: mi rtag pa'i dngos po ni de las bzlog pas na tha snyad du yod la de nyid bden pa'i dngos po bkag pa'i ngo bo yod pas stong nyid [⁽1763⁾]las thams cad 'byung bas kyang tha snyad du yod pa yin no
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1310-2024-09-26-16-25,unreviewed,8a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a8""/> bde legs dang 'gal ba'i phyir dang
column2: phan tshun 'gal bas de lta bu'i dngos po mi srid pa'i phyir ro
column4: mi rtag pa'i dngos po ni de las bzlog pas na tha snyad du yod la de nyid bden pa'i dngos po bkag pa'i ngo bo yod pas stong nyid [⁽1763⁾]las thams cad 'byung bas kyang tha snyad du yod pa yin no
column5: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1310-2024-09-26-16-25"" status=""unreviewed"">

column2: de'i phyir de gnyis ni de kho na nyid du dgag bya yin no zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref="""" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tsha </rs><rs type=""school"">rang rgyud pa</rs>'i grub mtha' dang bstun na shin tu legs te <rs type=""school"">dbu chen </rs>ltar na </note> legs par mi sems te
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1310-2024-09-26-10-17,unreviewed,18a7 - 18a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1310-2024-09-26-10-17"" status=""unreviewed"">

2 pa la <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref="""" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tsa</rs>'i rjes sa 'brangs nas</note> chos can bsgrub bya gtan tshigs kyi don 3+res <lb n=""18a7""/>par bya ba la
column2: dang po ni chos can du snang ba thams cad tshogs pa'i spyi 'god na <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref="""" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tsha</rs> na re na byis par sa bcu'i dbang phyug gis kyang</note> mi 'grub cing bye brag 'ga' zhig 'god na gzhan la bden par yod pa'i sgro 'dogs mi chod pas <note type=""gloss>"">nyi tshe bar 'gyur gyi</note> khyab pa'i stong nyid mi 'grub bo zhes rtog na
column3: ma yin te snang ba tsam gyi rigs kyi spyi <note type=""gloss"">ces sgro btags nas yin gyi bden par mi 'dod</note> 'god pas de <note type=""gloss"">ldog pa gnyis tshogs grub pa na chig rkyang ma grub par 'gal bas</note> yul dus rnam pa'i bye brag gi steng du ma dpyad pa'i mngon sum gyis grub la
column4: snang ba tsam gyi spyi la bden par <lb n=""18a8""/>yod pa'i sgro 'dogs dngos su khegs pas bye brag thams cad la yang bden par yod pa'i sgro 'dogs shugs la khegs pas nyi tshe ba'i stong par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1311-2024-10-2113-06-56,unreviewed,18a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a8""/>yod pa'i sgro 'dogs dngos su khegs pas bye brag thams cad la yang bden par yod pa'i sgro 'dogs shugs la khegs pas nyi tshe ba'i stong par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1311-2024-10-2113-06-56"" status=""unreviewed"">  yang skabs <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">gangs she</rs> zer te 'dir skabs su bab gsungs la 'ga' zhig du ni pha rol gang la log_rtog zhugs pa'i gzhi chos can du 'god la
column4: _de pha rol gyi khas blangs kyis grub cing*
column5: _de [⁽1763⁾]kho nyid gzhan la log par mi rtog na tsam gyis pha rol gyi ngor khyab pa'i stong pa yang grub pa yin no
column7: </seg>

column1: gnyis pa ni ci rang bzhin med pa ma yin dgag gam med dgag rtags kyi bsgrub bya yin grang*
column2: _dang po ltar na rtags kyi bsgrub bya [⁽1763⁾]gang yin pa de rigs shes kyi gzhal bya yin pas ma yin dgag don dam du 'gyur la
column3: _gnyis pa ltar na rigs shes chos dang chos can tshogs pa'i spyi ma 'jal bas rjes dpag ma yin par 'gyur zhing [⁽1763⁾]zer te</TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex13112024-10-2113-14-43,unreviewed,18a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a8""/>yod pa'i sgro 'dogs dngos su khegs pas bye brag thams cad la yang bden par yod pa'i sgro 'dogs shugs la khegs pas nyi tshe ba'i stong par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13112024-10-2113-14-43"" status=""unreviewed"">[⁽1763⁾]<rs type=""person"" ana="""">tsha na re</rs> spyir de ma thag rkyen du 'gyur ba la shes pa gzhan gyis chod na skyon du 'gyur gyi dus gzhan gyis chod pas mi skyon de 'gog pa la zhugs pa bzhin no
column5: des na mnyam par 'jog kha ma'i shes pa nyid la skye'o
column7: <rs type=""school"">phar phyin pa</rs> kun la yang mnyam bzhag snang ba yod med gnyis la med pa'i lugs kyang 'di dang mthun pa 'dra zhes gsungs
column8: _<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre </rs>ni khong <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>thal ba<?oxy_comment_end?> yang min te mnyam bzhag na shesapa dngos po la yod cing mnyam bzhag gi blo ngo na med pas spros par mi 'gyur gsung ste babs che che 'dra
column9: _so sa bon las skye'i mngon gyur med pas zer

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung na re</rs> mnyam bzhag don dam yin zhing <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>thal bas<?oxy_comment_end?> mnyam bzhag na sems rgyun chad dgos la
column2: _rjes shes ni kun rdzob tu rang gi rigs snga ma las skye ste bum pa'i bden gnyis bzhin zer te <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>go rgyu tsam mi 'dug<?oxy_comment_end?>_rang gi rtog pa la mnyam bzhag na mi rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyun ma bcad par bde
column3: _de rnal 'byor mngon sum yin min ni chos nyid la ltos nas mngon sum dang shes pa gnyis char btags pa ba ste
column4: _gzung ba dang shes bya nyid med pas so
column6: shes pa nyid pa ste mi rtog par gnas so
column9: mnyam bzhag gis ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa bshad zin to
column13: </seg>

column1: rjes la thob pa la bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa ni
column2: _mnyam bzhag gi chos nyid spros pa med dgag gi tshul gyis rtogs bya rjes shes la kun rdzob rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba snang ba tsam 'byung la des rang bzhin med par sgyu ma lta bur byis pas spyi'i tshul dang*
column3: _rgyu la gnas pa'i 'phags pas mngon sum du shes par byas nas sngar bshad pa'i kun rdzob byang sems kyis zin pa'i sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus la sogs pa'i 'khor gsum ma dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snang ba dang bcas pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs sog par byed pa yin no
column5: de la sbyin pa ni</TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex13112024-10-2113-08-51,unreviewed,18a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a8""/>yod pa'i sgro 'dogs dngos su khegs pas bye brag thams cad la yang bden par yod pa'i sgro 'dogs shugs la khegs pas nyi tshe ba'i stong par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13112024-10-2113-08-51"" status=""unreviewed""> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog lo</rs></note> gal te yul brdzun pa dang blo 'khrul par shes pas de ltar mi 'gyur ro zhes kyang brjod par mi nus te
column4: [ ⁽1763⁾]de ma yin la der 'dzin gyi zhen yul la 'khrul pa med kyang snang yul la 'khrul pa'i log shes yod pas ma rig pa'i rab rib ma spangs par 'gyur [⁽1763⁾]zhing de lta na sangs rgyas nyid min par <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>thal ba<?oxy_comment_end?>'i phyir ro
column6: </seg>

column1: gnyis pa ni byang chub sems dpa' don grub lta bu gcig nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe sprul pa bye ba phrag brgya la sogs pa 'gyed pa na
column2: _de rnyed [⁽1763⁾]mang po rnams kyi ye shes yod na rig pa'i rgyun la thog ma yod par 'gyur la
column3: _med na gang med pa de dag ye shes phun sum tshogs par mi rung ngo*
column5: gal te rgyud kyis bsdus pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni longs spyod rdzogs sku nyag gcig yin la
column6: _sprul pa'i sku gdul bya'i ngo na snang ba tsam yin pas na rgyud kyis bsdus pa'i ye shes med pas nyes pa med do zhes kyang brjod par mi nus te
column7: _brtag pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro
column9: gzhan yang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa yul du mi byed na de mkhyen par mi 'thad cing yul du byed na 'gags pa dang ma skyes pas med pa'i don 'dzin pa 'khrul par ji ltar mi 'gyur
column10: _gal te mi snang yang da ltar gyi dngos po snang ba'i shugs la rtogs pa yin no snyam na ma yin te
column11: _rang la sgro 'dogs med kyang</TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1310-13112023-09-15-112027,unreviewed,18a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a8""/>yod pa'i sgro 'dogs dngos su khegs pas bye brag thams cad la yang bden par yod pa'i sgro 'dogs shugs la khegs pas nyi tshe ba'i stong par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1310-13112023-09-15-112027"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">bde bar gshegs pa'i <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>bka' rab 'byams <?oxy_comment_end?>kyi don gsal bar byed pa <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3720"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub</rs> kyi <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4569"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""> dbu ma rigs pa'i tshogs kyi rgyan de kho na nyid snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba snyigs ma'i dus na bde bar gshegs pa lnga brgya bdun pa la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5745""> gangs ri'i khrod la kha ba can gyi ljongs</rs> su 'khrungs pa
column4: brtul zhugs kyi khur 'dzin cing bka' dang bstan bcos kyi gzhung rab 'byams la rtogs pa'i snang ba thob pa'i mkhas pa'i skye bo dam pa du ma bsten pa yis bstan pa'i khur 'dzin cing zab mo'i don la rigs pa'i dbang phyug tu gyur pa lta ba ngan pa'i rgol ba ma lus par 'joms par mdzad pa
column5: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3842"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">shAkya'i dge slong byang chub brtson 'grus </rs> kyis sbyar ba rdzogs s+ho
column7: </seg> dge'o
column9: bde legs su gyur cig
column12: </TEI>"

column1: 2_055_10 Ral gri_seng ge sgra man ngag.xml,2_055_10,,ex55102024-09-3016-41-552,reviewed,1b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b4""/> man ngag zab mo<seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex55102024-09-3016-41-552"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4065"">btsun pa zi'u<!--read: ze'u--></rs>s phyag dpe' la bris pa'o
column3: <note type=""editorial"">Comparing with the colophon of the instance of the <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4967"">rNam snang  bsgom thabs</rs>, we take ""btsun pa ze'u"" to be the scribe, presumably here also <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4065"">Ze'u grags shes</rs>, and read ""phyag dpe' la"" as ""phyag dpe' las"", presumably indicating the source as being the author's own exemplar.</note> dag go
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column3: theg pa gang dang yang mi 'gal ba de ni thun mong pa spyi yin la

column21: _gzung rnam ni rang la sngon po'i rnam pa shar nas sngon po [\[p.126-9\]]<lb n=""2b9""/>la kha phyir phyogs ste 'jal byed du zhugs pa'i blo nyid la bzhed do

column4: _de las gzhan du'ang 'bras bu skyed pa yin zhing
column5: _cig char don byed pa ni
column6: _dus gnyis pa kho nar 'bras bu skyed pa yin no

column1: []de lta na dus 'di dang dus gzhan tsam chos can
column2: _dngos po tha dad yin pas khyab ste
column3: _'gal ba'i chos ldan gyi dngos po yin pas khyab pa'i phyir
column4: _dper na sngon po dang sngo min gyi dngos po bzhin no

column1: khyab pa ni dpe'i steng du mngon sum gyis grub bo
column3: phyogs chos kyang dus snga phyi tsam la 'bras bu dang nye [\[p.172-5\]]ring sogs 'du ba 'gal bas khyab pa mngon sum gyis nges so

column1: []de lta na dus snga phyi tsam la dngos po tha dad kyi khyab pa grub pas dus skad cig gis phye ba na yang
column2: _skad cig dang po dang gnyis pa sogs dngos po tha dad du grub cing
column3: [ \[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pa yang dus du ma dang 'brel bas [\[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pa la skad cig ma du mas khyab par grub bo

column1: []cig char gyis don byed pa de la yang
column2: _don byed [\[p.172-6\]]pa'i phyi dus gzhan tsam chos can
column3: _rgyu 'gags pas khyab ste
column4: _'bras bu skyes pas khyab pa'i phyir
column5: _dper na bum pa skyes pa na 'jim pa 'gags pas khyab pa bzhin no

column1: khyab pa dpe'i steng du mngon sum gyis nges so
phyogs chos kyang mngon sum gyis grub bo
column3: de lta na phyi dus gzhan tsam la rgyu 'gags pas khyab pa grub pa na
column4: _dus la skad cig gis phye ba na yang skad cig cig char rgyu 'gags pas [\[p.172-7\]]<lb n=""25b7""/>khyab pa grub pas cig char don byed pa la skad cig gis khyab pa grub bo zhes gsungs so
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022025-01-0814-32-313,finalized,1b1 - 1b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022025-01-0814-32-313"" status=""finalized"">

<l>rgyal sras myu gu byang chub sems
<l>gzhan don spyod pas legs bsrungs pa'i
<l>'bras bu rdzogs pa rang gzhan don
<lb n=""1b2""/> <l>lhun grub sku la gus pas 'dud
<l><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4625"">mdo sde kun las btus pa'i don
column3: gsal byed nyi ma'i snying po</rs> 'di

column1: <l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3876""><abbr>ye shes</abbr></rs> dang ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus</rs> kyi
<l>mying ×can gsung bzhin legs bshad brtsam
column3: </l></seg>

column1: gang gi blo gros pad mo la
column3: nyi 'od gsung gi 'od shar bas
column5: kha 'byad mthong na dga' ba 'di
column7: sngan chad ma rnyed ngo mtshar che
column9: </TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2024-10-02-12-45,reviewed,1b5 - 1b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2024-10-02-12-45"" status=""reviewed""> dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsha ba</rs></note> na re chos <lb n=""1b6""/>nyan pa la spro ba bskyed pa ni
column3: chos nyan pa'i 'bras bu dang
column4: chos <choice><corr>kyi</corr><sic>kya</sic></choice> rang bzhin bzang pa dang
column5: nyan pa po skal ba dang ldan par brjod pa'i sgo nas te
column6: dang po ni 'bras bu mi 'dod pa spong pa dang
column7: 'dod pa sgrub pa'i bdag nyid do

column1: de'i yang dang po ni sdug ×bsngal gyi ngo bo dang
column2: de'i rgyu spong pa gnyis kyis te
column3: dang po ni gang ma thos pas ces pa yin la
column5: <lb n=""1b7""/> de yang chos ma thos na 'di lta bu'i nyes pa 'byung zhes shes dmigs dngos su brjod pas shugs kyis thos na sdug  bsngal spong par bstan ste
column6: des na de ni mnyan phyir nus pas skyed ces pa ni skabs kyi don to

column1: gnyis pa ni gang thos nas kyang ces pa yin no
'dod pa sgrub pa ni bde ba las ni ces pa yin la
column2: chos kyi rang bzhin bzung pa ni shin tu <lb n=""1b8""/> snyed dka'i ces pa yin zhing
column3: nyan pa po skal ba dang ldan bar brjod pa ni dam thob ces pa'o

column1: de ltar gsum gyis nye bar gnas pa'i skye bo dag chos nyan par spos ba bsgrubs nas
column2: nye bar mi gnas pa rjes su bzung pa ni khams gsum ces pa yin no
column3: zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>
column5: </seg>

column1: de la re shig tshigs su bcad pa dang po'i shugs kyis sdug bsngal gyi ngo bo spong pa</TEI>"

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2024-10-08-15-12,reviewed,5b1 - 5b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b1""/> bsgrubs na phyis mi snyed pa'i nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba ni gal te ces pa'i rtsa ba gnyis te phan pa ni de'i sa bon no
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2024-10-08-15-12"" status=""reviewed""> de lta yin dang 'dir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3809"">jo btsun khyung</rs></note> na re dal ba dang 'byor pa ni tha dad pa ni ma yin te
column4: mi khom pa brgyad las log pa yang de'i rang gi 'byor pa lnga las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir dang
column5: gnas la dad pa yang bsam pa yin pas lus kyi rten du bsdu bar mi 'thad <lb n=""5b2""/> pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr>

column1: des na 'dir dal 'byor ni 'grel pa byed pas mi khom pa brgyad spangs te khom ldan zhes bshad pa ltar yin la de nyid lung gzhan gyis phun sum 'tshogs pa ×bcur bshad pa yang yod do zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>
column3: </seg>

column1: de ni ma yin te dal ba ni bral ba la brjod la 'byor pa ni ldan pa'i cha yin pas na de 2 dngos po
tha mi dad kyang ldog pa tha dad pas
column3: rnam par gzhan</TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2025-01-08-423,unreviewed,9a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a2""/> pa ni snga na tshogs pa'i yul can kun la
dmigs pa'i sems zhes zer mod kyi
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2025-01-08-423"" status=""unreviewed""> 'di 2 gyis khyad par ni rim pa lhur <abbr>sems can</abbr> gyi don

column1: du chos sku thob par 'dod pa dang
column2: gzugs kyi sku thob par 'dod par ste <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo chen po</rs>'i gsung dang mthun pa <abbr>yin no</abbr>
column4: </seg>

column1: de lta yin dang skabs 'dir smon pa dang 'jug pa'i dbang du
byas nas gzhung du bshad pa la lnga ste
column2: thun mong gi phan yon dang</TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2025-01-08429,unreviewed,10b5 - 10b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""10b5""/> na
column2: de bas na de ltar

column1: zhes smos te
column2: byang chub seMs dpa' dmyal bar song bar gsungs pa lastsogs pa de dag gar

column1: gis te
column2: bzod pa thob nas ngan 'gro zad cing theg pa dman par mi lhung pa'i phyiro

column1: des na mos pa rab la spyod pa'i byang chub seMs dpa' la sems bskyed pa yod pa lta smos
su yang med do
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2025-01-08429"" status=""unreviewed"">de ni zhes bya ba la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kha 1</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3805"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">zhang</rs></note> seMs bskyes pa'i rgyal <lb n=""10b6""/> ba'i

column1: blo gros lasogs pa mos pa ma rdzogs par ma grub ste mos pa chen po pa yin zhes rtog pa'i
lams sbyar te mos pa chen po yod ni dgon mchog phyin gyi mdo las
column2: las 'di lta bu'i yon

column1: tan shug chos dang ldan bar gsungs pas ngan song du song pa'i rgyal ba'i blo gros lasogs
pa dang 'gal
column3: zhes sbyar bas <abbr>'chad do</abbr>
column5: </seg>

column1: de ni yi ge'i don ma yin te dgos</TEI>"

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2025-01-081,reviewed,11b7 - 11b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11b7""/> bslab bsdus su
yang mi sgrub par thal ba'i phyir
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2025-01-081"" status=""reviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">blo gros chen po dag</rs> <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsha ba</rs> 'di 'gro ba 'dod dang

column1: 'gro ba yis
column2: ces pa'i tshul gyis 'gro ba'i bya ba la dmigs pa'i blo rnam pa 2 po 'gro ba'i bya ba nyams su ma myong pa'i dus na yod pa'i dod pa tsam dang
column3: 'gro ba'i bya ba mngon du gyur pa'i dbye ba tha dad pa ltar
column4: byang chub la dmigs pa'i blo 2 kyang smon pa <lb n=""11b8""/> ni yul nyaMs su ma myong pa'i dus kyi 'dod pa tsam yin la
column5: 'jug pa ni dmigs yul byang chub nyaMs su myong pa'i dus na yin pas de mthong laM skyes pa na yin te
column6: des na smon pa ni yang dag pa blangs pa brda' las thob pa yin la
column7: 'jug pa ni chos nyid kyis thob pa <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>
column9: </seg>

column1: de slob dpon gyi bsaM pa ma yin te dpyod 'jug nas
seMs de yang dag</TEI>"

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2024-10-02-13-18,unreviewed,12a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12a1""/>
column3: blangs 'gyur pa ces 'jug pa blangs pa la ltos pa gsungs pa'i phyir

column1: dang
column2: bslab btus su so so'i skye bo rten du bsgrub pa la 2 su phye ba'i phyiro
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2024-10-02-13-18"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kha 1</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3805"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">zhang</rs></note>byang chub dang seMn la dmigs pa'i bsam pa ni smon pa yin la

column1: bsgrub pa dang 'brel laM ma 'brel yang sla ste
column2: des kuns bslang nas rgyu spyod pa

column1: nyaMs su len pa'i bsaM pa ni 'jug pa yino zhes zero
column3: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2024-10-02-13-42,unreviewed,12a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2024-10-02-13-42"" status=""unreviewed""> yang slob dpon

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kha 1</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3745"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">jo bo rje</rs></note>na re 'jug pa dang sdom pa ni thaMd du du yin ces gsung
ste gzhung gi dgongs pa 'ang de nyid yin par <abbr>sems so</abbr>
phye ba'i don bshad pa la 2 te
column2: smon pa dang
column3: 'jug pa'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2025-01-08444,unreviewed,15b8 - 16b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b8""/> pa dang
column2: chos kyi sbyin pa skye ba dran par

column1: gsungs pa dang
column2: gang mthong pa'i rkyen gyis stong pa dran par 'gyur ba sangs rgyas

column1: mthong pa'i rgyu la 'bad pa dang
column2: phyogs thaMd du sen thaMd byang chub 'dud pas rmi la

column1: na byang chub kyi sems mi 'dod zhes 'chad par 'gyur ba la bslabs pas so zhes ston pa ni ji ltar zhes bya ba'o
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2025-01-08444"" status=""unreviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsha ba</rs> ni tshe rabs gzhan du ste brtson gyi 'du shes <pb n=""16b""/><lb n=""16b1""/> nyes pa na 'gal zla spyad kyang stong pa mi gtong ste
column5: chos 'dul ba las

column3: sngo brtson ste brtson nyid du 'du shes na
column5: dngos gzhi min na bug pa chung dang

column1: ldan
column3: zhes gsungs pa bzhin

column1: bsrung pa'i sems dpa' med pas stong pa'i bya ba yang mi
byed de
column3: des na thal bas gsogs pa'i me zhan du gnas so zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>
column5: </seg>

column1: de ni ma yin te don
mi byed na yod pa nyid du rnam 'jog</TEI>"

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2025-01-08434,unreviewed,34b6 - 34b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""34b6""/>
nas sgras na 'ang lhung par 'gyur na
column2: rim pa zhan du chags pas mi tshangs par spyod pa

column1: dang gzhan gyi nor bsdus pa dang srog bcad pa dang rdzun du smra ba rnams lta smos su
yang med do zhes zer
column3: de yang mi rigs te nyan thos la lhung par 'gyur ba'i rgyus byang

column1: chub seMs dpa' la lhung par ma nges pa'i phyiro
column3: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2025-01-08434"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i rjes su 'brang pa kha 1</rs> na re bdag ston gzhan la smod pa 2 dang <lb n=""34b7""/> chos dang nor mi ster ba 2 dang

column1: bzod pa mi len ba dang gzhan 'tshog pa na dang
column2: theg chen spong pa dang chos ltar snang

column1: pa brjod pa 2 te dngos su bshad pa byad dang
column2: don gyis go ba nyan thos kyi rtsa ba'i

column1: nyes pa na ste bcu 2 yino zhes zer ro
column3: </seg>

column1: de yang ches mi rigs te nyan thos kyi na snga ma
dang mtshungs shing
column2: brgyad po nyid la byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang sdom pa nyi shu pa

column1: las zhar bshad pa la</TEI>"

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022024-10-2514-47-21,unreviewed,54a4 - 54a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022024-10-2514-47-21"" status=""unreviewed""><lb n=""54a4""/> gzhan yang sa ma thob pa la byas na gzhan la ni
ma yino zhes bya ba'i gzhan gyi sgra'i don sa thob pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
mi spyod pa la 'gro bas don ma 'brel par 'gyur ba dang
column2: lam ta bu mi zhes bya ba'i skad

column1: la dgag pa'i tshig med pas sa ma thob par byed pa 'khrul pa kho na'o zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kha 1</rs> 'chad do

column3: 'on kyang 'dir pha rol phyin drug spyod pa zhes bya ba khyad par nye bar <lb n=""54a5""/> bzung pa dang
column4: sngar brjod pa'i gzhung gzhan la brten nas kyang 'di ni sa ma thob

column1: pa'i dbang du byas pa'o zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kho bo</rs>s rtogs te
column2: mig dang mi ldan pa'i rtogs pa la su

column1: zhig yid stod par byed zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3876"">nyang bran</rs> 'chad do
column3: </seg>

column1: 'di dag</TEI>"

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022025-01-082,reviewed,60n5 - 60b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60n5""/> brtson
'grus la drug las mtshams sbyor ba ni de ltar zhes pa ste
column2: thos pa la brtson 'grus ma brtsaMs pa'i nyes pa ni gzhan du na zhes pa lung dang bcas pa'o
column4: <seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022025-01-082"" status=""reviewed""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs></note> 'di la ha cang ma 'brel te
column5: thos pa la brtson 'grus ma brtsaMs na gang zhig chud za bar 'gyur ba'i thos

column1: pa nyid med pa'i phyir dang
column2: des na lung yang ma 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr>
column4: des na 'di ni <note type=""gloss"">'ga' zhig gis °° par zad pas</note> de lta <lb n=""60b6""/> thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems sbyang pa'i phyir dgon pa la gnas par bya'o
column6: gzhan du na de'i thos pa chud za bar 'gyur te zhes gong du sbyar na <abbr>legs so</abbr> zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha 1</rs> 'chad do
column8: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022025-01-084,reviewed,60b6 - 60b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60b6""/> thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems sbyang pa'i phyir dgon pa la gnas par bya'o

column4: gzhan la brtson 'grus ma brtsams na thos pa la brtson 'grus brtsaMs kyang ngan song na thos pas skyob mi nus pas thos ba <lb n=""60b7""/> dam bar 'gyur zhes  'chad do

column1: de ni ma yin te thos ngang la brtson 'gras brtsaMs pa nyid skabs don yin

column2: thugs kyi me long yongs <lb n=""91a7""/> su dag pa la byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po × snang zhing dben pa'i gnas la thugs gzhol ba mtshan nas brjod par dka' ba'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6392"">slob dpon dbang phyug rin chen</rs> zhes bya ba'i zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos blangs nas
column3: mkhas pa'i skye bo chen po lung dang rigs pa la rtogs pa'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3876"">chos kyi ye shes</rs> zhes bya <lb n=""91a8""/> ba dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> zhes bya ba'i legs par bshad pa la sgro skur gnyis dang bral bar smra ba
column4: × <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3911"">shag kya'i dge slong gzhon nu rin chen</rs> gyis legs par sbyar ba
column6: × rdzogs s+O
column10: bkra shis par gyur gcig
column12: </seg></TEI>"
